story:
Hi, I'm Paul.

Like you, I'm in video meetings all day long. And when someone calls my name, I need to unmute quickly. If I don’t, bad things happen. My coworkers start wondering if I’m paying attention. Then someone says… “Paul, you’re on mute!” I look dumb. I don’t get the promotion. Damn you Zoom! 

After suffering too many of these moments, I called my buddy Tom, and together we built mütesync, the visual mute button. 

No more fumbling around to toggle your mute status. With our button, you can quickly update your mute status with a quick button press.

It's more than a mute button. The colorful light shows everyone around you if your mic is live. Maybe now your partner won't yell "We need more toilet paper!" when you're unmuted.

If the host or teacher mutes you, or you mute from the meeting app, the button changes color to stay in sync. 

By default, the mute button light is off when you're not in a meeting, red when you are in a meeting with the mic live, and yellow when in a meeting but the mic is muted.  But you can choose any colors you like to represent "not in meeting," "muted," and "live." 

 

 

Some of our early beta users wanted the the ability to switch the mütesync button to be a video toggle. So we're happy to add this Bonus Feature: Video Toggle!

 

Our mütesync app works with popular smart bulbs like Philips Hue and Wyze via home the automation platform, Home Assistant.  Use mütesync to project your mute status far and wide so your family and friends will know whether they can yell at you!

 

We've been shipping mute buttons since 2020 so we know what it takes to deliver a product on time and on budget. We're offering our largest discount ever for early bird backers.

 

Ever since we launched our first mute button back in late 2020 we've been adding new features and support each week. By the time we launch this new mute button, you'll have the benefit of getting a product that's been time-tested by hundred of users!

 

We've been working hard to bring this new button to life for months. We're already close to being production-ready so you can have your mute button this summer! 

 

We knew we needed to bring in experts so we hired an experienced team of manufacturing experts (Hi Kickstart Design ?). They have tons of experience bringing consumer electronic products to market and had the contacts we needed to establish our supply chain.  In 2020 we were able to mass manufacture our last mute button and iron out many of the wrinkles in fulfillment. Our supply chain is built and just needs your support to scale it to mass manufacturing!

Our Injection Molding Apparatus

 

Printed Circuit Board in Injection Molded Enclosure

During the prototyping phase, we were able to test every aspect of the button to make sure we got things just right. The button press is perfect. We added just enough sound and tactile (feel) response so you know the button is pressed but it doesn't make noise during your meeting.  The button's rubber base prevents slipping and the smooth rounded corners and compact size make the button fit perfectly under your hand.

 

We first launched with Mac support for the Zoom App but have added Windows support and a handful of the most popular meeting apps. With the funds we raise on Kickstarter, we'll be able to add support for even more more video meeting platforms.

Our native mütesync application runs on your Mac or PC:

  • Mac: Version 10.10 (Yosemite) and newer
  • PC: Windows 7 and newer

Current video conference tools we support:

  • Zoom App
  • Google Meet (via Chrome Browser)
  • Whereby (via Chrome Browser)
  • Discord (via Chrome Browser)
  • Teams (via Chrome Browser)

What's on the roadmap

  • Teams, Full App Support
  • BlueJeans
  • Cisco WebEx
  • Discord, Full App Support
  • Safari Browser
  • Amazon Chime

 It's one thing to fall in love with your own product. (We did!) But the overwhelmingly positive feedback from those who got their hands on our latest prototype has been absolutely inspiring. We are sure you will love this mute button.

Tom (cool aviator glasses guy) and I (sporting the man bun) met at a San Francisco Bay Area start-up where we designed and built some pretty amazing technology. The startup was acquired by a larger company and we both found ourselves in a lot more meetings. One day I asked Tom to do some fancy keybindings so I could mute Zoom faster,  and poof... mütesync was born in mid-2020. 

Since then we've built out our brand, app, prototype, and product.  Our free "virtual mute button" has hundreds of downloads and we've sold our mute button prototypes across the globe. We know how to build great products and we're excited to work with you, our backer, to bring our new mütesync mute button to life!

Paul and Tom, founders of mütesync

Building sophisticated electronics hardware was a fun challenge for Tom and me. But we didn't go it alone! We found Cameron and the crew at Kickstart Design who have been amazing partners throughout the entire process.  Kickstart Design is a Milwaukee-based design firm with a team of expert designers & engineers. Whether it be industrial design, prototyping, or manufacturing, Kickstart design can help turn your ideas into a reality.

 

As with any new product there are risks with manufacturing, bugs in the software, and the occasional global pandemic. The good news is that we've already spent almost a year designing, testing, and manufacturing our previous mute button software and hardware. We have tested our suppliers, our software has been installed and run thousands of times, and we already solved many of the unexpected issues that tend to come up when you launch a new product.

All our packaging is 100% paper. In addition, we designed the product so internal components can be easily accessed. This means that in the rare case that there is an issue with the button, we are able to repair the product rather than send it to the landfill. Let's keep plastic out of our rivers and oceans!

story:
Welcome to the new era of task lighting. The LUXI MX1 PLUS is as sleek and innovative as your laptop, tablet, or desktop monitor.

 


 

LUXI is loaded with innovative features such as comfort vision, easy touch LEDs, simple installation, auto on/off functionality, and smart control. LUXI's portable design and USB-C charging is perfect for your busy lifestyle.

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 



LUXI is compatible with your smart devices (iOS and Android). Enjoy an even more intuitive task lighting experience with the ability to adjust light settings remotely and customize as needed. Simply update the firmware to stay up to date.

 

 

 

 

 

Experience the power of LUXI from the comfort of your home or while you're on the move. With LUXI, you'll have perfect task lighting every time, everywhere. Your eyes are worth it.

 

 

Each LUXI MX1 PLUS includes 1x USB-C Cable per unit for a simple and easy setup.

story:
Are you looking for the perfect grill for your next camping trip?

Are you looking for something lightweight and dependable?

Then we’ve got the combo for you.

Everyone loves BBQ and other grilled foods when they’re camping. But cleaning, moving, and storing your grill is always a challenge. Often, a typical grill's bulky size and general lack of storage space are obstacles for outdoor lovers.

 

 

The Septem Titanium Camp Grill has been specifically designed to suit the needs of lightweight camping and bushcraft expeditions. It’s large enough to cook two steaks side-by-side but small enough to slide in your pack without taking up any valuable space. This is the perfect cooking unit for those looking to save on weight without compromising on quality. Every detail has been precisely engineered and constructed to ensure this grill will last you a lifetime.

 

READY FOR YOUR NEXT ADVENTURE IN THE WILDERNESS.

 

Half Hotplate & Half Grill 

Innovative Design 

Two versatile cooking methods on such a small grill plate. Two ways to cook the food you love, wherever you are.

 

 

Portable & Convenient - Simple Design 

This mini bushcraft grill is the perfect balance of durability and weight. It fits perfectly into any backpack, rucksack, or go bag and is just the right size for the job. It’s guaranteed to be a solid addition to your camping, hiking, backpacking, and survival gear collection.

 

 

Cooking On The Go - Practical Design 

Super lightweight at only 200 grams for the small one and 415 grams for the large one, it’s easy to carry on both short and long trips. Perfect for boiling water, reheating food, grilling, searing, and cooking.

 

 

Made from Titanium 

Long-Lasting Design 

High-grade pure titanium, known for its unparalleled strength and durability, seemed like the perfect foundation for a new generation of outdoor gear.

 

Anti-Bacterial

When titanium is exposed to air, an ultra-thin layer of titanium atoms interact with the oxygen to create a nano-coating of titanium dioxide (Titania). Titania-based nanocomposites subjected to light are remarkably effective in repelling microbial growth.

In simple terms? This makes your food safer to eat, stay fresher, and taste better.

 

 

Specifications

 

 

 

We're excited to be back with our sixth time create, here are the available add-ons from our previous successful campaigns. Once you've backed our campaign, you can add additional items. All the add-on items are free shipping!

 

 

 

 

WHO WE ARE 

From small beginnings come great things. What started as a seed planted in an adventurer’s mind turned into a company that creates, innovates, and delivers lightweight, durable, and cutting-edge gear for outdoor enthusiasts around the world.

“Our relentless pursuit of making things better, of answering questions, and of finding solutions continues to drive us. It’s our bedrock, our reason to be. We’re excited to have you along for the ride."

story:
We’re proud to introduce our fourth project: EATI. 

It is a camping utensil that seeks to combine the versatility of a multi-tool with the aesthetic treatment of a consumer product, and is set to change the way you camp. Whether you’re camping in your backyard, or backpacking around the world, EATI makes it easier to carry light, while still having everything you need to make your mealtimes enjoyable.

 

If you’re a backer of our previous projects, then you’re know how much we love titanium. Like all our previous products, EATI is made from pure titanium—it’s the perfect metal for ultralight, multi-use tools like this. Titanium is natural, non-toxic and eco-friendly material.

When titanium is exposed to air, an ultra-thin layer of titanium atoms interacts with the oxygen to create a nano-coating of titanium dioxide (Titania). Titania-based nanocomposites subjected to light are remarkably effective in repelling microbial growth.

In simple terms? This makes your food safer to eat and tastes fresher, and better.

 

There’s a lot that happens on a camping trip. Ever found yourself needing to open a box, cut a cord, light a fire, slice bread, eat, and pry open a beer, all at the same time? And why take different utensils and camp tools, if you can take just one instead?

Then we’ve got your solution. EATI is the ultimate eating utensil and food preparation tool for any camping situation.

So whether you’re out hiking, picnicking at the beach, or fueling up at the office, EATI makes it easier to prepare your own meals out-of-home.  

The SEPTEM team is passionate about minimizing our environmental impact. So, we came up with the idea of making the EATI packaging useful, too. It’s the product packaging your EATI tool comes in, and also doubles as a carry pouch and a cutting board. Easy to clean non-stick surface, a great (BPA free) reusable alternative to disposables.

 

Remember the weird taste that you get with stainless steel? Titanium is completely tasteless, as it causes no allergic reaction. Eat what you want, when you want, and fall in love with camp cooking again.

We always worry about coated products though - when the coating comes off, how much of it am I eating?

This never happens with Titanium. It’s durable, non-corrosive, and has no coating at all. And it’s virtually indestructible; titanium can withstand seawater for 4000 years without any chance of corrosion. That’s why every EATI comes with a lifetime warranty (that far eclipses our own!)   

 

About us

SEPTEM was established by a small design team who are passionate about bringing cool, sleek technology ideas to life, as well as striving to inspire others and foster an exploratory mindset.

Design is our passion, our hobby, and our vocation. With this project, we’re trying to bring something new to the world, and Kickstarter is an amazing platform to do that. We design to last.  Durable and re-usable, Food safe, recyclable materials.  

Our supporters receive the best prices and get the unique chance to follow the whole manufacturing process from start to finish. We’re super excited to be back with our fourth project.

story:
Story

We’re YSMART. We design and make cool EDC products. After the success of our TIPEN 1.0 with 2000+ backers and 10000+ products fulfilled, we received a heap of great feedback.  Now we are glad to be back with our crowdfunding campaign #4.

 

 

A Pen That Completely Changes The Rules. 

TIPEN 2.0 is the world’s smallest, lightest and toughest pen.

 

 

As small as a key, we made TIPEN 2.0 even lighter. But this doesn’t mean it’s fragile. Its Grade 5 Titanium body is waterproof, fireproof, and tough as nails. You can use the Silicon Nitride Ceramics tip to write on anything, and in a pinch, use it to slice and puncture.

 

 

Tiny appearance, huge functionality. 

TIPEN 2.0 is made to be minimal. Measuring at just 6cm long and 6 grams, TIPEN 2.0 stays true to its roots. No one will know it’s there until you use it.

 

 

Carry it loose in your wallet, add it to your keyring, attach it to your backpack, even use it on the zipper on your jacket. You’ll never be without a pen again.

 

 

You can write anywhere, at any time. No matter what.

 

 

 

TIPEN 2.0 is a rugged, powerful tool, packed into a tiny frame.

Its Grade 5 Titanium body is just awesome! It's super strong, surprisingly light, used to build real spaceships, race cars, and medical implants, and is just cool!

 

 

The tip is made from silicon carbide, it’s amazingly strong, measuring an insane 9.5 on the Mohs hardness scale. To put that in perspective, diamonds come in at 10.

 

 

And it’s not only made for writing. The sheer strength of the silicon carbide ballpoint tip makes it able to easily cut open packages, pry off lids, and even doubles as an emergency impact tool if you get into tricky situations.

 

 

 

Decorative laser etching With a Modern Aesthetic.

As well as being stronger, smaller, and lighter than the original, we wanted to do something special with TIPEN 2.0. So, we’ve developed four engraved treatments that elevate the pen from a rugged EDC tool to a piece of functional art, that you can carry with you every day.

 

 

Our engraving process uses a high-powered FIBER laser to remove micro pieces of metal, so the engraving is actually recessed into the surface of the body. This delivers a permanent, tactile mark to your TIPEN 2.0, which feels good under your fingers, and provides a better grip when you’re writing.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

EverydayCarry：“Its mix of durable construction, strong pointed writing tip, and extreme small size makes it a great backup tool to have”

CoolMaterial：“When it comes to versatility, portability and durability, you won't find a better option than the TIPEN 2.0.”

GearJunkie：“The TIPEN 2.0 EDC Pen is one of the smallest, lightest, and strongest pens on the market. ”

Unsharpen：“A super-portable “everyday carry” style pen that is meant to me kept on you.”

 

 

 

We created the original YSMART TIPEN 1.0 as a rugged, tiny EDC pen that you could take with you any use anywhere. We made it because we wanted a better way to always have a pen available, something we could add to our EDC and backcountry kit.

So when the world took a turn for the worse, we wanted to create a product that had your everyday needs in mind. We went back to the drawing board to improve on our previous model and come up with something better. something stronger. something… smaller, while taking the TIPEN to the next level. 

Built for a strange new world, TIPEN 2.0 is the slim, sleek EDC writing tool that you can take with you wherever you go. It's more than just a small pen, it's a simpler way of living.

 

 

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

This delivers a permanent, tactile mark to your TIPEN 2.0, which feels good under your fingers, and provides a better grip when you’re writing.        EverydayCarry：“Its mix of durable construction, strong pointed writing tip, and extreme small size makes it a great backup tool to have”CoolMaterial：“When it comes to versatility, portability and durability, you won't find a better option than the TIPEN 2.0.”GearJunkie：“The TIPEN 2.0 EDC Pen is one of the smallest, lightest, and strongest pens on the market. ”Unsharpen：“A super-portable “everyday carry” style pen that is meant to me kept on you.”   We created the original YSMART TIPEN 1.0 as a rugged, tiny EDC pen that you could take with you any use anywhere. We made it because we wanted a better way to always have a pen available, something we could add to our EDC and backcountry kit.So when the world took a turn for the worse, we wanted to create a product that had your everyday needs in mind. We went back to the drawing board to improve on our previous model and come up with something better. something stronger. something… smaller, while taking the TIPEN to the next level. Built for a strange new world, TIPEN 2.0 is the slim, sleek EDC writing tool that you can take with you wherever you go. It's more than just a small pen, it's a simpler way of living.  This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

story:
What Is Tactigon Skin? 

TACTIGON SKIN (or T-SKIN) Reload is like a natural extension of your hand. It is a programmable wearable mouse that recognises your voice and gestures, to make your work more productive and your fun more… fun! You can use T-SKIN Reload to control 3D modeling applications, PowerPoint presentations, VR and AR devices, robots, drones, and games joypads. Or, use it as a mouse for your PC. 

Tactigon SKIN Reload reimagines the way you interact with your devices. With voice and gesture control, you’re free to move!

Its intuitive control boosts your productivity and makes using your computer more enjoyable.

 

Use it like a touchpad

Tactigon SKIN Reload gives you 3 functions in one wearable (and portable) device: mouse, presenter, touchpad.It’s so simple to set up and use. Just place it on its charger and move the pointer with your fingers.

 

Why T-SKIN Reload 

 

Voice Control For Next Level Workflow

T-SKIN Reload now has voice control, adding an extra dimension to what is possible. Now you can open and close programs, zoom in and more - all through the power of your voice. For ultimate control, use voice commands and hand gestures together. For example, in CAD drawing, you can control details of height and length, color, rotation and more. Just imagine how that would speed up your workflow.

 

Application Control 

Tactigon Gear (or T-GR) is the simple-to-use software for managing your T-SKIN Reload controller. Use it to configure new gestures, add new applications and upgrade your system.

 

Make Your Presentations A Must-See

T-SKIN Reload takes your presentations to the next level. Instead of being tied to one spot, you’re free to move around. You can navigate the slides, open and close new apps, and make highlights, with simple hand gestures. Presenters love the laser pointer feature, which is great for pointing out essential facts. You’ve also got must-use controls such as zoom, page forward and scrolling.

 

Your mini projector for ultimate convenience

Your T-skin device works seamlessly with your portable projector, to make your presentations a must-see with wow-factor guaranteed. And you won’t need to carry a presenter anymore.

But it’s not just for presentations. You can use T-SKIN Reload for all your everyday work tasks. It doesn’t take up much space, you can use it indoors and outside, and you can still move your hand and fingers naturally when you’re wearing it.

 

Tactigon SKIN Reload detects your hand’s movements, while the touch keyboard tracks pressure from your four fingers. Combine these two factors to create complex gestures that give you ultimate control. For example, if you swipe your hand diagonally, it will perform different functions depending on which fingers you use to touch the keyboard.

 

Connect In Seconds - Lasts For Hours

T-SKIN Reload is easy and effortless. Simply connect it just like you do with your wireless earbuds! Using Bluetooth Low-Energy Interface, you can connect T-Skin Reload to a variety of devices including smartphones, laptops, and drones. Its universal compatibility makes it the perfect control solution for all your devices. Plus, hidden in the ergonomic design is a 155 mA rechargeable battery that can run your T-Skin continuously, for up to 40 hours.

 

Smart Ergonomic Design For Everyday Use 

)

T-SKIN was designed like a glove, but easier to wear - elegant and light like a bracelet but technological like a smartwatch. It’s the new work tool that you cannot do without. With support for the most frequently used hand gestures, it’s comfortable to use and easy to control. Whether you are working in the office, giving a presentation, or gaming on your sofa, T-SKIN Reload is the perfect productivity tool and controller for all your devices!

 

Perfect Connectivity And Ultra-Low Latency

Losing connectivity in the middle of an important presentation would be a nightmare - but with T-SKIN Reload, you’re covered. With only 7ms of latency, there’s no noticeable time lag between your gesture and the action taking place. You get perfect control with no disconnections anywhere within a 10m radius of your device.

 

How Does It Work?

 

Who is it for ? 

T-SKIN Reload is designed for anyone who could boost their productivity by incorporating voice or gesture control into their workflow. With its super-easy connection, low latency and wide range of features - students, teachers, professionals and gamers will all love T-SKIN Reload. Turn it on and go!

 

Use simple gestures to translate commands for your 3D CAD software!

 

Gamers. Tactigon SKIN Reload works with all operating systems. Now you can play hands-free!

 

 

Let's Compare 

 

 

Tactigon SKIN 1.0 vs Reload

 

Compatible Operating Systems 

Perks

 

 

What is in the box?

 

Design Process

 

 

Press + PR  + Reviews

Talk about us:

  

 

  

 

 

                                Timeline

 

Technical Specs

 

Which Problem Does It Solve?

Traditionally, you use a mouse that controls a pointer in two dimensions. This is unnatural. Tactigon SKIN makes the way we interact with our devices much more natural and intuitive.

A controller with an innovative design, gestures and voice control.Tactigon SKIN unlocks the possibility of working directly in a 3D environment, with gestures and voice control. Now, you can interact with presentations and take control of your devices in a much more natural way.

 

The Story behind the product

“Dad, make me a controller like Iron Man.” - When my daughter asked me to create a real-life superhero gesture controller, I knew she was just joking, but then I thought,  “What if I did it?”

I’m Massimiliano. I’m the CEO and Founder of The Tactigon, and I love a challenge. From an engineering perspective, I’ve always been interested in making the way humans interact with machines more intuitive. My daughter’s love of superheroes led me to create T-SKIN Reload.

My idea was to create an ergonomic wearable mouse device, highly functional but also stylish and fashionable. Professionals would love it as it would speed up their workflow and boost their productivity, but it would also be fun to use with games and drones.

I sat down with my team and we got to work. What I love about T-SKIN is how fast it is to get going. You can just put it on and start using it immediately. I love how you can use four fingers, as if you’re playing a guitar, as well as putting two T-SKINs on for advanced programs.

 

 

 

Meet the team

 

Social Media 

Our Hackster community hub is available here:

https://www.hackster.io/tactigon

 

Other ways you can help 

Be rewarded with 12% commission of every dollar you help raise for our campaign! All you have to do is joining our referral program here: https://tactigon-skin-20.kickbooster.me/boost

1. Click the button and register as a Booster.

2. Share your unique Booster link on your Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Website, or wherever you'd like!

3. Refer to your Kickbooster dashboard and watch your commissions roll in!

 

Risk and Challenges

Our team has been preparing to launch a crowdfunding campaign for years. Since 2018, we’ve been travelling around the world, participating in exhibitions and roadshows, pitching in competitions. Now that travelling possibilities are reduced, we're doing our best to "spread the word" through digital marketing.

Because we’ve talked to so many people around the world, we know what the market wants and what professionals need to boost productivity and speed up their workflow. That’s our added value. 

We understand that there are risks and challenges involved with launching and fulfilling a crowdfunding campaign. We do our best to avoid mistakes. However, if you have any problems, we'll try to solve them as soon as possible. We have produced products before, but never before on this huge scale. There might be some unforeseen hurdles that we have to overcome. If any factors risk impacting the quality of the product or delays to our shipments, we’ll be completely transparent with our backers.

Please understand that we are not free from the influence of post-COVID-19, which could disrupt the production schedule.

story:
Write, erase, and write again and again on the same page with any type of pen, pencil or marker. Make the slightest of motions and all inscription will fully disappear thanks to nuka magic eraser.

 

Self-developed non-toxic liquid is available in 2 forms: wet wipe & spray can.  

Eternal pencil’s tip is made of unique metal alloy. It writes like a regular pencil, but you can forget about sharpening or broken leads. Just write and enjoy smooth writing experience. Forever. 

 

 

Press harder for thicker lines, lighter for thinner. And yes, you can wipe off eternal pencil’s writings by nuka magic eraser.

 

Notebook components are made of waterproof materials which haven’t been used in other stationery before. Don’t worry about safety, the notes can’t be destroyed even if you spill water or any other drink on it.   

Next generation paper which you won't be able to tear. Because of the quality, the notebook is durable and stays as new for a long time.

 

Never again old fashion notebook rubber bands. One easy motion to open the notebook and full safe closure when you carry it, thanks to embedded magnets inside cover.

 

 

No way to lose the pencil as it attaches magnetically to the eternal notebook by one easy touch.  

 

 

 

 

Perfect extension of the eternal notebook on your phone. Scan the page with nuka app and get digital handwritten notes of good quality.

 

 

Create virtual notebooks and keep separate scans by categories projects, sketches, ideas and more. All notes are organized, safe, and always with you.

 

Self-developed smart-dots is multipurpose for all your needs. Use it to write down notes, make sketches, spreadsheet on the same page. 

 

We know that your tasks never end, like nuka to-do list. Erase completed tasks and write new.

 

Scan tasks and it will be added to to-do list inside the app. You will never forget about unfinished tasks thanks to reminders. 

Plan your month, erase and plan again. Unlimited times. 

 

Scan the page and plans will be added to calendar inside the app. You will get notifications about your schedule as per the scanned pages.

We save all tactility pleasant touch feelings of regular paper, because we love it. nuka paper is matt and soft to touch.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our products even space proof! And it’s not just an assumption, we send our products to Stratosphere it reached 30km height and then successfully landed!? 

They reached 35 km (21,7 miles) above the Earth and came back.

 

 

 

Hello! We are creators of nuka. All of us have used stationery for years, so we know all benefits and problems related to it. We saw advantages of digital notes but realized: nothing can replace the tactile experience of real materials. So, we decided to add modern technologies to stationery, and created radically new things – eternal notebook and pencil. Fired by this idea, we left school and started focusing only on nuka. Together with our partners, we have worked for 2 years to tailor business strategy, finalize technologies, work on prototypes and run production in China. Hope you are ready to change habitual things together with us. Let’s start!

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

Concepter invents products and helps entrepreneurs craft their ideas into design-driven businesses, turning on the best marketing techniques powered by a strong technology stack.

 

Biosphere Startup Platform (part of Biosphere Corporation) – aims to support early-stage startups by providing financial support and operational assistance.

 

SILA, also 強さ, is a close-knit team of industrial and digital designers, engineers, researchers and branding specialists from around the world.

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The launch of every product is followed by the unforeseen technological challenges, and we have overcome them vigilantly. We reduced our risks before the launch of the product by giving ourselves 24 months of R&D; research to determine which materials were the best to create nuka’s eternal stationary. This was done by creating prototypes of both, the notebook and the pencil. We have a manufacturing staff ready in place to not only produce the product but to also package and deliver it to you. Currently, our goal is to start our campaign on Kickstarter to gather funds that could be further invested in our eternal stationery for you, and in the app to make your note-keeping easier. We know that there may be some issues with production we cannot foresee. However, the most important thing is that you invest in our nuka team that will bring the product to you. Join us today!

story:
Ti-Straw: Titanium & Bamboo to Eliminate Plastic

The eco-friendly & anti-bacterial straw designed to last forever!  

Ti-Straw comes in 3 finishes with a handy bamboo case.

100% FULLY FUNDED THANK YOU BACKERS!!

 

Eco-friendly - no plastic!    

The Ti-Straw goal is to create an eco-friendly straw to reduce plastic waste and last forever! A titanium body and bamboo holder have been selected to reach this goal. 

 

The project was aimed to create a Titanium straw similar to a McDonald's straw in terms of length and cross-section. A direct replacement for plastic! Titanium was selected due to its great appearance and strength properties. This straw will avoid the unwanted deterioration of paper straws.

Autodesk Inventor was used to generate a CAD  model shown below. This enabled a 3D printed prototype and easier adaptations. The material identifier 'Ti' was laser etched onto the surface to highlight the titanium material selected.

Ti-Straw CAD Drawing

Computer rendered images were created to give a visual representation of the Ti-Straw and the desired finishes we aimed to replicate.  

Ti-Straw computer rendered images

A prototype of the Ti-Straw was printed on an Anycubic Photon Mono resin printer (50% scaled). The prototype was generated to determine if the width and function were suitable. The prototype was printed at 50% length due to printer dimensional constraints.

Ti-Straw 3D printed prototype (50% scale)

Following the successful design and prototype stages of development, the Ti-Straw was produced! Three distinct surface finishes (shown below) were created to give the straw a unique look. 

Ti-Straw outside images

Ti-Straw lightbox images

 The bamboo case was selected to encase each Ti-Straw. This case allows the straw to be portable, clean and protected. A list of key attributes in deciding the bamboo material is listed below:

Ti-Straw bamboo case

1. Bamboo is the fastest-growing plant on earth 

2. Bamboo is strong and durable 

3. Bamboo is safe and hygienic

4. Bamboo is environmentally friendly  

 The flame tinting process was trialled on various Ti-Straws until three distinct finished were selected. Titanium grade 2 (99.5% purity), unlike many metals such as aluminium, can be coloured via a heat tinting process.

It is possible to achieve a variety of colours other than the raw finish, allowing it to be more aesthetically pleasing and provide a protective layer. During the process of heat tinting, a thin oxide layer is produced. Interference of light rays reflecting from the inner and outer film surface produce vibrant colours shown on Ti-Straw. 

Ti-Straw flame tinting trials

 

Ti-Straw reward chart

When your Titan titanium guitar picks are exposed to the environment, a microscopic layer of titanium atoms interact with oxygen to create a nano-coating of titanium dioxide. When titanium dioxide coatings are exposed to light they significantly inhibit bacterial growth. Compared to other metals like stainless steel, a significant reduction in residual bacteria remains on the surface.

Bacteria residue comparison (Titanium vs Stainless Steel)

Stretch goal unlock chart

All of our Ti-Straws will be sent with Royal Mail UK for international and national delivery. Ti-Straws are subject to discounted rates for UK buyers. 

Kickbooster link: https://ti-straw-titanium-bamboo-to.kickbooster.me/boost

During the process of heat tinting, a thin oxide layer is produced. Interference of light rays reflecting from the inner and outer film surface produce vibrant colours shown on Ti-Straw. Ti-Straw flame tinting trials Ti-Straw reward chartWhen your Titan titanium guitar picks are exposed to the environment, a microscopic layer of titanium atoms interact with oxygen to create a nano-coating of titanium dioxide. When titanium dioxide coatings are exposed to light they significantly inhibit bacterial growth. Compared to other metals like stainless steel, a significant reduction in residual bacteria remains on the surface.Bacteria residue comparison (Titanium vs Stainless Steel)Stretch goal unlock chartAll of our Ti-Straws will be sent with Royal Mail UK for international and national delivery. Ti-Straws are subject to discounted rates for UK buyers. Kickbooster link: https://ti-straw-titanium-bamboo-to.kickbooster.me/boost

story:
We are Orangered Life. We celebrate simplicity and smart design.  With four successful 30° crowdfunding campaigns, 6,500 ecstatic backers, and 20,000+ delivered products, we’re back and better with the 30° Ruler 5.0!

 

 

We believe life is best when simple things work...

When we create our designs, we use various tools-some basic, some advanced. In the midst of design work on others, the humble ruler came to our attention and we began to look at one of our most used tools in a new light.

 

What’s special about the 30° Ruler?

 

Sometimes all it takes is one great idea to revolutionize a product. For the 30° Ruler, it was a simple elevation. By lifting the slope on the ruler’s face by 30°, we’ve made it easier to use, and we’ve expanded what you can use it for. It’s simple but effective – that’s what Orangered Life is all about.

 

 

With a 30° slope, you can read the measurements from a glance without having to lean over to use the device. So you switch from a tilted neck to a tilted ruler – keeping your back straight and your eyes on the target.

 

 

The elevation also allows for easy grabbing, without having to drag it towards the edge of the table or dig your nails underneath it. Finally, the angled nature of the ruler makes it safe for cutting.

 

 

Alongside simplicity, we believe clarity is key. The 30° Ruler does away with teeny measurements, instead opting for large fonts and clear indications. This means you can read the measurements from a distance, and you'll always be sure to find your mark.

 

 

Apart from its signature sloped design, the 30° Ruler also has a couple of new features.

 

 

This 2-in-1 ruler has millimetres and centimetres on one side, inches on the reverse. We've labelled them in the same direction allowing for easy conversions.

 

 

The 30° Ruler is designed to eliminate the confusion and strain of reading your typical ruler,  so every tick mark is labelled. 

  • On the Imperial measurement side, all hash marks are labelled to eliminate guessing and counting of lines.  
  • On the Metric measurement side, both the millimetres and centimetres are numbered and the hash marks rise and fall making it easy to identify specific millimetre measurements.

 

 

The 30° Ruler starts at zero. It is another simple design feature meaning you can start measuring from the very edge of the ruler instead of having to make adjustments for the useless blank space before the laser engraved measurements.

 

 

The ruler itself is made from aerospace-grade aluminium while the measurements are laser targeted. In addition to making it more durable, the advanced materials make the 30° Ruler more lightweight and scratch-resistant.

 

 

What’s New？New Color. New Size.

 

 

The ruler also comes in four sizes of 15cm/6inch, 20cm/8inch, 30cm/12inch and 45cm/18inch; so you can choose the right sized ruler depending on what you’re measuring.

 

 

The new colour was one of the biggest asks we got from our previous backers. And we don't disappoint our backers! We exist because of you guys, so we're proud to offer the new colours and new sizes.  Not sure which you like? Don’t worry about that yet! You will get to select your colour choice at the survey time.

 

 

 

 

Thank You

 

We love sharing our passion for this ruler.

Through Indiegogo, we can cordially invite you on our journey and share with you the manufacturing process. We are passionate about what we do, and the opportunity to serve you and bring such a fantastic product to market has been an incredible adventure.

story:
Millions of computer users understand the huge productivity gains that additional computer screens can bring. By reducing or eliminating the time spent switching back and forth between different programs, additional screens can allow you to get things done much more quickly.

When using a laptop being limited to just the single laptop screen can be frustrating. We created Packed Pixels so you can easily take a lightweight and durable monitor wherever you go, so you can stay productive all the time.

Why Packed Pixels?

Our new Packed Pixels models now offer:

  • Two screen size options to choose from
  • HDMI and USB-C connectivity

Packed Pixels has always been:

  • A huge aid to productivity
  • Lightweight
  • Durable
  • High quality retina display
  • Easy, universal mounting system
  • First to market
  • Reliable
  • Thousands already delivered worldwide
  • Backed up with great customer service

See how Packed Pixels could help you:

Work from home/coffee shop/hot desk/freelance

Have you ever found yourself trying to write a proposal but you are constantly having to switch back and forth to a spreadsheet that has all the figures on it?

With Packed Pixels you can have the proposal open on your laptop screen and the figures immediately to hand on your Packed Pixels. Spend more time working and less time wasted switching back and forth between programs.

Developer

Many developers understand the benefits of extra screens. It can therefore be so frustrating when working on a laptop to be switching back and forth with that helpful wiki, while also missing out on crucial items in your chat window.

With Packed Pixels you can have it all; chat windows, wiki pages, monitoring dashboards, etc. no matter where you are.

Photographer/Film maker

Do you wish you had a larger preview screen when shooting and editing?

Packed Pixels can help. While connected to your laptop, Packed Pixels can give you a rich full colour preview of your output. For film makers, the Packed Pixels 4K gives you a full 4K preview of your output.

But that isn’t all. Thanks to the HDMI connectivity, you can also connect your Packed Pixels directly to your camera for a large preview of what you are shooting. And thanks to the standard 1/4 UNC thread mount on the rear of Packed Pixels, it can be mounted using any standard camera mount.

Stocks and shares day trader

If you deal in stocks and shares you know how important it is to have as much screen space as possible so you can track the market trends. While laptops are great for letting you trade from anywhere in the world, it can be frustrating being so limited on what you can track on just one screen.

Packed Pixels only use retina panels which means you can fit more stock graphs on screen, giving you that competitive advantage. And thanks to how lightweight and durable Packed Pixels are, you can make your millions where ever you want to be.

Gamer

Do you want to be the envy of the LAN party or wish you could game on your console anywhere? Packed Pixels can help. With Packed Pixels you can turn your gaming laptop into a widescreen powerhouse. Or perhaps you just need some extra screen space for the ultimate laptop Twitch setup.

Thanks to our inclusion of HDMI connectivity console gamers aren’t left out either. Packed Pixels can plug into your Xbox, Playstation or Switch for the ultimate go anywhere setup that drops easily into your backpack.

The Packed Pixels difference

Packed Pixels are the only retina resolution portable laptop monitors on the market.
Our patented mounting system works with any size of laptop and takes seconds to take on and off. Our system does NOT use sticky pads that are permanently stuck to your laptop or clamping brackets that can damage your screen.
We have a track record of delivering quality and reliable screens all over the world, backed up with excellent customer service.

Which Packed Pixels is right for me?

No matter which Packed Pixels you choose, you will have a lightweight and durable screen that will improve your productivity, no matter where you are.

Packed Pixels 4K - 15.6" portable monitor - Choose your perk in this campaign

Designed for those who run larger and more powerful laptops and want only the best experience. Its size and massive 4K resolution are perfect for those who want a powerful workstation no matter where they are.

Packed Pixels Go - 10.1" portable monitor - Follow the link below to our other Indiegogo campaign

Our more compact screen has been designed to be the perfect companion to lightweight ultrabook laptops and for those who like to travel light. The Packed Pixels Go packs a real punch with its beautiful retina display and can be used landscape or portrait for ultimate flexibility.

Go to our Packed Pixels Go Indiegogo campaign

Reviews and testimonials

For the past 3 years we have been shipping Packed Pixels worldwide, helping thousands of people all over the globe to be more productive. Don’t just take our word for it, here is what they’ve had to say about Packed Pixels.

“absolutely love it!”

“super sharp and very bright”

“the product and functionality of it are wonderful”

“Has made my work so much easier.”

“Great product with great customer service backing it up!”

“such a beautiful screen”

We launched the original Packed Pixels via the Kickstarter crowdfunding platform. We feel this comment from a backer shows what you can expect from us.

“I will always look forward to any Kickstarter campaigns by this team: they represent the very best type of Kickstarter experience and have indeed delivered an awesome product that still is way ahead of any potential competition out there... and there really isn't any (yet). YOU GUYS ROCK!”

Tech specs

story:
MuteMe is now available on our own website at muteme.com

 
 
The first button that stays in sync with your video conferencing tool of choice!
 
 
 

 

 

Knowing when you are on mute or unmute is not always obvious to computer users, virtual meeting participants, or those physically around them. When on a computer, the status of the microphone may be obscured by multiple windows being open, a particular program being minimized, or a user may be inattentive to the microphone state by using multiple monitors. Typically, knowing when your microphone is muted or unmuted requires locating the online conference window and identifying the condition of the microphone icon.

 

 

 

 

Speaking with anyone around the world through a virtual meeting has become significant during the COVID-19 pandemic. But, frequent video conferencing problems have been the cause of embarrassment because either the person using virtual meetings did not know their microphones were on, or people have walked in on their meetings.  As a result, users and those around the user need to know a conference is occurring and if a microphone is on.

 

 

 

MuteMe™ is an illuminated mute button for virtual calls that increases productivity, boosts confidence, and decreases interruptions. The patent-pending device is designed to recognize if you're on or off mute by using intelligent software that works with any computer to control your microphone. 

Not only is it just a button, it's an app! Our app stays in sync with the MuteMe illuminated button, so if you mute from the virtual conferencing app, the light on the button and the app change together!

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
.       

Aug'20 - MuteMe Idea and Concept Development

Sep'20 - MuteMe Hardware Prototype

Oct'20 - MuteMe Software Prototype 

Nov'20 - Patent Pending

Dec'20 - Kickstarter Campaign Launched

Jan'21 - Indiegogo Campaign Launched

Feb'21 - Manufacturing Partners Finalized; Tooling Completed

Mar'21 - Packaging Finalized; Initial Production Run

Apr'21 - Mass Production

May'21 - Customer Fulfillment Begins

Jun'21 - MuteMe Available in Staples Stores Nationwide

Jul'21 - Crowdfunding Fulfillment Complete

Aug'21 - Sneak Peak of MuteMe Mini (micro, portable MuteMe)

Sep'21 - MuteMe Ready and Stocked for the Holiday Season

Oct'21 - MuteMe Airs on ABC's Season 13 Shark Tank; MuteMe Mini Launches

 

In 2020, in the middle of the pandemic and chaos, we experienced constant disruptions in virtual meetings (kids, lawn mower, door bell, you name it). The current solutions didn’t allow us to mute/unmute quickly enough.

This problem brought our team together; compelling us out of necessity to create technology enabling us to be quick, confident, and focused in virtual meetings. 

In the fall of 2020, in a small garage in El Dorado Hills, California, the first prototype of MuteMe came to life. Ignited by crowdfunding, MuteMe was improved, sculpted, and brought into the homes of 20K+ virtual workers across the globe in less than 1 year. 

Because it doesn't really matter where you're working from or when. We are in the business to allow you to be heard, when you want to be.

story:
Introducing Razorbooster, the world’s 1st Smart Razor Blade Cleaner & Sharpener. It is the ultimate tool for facial hair upkeeping! Razorbooster cleans your razor blades like a pro, and sharpens them in no time while prolonging the life of your blades. It looks awesome, and is a must have accessory for any men with facial hair.

 

​

 

 

​

 

Using the same razor blade over and over again can lead to various problems. On average men change their razor cartridges every one to two weeks. But even within this short period, the blades can easily and quickly become contaminated and dull to the point where you may experience skin irritation. However, now there is a solution to this problem! Let us help you keep your razor blades clean, protect your skin, and save money all at the same time!

The razor blades you use every day are a breeding ground for viruses and bacteria, which can cause severe skin problems. No matter how thoroughly you rinse the cartridge after using it, you will not be able to clean it of all the dead skin cells and hair stuck between the blades, and the dirty blades will eventually damage your skin. This is why you need Razorbooster. It enables you to thoroughly clean your blades and protect your skin.

 

 

​​

As mentioned, the average man changes their razor blades once every week or two. On Amazon, a Gillette razor blade pack containing eight cartridges costs around $32, or $4 per cartridge. If we assume that you change your razor blades every two weeks, that would mean that you would need 26 cartridges per year. Thus, you’d be paying a total of $96 every year for razor blades. However, as Razorbooster cleans, it also disinfects and sharpens your razor blades increasing the blades’ average lifespan three times over three times That means that instead of exchanging your razor blades every two weeks you can safely use your blades for six weeks or more. This way, you can reduce the amount you’re spending on razor blades from $96 to only $32 per year.

 

 

2 billion razors and refill blades are thrown away, according to the US Environmental Protection Agency.
Dull razor blades can not be recycled, so they just turn into waste that harms the environment. Why not start today and use Razorbooster, so we can contribute a little bit to cleaning our planet!

 

Using Razorbooster is a rational choice when it comes to a healthy lifestyle and sharp shaving

 

 

 

 

What do you think sharpens a razor blade when you clean it? It isn't the water. However, Jeans, Razorpit, and Razorbooster do sharpen the blade by removing substances on the edge of the blades.

But the distinct difference that sets the Razorbooster apart is it uses 12 rubber blades that can fit between those 2~5 blades, so it can clean and sharpen neatly even between razor blades. And also by using Sanitizing Liquid that contains tiny "Ceramic Balls", helps to grind the blades.

 

Normal razor-cleaning products do not feature dual blade-protection and razor-cleaning power at the same time. Generally, the sanitizers we use on our blades remove viruses or germs but do not aid in the sharpening process. Also, products such as the Razor Pit can damage not only the blade itself but also the blade’s frame, making it harder to use over time.

 

Razorbooster is made the ideal size for most razor blades to protect the lubricants of the blades and rubber bumps protect the razor blades as much as possible.​

 

Every razor blade cleaning product tends to do one thing: they either clean, sanitize, or sharpen. However, Razorbooster can clean, sanitize, and sharpen at the same time.

 

 

 

 

 

Razorbooster is equipped with a strong motor that enables you to easily and comfortably clean and sharpens your razor blades. It clean and brushes the blades 600 times per second, thereby making the blades so sharp that they feel brand new.

 

 

 

 

 

Rinsing your razor blades with water can neither clean out the dirt that gets stuck between the blades nor can it possibly remove the various types of viruses and bacteria that grow there.

Razorbooster cleans razorblades substantially more effectively than just rinsing them with water ever could.

 

 

 

While you might not be able to see much difference right now, zoom into the images and you'll see the difference. In the picture on the left, you can see the microscopic debris left on the blades after rinsing them with water. By using Razorbooster, however, the blades become completely clean and are safe to reuse.

 

Razerbooster is powered by a small electric motor, and it contains 12 rubber blades that clean and brush 600 times per second, sharpening razor blades and offering 99% sterilization.

 

 

 

​

 

​

The Sanitizing Liquid was created with natural, healing ingredients such as charcoal, a safe ingredient which is dark grey and viscous ceramic ball. It also contains tiny ceramic balls that act as a blade sharpener.

Also You can use 120ml liquid for 120~200 times/4~6 months even if you shave everyday!

 

Conventional razor blade cleaners usually come in the form of detergents and are thus not effective when it comes to removing smaller dirt particles. Razorbooster, on the other hand, contains charcoal and tiny grains that help sharpen the blades and make them perfectly clean, thanks to the charcoal’s property of absorbing even microscopic dirt particles.

 

 

Charcoal is an organic ingredient that often appears in face cleansing or mask products and is well known as an ingredient that absorbs oil, impurities, and toxic substances!! 99.9% Razor blade sterilization! Reduction of skin troubles Test proven sterilizer

 

It’s reasonable to doubt the quality of Chinese OEM products! These types of low-quality products frequently breakdown. At Razorbooster, we take care when considering the material and manufacturing process. Samsung, Hyundai, and BTS are all high quality products that made in Korea!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

​

​

​

​

 

 

 

Provides a switch that enables settings for a left-handed or right-handed user. Anyone can use Razorbooster with ease! Choose R for right-handed, and L for left-handed.

 

Razorbooster uses a NiMH battery which requires 6 hours of charging for a full charge. The battery will last approximately 30 days before requiring a recharge. No worries if the battery runs low. You can use Razorbooster while it’s being recharged. Just make sure to pull the plug when rinsing the device after use.

 

Razorbooster is compatible with almost all razors. The protective rubber part matches the size of all conventional razors and offers maximum protection for the razor’s lubricant while the blades are cleaned and sharpened with strong rotational power. This technology makes it possible to use your razor cartridges for a long time!

In testing, eight different razors were used to assess Razorbooster’s compatibility. All of them were effectively cleaned.

 

Rubber blades were made to match the exact size of the razor blade, which prevents damage to the lubricating band.

 

 

 

Many women also use razors to keep their skin smooth and clean. They sometimes use the razor blade on other sensitive parts of skin, so it is absolutely crucial to keep the razor blades clean and sharp. Therefore, Razorbooster was designed in a way that makes it compatible with women’s razors as well. Only cartridges with big moisture bars do not fit into the opening and can thus not be used. 

 

 

 

 
 

Razorbooster was reviewed by the Youtube channels "Modern Man TV",“Man Cave KYLE” and “Review Man Chang soo.” It is currently trending in Korea! 

>> Please turn on the subtitles to English, when you watch the video << 

Razorbooster is also featured in Gigadgets as well

 

 

 

We have already raised our initial funding goal to US$160,000 with over 4,000 backers at Wadiz (The no. 1 crowdfunding platform in South Korea.) that ended on March 9th, 2021. We are now manufacturing the products to ship to Korean backers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Razorbooster is a brand established by Mystique Life, founded by a group of engineers in South Korea, who set out to create tech products that not only make everyone’s life easier but at the same time that can also help protect the environment.

Before Razorbooster, Mystique Life Inc. has successfully crowdfunded a few campaigns on Wadiz, which is the No.1 Crowdfunding platform in South Korea, including "Clean Aqua" that raised US$120,000 in funds.

 

Like what you're seeing? Great! Don't be shy about sharing Razorbooster with your friends. We've made it super easy. Just hit one of the buttons below.
The more people who know about Razorbooster, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make Razorbooster!
story_txt: Introducing Razorbooster, the world’s 1st Smart Razor Blade Cleaner & Sharpener. It is the ultimate tool for facial hair upkeeping! Razorbooster cleans your razor blades like a pro, and sharpens them in no time while prolonging the life of your blades. It looks awesome, and is a must have accessory for any men with facial hair. ​  ​ Using the same razor blade over and over again can lead to various problems. On average men change their razor cartridges every one to two weeks. But even within this short period, the blades can easily and quickly become contaminated and dull to the point where you may experience skin irritation. However, now there is a solution to this problem! Let us help you keep your razor blades clean, protect your skin, and save money all at the same time!The razor blades you use every day are a breeding ground for viruses and bacteria, which can cause severe skin problems. No matter how thoroughly you rinse the cartridge after using it, you will not be able to clean it of all the dead skin cells and hair stuck between the blades, and the dirty blades will eventually damage your skin. This is why you need Razorbooster. It enables you to thoroughly clean your blades and protect your skin.  ​​As mentioned, the average man changes their razor blades once every week or two. On Amazon, a Gillette razor blade pack containing eight cartridges costs around $32, or $4 per cartridge. If we assume that you change your razor blades every two weeks, that would mean that you would need 26 cartridges per year. Thus, you’d be paying a total of $96 every year for razor blades. However, as Razorbooster cleans, it also disinfects and sharpens your razor blades increasing the blades’ average lifespan three times over three times That means that instead of exchanging your razor blades every two weeks you can safely use your blades for six weeks or more. This way, you can reduce the amount you’re spending on razor blades from $96 to only $32 per year.  2 billion razors and refill blades are thrown away, according to the US Environmental Protection Agency.Dull razor blades can not be recycled, so they just turn into waste that harms the environment. Why not start today and use Razorbooster, so we can contribute a little bit to cleaning our planet! Using Razorbooster is a rational choice when it comes to a healthy lifestyle and sharp shaving    What do you think sharpens a razor blade when you clean it? It isn't the water. However, Jeans, Razorpit, and Razorbooster do sharpen the blade by removing substances on the edge of the blades.But the distinct difference that sets the Razorbooster apart is it uses 12 rubber blades that can fit between those 2~5 blades, so it can clean and sharpen neatly even between razor blades. And also by using Sanitizing Liquid that contains tiny "Ceramic Balls", helps to grind the blades. Normal razor-cleaning products do not feature dual blade-protection and razor-cleaning power at the same time. Generally, the sanitizers we use on our blades remove viruses or germs but do not aid in the sharpening process. Also, products such as the Razor Pit can damage not only the blade itself but also the blade’s frame, making it harder to use over time. Razorbooster is made the ideal size for most razor blades to protect the lubricants of the blades and rubber bumps protect the razor blades as much as possible.​ Every razor blade cleaning product tends to do one thing: they either clean, sanitize, or sharpen. However, Razorbooster can clean, sanitize, and sharpen at the same time.     Razorbooster is equipped with a strong motor that enables you to easily and comfortably clean and sharpens your razor blades. It clean and brushes the blades 600 times per second, thereby making the blades so sharp that they feel brand new.     Rinsing your razor blades with water can neither clean out the dirt that gets stuck between the blades nor can it possibly remove the various types of viruses and bacteria that grow there.Razorbooster cleans razorblades substantially more effectively than just rinsing them with water ever could.   While you might not be able to see much difference right now, zoom into the images and you'll see the difference. In the picture on the left, you can see the microscopic debris left on the blades after rinsing them with water. By using Razorbooster, however, the blades become completely clean and are safe to reuse. Razerbooster is powered by a small electric motor, and it contains 12 rubber blades that clean and brush 600 times per second, sharpening razor blades and offering 99% sterilization.   ​ ​The Sanitizing Liquid was created with natural, healing ingredients such as charcoal, a safe ingredient which is dark grey and viscous ceramic ball. It also contains tiny ceramic balls that act as a blade sharpener.Also You can use 120ml liquid for 120~200 times/4~6 months even if you shave everyday! Conventional razor blade cleaners usually come in the form of detergents and are thus not effective when it comes to removing smaller dirt particles. Razorbooster, on the other hand, contains charcoal and tiny grains that help sharpen the blades and make them perfectly clean, thanks to the charcoal’s property of absorbing even microscopic dirt particles.  Charcoal is an organic ingredient that often appears in face cleansing or mask products and is well known as an ingredient that absorbs oil, impurities, and toxic substances!! 99.9% Razor blade sterilization! Reduction of skin troubles Test proven sterilizer It’s reasonable to doubt the quality of Chinese OEM products! These types of low-quality products frequently breakdown. At Razorbooster, we take care when considering the material and manufacturing process. Samsung, Hyundai, and BTS are all high quality products that made in Korea!        ​​​​   Provides a switch that enables settings for a left-handed or right-handed user. Anyone can use Razorbooster with ease! Choose R for right-handed, and L for left-handed. Razorbooster uses a NiMH battery which requires 6 hours of charging for a full charge. The battery will last approximately 30 days before requiring a recharge. No worries if the battery runs low. You can use Razorbooster while it’s being recharged. Just make sure to pull the plug when rinsing the device after use. Razorbooster is compatible with almost all razors. The protective rubber part matches the size of all conventional razors and offers maximum protection for the razor’s lubricant while the blades are cleaned and sharpened with strong rotational power. This technology makes it possible to use your razor cartridges for a long time!In testing, eight different razors were used to assess Razorbooster’s compatibility. All of them were effectively cleaned. Rubber blades were made to match the exact size of the razor blade, which prevents damage to the lubricating band.   Many women also use razors to keep their skin smooth and clean. They sometimes use the razor blade on other sensitive parts of skin, so it is absolutely crucial to keep the razor blades clean and sharp. Therefore, Razorbooster was designed in a way that makes it compatible with women’s razors as well. Only cartridges with big moisture bars do not fit into the opening and can thus not be used.      Razorbooster was reviewed by the Youtube channels "Modern Man TV",“Man Cave KYLE” and “Review Man Chang soo.” It is currently trending in Korea! >> Please turn on the subtitles to English, when you watch the video << Razorbooster is also featured in Gigadgets as well   We have already raised our initial funding goal to US$160,000 with over 4,000 backers at Wadiz (The no. 1 crowdfunding platform in South Korea.) that ended on March 9th, 2021. We are now manufacturing the products to ship to Korean backers.                     Razorbooster is a brand established by Mystique Life, founded by a group of engineers in South Korea, who set out to create tech products that not only make everyone’s life easier but at the same time that can also help protect the environment.Before Razorbooster, Mystique Life Inc. has successfully crowdfunded a few campaigns on Wadiz, which is the No.1 Crowdfunding platform in South Korea, including "Clean Aqua" that raised US$120,000 in funds. Like what you're seeing? Great! Don't be shy about sharing Razorbooster with your friends. We've made it super easy. Just hit one of the buttons below.The more people who know about Razorbooster, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make Razorbooster!

story:
Exlicon is an innovative, highly portable, uniquely design multifunctional tool. It is all that you need for your work to be extraordinary.

From accurate ellipses to circles, Exlicon can draw shapes of any kind. Unleashed your creativity with the help of Exlicon.

After a year of innovative designing and numerous testing, we now introduce to you our exceptional new product called Exlicon, which is an upgraded version of our previously hit product Magcon that has been sold and shipped to over 80+ countries worldwide.

 

Are you fed up with old-school compasses for your pictures with holes all over the drawing surface, several erasing, and sometimes stray drawings? Let us introduce Exlicon, a stainless steel, lightweight multiuse stationery product with several handy abilities that you never witnessed before.

The list of remarkable features just doesn’t end here. Our new predictive Exlicon takes precision to the next level with its unique portable design without compromising accuracy of measurements and design.

Exlicon is an innovative, highly portable, uniquely design multifunctional tool. It is all that you need for your work to be extraordinary.

From accurate ellipses to circles, Exlicon can draw shapes of any kind. Unleashed your creativity with the help of Exlicon.

 
Exlicon is capable of drawing different sizes and creating distinct eccentric ellipses using its convertible wings. It can also be used in drawing vertical and horizontal ellipses by altering the tip’s location.

By combining different rulers, Exlicon offers a diverse creation of shapes and ellipses of over 50 dimensions.

The short ruler can draw a circle from 15mm to 180 mm while the long ruler can allow you to make circles and shapes from 15mm to 310 mm diameter. 

With an upgraded base of 50 mm measurements for stability, Exlicon allows you to create any shapes you want at any degrees without perforating the medium you use to draw on. 

Its high precision makes it an ideal tool for making and drawing shapes with golden ratio and Fibonacci sequences.

One of the remarkable features that remains unmatched to any other drawing tool is our attachable water drop wing that no only be used to make circles from 50mm-110mm radius but also triangles, spirals and circles with golden ratio. This takes your design up a whole new level in not just measurements but also in overall presentation, providing a perfect professional look. 

Exlicon is not just limited to the shape of circles but you can efficiently draw pentagrams and hexagons. Just attach the ideal ruler you want your drawing to be, and follow the markings on the base to achieve these shapes with a golden ratio.  

To draw a pentagram or hexagon, the stars marked on the base can be used as directions to draw perfect shapes. The modifications that you can make according to your need is what makes Exlicon a perfect user friendly and efficient tool for everyone.

Perfect for mandala and all other types of art, you can make water drop wing with precision allowing beautiful details that makes it easy for you to execute your creativity on paper.

Exlicon is the futuristic tool for designing. To make double circle, you can use to two pens with the long ruler simultaneously.

Its highly precise checkered markings paired with its ruler with similar markings provide highly accurate and error free drawings that are an ideal for not just 

architects but for all the designers who want their works to be as accurate as possible.

The highly precise attachable rulers are intricately designed with chamfered holes that make it easy and accessible to fit pens for outlining work and simultaneously create circles and shapes without any error.

Utilizing the projection on the shorter ruler, Exlicon can draw a 45 & 90 degrees straight lines.

By altering the location of the tip, Exlicon draws vertical and horizontal ellipses with distinct eccentricities.

Mark a center point, and on top, place the guiding compass. Turn the short downside and merge the long wing/waterdrop wing. Plugging the ruler into a suitable tip, then draw an ellipse. Turning the end to the 2nd arrow to draw a small eccentricity ellipse.

A good tool for mandalas lover for drawing grid before you draw.

It is your all weather and all design friend that you can put to use to explore your creative dimensions. Exlicon adopts to a futuristic approach and allows you build onto your designs with Exlicon stainless steel disc that has a range of 10,12 and 14 degrees for all chamfered holes that are an excellent partner in making large complex grids.

Simply add on HK $ 78 (US $10) for a stainless steel disc. 

Exlicon Ellipse Disc for add on

The Exlicon disc has a range of 10 degrees for outer line and draw golden spiral easily.

Made with brass, ellipse disc comes with unbreakable durability that is lightweight and portable.

Simply add on HKD$ 78 (USD 10) for the Ellipse brass disc.

Press 'Add Perk' button to add the number you want.

Your parts are safely stored as Exlicon offers you genuine leather pouch to accommodate Exlicon’s parts and extra space to put in your pen and pencils, making it an ideal travel pack that is highly portable and fit for carrying it anywhere at anytime.

Following the success of Magcon, we have spent a year refining and improving on that design to create the Exlicon that we are offering you now. 

Exlicon’s convertible, durable, and user-friendly design is not just limited to the use of professionals but is also for students who are keen on doing art. If you are an artist, architect, designer, or an art enthusiast, Exlicon is the masterpiece that you must have for your art to be precise, beautiful and unique with absolute effortlessness.

Project Timeline

2019 Dec --- Research & Analysis 

2020 Jan --- Product Design

2020 March --- Idea Concept, 3D printing & Prototype

2020 October --- Final Version Prototype

2020 Dec --- Manufacturing 

2021 March --- Finish Manufacturing 

2021 April --- Fulfillment

story:
Perfect Screen Size for Handheld Device with Larger Display and Finer Resolution

With a 8.4 inch display and 178° viewing angle, ONEXPLAYER matches similar visual quality to those 16 inch gaming laptops in the market.

11th Generation of Tiger Lake i7 Processor

Playing games with the most powerful CPU is like racing with a 1,600 bhp sports car. The experience is surreal. The 11th generation of Tiger Lake-U processor features 12M L3 cache, 4.8 GHz turbo frequency, 4-core and 8-thread(applies to i7-1185G7 only). The world's best performing CPU makes sure you rule all kinds of video games and boosts performance in every possible way.

Compared with AMD's Ryzen 4800U, Intel's Core i7 - 1185G7 beats by 28% in regular mode, 67% in gaming mode and 400% in deep learning mode.

iRIS® Xe Graphics 96EU Graphics

Utilizing the execution units to their best, the newest Intel iRIS® Xe 96 EU Graphics enables a handheld gaming console to perform like a desktop gaming PC. All mainstream games run smoothly thanks to the powerful GPU.

Performance Benchmarking of GPU

 

FPS Measurement

ONEXPLAYER makes full use of the performance of the Intel iRIS® Xe Graphics, and optimizes the performance and heat dissipation of the whole device, thereby greatly improving the smoothness of the game. 

Japanese Original ALPS Rocker

360° Flexible Operation

Two Japanese original ALPS high performance 360° rocker are adopted with stable and smooth force, low resistance and flexible feedback. It greatly improves the play feel, and supports L3/R3 function.

Linear Analog Trigger

Fast Touch-Click Bumper, Faster than Traditional Mouse Click

In FPS games, you need real-time and sensitive trigger feedback. In racing games, you need the same to master the throttle. ONEXPLAYER has two complete linear analog trigger buttons with touch-click bumper buttons, 0.3mm keystroke, rapid triggering, allowing you to go deeper into the games.

15,300 mAh High-Capacity Battery

We managed to power the performance beast with a 15,300 mAH (3.85V) high-capacity battery which sustain much longer battery life. With a 65W adapter, you can expect a rapid battery re-charging cycle. Say good-bye to your battery anxiety.

Power bank Compatible

ONEXPLAYER supports power bank with PD protocol (20V 3.25A). Recharge anywhere and anytime.

M.2 2280 PCle SSD

Up to 2TB Storage

Install All the Games You Love

ONEXPLAYER features a built-in M.2 2280 PCle solid-state drive, supporting up to 2TB PCle empowers higher reading/writing speed, waiving anxious wait time and allowing more local games. Besides, ONEXPLAYER supports TF card as a more cost-effective way to add hard drive capacity.

Smart Cooling Technology

Double Cooling Fans + Radiators, Lower surface temperature, Better battery life

Power Button Integrated with Touch ID

On a handheld device, Touch ID is undoubtedly a more convenient and faster way to unlock the device and gamer profile. No more tedious keyboard typing.

USB 4.0 x 2

Connect with External Graphics Dock and 4K Monitor to Perform Better

Two USB 4.0 ports are available that can connect to an eGPU and an external 4K monitor at the same time. Enjoy even better gaming experience.

Note: If there is a small error in the appearance size, it's a normal phenomenon. Please refer to the actual measurement.

From Ideation to Invention

One Netbook was founded by a group of senior hardware engineers. We proudly served well-known brands such as IBM, Haier and Tsinghua Tongfang. One Netbook has a complete R & D, production, sales and after-sales team that is full of operations experience. 

Intel Innovation Award

One Netbook was invited to CTE CEO Summit 2021 hosted by Intel. ONEXPLAYER has won the Intel Innovation Award for its shining records in the PC game console segment.

Strict QC and Sufficient and Stock of ONEXPLAYER

ONEXPLAYER has very strict quality control requirements. It recruits top tiered suppliers and conducts strict quality inspections to control each production process. From project establishment to mass production, the products are implemented up to the industry's highest standards.

Beta Testing Events

ONEXPLAYER conducted beta device testing activities in five major cities in China. Numerous fans and media are invited. We’ve received great praises for the product and constructive suggestions for improvements.
