story:
As a freelancer or mobile worker, your professional life unfolds on the move.You might need to use more than one devices for video programming and editing, or charge your phone with other tech gadgets in some circumstances. However, you don’t want another heavy pack or an extra net of entangled wires. In other words, you need the LinkPRO Hub Stand, a robust, stable and ergonomic stand for multiple laptops that comes with an 11-port USB Hub for all your charging and connectivity needs. 

Check out what our early reviewers said about LinkPro:
 
 
Here is the official unboxing video to help you guys know more about LinkPro:
 

 

The LinkPRO Hub Stand is a cable-friendly portable working station. Equipped with 11 different input and output ports, this unique hub lets you connect, charge and transfer data from and into all your essential devices, whether you’re working at home, in the office, or even on that lengthy train ride. If you’re using it for entertainment, it’s just as perfect and convenient. Ultimately, whatever you do, with the LinkPRO Hub Stand, you have 11 ways of being connected.

We’re all different and we all have different requirements and preferences. That’s why we designed the stand’s hub to make it detachable and adaptable. Attach the hub to the left or right side of your stand, based on your preferences and needs. Change it from one side to the other whenever you want, detach it you want to keep it within reach but not attached to the stand, or simply take it separately anywhere you want as an independent USB hub.

Your comfort is our priority, which is why we designed the LinkPRO Hub Stand ergonomically. Choose from three adjustable heights—60mm, 104mm, and 147mm, adjusting the height that provides you the most suitable and comfortable experience so that you can avoid the typical back, neck and shoulder pain and strain caused by too many hours sitting and working.

Sure, your laptop may be of any size, which makes the LinkPRO Hub Stand perfect for you. We made it suitable to support laptops of several sizes, such as 13, 15.6, and 17.3 inches(maximum). When fully stretched out, the whole stand is 270mm in length and 250mm in width, so all your laptops’ different sizes are covered.

The LinkPRO Hub Stand is equipped with a 4*4 Connecting Structure. Having 4*4 connecting rods at its center, this laptop stand can support up to 15kg of total laptop weight, letting you enjoy a sense of complete safety and stability when you are tapping on your laptops’ keyboards. 

Time is a scarce resource, especially for busy professionals like you, who are always on the move. This makes it essential to be able to rely on devices that save you time. The LinkPRO Hub Stand has a foldable design that supports your fast-paced rhythm. Fold it in a heartbeat, and see it collapsing to a compact size of only 40*25*250mm—only as wide as your wrist. This makes the stand incredibly portable, along with the detachable hub, so just fold the stand, grab the hub, drop them into your backpack, and you’re good to go! 

While sophisticated and elegant, the design of the LinkPRO Stand Hub is actually very simple and built around the concept of optimal portability. This remarkable stand and hub only weighs 264g—despite having 159 components in total. It fits in any bag, and it’s as easy to carry as it should be.

This unique device also features a safety lock on the upper-right corner and two holding bars at the bottom, so that the stand is kept even more stable and secure. 

When you’re working and feeling the pressure to perform, you need a robust partner that can withstand the pressure you’re under to work fast. That’s why we built the LinkPRO Hub Stand with aviation-grade materials, including carbon fiber reinforced plastic and a special aluminum alloy. These materials translate into a superb stability to keep your laptops safe and accommodated, and extreme durability for the stand.

LinkPRO is a product design company with experts working in constant movement. Leveraging over 8 years of experience in design, research and development services, during which we collaborated with highly reputed brands, and having obtained a number of design patents, at LinkPRO we have secured a leading position in the market, and our design achievements have become industry benchmarks. So, we knew we had to turn all this experience into a lean, efficient and ultra-convenient mobile working sidekick such as the LinkPRO Hub Stand, which we’re now bringing to you!
story_txt:
As a freelancer or mobile worker, your professional life unfolds on the move.You might need to use more than one devices for video programming and editing, or charge your phone with other tech gadgets in some circumstances. However, you don’t want another heavy pack or an extra net of entangled wires. In other words, you need the LinkPRO Hub Stand, a robust, stable and ergonomic stand for multiple laptops that comes with an 11-port USB Hub for all your charging and connectivity needs. 

Check out what our early reviewers said about LinkPro:
 

 
Here is the official unboxing video to help you guys know more about LinkPro:
 


 



The LinkPRO Hub Stand is a cable-friendly portable working station. Equipped with 11 different input and output ports, this unique hub lets you connect, charge and transfer data from and into all your essential devices, whether you’re working at home, in the office, or even on that lengthy train ride. If you’re using it for entertainment, it’s just as perfect and convenient. Ultimately, whatever you do, with the LinkPRO Hub Stand, you have 11 ways of being connected.


We’re all different and we all have different requirements and preferences. That’s why we designed the stand’s hub to make it detachable and adaptable. Attach the hub to the left or right side of your stand, based on your preferences and needs. Change it from one side to the other whenever you want, detach it you want to keep it within reach but not attached to the stand, or simply take it separately anywhere you want as an independent USB hub.


Your comfort is our priority, which is why we designed the LinkPRO Hub Stand ergonomically. Choose from three adjustable heights—60mm, 104mm, and 147mm, adjusting the height that provides you the most suitable and comfortable experience so that you can avoid the typical back, neck and shoulder pain and strain caused by too many hours sitting and working.

Sure, your laptop may be of any size, which makes the LinkPRO Hub Stand perfect for you. We made it suitable to support laptops of several sizes, such as 13, 15.6, and 17.3 inches(maximum). When fully stretched out, the whole stand is 270mm in length and 250mm in width, so all your laptops’ different sizes are covered.

The LinkPRO Hub Stand is equipped with a 4*4 Connecting Structure. Having 4*4 connecting rods at its center, this laptop stand can support up to 15kg of total laptop weight, letting you enjoy a sense of complete safety and stability when you are tapping on your laptops’ keyboards. 



Time is a scarce resource, especially for busy professionals like you, who are always on the move. This makes it essential to be able to rely on devices that save you time. The LinkPRO Hub Stand has a foldable design that supports your fast-paced rhythm. Fold it in a heartbeat, and see it collapsing to a compact size of only 40*25*250mm—only as wide as your wrist. This makes the stand incredibly portable, along with the detachable hub, so just fold the stand, grab the hub, drop them into your backpack, and you’re good to go! 

While sophisticated and elegant, the design of the LinkPRO Stand Hub is actually very simple and built around the concept of optimal portability. This remarkable stand and hub only weighs 264g—despite having 159 components in total. It fits in any bag, and it’s as easy to carry as it should be.

This unique device also features a safety lock on the upper-right corner and two holding bars at the bottom, so that the stand is kept even more stable and secure. 
When you’re working and feeling the pressure to perform, you need a robust partner that can withstand the pressure you’re under to work fast. That’s why we built the LinkPRO Hub Stand with aviation-grade materials, including carbon fiber reinforced plastic and a special aluminum alloy. These materials translate into a superb stability to keep your laptops safe and accommodated, and extreme durability for the stand.
LinkPRO is a product design company with experts working in constant movement. Leveraging over 8 years of experience in design, research and development services, during which we collaborated with highly reputed brands, and having obtained a number of design patents, at LinkPRO we have secured a leading position in the market, and our design achievements have become industry benchmarks. So, we knew we had to turn all this experience into a lean, efficient and ultra-convenient mobile working sidekick such as the LinkPRO Hub Stand, which we’re now bringing to you!

story:
iPad users can now maximize the potentials of their smart devices for work or leisure purposes. The OKAMI has been designed to offer the best possible user experience to iPad owners with a polyfunctional 3-in-1 case & stand. With only 6mm thickness, gets you to a whole new level of productivity and fun!

 

 

 

IMPROVE PRODUCTIVITY & FUN​

 

OKAMI AT GLANCE

 

WFH? WE GOT YOU COVERED

 

 

 

The main difference you will notice between the Okami and other iPad stands is that there are no mechanical parts or hinges of any kind. Our team has created a timeproof design, that won't weaken after prolonged usage.

 

We chose not to be a part of the trend towards planned obsolescence and believe that it's the designers' responsibility to develop for you, a long-lasting product.

 

 

 

The wide size of the base of Okami is the same length as the iPad itself, a considerable advantage in terms of stability.  The aim was to make a reliable and worry-free stand. We want to solve a problem, without creating another: elevating an iPad from your desk, without the stress of having it fall.

 

The elevation of the screen with Okami™ reaches a remarkable 8.5
cm / 3.3 inch. This is about 4x the elevation you get with Apple's Magic Keyboard.

 

 

 

Once in place, you will discover that Okami looks very similar to a tiny iMac, only transportable. 

All you need is to attach your keyboard and mouse and you have a portable computer with you always, wherever you want.

 

 

 

We've done months of testing and trials to find the best degrees of inclinations & the right strength of the magnets.  Every element is carefully planned, with nothing left to chance.

 

For the inner body, we have used the toughest material possible: a layer of fibreglass that
won't bend or break even under stress. On the exterior, we've selected a water-resistant
finish, with a soft to touch lining in the inner side.

 

From the vocabulary.  "Functionality: the quality of being suited to serve a purpose well; practicality."  This has been a prerogative in Okami's design process since day one, none the less was to be quick and easy to use.

 

 

Our main objective was to increase the functionality of your iPad while
keeping a quick, easy setup. After just a couple of times of using Okami, our team noticed
that the action of unfolding and assembling became an unconscious routine. We are sure
that you will enjoy the ease of the “Fold & Play”!

 

 

A laptop's screen is attached to the keyboard, whether you like it or not. An iPad doesn't have the same design constraint! So why not make it more comfortable? Even a little discomfort while working can become very annoying when you spend hours in that position.  

With users’ screen time increasing globally, sitting in the same position for
work or leisure can bad for your posture and the smallest discomfort can turn into
something much worse over time.

 

 

Through raising your screen with a stable base, Okami
takes care of you and brings relief to your neck and shoulders, improves your posture, which
can also increase your productivity.

 

 

With only 6 mm of thickness added when folded, the benefits that Okami
brings are inversely proportional to its dimensions. iPad stands are usually "another thing to
carry". While Okami is hidden when folded (while providing protection) and will not take up
extra space in your bag.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

iPad Air 2020

iPad Pro 11" (1st generation) 2018

iPad Pro 11" (2nd generation) 2020

iPad Pro 12.9" (3rd generation) 2018

iPad Pro 12.9"  (4th generation) 2020

iPad Pro 12.9" (5th Generation) 2021

 

or get our ADD-ONS: 

 

_______________________________________________________________________________

 

Thanks to iPad iOs we finally can connect the, so much awaited, Bluetooth tools to our iPad and use it natively. All kind of Bluetooth keyboards, mouses and trackpads (and console controllers) now have the official way to work properly.  Looking around I've noticed that pretty much all the iPad keyboards have the tendency to make it look like a laptop. Apple design too attaches the keyboard on the long side of the tablet and so make it look like a tiny MacBook. But why?

I've been thinking about it and, as a designer, I've realised that this is the way things has done so far: the concept itself of the laptop has always been with a screen on a side and the keyboard on the other side. Always with and a hinge in the middle. The "laptop way" of making-a-portable-pc is surely the most efficient way in terms of "carry a computer around", but not the best efficient way to "use it". For the first time since the invention of the laptop, we can finally detach the keyboard and so remove this design constrain.

 I've been asking myself "what would it be the best way to use it then!?" and so I've been in the making of a better design, one that would make it more user friendly "while using it" rather than focus exclusively on "the best way to carry it". Here the fundaments behind the idea of OKAMI. Right after, I've bought plenty of iPad cases myself and I've noticed that there is a tendency of making the front side foldable somehow (some brands are doing a remarkable job while some others definitely are not) and so I knew I had to make something better than what's already out there. Then I've been studying origami and the way structures can become really strong when folded, and so I have been experimenting all the way into it.  

Also, nature is very aware of that, you can check how the celery takes shape: the body and the structure of the vegetable are not that resilient but is that U section that gives it the strength it needs to stay up and strong.

 

 

After months of trial and errors, I've finally come up with the right structure for it. Easy to fold and unfold. Completely portable but most important, now we made an iPad look and feel like an iMac rather than a MacBook. And that's a big shift! We've tested it in plenty of scenarios and we finally can say that the degree of the inclination of "okami floaty' it's just right. With my team, we have plenty of ideas for the future to come and we hope to have the chance to make it happen, starting from here.

Thank you for your time and hopefully, you've enjoyed it. If you'll decide to jump on board and back our crowdfunding campaign we're really thankful to you, for your trust!

The okami team

story:
Finally - a hassle-free way to organize your laptop accessories. The easy-to-use design with the adhesive backing is friendly enough to stick to any and all electronics. Cleans easily when removed.

 

 

*External hard drive not included

 

 

Studio Neat, Hi Noon Studio, The Gadgeteer, Medium, Prefundia, Tools&Toys, Innoboot, Product Hunt, GadgetFlow, BackerClub, MikeShouts 

 

 

 

 

 

Laptops are meant to be mobile, but quickly become anchored or annoying once you have a hard drive plugged in. DriveSlide keeps you mobile, no matter what and gives all your external laptop accessories a place to live.

 

 

 

 

 

Mobile organization is as easy as 1-2-3.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The DriveSlide Lock is designed to be thin enough to adhere to your laptop and easily fits into your laptop case while being durable enough to withstand the weight of your accessory.

 

 

 

 

 

The DriveSlide Key fits in any hard drive case - no need to remove the Key from your accessory. The Key's adhesive back attaches onto your accessory with ease and secures your accessory to the back of your laptop. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Choose between Woodsmoke or Comet on the survey we send out shortly after you place your order. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

Click to earn cash from your referrals!



 

 

Siblings Anna and Eli Jay are the creators of DriveSlide. Anna is a filmmaker and Eli is a Project Engineer. She came up with the idea in 2019 when she’d had enough with the lint covered Velcro stuck onto the back of her multiple laptops and hard drives. Working in the camera department on a Netflix film, she noticed the unsightly staple being used regularly to organize equipment. Keeping up with Velcro was messy, and she knew there had to be a better way to secure the essential hard drives she was managing. Eli was months away from finishing a mechanical engineering degree. Not only did her younger brother have knowledge in CAD software, but also after-hours access to the university’s 3-D printer. Anna got to work sketching and taking online classes in product research and development, and within months came up with a design ready for printing. During the process, she invited Eli’s feedback and discovered she’d found a partner for the ride.

Anna and Eli Jay’s ingenuity comes from a practical understanding of how frustrating messy workspaces and dangling accessories are for all of us. With the Indiegogo community’s support, and a product they believe in to make it to the finish line, DriveSlide will soon be a laptop accessory staple. 

 

 

Our passion - okay, obsession - comes from a true understanding of how frustrating a messy desk and dangling accessories are. DriveSlide is a seamless and easy to use attachment, no matter where you’re working. External hard drives have become a place where you store pictures of your favorite memories, scripts for that new movie you want to produce, and everything else in between—and DriveSlide does not take that job lightly.

Our goal is to raise funds to start the first round of manufacturing. Transparency is our number one policy.  We’ve worked hard to align ourselves with experienced vendors and manufacturers, that doesn’t make us immune to hitches along the way. COVID-19 has created a unique challenge within itself, but be assured, we are here for the long haul and will work tirelessly to stay on track. DriveSlide currently will have 100% recyclable packaging. The ultimate goal is for our product to be sourced from sturdy, post-consumer recycled materials.

 

We thank the community for your support!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

We plan to ship starting in February 2021 We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of DriveSlide.

story:
Missed the Chance to Take XPick?

Don't worry! Here's the New Active Campaign:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/x-pick-no-magic-just-science--3#/

 

 
 
 
 

Hello everyone ...

My name is Marsio Salcuni, and I am a lover of Music, Physics and Magnetism, and one day, I got the idea of ​​combining these three things in my own way! And I must admit that it didn't go badly ... That idea gave me the opportunity to build my first X-PICK, and start having fun experimenting and playing. As you can see from the videos, however, I started to understand that it was much more important than just having fun ... I discovered that it is a set of everything a guitarist or bassist should have always with him ... All enclosed in a little Gem!

Like a ... Swiss Army Knife ... made especially for Musicians, which combines a multitude of objects, which usually a guitarist buys and uses separately ... In addition to the fact that it gives us the possibility to do many things that could not be done in any other way, if not with the X-Pick ... Like Playing with Magnetic Fields!

I apologize for the guitar or Bass performances, but in my defense, I delight more in singing, and this strengthens my desire to see the X-PICK in the hands of REAL GUITARISTS or BASS PLAYERS, to see the thousand other facets that they are able to discover (moreover because each of you has different instruments, amplifiers, settings, etc ... and being Magnetic Fields, they will always be different, with different results, different sounds, etc)

Each of you will contribute to the growth of the X-Pick's capabilities, and yours!

Because you will have 1000 more ways to MAKE MUSIC! 

The X-PICK has a size of 24 mm x 25 mm, 

 

a thickness of 4 mm and has a well-defined tip, but with a very wide angle (90° in Axial Position), such as to facilitate simple picking or normal fast picking.

 

 

The DESIGN, combined with the type of MAGNETIZATION, never creates problems of too much attraction towards the strings ... The maximum magnetic degree, is poured only on the faces of the magnet as Physics teaches us, and strong enough, but calculated, on the back of the X-Pick to use magnetic field modulation techniques! ... It is obvious, for example, that the bass strings suffer more attraction, given their thickness, but this in no way prevents the fast and precise picking, as you have seen from the videos because you can take advantage also of a Magnetic Trick, to improve Normal Picking and Fast Picking:

 

 

Exactly at the tip, at the union between the North and South magnetic fields, there is no attraction with the iron strings, but an imperceptible, but decisive repulsive force is felt, which facilitates the Picking, as if the string were thrown.

The reason is that the iron atoms of the string, being close to both polarities almost simultaneously (i.e. picking) do not have time to reorient themselves for the attraction, and combined with the fact that the power of magnetism always focuses on the faces of a magnet, I opted for axial magnetization that collides the opposite magnetic fields, right in the tip, and I created this kind of magnetism game to facilitate and speed up the movement of the pick ...

The rear corners are cut in order to facilitate the use of some particular techniques, and ensure the right degree of magnetism in the interaction between magnetic fields with the Pickups.

 

It has very smooth lateral surfaces to slide on the strings like a slide would and the back is the one that has the most magnetic degree, because it is the widest, suitable for all the innovative techniques that require magnetic field modulations of the pick-ups of the instruments

 

The direction of magnetization of the pick is AXIAL, in such a way as to adapt to any type of polarity of the pick ups on the market

 

 

The X-Pick is made with material named NEODYMIUM, from the category of Rare Earth Permanent Magnets; is chemically composed with NdFeB (Neodymium-Iron-Boron) and has the highest degree of magnetism that exists: N52. 

It have a Coating named (Ni-Cu-Ni- Epoxy) that is, a Nickel-Copper-Nickel composition and a final layer of Epoxy Resin to give more grip in contact with the fingers, as well as for protection from wear …

 

MAGNETIC FIELDS (with iron powder):

 

POLARITY (with a compass):

  

"X- PICK"

ALL IN NEODYMIUM N52

THE ONLY MAGNETIC PICK OF ALL TIMES

+

ROUND PLASTIC CASE

TO PROTECT THE X-PICK AND

ALWAYS CARRY IT WITH YOU !!

 

"X- PICK"

ALL IN NEODYMIUM N52

THE ONLY MAGNETIC PICK OF ALL TIMES

+

WOODEN DISPLAY BOX

​TO SHOW IT IN ALL ITS SPLENDOR: 

- AT YOUR HOME, 

- WHERE YOU PLAY WITH YOUR BAND, 

- IN THE SHOWCASE OF YOUR SHOP, 

- OR FOR A PHANTASMAGORIC

 GIFT TO GIVE TO A MUSICIAN !!

 

 

 

IT IS COMPOSED BY:

 

- A WOODEN DIPLAY BOX

- VELVET BEARING

- NON-SLIP MAGNET

WHICH ALLOWS THE X-PICK TO REMAIN

ERECTED FOR EXPOSURE, IN FRONT OF

THE LOGO THAT IS ALSO PRESENT INSIDE ... 

+

    

AND IN ADDITION WITH THE CHOICE "EXPO"

YOU WILL ALSO HAVE THE "TACTICAL" CASE

TO PROTECT THE X-PICK AND TAKE IT WITH YOU

 

 

Describing what happens, when it bring the X-Pick closer and away from the pick up of the instrument, there is a field modulation of the electromagnetic coils, with consequent change of shape, direction and intensity of the magnetic field between the X-Pick and the pick ups, to produce a different sound than usual ...

Using the X-Pick, you can change, IN REAL TIME: THE POSITION, THE SHAPE, THE POWER, THE INTENSITY of the GUITAR/BASS PICKUPS, which will have their fixed magnetic field, modulated by a magnetic brother who moves on them!

AS IF YOU CREATED A DIFFERENT PICKUP FOR EVERY PICK POSITION, ADAPTABLE TO EVERY KIND OF NEED:

 

 

PLECTRUM

New approach in the use of the Pick, with the use of the Magnetic Trick explained above, to improve control and speed up the Pick

​

 

BODY & CRISTALLINITY OF SOUND

Crystallinity and Body of Sound thanks to this innovative material, the Neodymium, which makes it seem to ALWAYS PLAY WITH NEW STRINGS!

 

SLIDE

A Wonderfull Slide, again thanks to Neodymium, which guarantees a Great Sustain! But also under another aspect: Finally you will use the Slide with the right hand in an agile way, leaving the left free to put chords, managing to act even only on the single note !!

 

PICK – TAPPING or "TAPPICK"

The Pick that will allow you to give a brilliant and perfect note just to contact, without having to press the string on the fret like a Viking, like with normal picks! In fact, it makes the notes shine even where there is no guitar fretboard, so much that you will use it for magnificent and wild tapping, where no one has gone before!

 

BRUSHES EFFECT

Sound produced only by the magnetic fields, bringing the pick closer to the Pick Up, and making them pass the strings, one by one or all together to create the rolls

 

MAGNETIC FIELDS DELAY

Delay of any kind of sound you want; Just one touch on the note or chords, like the classic pedalboards, and then you have Total Control over the Delay ... You'll be able to slow down or speed up the delay, accentuate it, change the sound in real time ... 

 

ELECTRIC VIOLIN & OCTAVER

(POWER & ETERNAL SUSTAIN)

ELECTRIC VIOLIN: Only sliding on the string gently, with the back or side of the X-Pick; HOW MANY TIMES HAVE YOU HOPED THAT YOUR BENDING WILL LAST IN ETERNAL GARY MOORE STYLE ???? ... NOW YOU CAN DO IT TOO !!! ALSO RECOMMENDED FOR LESS EXPENSIVE AND PERFORMING GUITARS !!

OCTAVER: Just slipping on the string with the back of the pick, adds more than an octave to the traditional guitar fretboard with a bright and powerful sound!

 

HYPER PICKING

THE TECHNIQUE BORN WITH THE X-PICK, that will allow you to play without touching the strings, and to interact only through magnetic fields! In this case the change in polarity of the magnetic field acts (Attraction/Repulsion), because the movement of the pick is right - left with respect to the string ...

 

MAGNETIC FIELDS TREMOLO

OTHER X-PICK TECHNIQUE, which differs from Hyper Picking, because the movement of the Pick with respect to the strings is up and down, that is, close to and away from the string quickly. In this case there is Compression of Magnetic Fields (Only Repulsion) TECHNIQUE THAT FINALLY WILL MAKES TREMOLO POSSIBLE EVEN ON LEVER-LESS GUITARS!

 

REVERSE / ROTARY

Technique that thanks to the magnetic fields, will gives us the possibility of having these effects even without a pedal board ... How many times have you brought the effects pedals to an evening of the band, to use them in a single song?

 

EPIC ATTACK: "THE GOD OF ROCK" 

Versatile and Innovative Pick Attack thanks to Neodymium, and speaking personally, it is one of the most exciting things this little treasure will makes with your support!

 

ULTRA MAGNETIC CONVENIENCE

You will be able to magnetically attach your X-Pick wherever you want thanks to the high magnetic degree: to an iron necklace, a bracelet, a belt, a ring, near any small iron part or small part of the same guitar as I did in the video, and speed up your changes from accompaniment to solo! 

 

MANY EFFECTS

In addition to the one shown above, and that you could see from the videos, you must keep in mind that the combinations of use of the X-Pick are infinite ... I am talking about the all different instruments we have, and therefore with different magnetic fields, completely new results , or used together with different pedals, amplifiers of various brands and powers, and I could go on forever as you well know… SO IT'S A NEW WORLD TO BE COMPLETELY DISCOVERED BY EACH OF YOU !!!

 

HANG OBJECTS

Hang a sheet on the refrigerator, Hang a screwdriver or hammer, Hang up the cell phone, ...

 

LEARN SCIENCE

With a Magnet so strong, it will be easier to learn the rules of magnetism at school, at home, anywhere ...

 

MAGNETIZE OBJECTS

Such as Screwdrivers, screws, Knives, paper clips, etc ...

On Technical Level

When you'll playing with the X-Pick, you will not hear those annoying hums due to too high gain or too open tones or exaggerated volumes ... This happens because the X-Pick, being made of ferrous material and magnetic, in contact with the strings, IMPROVE THE GROUNDING SYSTEM OF THE INSTRUMENT, closing better the mass that makes the usual turn in your body only from the left hand; a round of Grounding that is usually stopped by the normal picks of non-conducting material ...

 

On Philosophical Level

And for this I have to go a little personal ... Well, I'm one of those who sweated with work and the few savings his Gibson Les Paul Studio, and this desire to have it, created a bond ... let's say I'm one of those who believe that every instrument has a SOUL, a CONSCIENCE, and an OPINION to express… And when I play, I speak to her! SHE TALK TO ME! ...

So why not give maximum voice to this essence?

LET YOUR GUITAR OR BASS EXPRESS, IN NEW WAYS, WITH SOUNDS THAT HAVE NEVER HEARD OR PRODUCED, WITH NEW TECHNIQUES ... NEW VIBRATIONS !! ...

 

A simple Pick?

 

I tried to make the X-Pick by myself, like the ones you see in the videos… I made them all by hand with the cutter; but there is a problem ... If magnets reach a critical heat point, they lose a lot of their magnetism, and with the cutter or any other tool, that point is far surpassed! ... And it is for this reason that I am collaborating with a magnet manufacturers, to have my custom Mold Patent (pending) made ... It is the only way for the moment, at least until I can afford to open a business independently ...

Unfortunately, this company need a substantial amount of X-PICK to give me an advantageous quote, for various reasons:

  1. The first is the cost of the material, the more it is, the less they pay for it too;
  2. The Second is for all instruments and processes for magnetization to grade N52;
  3. The third and most expensive is the mold created specifically for this Patent; of which they asked me to contribute with the cost of the realization, because the company cannot use it for any other purpose ... 

In fact, the products that I will ship, will be produced with:

  • MAGNETIC CERTIFICATION
  • ALL THE SAME AND PERFECT, THANKS TO THE MOLD,
  • WITH A COATING AGAINST WEAR, AND TO IMPROVE THE GRIP BETWEEN THE FINGERS,
  • WITHOUT THE MINIMAL DEFECT OR IMPERFECTION!​

After the success of the Campaign on another Platform, and thanks to many people who believed in this project (and whom I thank again from the heart), I was able to raise enough money to:

- Have a first collaboration with a Magnet Company;

- Start doing Mold tests:

VERSION N.1 (Brown Resin test mold)

VERSION N.2 (Brown Resin test mold)

 

FINAL VERSION (White Resin Test Mold)

NOW EVERYTHING IS READY FOR PRODUCTION!

At the end of the campaign, all it have to do is indicate a quantity to produce!

Subsequently, I will personally arrange for packaging and shipping, because I want to be SURE that everything I have shown and promised is completely respected!

I am doing my best to make my little dream come true but I would need some of your help ... 

 

As I said before, I managed to create my first X-Pick by myself, but with consequent loss of magnetism ... In fact, to work the so-called permanent rare earth magnets with high magnetic potential, you need a lot of machinery, expensive machinery, that only a company already started and that does only this can have.

I do not have the presumption of wanting to open a magnet company immediately, but simply to collaborate with one of these companies, so that they develop a special mold of my patent and provide to magnetization and coating. By proceeding in this way, I will be able to start creating a way forward, because Rome wasn't built in a day! And I tell you as an Italian! That's it! …

Things start small, and if you've read this far, I'm sure you'll help me take a small step !!

I'll thank you forever!

GOOD MUSIC WITH OR WITHOUT X-PICK

But it's better with :-)

 

 

 

 

Earn A Lot By Spreading The Word About X-Pick With KickBooster!

 

 

SALCUNI MARSIO - Creator & CEO

 

Pleased to meet you ...
story_txt:
Missed the Chance to Take XPick?
Don't worry! Here's the New Active Campaign:
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/x-pick-no-magic-just-science--3#/

 
   

 

Hello everyone ...
My name is Marsio Salcuni, and I am a lover of Music, Physics and Magnetism, and one day, I got the idea of ​​combining these three things in my own way! And I must admit that it didn't go badly ... That idea gave me the opportunity to build my first X-PICK, and start having fun experimenting and playing. As you can see from the videos, however, I started to understand that it was much more important than just having fun ... I discovered that it is a set of everything a guitarist or bassist should have always with him ... All enclosed in a little Gem!
Like a ... Swiss Army Knife ... made especially for Musicians, which combines a multitude of objects, which usually a guitarist buys and uses separately ... In addition to the fact that it gives us the possibility to do many things that could not be done in any other way, if not with the X-Pick ... Like Playing with Magnetic Fields!
I apologize for the guitar or Bass performances, but in my defense, I delight more in singing, and this strengthens my desire to see the X-PICK in the hands of REAL GUITARISTS or BASS PLAYERS, to see the thousand other facets that they are able to discover (moreover because each of you has different instruments, amplifiers, settings, etc ... and being Magnetic Fields, they will always be different, with different results, different sounds, etc)
Each of you will contribute to the growth of the X-Pick's capabilities, and yours! 
Because you will have 1000 more ways to MAKE MUSIC! 


The X-PICK has a size of 24 mm x 25 mm, 

 
a thickness of 4 mm and has a well-defined tip, but with a very wide angle (90° in Axial Position), such as to facilitate simple picking or normal fast picking.
 

 

The DESIGN, combined with the type of MAGNETIZATION, never creates problems of too much attraction towards the strings ... The maximum magnetic degree, is poured only on the faces of the magnet as Physics teaches us, and strong enough, but calculated, on the back of the X-Pick to use magnetic field modulation techniques! ... It is obvious, for example, that the bass strings suffer more attraction, given their thickness, but this in no way prevents the fast and precise picking, as you have seen from the videos because you can take advantage also of a Magnetic Trick, to improve Normal Picking and Fast Picking:
 

 
Exactly at the tip, at the union between the North and South magnetic fields, there is no attraction with the iron strings, but an imperceptible, but decisive repulsive force is felt, which facilitates the Picking, as if the string were thrown.
The reason is that the iron atoms of the string, being close to both polarities almost simultaneously (i.e. picking) do not have time to reorient themselves for the attraction, and combined with the fact that the power of magnetism always focuses on the faces of a magnet, I opted for axial magnetization that collides the opposite magnetic fields, right in the tip, and I created this kind of magnetism game to facilitate and speed up the movement of the pick ...
The rear corners are cut in order to facilitate the use of some particular techniques, and ensure the right degree of magnetism in the interaction between magnetic fields with the Pickups.

 
It has very smooth lateral surfaces to slide on the strings like a slide would and the back is the one that has the most magnetic degree, because it is the widest, suitable for all the innovative techniques that require magnetic field modulations of the pick-ups of the instruments
 
The direction of magnetization of the pick is AXIAL, in such a way as to adapt to any type of polarity of the pick ups on the market

 

 


The X-Pick is made with material named NEODYMIUM, from the category of Rare Earth Permanent Magnets; is chemically composed with NdFeB (Neodymium-Iron-Boron) and has the highest degree of magnetism that exists: N52. 
It have a Coating named (Ni-Cu-Ni- Epoxy) that is, a Nickel-Copper-Nickel composition and a final layer of Epoxy Resin to give more grip in contact with the fingers, as well as for protection from wear …
 
MAGNETIC FIELDS (with iron powder):


 
POLARITY (with a compass):
  


"X- PICK"
ALL IN NEODYMIUM N52
THE ONLY MAGNETIC PICK OF ALL TIMES
+
ROUND PLASTIC CASE
TO PROTECT THE X-PICK AND
ALWAYS CARRY IT WITH YOU !!
 



"X- PICK"
ALL IN NEODYMIUM N52
THE ONLY MAGNETIC PICK OF ALL TIMES
+
WOODEN DISPLAY BOX
​TO SHOW IT IN ALL ITS SPLENDOR: 
- AT YOUR HOME, 
- WHERE YOU PLAY WITH YOUR BAND, 
- IN THE SHOWCASE OF YOUR SHOP, 
- OR FOR A PHANTASMAGORIC
 GIFT TO GIVE TO A MUSICIAN !!
 
 
 
IT IS COMPOSED BY:
 
- A WOODEN DIPLAY BOX
- VELVET BEARING
- NON-SLIP MAGNET
WHICH ALLOWS THE X-PICK TO REMAIN
ERECTED FOR EXPOSURE, IN FRONT OF
THE LOGO THAT IS ALSO PRESENT INSIDE ... 
+
    
AND IN ADDITION WITH THE CHOICE "EXPO" 
YOU WILL ALSO HAVE THE "TACTICAL" CASE
TO PROTECT THE X-PICK AND TAKE IT WITH YOU
 


 


Describing what happens, when it bring the X-Pick closer and away from the pick up of the instrument, there is a field modulation of the electromagnetic coils, with consequent change of shape, direction and intensity of the magnetic field between the X-Pick and the pick ups, to produce a different sound than usual ...
Using the X-Pick, you can change, IN REAL TIME: THE POSITION, THE SHAPE, THE POWER, THE INTENSITY of the GUITAR/BASS PICKUPS, which will have their fixed magnetic field, modulated by a magnetic brother who moves on them!
AS IF YOU CREATED A DIFFERENT PICKUP FOR EVERY PICK POSITION, ADAPTABLE TO EVERY KIND OF NEED:
 
 
PLECTRUM
New approach in the use of the Pick, with the use of the Magnetic Trick explained above, to improve control and speed up the Pick

​

 
BODY & CRISTALLINITY OF SOUND
Crystallinity and Body of Sound thanks to this innovative material, the Neodymium, which makes it seem to ALWAYS PLAY WITH NEW STRINGS!

 
SLIDE
A Wonderfull Slide, again thanks to Neodymium, which guarantees a Great Sustain! But also under another aspect: Finally you will use the Slide with the right hand in an agile way, leaving the left free to put chords, managing to act even only on the single note !!

story:
What is it like having a mini whiteboard standing on your desk ready for your next million dollar ideas?

What is it like seeing clearly in front of you what all your top priorities are at a glance?

 

Having a focal point of to-dos help clear out your mind to focus on what you’re set out to accomplish. It guides you through out your work day knowing exactly what your top priorities are in order to achieve your goals. 

 

A total of 52 Pages of erasable whiteboard weekly pages give you infinite space for all sorts of schedules, planning, notes, ideas and many more. 

 

 

With the reusable undated weekly layout pages you can use again and again year after year, you may never need to buy another planner again. 

AND you can save lots of trees our earth will thank you!

story:
Notes of Shipping Fees.

Due to the global freight rate has risen so much that we have to increase the freight cost per order, which will increase between $12-$20 according to different countries. After the purchase is completed, we will collect the increased shipping fees through surveys. Thanks for all the support!

 

We provide you multi-functional dog handles with built-in LED, water tank, poop bag storage and TWO training modes with a new training collar. Solve all the problems you may have, make your time with your dog more harmonious. 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

For Sound Training Mode, Dogs can recognize certain sounds and tones and learn how to react to them. For example, your dog knows what the doorbell ringing means and how to react to it. 

Through repetition, dogs will learn what a specific sound or tone means and be able to react to it appropriately.

With sound training, you can easily overlay an audible sound over a known (or learning) verbal command and quickly teach your dog commands like "sit," "stay," and "heel." Our GoGoLeash Training System has a maximum range of about 650 feet. 

 

 

Vibration collars are often suggested for hearing-impaired dogs or those who simply refuse to listen. When using vibration training, you want the collar to fit snugly enough for the dog to feel the vibration but not tightly. You should be able to put 1-2 fingers between the collar and your dog's neck.

Vibration is a safe and humane way to work with dogs of any size to help train them, praise them, and correct behavior. Both training modes can be used to give your pup a warning, give them praise, or as a silent command depending on how you choose to train your dog.

 

When using any training tools, experts recommend you use verbal commands first and then training tools to reinforce the commands, and reward positive behavior with treats. Training tools are cues for your dogs - not a consequence or punishment. 

The leash handle has a water bowl and water tank that holds 150 ml of water so your pup can quench their thirst anywhere.  You can easily remove the water tank when you have a short trip.  

We included a built-in storage area to hold up to 15 waste bags with an easy-tear dispenser. We get it..If you worried about running out of waste bags, since we design it as a universal type, you can easily buy refills online.  

Incorporated LED lights in the leash handle AND on your dog’s collar to keep you and your pup safe at night or in low-light conditions.

For training modes, internal channel switching allows you to switch from one dog to another (maximum 4 dogs at the same time) to easily use their preferred training method only on them.

 

GoGoLeash handle have super bearing capacities up to 100 kg / 220 pounds and you can walk up to 5 small dogs with one leash handle.

 

Our training collar can be attached to your dog's harness. Whether your dog wears a Small, Medium or even Extra-Large harness, it can be perfectly matched.

Many of you told us that you wanted a retractable leash. We initially thought we would work on integrating it for the next version, but with the efforts of our design team, we’re super happy to announce that we’ve created a retractable leash add-on that will be available to ship with GoGoLeash! The length of it is 1.3-1.5m. Our backers can add it during the post-campaign survey! 

 

The GoGoLeash is also compatible with regular Car Seat Belt Buckles to keep your dogs safe and secure in your vehicle. We use 1.3 to 1.8 meters of adjustable reflective leash with universal buckle, you can easily tie it to your dog's harness.

 
 
 

 

 

 

Crowdfunding platform is not a shop or a storehouse. Every purchase is like an investment. We do not accept any refund. But we will do our best on the production and delivery process. Hope you guys will receive a perfect GoGoLeash and have fun with your lovers!

 

We took the final prototype to the factory. In order to confirm the final mold and appearance process, which will be produced in a factory in Shenzhen.

 

After the CES, we upgraded some features, such as size, design, function, etc. through the collected suggestions.

 

 

 

1. What shipping service will you be using?

Most of the rewards we have listed, will use Container shipping to ship to the destination country or city and then use the local post office or shipping services to get the GoGoLeash to your home. We want you to have the cheapest shipping cost possible and this is how we can do that.

 

2. Are there VAT, duties, or fees related to shipping?

For container shipment orders to US EU AU CA CN HK SG area, we will pay the tax.

Kickstarter rewards are gifts that you receive in return for your donations. They are different from ordinary sales/purchases. Our courier had worked on dozens crowdfunding projects which went smoothly through fulfillment. Under our arrangement, it won't entail additional costs for you under most circumstances. Despite that, the fact we're shipping directly from China may still impose a chance for further inspection and determination by the customs. The VAT, duties and fees vary by country. Please message us about the specifics.

 

3. Does it come with a warranty? If so, how long and what does it cover?

We provide a 12-month warranty on Kickstarter orders, same as retail.

 

4. What materials are the collar, leash, and handle made of?

All products are made of recyclable plastic materials.

 

5. How many training modes does it have?

Vibration and sound.

 

6. Can the intensity of the sound and vibration be adjusted?

No, it cannot. The training modes are gentle and not aggressive but are enough to get your pet's attention.

 

7. How bright are the LED lights for night walks?

The leash handle has a power of 1 watt and can be illuminated for 3 meters at night.

The smart collar can irradiate 1 meter.

 

8. How many poop bags can it hold?

15 bags of any brand.

 

9. How much water fits in the attached water tank?

150ml / 5.3 ounces.

 

10. What is the weight limit?

Leash weight limit is 100 kg/220 pounds and collar capacity is 50 kg/110 pounds.

 

11. How long does it need to be charged?

The collar can be fully charged in 30 minutes and last 15 days on one full charge.

The leash handle can be fully charged in one hour and lasts 95 days.

 

12. What kind of charger does it need?

Type-C (provided)

Our GoGoLeash Training System has a maximum range of about 650 feet.   Vibration collars are often suggested for hearing-impaired dogs or those who simply refuse to listen. When using vibration training, you want the collar to fit snugly enough for the dog to feel the vibration but not tightly. You should be able to put 1-2 fingers between the collar and your dog's neck.Vibration is a safe and humane way to work with dogs of any size to help train them, praise them, and correct behavior. Both training modes can be used to give your pup a warning, give them praise, or as a silent command depending on how you choose to train your dog. When using any training tools, experts recommend you use verbal commands first and then training tools to reinforce the commands, and reward positive behavior with treats. Training tools are cues for your dogs - not a consequence or punishment. The leash handle has a water bowl and water tank that holds 150 ml of water so your pup can quench their thirst anywhere.  You can easily remove the water tank when you have a short trip.  We included a built-in storage area to hold up to 15 waste bags with an easy-tear dispenser. We get it..If you worried about running out of waste bags, since we design it as a universal type, you can easily buy refills online.  Incorporated LED lights in the leash handle AND on your dog’s collar to keep you and your pup safe at night or in low-light conditions.For training modes, internal channel switching allows you to switch from one dog to another (maximum 4 dogs at the same time) to easily use their preferred training method only on them.  GoGoLeash handle have super bearing capacities up to 100 kg / 220 pounds and you can walk up to 5 small dogs with one leash handle.  Our training collar can be attached to your dog's harness. Whether your dog wears a Small, Medium or even Extra-Large harness, it can be perfectly matched.Many of you told us that you wanted a retractable leash. We initially thought we would work on integrating it for the next version, but with the efforts of our design team, we’re super happy to announce that we’ve created a retractable leash add-on that will be available to ship with GoGoLeash! The length of it is 1.3-1.5m. Our backers can add it during the post-campaign survey!   The GoGoLeash is also compatible with regular Car Seat Belt Buckles to keep your dogs safe and secure in your vehicle. We use 1.3 to 1.8 meters of adjustable reflective leash with universal buckle, you can easily tie it to your dog's harness.
 


 


 

 



 



 


Crowdfunding platform is not a shop or a storehouse. Every purchase is like an investment. We do not accept any refund. But we will do our best on the production and delivery process. Hope you guys will receive a perfect GoGoLeash and have fun with your lovers!



 


We took the final prototype to the factory. In order to confirm the final mold and appearance process, which will be produced in a factory in Shenzhen.
 



After the CES, we upgraded some features, such as size, design, function, etc. through the collected suggestions.
 





 




 

1. What shipping service will you be using?
Most of the rewards we have listed, will use Container shipping to ship to the destination country or city and then use the local post office or shipping services to get the GoGoLeash to your home. We want you to have the cheapest shipping cost possible and this is how we can do that.
 
2. Are there VAT, duties, or fees related to shipping?
For container shipment orders to US EU AU CA CN HK SG area, we will pay the tax.
Kickstarter rewards are gifts that you receive in return for your donations. They are different from ordinary sales/purchases. Our courier had worked on dozens crowdfunding projects which went smoothly through fulfillment. Under our arrangement, it won't entail additional costs for you under most circumstances. Despite that, the fact we're shipping directly from China may still impose a chance for further inspection and determination by the customs. The VAT, duties and fees vary by country. Please message us about the specifics.
 
3. Does it come with a warranty? If so, how long and what does it cover?
We provide a 12-month warranty on Kickstarter orders, same as retail.
 
4. What materials are the collar, leash, and handle made of?
All products are made of recyclable plastic materials.
 
5. How many training modes does it have?
Vibration and sound.
 
6. Can the intensity of the sound and vibration be adjusted?
No, it cannot. The training modes are gentle and not aggressive but are enough to get your pet's attention.
 
7. How bright are the LED lights for night walks?
The leash handle has a power of 1 watt and can be illuminated for 3 meters at night.
The smart collar can irradiate 1 meter.
 
8. How many poop bags can it hold?
15 bags of any brand.
 
9. How much water fits in the attached water tank?
150ml / 5.3 ounces.
 
10. What is the weight limit?
Leash weight limit is 100 kg/220 pounds and collar capacity is 50 kg/110 pounds.
 
11. How long does it need to be charged?
The collar can be fully charged in 30 minutes and last 15 days on one full charge.
The leash handle can be fully charged in one hour and lasts 95 days.
 
12. What kind of charger does it need?
Type-C (provided)

story:
The Arc Edition 


The Arc Edition is a limited edition pen series, available in rollerball or fountain pen, celebrating our current cultural moment and the history of Civil Rights in America. A portion of the proceeds will be donated to a nonprofit working with victims of gun violence in one of Chicago's most violent neighborhoods.

 

On March 25, 1965, Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. stepped in front of a microphone on the steps of the Alabama State Capitol building in Montgomery, Alabama. Over the past five days, he and thousands of others had marched 54 miles from Selma, Alabama. On that day Dr. King said something incredibly powerful.

 

"The arc of the moral universe is long, but it bends toward justice." - MLK

 

This powerful quote was part of a speech Dr. King delivered at the end of the march known as "Our God is Marching On" or "How Long? Not Long." You can find a short video of the conclusion of the speech here or the full audio version here.

The Selma to Montgomery marches took place over several weeks in March of 1965. It took three attempts for protesters to reach their destination. The first two were ended by violence: beatings and even murder of one of the protesters. The murder of James Reeb, a minister, sparked national outrage and won the marchers the support of the White House and a committment to provide them with a peaceful escort along their 54-mile march.  

The Voting Rights Act became law on August 6, 1965, just a few months after these marches. 

 

Marchers passing over the Edmund-Pettus bridge on Bloody Sunday during the first attempt.

 

Protesters bringing the flag to Montgomery.

 

The Alabama State Capitol building had long been a seat of power in the segregationist South, serving as the first capitol of the Confederate States and housing their constitutional convention. George Wallace, the Alabama governor, was a staunch segregationist and refused to protect or recognize the protesters. Dr. King's choice to speak from these steps, in and of itself, was an act of strength and defiance. In 1985, the State Capitol building began its first significant renovation since the 1965 events. As part of this renovation a board was removed from the threshold. This board made its way into our hands in 2012 and is the centerpiece of our newest limited edition pen series - The Arc Edition.

In 2020, we brought the Arc Edition to life on Kickstarter. We promised to give back to the community. That promise has turned into an amazing partnership with Good Kids, Mad City - Englewood. 

 

Good Kids, Mad City - Englewood

 

 

Englewood is one of Chicago's most violent neighborhoods. In 2020, it experienced gun violence on an almost daily basis. Good Kids, Mad City was founded by Carlil Pitman, who grew up in the community and experienced its challenges first hand. Among their programs is a first responder class for kids to give aid to gunshot victims until the ambulance arrives. We're going to be donating a portion of the proceeds for all Arc Edition sales to them, and we've helped them launch their own Patreon fundraising campaign to create ongoing operating funds so they can further transform the Englewood community.

 

 

The Perks

A closer look at the items in the Arc Edition:

 

Arc Edition Pen

The Arc Edition features an elegant metal cap that screws on the front for a tight seal and pressure-posts to the back for easy use. The back of the cap features an classic pocket clip.

 

Each pen is engraved with a unique serial number and comes with a signed certificate of authenticity.

 

We're making this limited edition pen as either a rollerball our fountain pen - your choice.

 

The rollerball pen uses a premium Schneider Topball 850 refill.

 

The nib is a German-made with a steel core and iridium tip. In our estimation it's on the fine side of medium and is a touch wetter with sightly more flex than a typical steel nib.

 

Included with each fountain pen is a piston filler for your favorite bottled ink and an international short cartridge.

 

The facts:

  • Size: 5.5 inches long with cap on; 5.75 inches with cap posted; and 5 inches without cap.
  • Weight: 1.5 oz with the cap on and 1.2 oz without the cap.
  • Rollerball Refills: The rollerball uses Euro/rollerball 110mm refills and ships with a Schneider Topball 850 refill in black ink. Additional rollerball refill options will be available to add to your order in the post-project BackerKit survey.
  • Fountain Pen Refills: The fountain pen use short international ink cartridges or international piston fillers. Ships with one of each. 
  • Fountain Pen Nib: Ships with a #5 medium nib. Additional nib sizes will be available to add to your order in the post-project BackerKit survey (extra fine, fine, broad , 1.1 italic, and 1.4 italic).

 

The Arc Edition Sleeve

Each Arc Edition pen will ship with an Ecuadorian latigo leather pen sleeve in black leather and tan stitching, complementing the colors of the pen. The leather sleeve will help to protect the wood and metal finishes for years to come. 

Handcrafted using our Ecuadorian latigo leather, this Arc Edition sleeve is the perfect complement to the pen, protecting the wood and metal finishes.

 

The Arc Edition Box

The Arc Edition Pen Set includes this engraved cherry wood gift box, making this set the perfect desk accessory or gift. Each pen in the set is individually numbered and comes with its own pen sleeve so you can keep the whole set for yourself or easily gift one of the pens.

The Arc Edition Set comes with a cherry gift box that can hold one or two pens along with their certificates of authenticity. You may choose the writing style of each pen in your set (rollerball & fountain pen, two rollerballs, or two fountain pens).

 

The top of the box is engraved with a map of the 54-mile march from Selma to Montgomery and an image of the exterior of the Capitol building.

 

The Materials

Alabama State Capitol Heart Pine

Photo Credit; https://medium.com/vantage/thoughts-on-this-mlk...

 

The Alabama State Capitol Building was built in 1846. In 1861, it became the first capitol of the Confederate States of America and was where the Confederate constitution was drawn up. Over 100 years later, this building bore witness to the Selma to Montgomery marches, leading to the Voting Rights Act, a significant milestone in the civil rights movement. In 1985, the State Capitol Building was renovated and the threshold board used in the Arc Edition was removed. 

For more information about the State Capitol Building: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alabama_State_Cap...

For more information about the Selma to Montgomery Marches: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Selma_to_Montgome...

 

Bog Oak

Old-growth oak has been buried in a peat bog for over 5,000 years.

 

We chose bog oak for two reasons. One, it is a beautiful wood and provides a great contrast for the heart pine. And two, we think Dr. King's choice of words about history being long is important. We know that the story of justice in America has been a long story so choosing a wood that is over 5,000 years old felt appropriate. 

 

Ecuadorian Latigo Leather 

Respect the Animal: We're not big fans of how the cattle industry in America treats animals. So we sought out our leather from a place where virtually all cattle are free-range, grass-fed, and factory farms are nearly impossible to find.

Character by Design: The finish of our Latigo leather is designed to show marks and age very easily but just as easily have them buffed out. The idea here is that you can dial in how much age/character you want your piece to show based on how often you oil treat it.

Hydrophobic treatment: If you made a bag from this leather and filled it with water it would take eight hours for the first drop to hit the floor. Pretty sweet.

 

Our Crafting Process

 

Our Guarantee

Now, forever, no questions. When we put our logo on something, we're signing our work. We take that seriously. If you aren't madly in love with your Allegory piece, tell us! If any part of it ever breaks or wears out, we'll fix it. We're in this for the long haul.

 

About Allegory

Allegory was founded in 2012 with the help of a couple hundred awesome Kickstarter backers. Our mission is to raise the bar for what people expect from products and brands. We believe that products should be made to last, have a story you can be proud of, and have a positive impact on all the people they touch along the way. Here are some comments from backers of the original Kickstarter Arc Edition project:

Just received my pens and display boxes yesterday and they look fantastic!! Thank you so very much! An artful piece of history.

- Michael Santos, Original Arc Edition Kickstarter Backer, 2020

 

Beautiful, expertly crafted pen. Received mine 2 days ago and just now tried it out. The nib is smoother than any I’ve used before. Silky smooth! Thank you for such a lovely piece of history.

- Mary Beth Logue, Original Arc Edition Kickstarter Backer, 2020

 

Mine arrived today. I've gotten many great things from you over the last few years, including some excellent pens. This is some of your best work. Great dimensions and balance. Congratulations and thank you, Chad and Jess. Looking forward to your next project.

- Jason, Original Arc Edition Kickstarter Backer, 2020
