story:
AirView2 wirelessHD DeX/PC/Mac, 4K/FHD touchscreen. mm-Wave technology. Zero lag.

 

⭐WirelessHD mm-Wave technology. The world’s first ZERO lag wireless touchscreen.

 

⭐Wireless Samsung DeX/Android/PC/Mac multi-touch screen.

 

⭐Plug and play. No pair WIFI need. No APP installation. Hassle free connection.

 

⭐Both USB-C and HDMI video-in support, and smartphone dock function.

 

⭐Wireless Nintendo Switch display. Smartphone Somatosensory games’ display.

 

⭐Extremely responsive, ZERO latency. Lossless picture/video quality.

 

⭐Ultra-wide 178-degree vertical and horizontal viewing angles.

 

⭐sRGB 100% color space, optimal color/contrast than other panels.

 

⭐Outstanding color accuracy and screen consistency.

 

⭐Fully laminated IPS, higher optical transparency (>94%), brilliant color clarity and brightness, perfect for indoor and outdoor use.

 

⭐Built-in battery 10200mAh, lightweight and thinness for mobility. PD quick charge.

 

 

AirView 2nd generation comes to the earth. It’s the world’s first ZERO lag wireless touchscreen. Advanced mm-Wave wirelessHD and touchable feature integrated into a portable touchscreen monitor ever. It’s your wireless touchable display, it’s your smartphone dock, it’s your powerbank, it’s your speakers, it's your wireless HDMI, and it’s versatile comprehensively cater for all your needs. Fully support wireless Samsung DeX, smartphone, and PC/Mac screen touchable, Nintendo, or any HDMI wireless display without latency.

 

Hands-on video of AirView2

 

 

 

 

 

AirView2 utilizes the industrial leading WirelessHD (mm-Wave) technology that is normally found in 5G networks. The WirelessHD specification is based on a 7 GHz channel in the 60 GHz Extremely High Frequency radio band. It allows either lightly compressed (proprietary wireless link-aware codec) or uncompressed digital transmission of high-definition video and audio and data signals, essentially making it equivalent of a wireless HDMI. First-generation implementation achieves data rates from 4 Gbit/s, but the core technology allows theoretical data rates as high as 25 Gbit/s (compared to 10.2 Gbit/s for HDMI 1.3 and 21.6 Gbit/s for DisplayPort 1.2), permitting WirelessHD to scale to higher resolutions, color depth, and range.

 

 

We know many others cabled/wired portable monitors. Most of them were not have enough selling points. Many others were not full-laminated, not equipped with high capacity battery power, not have wirelessHD feature to lead ahead of the future, not have adequated USB-C ports. But they were selling almost same or 2/3 price of AirView2.  If you were still thinking or pledged others, then it's time to get AirView2 instead, that brings you much more adanced features. It's not others can compete with AirView2.

 

 

How much more could you get done by connecting devices with a touchable display without a cable?  AirView2 its DeX/PC/Mac touchable feature is perfectly for any usages, no matter wired or wireless. Not only for laptop, game station or PC, but also for smartphone or mobile devices.  Nowadays, many Android 10 onward smartphones have built-in desktop mode are coming popular. Portable mobile work become more efficient and easy.

 

AirView 2nd generation is not a common wireless display. Forget other impossible products. AirView2 already fully support Samsung DeX wireless touchable. Beyond your imagination, many feature are come true and not been constrained by traditional cable anymore.

 

 

How long have you been longing for a wireless Samsung DeX or PC wireless touchable screen? Now it’s come true! In the past, Samsung DeX was not possible wirelessly touchable. That constrains been killed by AirView2. From now on, AirView2 bring you future wireless expereience beyond cable connect. ZERO lag touchscreen feature, no matter for any Android desktop mode, or gaming via AirView2 are exceptional amazing.

 

 

AirView2 improved long last battery support joyful gaming anywhere. With Type-C & WirelessHD new technology, AirView supports any DP alt mode devices. Which means not only Nintendo Switch, but also other Android games & somatosensory games are playable & touchable over wired or wirelessly without any latency.

 

Whether desktop gamer, mobile gamer or just leisure, the versatile AirView2 turn up the game with more details display, color space and clarity. With Hi-Fi sound, playing really joyful immersively. The most important is AirVIew2 support wireless Nintendo Switch & somatosensory game display now!

 

 

 

AirView beyond common touchscreen monitor, even for producer, vlogger, photographer, filmmaker, director can monitor on-camera videos while shooting without cable constraint. Professionals can see more details on bigger screen, and real-time control each element via touch.

 

 

AirView2 as car infotainment system give you unlimited connectivities to your smartphone and car integration. Over APPs abilities, you will get much more advanced than your built-in navigation system thanks to APP’s fantastic features like Car Connectivity, Real-time Traffic Information, Speed Limits, Fuel Prices, Voice Guided, Parking Services and more.

 

Samsung DeX:

 

PC/Windows/Laptop:​

 

Huawei EMUI:​

 

Nintendo Switch:​

 

Xbox:

 

Wireless DeX, PC Windows, NIntendo Switch and Huawei demo:

 

AirView2 ports:

 

AirView2 cable mode:

 

Macbook pro:

 

*Note: The demo video Macbook Pro OS version is 10.12 (latest tested 10.15). Apple changes peripherals software driver from time to time, we cannot test all Mac OS version for wireless touch function. If the Mac product limited itself, we cannot guarantee wireless touch function can work if Apple made any changes. AirView2's bluetooth firmware is upgradable to adapt as many devices as possible.

 

Click and order the AirView 1
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/airview-wireless-touchscreen-portable-monitor/x/23403190#/ 


(Please make sure select model: A133wltswc, A156wltswc)

 

A few weeks ago we were so excited about Samsung DeX rolled out its wireless DeX over Miracast technology. It seamlessly perfectly works with AirView1. We tested in the Samsung retail shop, which is so great quality almost like a cabled connection. We can't wait to shoot a short video to show you how these excitings.

 

Now AirView1 reward perk is available for all of you. Don't miss out. It's another great product for DeX, PC, Mac and Android smartphone. For wireless DeX, all OneUI 2.5 version are work. i.e. S9, Note9, S10, Note10, S20, Note20, Galaxy Fold...

 

Also available on AirView website: https://airviewscreen.com/
(Please make sure select model: A133wltswc, A156wltswc)

 

 

 

Note: Above transmitter dimension is for prototype design only. Final dimension will be slightly different.

 

AirView2 combo wirelessHD transmitter is 2-in-1 use. It can support both USB-C and HDMI video devices. Versatile detachable HDMI module is handy for any HDMI devices. Just plug-n-play for video devices transmitting high-definition video content to AirView2 without any latency.

 

Fully laminated LCD display, greatly reduce glare and eliminating the air gap,combining the cover glass and touch panel layers. This offers higher optical transparency (>94%) than conventional display, resulting in brilliant color clarity and brightness, make your pictures even more transparent and colorful, perfect for indoor and outdoor use.

 

The surface of the screen is fully laminated with tempered glass and treated with electroplated oil-repellent layer to improve touch control Fluency and comfort, and screen protection.

 

The spectacular 15.6-inch wide gamut display makes photos, videos and games look exquisite and vivid. And, thanks to the IPS panel’s full-view technology, viewing from all angles is visually pleasing.

 

 

AirView2 has wide frequency range and higher sensitivity rating stereo speakers. These integrated speakers provide robust, crystal-clear, and natural sound reproduction, so all of audio scenes sound impressive great.

 

Audio engineers, composers, musicians, and music lovers will benefit from dynamic, rich sound no matter where they go. When working on a laptop, two extra speakers make all the difference when mixing tracks and editing. When on a phone or tablet, AirView2 transforms your media into a cinematic experience with crystal clear audio.

 

 

Two-way PD quick charging protocol, full charge just in 2 hours, you can play for 4 hours, and can be used as PD mobile powerbank, for charging your other devices at any time.

 

 

AirView2 wireless display is made of light aluminum alloy, lighter weight, and better compression resistance, making it super easy to carry.

 

 

 

  • PD charger
  • Holster stand
  • USB-C charging cable
  • USB-C data cable
  • HDMI cable
  • Universal adapter

 

 

At the end of the campaign, we will send you a Backerkit or PledgeBox survey via email.

 

From there, you will be able to choose below list or other add-ons we might release throughout the campaign.

 

 

 

 

 

The company’s one of the core product lines is to focus on smartphone-desktop efficiency. Forward-looking on the wireless touchscreen display, PC and mobile phone innovatively integration. The future trend is the smartphone is the computer, the company has more breakthrough products in this area. 

 

Unlike other common portable monitor screens, AirView deeply believes the future world communication can be wireless. In the phone area, from landline telephone to 6G wireless technology, every iteration was excited us. Same to the AirView. From cable to WiFi mirror-cast to mm-wave wirelessHD technology, from minor latency to ZERO latency, from FHD to 4K UHD, from cabled touchable to wireless touchable, AirView now truly leading the wire and wireless touchscreen world.

 

Why still buy legacy screens? Upgrade to AirView products, we will change the smartphone-computer and touchscreen world very quickly, and you will lead the world once you own these products.

 

Product line brief show:

 

 

 We estimate that we will start shipping AirView2 as soon as early 2021. Later customers will likely have their AirView2 shipped out in following months of early 2021.

 

However, due to the COVID-19 and large orders of AirView2, we cannot ship all the AirView2 at the same time. Hence the long duration of Mass Production to Delivery from Jan 2021 to June 2021, timelines may get pushed up or pushed back but we will give our 100% to make sure that things are completed on, or even ahead of schedule.

 

Shipping will be calculated and paid at the end of the campaign, before we ship the AirView2 out to you. During these uncertain times, shipping costs have gone up significantly. As the stretch goal listed, free shipping will be available once funding goal reach US$1.250M. Let’s invite more friends/families/companies to get AirView2 and free shipping worldwide.

 

 

* Prices do not include taxes and VAT. That will be subject to the laws and regulations of each individual country.

 

** Note that these prices are dependent on the situation and may increase or decrease by a few dollars in the months to come.

 

*** Above price in USD currency. Price in other currency slightly different vary on current exchange rate.

 

 

Risks and challenges

Like many, we have been contending with the uncertainties of COVID-19. As the future of education has been changing, we have been updating and iterating our approach. We are aware of the challenges of software development in this environment and have a talented team ready to execute the work necessary to ensure success.
story_txt:
AirView2 wirelessHD DeX/PC/Mac, 4K/FHD touchscreen. mm-Wave technology. Zero lag. ⭐WirelessHD mm-Wave technology. The world’s first ZERO lag wireless touchscreen. ⭐Wireless Samsung DeX/Android/PC/Mac multi-touch screen. ⭐Plug and play. No pair WIFI need. No APP installation. Hassle free connection. ⭐Both USB-C and HDMI video-in support, and smartphone dock function. ⭐Wireless Nintendo Switch display. Smartphone Somatosensory games’ display. ⭐Extremely responsive, ZERO latency. Lossless picture/video quality. ⭐Ultra-wide 178-degree vertical and horizontal viewing angles. ⭐sRGB 100% color space, optimal color/contrast than other panels. ⭐Outstanding color accuracy and screen consistency. ⭐Fully laminated IPS, higher optical transparency (>94%), brilliant color clarity and brightness, perfect for indoor and outdoor use. ⭐Built-in battery 10200mAh, lightweight and thinness for mobility. PD quick charge.  AirView 2nd generation comes to the earth. It’s the world’s first ZERO lag wireless touchscreen. Advanced mm-Wave wirelessHD and touchable feature integrated into a portable touchscreen monitor ever. It’s your wireless touchable display, it’s your smartphone dock, it’s your powerbank, it’s your speakers, it's your wireless HDMI, and it’s versatile comprehensively cater for all your needs. Fully support wireless Samsung DeX, smartphone, and PC/Mac screen touchable, Nintendo, or any HDMI wireless display without latency. Hands-on video of AirView2     AirView2 utilizes the industrial leading WirelessHD (mm-Wave) technology that is normally found in 5G networks. The WirelessHD specification is based on a 7 GHz channel in the 60 GHz Extremely High Frequency radio band. It allows either lightly compressed (proprietary wireless link-aware codec) or uncompressed digital transmission of high-definition video and audio and data signals, essentially making it equivalent of a wireless HDMI. First-generation implementation achieves data rates from 4 Gbit/s, but the core technology allows theoretical data rates as high as 25 Gbit/s (compared to 10.2 Gbit/s for HDMI 1.3 and 21.6 Gbit/s for DisplayPort 1.2), permitting WirelessHD to scale to higher resolutions, color depth, and range.  We know many others cabled/wired portable monitors. Most of them were not have enough selling points. Many others were not full-laminated, not equipped with high capacity battery power, not have wirelessHD feature to lead ahead of the future, not have adequated USB-C ports. But they were selling almost same or 2/3 price of AirView2.  If you were still thinking or pledged others, then it's time to get AirView2 instead, that brings you much more adanced features. It's not others can compete with AirView2.  How much more could you get done by connecting devices with a touchable display without a cable?  AirView2 its DeX/PC/Mac touchable feature is perfectly for any usages, no matter wired or wireless. Not only for laptop, game station or PC, but also for smartphone or mobile devices.  Nowadays, many Android 10 onward smartphones have built-in desktop mode are coming popular. Portable mobile work become more efficient and easy. AirView 2nd generation is not a common wireless display. Forget other impossible products. AirView2 already fully support Samsung DeX wireless touchable. Beyond your imagination, many feature are come true and not been constrained by traditional cable anymore.  How long have you been longing for a wireless Samsung DeX or PC wireless touchable screen? Now it’s come true! In the past, Samsung DeX was not possible wirelessly touchable. That constrains been killed by AirView2. From now on, AirView2 bring you future wireless expereience beyond cable connect. ZERO lag touchscreen feature, no matter for any Android desktop mode, or gaming via AirView2 are exceptional amazing.  AirView2 improved long last battery support joyful gaming anywhere. With Type-C & WirelessHD new technology, AirView supports any DP alt mode devices. Which means not only Nintendo Switch, but also other Android games & somatosensory games are playable & touchable over wired or wirelessly without any latency. Whether desktop gamer, mobile gamer or just leisure, the versatile AirView2 turn up the game with more details display, color space and clarity. With Hi-Fi sound, playing really joyful immersively. The most important is AirVIew2 support wireless Nintendo Switch & somatosensory game display now!   AirView beyond common touchscreen monitor, even for producer, vlogger, photographer, filmmaker, director can monitor on-camera videos while shooting without cable constraint. Professionals can see more details on bigger screen, and real-time control each element via touch.  AirView2 as car infotainment system give you unlimited connectivities to your smartphone and car integration. Over APPs abilities, you will get much more advanced than your built-in navigation system thanks to APP’s fantastic features like Car Connectivity, Real-time Traffic Information, Speed Limits, Fuel Prices, Voice Guided, Parking Services and more. Samsung DeX: PC/Windows/Laptop:​ Huawei EMUI:​ Nintendo Switch:​ Xbox: Wireless DeX, PC Windows, NIntendo Switch and Huawei demo: AirView2 ports: AirView2 cable mode: Macbook pro: *Note: The demo video Macbook Pro OS version is 10.12 (latest tested 10.15). Apple changes peripherals software driver from time to time, we cannot test all Mac OS version for wireless touch function. If the Mac product limited itself, we cannot guarantee wireless touch function can work if Apple made any changes. AirView2's bluetooth firmware is upgradable to adapt as many devices as possible. Click and order the AirView 1https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/airview-wireless-touchscreen-portable-monitor/x/23403190#/ (Please make sure select model: A133wltswc, A156wltswc) A few weeks ago we were so excited about Samsung DeX rolled out its wireless DeX over Miracast technology. It seamlessly perfectly works with AirView1. We tested in the Samsung retail shop, which is so great quality almost like a cabled connection. We can't wait to shoot a short video to show you how these excitings. Now AirView1 reward perk is available for all of you. Don't miss out. It's another great product for DeX, PC, Mac and Android smartphone. For wireless DeX, all OneUI 2.5 version are work. i.e. S9, Note9, S10, Note10, S20, Note20, Galaxy Fold... Also available on AirView website: https://airviewscreen.com/(Please make sure select model: A133wltswc, A156wltswc)   Note: Above transmitter dimension is for prototype design only. Final dimension will be slightly different. AirView2 combo wirelessHD transmitter is 2-in-1 use. It can support both USB-C and HDMI video devices. Versatile detachable HDMI module is handy for any HDMI devices. Just plug-n-play for video devices transmitting high-definition video content to AirView2 without any latency. Fully laminated LCD display, greatly reduce glare and eliminating the air gap,combining the cover glass and touch panel layers. This offers higher optical transparency (>94%) than conventional display, resulting in brilliant color clarity and brightness, make your pictures even more transparent and colorful, perfect for indoor and outdoor use. The surface of the screen is fully laminated with tempered glass and treated with electroplated oil-repellent layer to improve touch control Fluency and comfort, and screen protection. The spectacular 15.6-inch wide gamut display makes photos, videos and games look exquisite and vivid. And, thanks to the IPS panel’s full-view technology, viewing from all angles is visually pleasing.  AirView2 has wide frequency range and higher sensitivity rating stereo speakers. These integrated speakers provide robust, crystal-clear, and natural sound reproduction, so all of audio scenes sound impressive great. Audio engineers, composers, musicians, and music lovers will benefit from dynamic, rich sound no matter where they go. When working on a laptop, two extra speakers make all the difference when mixing tracks and editing. When on a phone or tablet, AirView2 transforms your media into a cinematic experience with crystal clear audio.  Two-way PD quick charging protocol, full charge just in 2 hours, you can play for 4 hours, and can be used as PD mobile powerbank, for charging your other devices at any time.  AirView2 wireless display is made of light aluminum alloy, lighter weight, and better compression resistance, making it super easy to carry.   
PD charger
Holster stand
USB-C charging cable
USB-C data cable
HDMI cable
Universal adapter
  At the end of the campaign, we will send you a Backerkit or PledgeBox survey via email. From there, you will be able to choose below list or other add-ons we might release throughout the campaign.     The company’s one of the core product lines is to focus on smartphone-desktop efficiency. Hence the long duration of Mass Production to Delivery from Jan 2021 to June 2021, timelines may get pushed up or pushed back but we will give our 100% to make sure that things are completed on, or even ahead of schedule. Shipping will be calculated and paid at the end of the campaign, before we ship the AirView2 out to you. Let’s invite more friends/families/companies to get AirView2 and free shipping worldwide.  * Prices do not include taxes and VAT. That will be subject to the laws and regulations of each individual country. ** Note that these prices are dependent on the situation and may increase or decrease by a few dollars in the months to come. *** Above price in USD currency. Price in other currency slightly different vary on current exchange rate.  Risks and challengesLike many, we have been contending with the uncertainties of COVID-19. We are aware of the challenges of software development in this environment and have a talented team ready to execute the work necessary to ensure success.

story:
ULTIMATE HIGH CAPACITY & HIGH SPEED SSD 

SPEEDSSD is the latest high-capacity, high-speed stick drive. Storing up to 4TB with read and write speed of 1050 MB/s. Perfect for creatives - photographers, content creators or simply for everyday folks with lots of precious memories to capture and store safely.

 

 

Design and Technology

Enclosed in state-of-the-art aerospace grade aluminum with a silicone shield, complemented with a built-in cooling fan, the SPEEDSSD is designed to ensure a longer lifetime and durability. The combined effects of the cooling fins inside the case and the cooling fan maintain an optimal operating temperature of below 50°C / 122°F. An added bonus is the external case temperature will remain low and cool to the touch. 

 

 

 

On the inside, the custom-made M.2 solid-state drive is powered by Intel's 3D TLC NAND flash memory and the PS5012-E12DI microcontroller with 2GB of DRAM. And topped with features like universal compatibility, exchangeable memory, quick backup data, camera mount and dual OS - it’s the ultimate SSD you will ever need.

 

 

1. Uber High Capacity 

Most portable SSD drives in the market can only store up to 2TB, while SPEED SSD offers both 2TB and 4TB capacity - SPEEDSSD is super portable but still with plenty of storage space for your data.

 

2. High & Stable Transfer Speed

 

With 1050MB/s read and write speed, all your data is transferred in lightning speed. 10GB of data only needs 10 seconds to get transferred. For a lot of other portable SSD drives, the high transfer speed can be compromised when it is written over - not for SPEEDSSD though - it remains high speed and stable even with data stored. 

 

 

 3. Portable Size & Lightweight 

SSD drives with high storage capacity can be bulky and heavy to bring around, especially hard for creatives with lots of gear in their backpack. SPEEDSSD comes in a portable stick form that is easy to carry around.  Weighing 49g / 1.75oz, its perfect as an everyday carry item. 

 

 4. Longer Life Time 

With a built-in cooling fan and cooling fins on the SSD shell, these features help dissipate heat and prevent overheating to make sure your precious data is safeguarded while the drive runs at maximum speed. 

 

 

5. Universal Compatibility 

SPEEDSSD is compatible with PCs, MAC™ and Linux. It connects with USB Type C, and is compatible with USB 3.2 Gen2 (10Gbps) and backwards compatible.

 

 

 6. Durable Design 

 

SPEEDSSD is enclosed in an aerospace grade aluminum case to withstand any outside strength and force. Aluminum can also help keep the flash controller cool since it’s a great heat conductor.

 

 

7. Anti-Scratch 

With each SPEEDSSD coming with a silicone shield, it can avoid scratching  the surfaces of your other gadgets. Silicone shield is also great at shock absorption - in case it gets dropped on the concrete floor, your data is still safe in SPEEDSSD.

 

 

8. Magnetic Case with Exchangeable Memory 

When your 2TB or 4TB SPEED SSD memory is used up, you can simply open the aluminum case easily with its magnetic opening and replace it with another M.2 SSD - and voila - another full capacity portable SSD is in hand! We are also making a carrying case as a stretch goal for you to safely store your extra memory with all your data.

 

 

 9. Camera Mount

With our custom-designed camera mount, SPEEDSSD can be directly mounted on Sigma FP and BMPCC 4K/6K. For videographers creating content, this allows them to directly record their videos to SPEEDSSD, saving them lots of time and money.

 

 10. Backup Data 

Backing up your data on the computer can be a headache as it can take way too long. With SPEEDSSD’s high and stable transfer speed, backing up all of your computer data is easily done in a matter of minutes.

 

 

 

 

As you can see from the video, SPEEDSSD is connected to the Blackmagic Pocket Cinema Camera 6k. We would like to show two things through it - firstly, it shows that SPEEDSSD is compatible with Blackmagic camera and the content can be written directly on the SSD. Secondly, to prove that SPEEDSSD’s fan generates very little noise, we can refer to the “sound level bar” on the bottom right of the Blackmagic camera’s screen. With the microphone attached with the camera, any noise can be detected. At 0:07, a camera cover was dropped on the table and the “sound level bar” immediately went off the chart. Other than that, it stays on the green level, which means the fan doesn’t generate excessive noise at all.

 

 

Dual OS

With our 1050MB/s high transfer speed and fully saturating the USB 3.2 Gen 2 interface, having a SPEEDSSD is like having a Windows-to-go, you’ll be running Windows on MAC right from the SPEEDSSD drive, without occupying extra internal storage space on your computer.

 

 

Warranty

A 5-year warranty is provided with each purchase of SPEED SSD’s M.2 SSD Memory* , any physical damages to the enclosure and PCB are eligible for warranty.

*Physical damage to M.2 SSD Memory will not be warranted

 

Risks and challenges

Even as a start-up founded in 2018, we still have our competitive advantage - our founder has worked in one of the largest electronic company in China with over 20 years of experience and our team of product designers have their fair share of experience in the manufacturing industry. These give us an edge in sticking to the deadlines during production and maintain timely delivery in September and October. Our product has a lot of new features, yet the design and innovation have been tested to be achievable and practical in mass production. If any problems arise during the process, we will keep our backers informed with updates on the issues and our solutions.

story:
Workspace at your command for your own system

Move ideas around in your personal workspace and easily adapt changes.

It pops up.

 

Meet Mover-Erase!

Brainstorm ideas brick by brick and bring your body to your work. 

Bring the sense of playing chess into breaking down ideas. 

 Easy to store

 

 

 Your desk, your imagination

 

 

Always in sight

Take it down and swipe off.

A secure way to visualize and adapt to changes compared to memo curling up and falling off all the time.

The 5-magnet design.

1mm fine-cutting magnets are embedded.

Ideas at a glance

 Snap to the fridge

The surface of Mover Erase is made with High Quality Silicon. (different from normal whiteboard in the existing market, which is metal and may oxidate)

Not only Erasable......also washable

GREEN and durable!

On average, a person in the US uses more than 700 pounds of paper every year.

Per person, 8 trees have to be cut down and 7K gallons of water need to be consumed through out the process.

1 Mover Erase = 10,000 Memo Paper

Mover Erase can be a greener option.

Mover Erase has two purposes. The first one is to cultivate a more focused habit and working environment. The second one is to be eco-friendly.

Regarding focus, the ability to be moved and swiped at will of Mover Erase enables us to make choice. Throughout the process, we can learn to prioritize important actions and let go of unimportant ideas.

Regarding eco-friendly, when writing something does not just happen on a piece of A4 or memo paper (throw it away after one time usage), but can be reused for many years, the waste of resources can be greatly reduced.

 

No Trace and Easy Removal

MagDisc behind is embedded with 3M VHB Backing

You can reposition it and there is no trace. It is re-stickable.

To help get things done. 

Breaking task down into...bricks!

Having a big vision is important. Yet, breaking vision into small steps can be difficult, let alone making them doable.

That is why we made them into BRICKS. 

step by step...brick by brick, it will lead you "there".

(The above picture is demonstrating the usage of Mover from our last campaign.)

And ...... Mover Erase is the 2nd generation of Mover.

 Bring your hands to your work with easy prioritization

 Single out task with your hand.

You are in control with your grip.

(We love that sense of control when playing with tactile chess pieces.)

"Computers are alienating because they put a sheet of glass between you and whatever is happening......

Just watch someone at their computer. They are so still, so immobile. You don't need a scientific study to tell you that sitting in front of a computer all day is killing you, and killing your work.

You need to find a way to bring your body into your work..."

~Steal Like an Artist, Austin Kleon

You can brainstorm on the desk.

Stack'em up!

You can easily snap a bunch of Mover Erase on the whiteboard.

Tight and neat!

As long as it is water-based pigment

Choose your style and thickness

You can write something tiny too!

 Mover Pixelated Arts

Children Drawing Bricks

Give a highlighter and bunch of movers to your kids and they are ready to kickstart their imagination.

Encourage your children to write down their thoughts on Mover Erase and move them brick by brick as a habit. Erase things when they decided not to do it.

This may form a habit of them making choice and compromising. Focus less things and not as much as they can.

 

Workplace planning and visualisation

 

When you are figuring out your plan and mind map, you can have several Mover Erase and a piece of paper. You will have a different tactile experience.

It helps! 

Many backers expressed that they had similar ideas when Mover debuted.

After they received movers, they are happily using them.

Over a hundred of tests have been undergone to make the press and standup feature.

A patented design.

A Moving Block for Writing

See the protruding part on the left? It was used to be pressed.

Though, the plastic is not strong enough.

The plastic used in the initial stage is also very fragile. “We need to make something very durable. It may possibly used for a life time”

Also, Mover has to be very thin and light weight.

 

 

We have finalized our design and are ready to manufacture.

During the prototyping period, we have built a strong connection with our suppliers and excluded the bad ones.

We have done a lot of testing on prototype and tooling process to ensure the manufacturing and production process will be feasible and smooth.

If we can pull this off, we will order molding to be made once the kickstarter campaign ends. With our 1st campaign's successful experience, we have utter confidence to deliver what you ordered with high quality. We are estimating 3-4 months until final delivery, which should be September to October 2020.

Many books we read provide good suggestion to people. We study and follow their viewpoints to design and create tools to match people's daily usage.

For example, in the book "The One Thing", Jaypapasan suggested block of time to make appointment with yourself to get things done. We always asked ourselves what we could do to help people better execute such an idea. That is why we made a memo brick to block the time.

This will be an on-going process and we are still asking ourselves. We will keep creating value and hopefully the world will test the usefulness of it.

Please Share this Project!

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

It is re-stickable.To help get things done. Breaking task down into...bricks!Having a big vision is important. Yet, breaking vision into small steps can be difficult, let alone making them doable.That is why we made them into BRICKS. step by step...brick by brick, it will lead you "there".An example(The above picture is demonstrating the usage of Mover from our last campaign.)And ...... Mover Erase is the 2nd generation of Mover.
  Bring your hands to your work with easy prioritization brick by brick Single out task with your hand.You are in control with your grip.(We love that sense of control when playing with tactile chess pieces.)"Computers are alienating because they put a sheet of glass between you and whatever is happening......Just watch someone at their computer. They are so still, so immobile. You don't need a scientific study to tell you that sitting in front of a computer all day is killing you, and killing your work.You need to find a way to bring your body into your work..."~Steal Like an Artist, Austin Kleon You can brainstorm on the desk.
 Stack'em up! You can easily snap a bunch of Mover Erase on the whiteboard.Tight and neat!As long as it is water-based pigmentChoose your style and thickness
 You can write something tiny too! Mover Pixelated ArtsChildren Drawing BricksGive a highlighter and bunch of movers to your kids and they are ready to kickstart their imagination.Encourage your children to write down their thoughts on Mover Erase and move them brick by brick as a habit. Erase things when they decided not to do it.This may form a habit of them making choice and compromising. Focus less things and not as much as they can. Workplace planning and visualisation In a garage!Visual Planning Block by BlockClass Room PlanningKitchen Preparation and Tools VisualizationWhen you are figuring out your plan and mind map, you can have several Mover Erase and a piece of paper. You will have a different tactile experience.It helps! Many backers expressed that they had similar ideas when Mover debuted.After they received movers, they are happily using them.Over a hundred of tests have been undergone to make the press and standup feature.A patented design.A Moving Block for WritingSee the protruding part on the left? It was used to be pressed.Though, the plastic is not strong enough.The plastic used in the initial stage is also very fragile. “We need to make something very durable. It may possibly used for a life time”Also, Mover has to be very thin and light weight.A huge difference from the initial sketching, right?
Super strong magnet!  We have finalized our design and are ready to manufacture.During the prototyping period, we have built a strong connection with our suppliers and excluded the bad ones.We have done a lot of testing on prototype and tooling process to ensure the manufacturing and production process will be feasible and smooth.If we can pull this off, we will order molding to be made once the kickstarter campaign ends. With our 1st campaign's successful experience, we have utter confidence to deliver what you ordered with high quality. We are estimating 3-4 months until final delivery, which should be September to October 2020.Many books we read provide good suggestion to people. We study and follow their viewpoints to design and create tools to match people's daily usage.For example, in the book "The One Thing", Jaypapasan suggested block of time to make appointment with yourself to get things done. We always asked ourselves what we could do to help people better execute such an idea. That is why we made a memo brick to block the time.This will be an on-going process and we are still asking ourselves. We will keep creating value and hopefully the world will test the usefulness of it.Please Share this Project!  This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

story:
Overview

The VAVA Portable Solid-State Drive (SSD) Touch gives you the ultimate fingerprint security and 540MB/s transfer speed in a palm-sized package. Experience the convenience of securing and unlocking your critical files with a touch of a finger.

  • AES 256-Bit Encryption
  • Fingerprint Identification Technology
  • Ultra Sleek Design
  • Up to 540/480MB/s Read & Write Speed 
  • Multi-device Compatibility

Fingerprint Encryption 

Ultra Sleek Design

540MB/s Fast Speed

As Featured InUnboxing Video by Indiegogo Team

Review by KTLA 5 Tech Reporter Rich DeMuro

Review by iBertz

Review by EBPMAN

Review by State of Tech

Review by JoelsterG4K

Review by Jabber Tech

Secure Your Files with a Touch

The VAVA Portable SSD Touch utilizes the world's most advanced encryption technology - AES 256-bit hardware encryption, which keeps your data secure and unbreachable. The fingerprint reader adds an extra biometric layer of security to data on the drive. Unlock using fingerprint authentication or user-generated passwords.

Register up to 10 Fingerprints

With the capacity for 10 team members’ fingerprints, collaborating on projects has never been easier.

 

LED Status Indicator

The VAVA SSD Touch features an LED light that glows when the device is in use. The light blinks blue during data transfer and red when an error occurs, so you know what your device is up to at a glance.

Transfer Your Files in a Flash 

Transfer 10GB of data in just 20 seconds with the ultra fast speeds of the USB 3.1 Gen2 VAVA SSD Touch. Featuring read/write speeds of up to 540/480MB/s, it’s 4.9x faster than standard hard disk drive (HDD).

*Speed Test on Windows PC

 

*Testing Rig: Windows 10, 64 bit, USB 3,1 Gen2

*Speed Test on MacBook Pro

*Testing Rig: MacBook Pro, 2.2GHz Intel core i7, 16GB 2400MHz PDR4. 

** Performance may vary depending on host configuration. To reach maximum transfer speeds of 540 MB/s, the host device and connection cables must support USB 3.1 Gen 2 and the UASP mode must be enabled. 

*Speed Test for Sandisk, Western Digital, and Samsung on MacBook Pro

*Testing Rig: MacBook Pro, 2.2GHz Intel core i7, 16GB 2400MHz PDR4. 

VAVA vs. Other External Storage Devices

Reduce Game Load Times by 40%

VAVA SSD Touch shortens game loading times by up to 40%. For games that require frequent loading for new areas or titles with long initial load times, using the SSD Touch saves you time and prevents game time interruption.

 

Ultra Sleek Design

Multi-Device Compatibility

The VAVA SSD Touch is compatible with PC, Mac, iPad Pro, Android devices, gaming consoles, cameras, and more. For your convenience, it comes with both USB Type C-C and Type C-A cables.

Strong and Shock Resistant 

Unlike HDDs, the VAVA SSD Touch is free of any moving parts and is more resistant to shock. Constructed of strong zinc and aluminum alloy, the SSD Touch prevents any data loss from drops up to 4 feet (1.2 meters).

 

Thermal Control  

Aluminum is a great heat conductor to keep the flash controller cool at all times. The Aluminum alloy upper case and the Zinc alloy lower case prevents overheating problems and keeps the VAVA Portable SSD Touch cool all the time. 

More Color Options

Store your data in style. The VAVA SSD Touch currently comes in two colors to complement your devices: cobalt blue and space gray,  and is available in capacities of 500GB, 1TB, and 2TB.

2 x USB 3.0
1 x USB 2.0
1 x Ethernet port
1 x 4K HDMI Port
1 x SD Card Reader
1 x TF Card Reader
1 x 3.5mm Audio Port
1 x Type C PD Charging Port​
2 x USB 3.0
1 x USB 2.0
1 x Ethernet port
1 x 4K HDMI Port
1 x SD Card Reader
1 x TF Card Reader
1 x Type C PD Charging Port​

VAVA has been dedicated to become a green tech company that is empowered by renewable resources. The VAVA Portable SSD Touch is made of renewed tin and produces zero waste to landfill during manufacture. The aluminum case is 100% recyclable. 

Our first batch of VAVA SSD Touch (1328 pieces of 512GB VAVA SSD Touch & 1395 pieces of 1TB VAVA SSD Touch) have gone through the final quality assurance and are now ready to depart from our manufacturing plant. We will send out the tracking information once the product is sent out to backers from our local warehouses. 

Step 1: Click here and register as a Booster.
Step 2: Share your unique Booster link on your Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Website, or wherever you'd like!
Step 3: Refer to your Kickbooster dashboard and watch your commissions roll in!

We have completed three rounds of testing production and are now in full production. The mass production and quality assurance will be completed around September 20. We will start shipping the VAVA SSD Touch to backers in early October. 

Founded in 2015, VAVA has been dedicated to improving and enriching people’s lives through innovative technologies, products and designs.

For the last 4 years, our award-winning team has been disrupting the tech hardware market with innovative products and solutions. We believe that people deserve quality products and wish to bring the latest technologies to the public.

This is our fifth crowdfunding campaign. We’ve always delivered absolutely amazing products to our backers and don’t plan to stop.

story:
WE ARE SHIPPING!

Order your CNC ONE and receive it within 2-4 weeks!

 

 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

CNC ONE's CNC Academy, big size, rigid design, and metal milling capabilities makes it the perfect entry into the world of CNC milling. It combines easy use with high quality standards, making it the best CNC router you can buy at this price.

 

 

 

 

Questions? Contact us here

 

 

 

CNC ONE machines help to make an unlimited number of things on your own. Either to make others and yourself happy or to start a business.

 

 

CNC ONE can machine a wide range of materials at high speeds. Mill a wide variety of materials like aluminum, wood, acrylics, MDF, steel sheets, brass, PCBs, foam and carbon fiber.

 

 

CNC ONE is one of the largest CNC routers in its class. The big dimensions and high robustness allow you to mill projects in any size up to 1,000 x 1,000 x 80 mm or 39.4 x 39.4 x 3.2 in.

 

 

CNC ONE is not a toy or an average entry CNC machine. It is powerful enough to mill, and not only engrave, all commonly-used metals like aluminum, copper, brass or steel sheets.

 

 

 

CNC ONE is great for both personal hobby projects and massive business projects, thanks to its immense power and versatile capabilities. CNC ONE is like your first employee that you only pay once and continues to pay for itself time after time.

 

 

Even if you love working with your hands, not all products can be sold for a profit this way due to time constraints and physical complications. Instead, allow yourself to focus on the creative and fun tasks and let CNC ONE do the rest.

 

 

Increase your profit by selling customized products. Offer products in your online shop that can be personalized on any scale. 

 

A fashion startup approached us asking for a machine to customize their stylish backpacks and fashion products. So we designed a compact engraver and CNC ONE milled it in just 8 hours! (only the spindle was made on a lathe)

Other Crowdfunding campaigns sold a CNC engraver like this for €2,000 - CNC ONE made this in just a few hours, saving thousands of Euros.

 

 

 

 

The main focus of other CNC manufacturers is on the machine and not the customer. The result is that it takes especially unexperienced customers a long time to surpass the CNC learning curve and to begin having fun with machining.

Watch our Co-Founder Filip talk about the challenges you encounter with other CNCs and what a great customer experience looks like with CNC ONE.

 

 

Questions? Contact us here

 

 

 

We know that CNC machining can be a daunting topic. To prove the opposite, we developed the smoothest CNC experience for our customers. Our free CNC ONE Academy and hassle-free workflows empower even the least experienced beginners to machine beautiful projects on their very first day.

 

 

We at CNC ONE guide you by your hands from the moment your CNC journey begins until each creation is finished. We want you to have a simple, trouble-free experience with our machines. This makes CNC ONE easier to use and more fun than other CNCs. 

We offer our CNC ONE Academy to all our customers for free. In more than 50 video lessons, we show you how easy CNC can be. Learn everything you need to CNC machine like a Pro. 

 

 

Other machines in this price class come in pieces. This means hundreds of screws, soldering cables, installing different software etc. CNC ONE comes with pre-assembled components. For you this means tightening a few screws and connecting cables. All explained in our CNC ONE Academy. And ready to run in 30 minutes.

 

 

Our workflow is optimized for you: going from an idea to the finished project is usually a lengthy process that involves multiple tasks and software programs. Each step requires a laptop and a permanent cable connection to your machine during operation.

For CNC ONE, we came up with a completely new workflow. We eliminated all those unnecessary steps and optimized our machine for the best free CAD/CAM software for hobbyists and professionals: Autodesk Fusion 360. 

Additionally, you can upload your projects to the cloud which makes it possible to separate the design and machine process. This way, you can model your ideas in peace at home and start operations with another device when you enter your workshop. If you prefer working offline, you can easily transfer your projects via Micro SD or USB.

Our CNC ONE Academy will guide you trough all the necessary steps to get the results you wanted.

(You can find additional information about our software specification in the section "Rewards")

 

Watch Filip explaining our easy workflow: 

 
 
 
Our integrated open source Wi-Fi system allows you to control CNC ONE the way you like: use your smartphone, the built-in touchscreen, or wirelessly connect your laptop. You choose! No other manufacturer offers so many options to control your CNC router!
 
 

Other CNC routers are controlled by a laptop which is hard-wired to the machine via USB or parallel port. While operating, your laptop is covered in wood chips and sawdust. CNC ONE is utilizes Wi-Fi connections so that you can move your laptop freely.

 

 

Controlling CNC ONE with your smartphone is magical. Leave your laptop at home and mill your project with your own iOS or Android device.

 

 

The included touchscreen gives you full control over the machine into your hands. Move CNC ONE or start machining your projects directly at point of use.

 

Precision is also a result of robustness. Other CNC routers use 10 mm aluminum parts or 3-5 mm steel sheet. On CNC ONE we use heavy 20 mm aluminum parts. 

 

 

Our 20 mm gantry design has another advantage: CNC ONE is built to last. The strong design can bear operational errors. While other CNC routers suffer major breakdowns, CNC ONE has a broken mill. 

 

 

Because of its rigid design, CNC ONE machines are one of the largest in its class. The Pro XL and Pro XL Max is equipped with a machine bed of 1,000 x 1,000 x 80 mm or 39.4 x 39.4 x 3.2 in. The standard z-height is 80 mm (3.1 in) and can be upgraded to 130 mm (5.1 in).



 

90% of non-industrial CNC routers use stepper motors. They are inexpensive but provide low speed and acceleration. CNC ONE is the first in its price class that uses servo motors. This makes it 4x faster than its competition. Be the first to take the next step in CNC technology. 

 

 See how fast our servo motors are: 

 

 

High and repeatable precision is important if you plan to machine demanding projects. Most non-industrial machines use cheap belt drive or lead screw systems. The result: your project does not look like its 3D model and you must throw it away.

We use ball screws on all axes. This system allows high precision and excellent repeatability,  while enabling low wear, and low energy consumption.

 

 

Machine demanding projects whose parts fit together perfectly without gluing, screwing or rework. Our motto: if your parts do not fit, you cannot call it a CNC!

 

 

Whether you mill 1 or 10,000 units of the same project, CNC ONE gets the job done in a repeatable quality that you can even sell. CNC ONE even allows you to machine solid aluminum with high and repeatable precision.

 

 

Questions? Contact us here

 

 

 

 

We designed our machines to add and change parts easily. Upgrade your CNC ONE at the checkout of this campaign.

 

 

 

We ship all CNC ONE machines and add-ons worldwide. Since we want to keep your shipping costs as low as possible, we will charge an additional shipping fee before shipment.

All prices include 19% VAT. If you live in a non-EU country, additional taxes, VAT or duties may apply. The amount is subject to the laws and regulations of your country.

 

 

CNC ONE has been on a great journey. We are in the middle of production and we will deliver our first machines to all Kickstarter backers in April - May 2021.
If you order on Indiegogo, you will receive your machine shortly afterwards.

 

 

 

 

We are proud to manufacture and assemble each CNC ONE in Munich, Germany, with high-quality parts sourced from areas across Europe and Asia.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are Sven (32) and Filip (34) from Munich, Germany. We met at university where we studied Engineering, and immediately became good friends. We even lived together for 2.5 years during our Bachelor's.

During that time, we had the idea to build our own company one day as we always thought that we would have the perfect working match. Filip loves to develop technical things and Sven loves to work on business ideas. In the last years, we worked at manufacturing companies in Germany. Filip learnt to build machines and hardware products including all the electronics, and Sven learnt how to produce them efficiently. Additionally, Sven did his PhD besides his job which gave him a good understanding of how manufacturing will develop over the next decades. By combining our abilities, starting a business that develops and produces smart hardware products was the obvious choice. But how come we exactly decided to create CNC ONE? 

The idea of CNC ONE started because we weren't happy with existing machines. As Engineers, we worked for German manufacturing companies and therefore with industrial CNCs. For our own projects we first used our own developed 3D printers, but they were not enough to create high-quality prototypes. CNC-Machines are perfect if you need different materials by speed. So we wanted to buy a CNC, but couldn’t find one that fulfilled our needs as the industrial ones were too expensive and the cheap ones didn’t have enough power. So we decided to built our own CNC: an affordable router that is easy and powerful and we want you to have the same fun with creating as us. A year ago we built our first prototype and what you can see now is the 5th version of the machine as we are always improving.

 

 

 

Questions? Contact us here

 

 

 

Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com

If you live in a non-EU country, additional taxes, VAT or duties may apply. The amount is subject to the laws and regulations of your country.  CNC ONE has been on a great journey. We are in the middle of production and we will deliver our first machines to all Kickstarter backers in April - May 2021.If you order on Indiegogo, you will receive your machine shortly afterwards.    We are proud to manufacture and assemble each CNC ONE in Munich, Germany, with high-quality parts sourced from areas across Europe and Asia.      We are Sven (32) and Filip (34) from Munich, Germany. We met at university where we studied Engineering, and immediately became good friends. We even lived together for 2.5 years during our Bachelor's.During that time, we had the idea to build our own company one day as we always thought that we would have the perfect working match. Filip loves to develop technical things and Sven loves to work on business ideas. In the last years, we worked at manufacturing companies in Germany. Filip learnt to build machines and hardware products including all the electronics, and Sven learnt how to produce them efficiently. Additionally, Sven did his PhD besides his job which gave him a good understanding of how manufacturing will develop over the next decades. By combining our abilities, starting a business that develops and produces smart hardware products was the obvious choice. But how come we exactly decided to create CNC ONE? The idea of CNC ONE started because we weren't happy with existing machines. As Engineers, we worked for German manufacturing companies and therefore with industrial CNCs. For our own projects we first used our own developed 3D printers, but they were not enough to create high-quality prototypes. CNC-Machines are perfect if you need different materials by speed. So we wanted to buy a CNC, but couldn’t find one that fulfilled our needs as the industrial ones were too expensive and the cheap ones didn’t have enough power. So we decided to built our own CNC: an affordable router that is easy and powerful and we want you to have the same fun with creating as us. A year ago we built our first prototype and what you can see now is the 5th version of the machine as we are always improving.   Questions? Contact us here   Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com

story:
The brand new dubbel with all the built in features you could need. Available for pre-order now with delivery scheduled for January 2022.

The brand new dubbel mute, shipping without speakers, but with all the other amazing features you can find in our standard model. Available for pre-order now, with delivery scheduled for January 2022.

Pre-order now to be one of the first owners of the brand new dubbel! Shipping is scheduled for January 2022 with updates to be sent via email. UK shipping via DPD charged at £4.95. International orders include a £35 surcharge.

story:
What is TiBeast?

A professional 12 Degrees of Freedom robotic dog.

A combination of advanced technologies, including

  • 3D-enabled control software - Cradle Studio
  • 12 Degrees of Freedom movement and rotation
  • 80 watts of rated power output
  • 1.5Kg Payload
  • Digital Twin for real-time sync
  • Full-pose auto-adjust algorithm

Featured Around the World

From USA and Europe to Korea and Japan, the news of TiBeast has been shared across the globe!

 

LEGO-Compatible

Unleash your creativity and bring endless fun to you and your friends and family! 

Creative Works

Make cool photos and viral videos with TiBeast!

The Cool Robotic Helper 

Amaze your friends and family with the powerful robotic helper.

Control it like playing a video game

TiBeast can be controlled like a video game. supporting popular controllers:

  • PS4 DualShock, PS5 DualSense [Gyroscoope Control Supported]
  • Xbox 360 and newer controllers
  • PC-compatible joysticks
  • Flight-sticks
  • Keyboard & Mouse

Mobile Phone Support

Control TiBeast on your Android or iOS devices!

Walking Camera

TiBeast has a 2MP 170° FOV camera on its forehead.

Besides taking photo or shooting videos, you can view the camera's live feed within Cradle Studio.

Bluetooth Speakers

What’s cooler, you can wirelessly connect your phone to TiBeast's Bluetooth speaker, so while walking your TiBeast, you can stream your favorite music to TiBeast from your own Music app and library. and blast it out loud.

A Walking Platform

All TiBeast models have a built-in gyroscope, and operate with 12 degrees of freedom (12 DOF), and can carry up to 1.5KG/3.3 lbs of load in motion.

The payload allows TiBeast to carry additional devices on its back.

Cradle Studio

 Cradle Studio is our in-house developed software for TiBeast, and the heart and brain of TiBeast.

It is built with a rich set of advanced features, such as

  • 3D Digtial Twin
  • 3D Drag-and-Pose
  • Wide range of controlle support
  • Real-time comunication and sycnchronization with TiBeast
  • Code Editor and Runtime
  • Behavior-tree AI
  • Dynamic Terrain
  • Integrated Physics system
  • Motion Simulation

3D Digital Twin

The 3D digital twin of TiBeast could synchronize its state to TiBeast in real-time, or run in simulation mode without an actual TiBeast machine.

Coding Platform

A code editor with C# runtime is integrated within Cradle Studio.

All servos and sensors of TiBeast are accessible to preform actions in greater precision.

Beast SDK and Unity3D Integration

 The Beast SDK is a toolkit that allow developers, students and educators to access all servos and sensors on TiBeast to develop applications.

Unity3D has a rich collection of 3rd party libraries such as OpenCV, LeapMotion, Kinect, etc, to help developers fully utilize the TiBeast hardware and add more features!

TiBeast PC has a full-feature Windows PC on its back.

A GPS sensor is also exclusively available to TiBeast PC for outdoor operation.

Three USB 3.0 ports are available on TiBeast PC, for users to plug in their own peripheral devices such as

  • Kinect
  • Intel RealSense
  • LeapMotion

As full-feature PC,  TiBeast is also compatible with all PC-ready peripheral devices from printers to webcams.

TiBeast is already a powerful device itself, but customization and accessories make it even better.

M3 Screwholes x8

There are eight screw holes on the back of TiBeast, ready for you to customize and mount your own gears.

Accessories

We have tailor-made several gears and accessories that can be directly installed onto the screw holes on TiBeast further customization.

7 Inch Multi-Touch Display

A monitor has been specially made for TiBeast PC, with one HMDI input port compatible with all HDMI output devices such as TV, Xbox, Playstation, Laptop, Desktop, DSLR camera etc.

The specification of the display are as followings,

  • 7 Inch display area
  • 1024 x 600 resolution
  • 5-point multi-touch display
  • Driver-free multi-touch function (only on Windows)
  • HDMI input, compatible with all HDMI output devices such as PS4/PS5, Xbox etc
  • Dual 360° rotation
  • Tailor made for TiBeast's hardware dimensions

The monitor package includes:

  • 1x display monitor
  • 1x HDMI cable
  • 2x Micro USB cable (one for power supply, another for touch function)
  • 1x Base Mount on TiBeast
  • 1x 360° Monitor-to-Base Connector

TiRelay

TiRelay is an extension box for users to plug in and remotely control their own servos and sensors.

It's compatible with Cradle Studio on all platforms, and can be wirelessly controlled within Cradle Studio, or via the Beast SDK.

TiRelay Specifications

  • LEGO-compatible top surface
  • Comes with its own battery (16.8v, 3000mah).
  • 32 x PWM channels (16@12v, 16@8.4v), with a total power output of 80W.
  • 8 x i2c channels.

Future accessories and components will make use of this relay to transmit and receive data between themselves and Cradle Studio.

Three different models of TiBeast are designed, each tailored for a different level of functionalities that best suits your need.

Platforms and Compatibility

TiBeast can work all major mobile and desktop platforms.

  • * Windows 10, Ubuntu Desktop 16 & up, MacOS 10.13 “High Sierra” & up =
  • ** iOS (iPhone 6 & up, with latest iOS version), Android 4.4 Kitkat & up
  • *** Xbox 360, Xbox One/One S, Xbox series X/XS controllers
  • **** For Cradle Studio Windows version

At Celestial Robotics, our vision is to bring forth the age of robots.

Our company is registered in the USA, our founding members received their college education across the globe in the USA, Singapore, Phillipines and China. To better the research and manufacturing process and to save production cost, our team is currently located in China.

Our company is specialized in delivering easy-to-use professional robots for both everyday users and tech-savvy professionals in the same products - our game-like interface and control mechanism allows users to seamlessly adapt to our robot controls, and our IDE with built-in code editor and live-syncing WYSIWYG 3D model helps professionals quickly get their codes running on our products, and our Beast SDK will allow developers to further customize the robot in their current IDE.

A robotics enthusiast since young, Alex started coding at the age of 10. At 17, while attending high school in Singapore, Alex already took part in master-degree level robotics project at NUS to code for a metallic Omni-directional robot running RT Linux with a load capacity of over 150 KG.

Alex oversees all technical aspects of TiBeast, the Cradle Studio and other upcoming products.

Rain is a huge sci-fi fan with a bachelor’s degree in Digital Animation, which focuses on both design and coding. The many animation/interactive 3D projects he has done in the past are widely available in various museums and science fairs across China.

Rain has designed the foundation of TiBeast’s entire interaction schema to maximize usability and control, and is also in charge of the STEM-education aspect of our products for students from 4 to 18 years old (K12).  

Sookie has a bachelor’s degree in 3D design, and also an award-winning background in traditional Chinese painting - over the years, her work covers a wide range of themes from oriental flowers to neutron stars and alien machines.

Sookie’s in charge of both 2D & 3D designs for TiBeast, the Cradle Studio, as well as other upcoming accessories and products.

story:
A SMART MOUSE ?  WHY SMART ?

  • Turn any computer screen in a touch Screen.
  • Navigate in 3 dimensions
  • discover the  infinite possibilities offered by  "Infinity Smart Mouse"
  • As for smartphones, Infinity Smart mouse comes with a set of pre-installed features, but the number of applications that will be developed in all areas, are limitless
  • Try it , you'll adopt it

Infinite functions directly at your fingertips: 

An immersive, faster & smarter computer experience

 

patents pending

 
 
 

How do you choose between all functions ? 

Some are direct on smart mouse screen and through its sensors ( Rotate, Zoom, Accelerate, Spin,  3 & 4 D Navigation & Gaming commands ) , some others, like which pad to be displayed,  are based on  icons to select ... or contextual ( based on sofwares used at the moment, they appear automatically)

Easy and natural !

Two Screen versions :

One is based on E-Ink color display offers weeks of autonomy, before any battery recharge

The other is based on an HD Led Screen, includes optional wireless recharge . 

Multi-sensors allows to navigate in 3D and more : Pressure force is detected, for instance to accelerate, zoom or spin with accuracy ... 

All versions Include Bluetooth & USB recharge

What do we Need

We plan to develop the following versions initially, depending on the amount of funds raised

Version 1  Referenced SM-1: "Standard" Design Infinity Smart Mouse ,

  • Funds needed : US$ 40 000 This includes some major costs like External shape design , Molds , Industrialization, Packaging, Certifications,  Embeded Sofwtare, Drivers , etc ... 

Version 2 , Referenced SM-1 G : Gamer & Precision  Secured mouse,

  • If we reach an additional  US$ 20 000

Version 3, Referenced SM-1 F : Fully foldable version , slimmer version mainly for travellers and laptops :

  • If we reach an additional  US$ 20 000

4 colors at start:  White, Black, Red, lunar Grey

What You Get

Please note that final external shapes (standard & Gamer)  may vary from the designs shown.

 

The Impact

As almost everyone uses a computer, everyone can measure the impact of a smart mouse in the way you use your computer or laptop, adding limitless features and functions at your fingertips

Di Infinity Smart Mouse 

A true innovation since the invention of the mouse 

patent pending

Designs presented for illustration purpose, final shapes may differ from these one. 

We believe that there is a lot to bring in terms of innovation in the IT environment and we have a lot to bring and show (multiple innovative products). 

We believe innovation is not the only playground for big corporations.

This first project is for us a fundamental step allowing us to offer to all a set of completely innovative and amazing services and products, which you will discover if this first crowdfunding campaign achieves its objectives, and allow us to grow. 

Risks & Challenges

The development of such a product does not involve any technological risk.

It requires real know-how, and includes multiple advanced technologies, however, it does not involve any risk of failure in terms of manufacturing or software.

the announced budget makes it possible to achieve the objectives in less than 7 months - Product shipping - from the moment the funds are released.

The team has experience of industrial processes in the field of electronic equipment 

Other Ways You Can Help

You like the concept and the product ?  you foresee the need for your self, for your company or departement , just talk about it and make some noise about this campaign & Product,

Thanks for helping us

story:
Empower Employ is on a mission to help Veterans, transitioning military members and Military Spouses find equitable employment. 

 

 
JAKE IS ALIVE CHECK HIM OUT: 

 

 

Our founder, Lindsay Helm, is both a military Veteran and military spouse. In the 11 years since she has been out of the military, Lindsay has endured the hurdles associated with transitioning out of military service and helped countless others that have dealt with similar issues.


Despite decades of advocacy, the transition process is still difficult for potential employers and employees alike. Military Spouses continue to see  a +20% unemployment rate (currently 38% at pandemic strained levels) and a 70% underemployment rate. This has become what many have deemed a matter of national security.

Empower Employ is on a mission to eliminate the disparities in employment for military members and their spouses, and to educate employers about the military culture and what it truly means to hire and retain Veteran and military spouse talent. 
 

What are the problems that military veterans and their spouses are dealing with?

Networking.  (We've got a plan for that. ---- our applicant tracking system)
Civilian Workforce Culture Competence.  (We have a plan for that.)
Lack of Employer experience with military lifestyle.  (We are working on that.)

Our applicant tracking system, JAKE, will provide vetted employment opportunities for applicants who are ready to work and employers who are military ready, not just military friendly.

Listen to the following videos to help understand the personal toll transition and military life has on military member's and their families.
 

 
 

Whether it is wading through the military jargon, translating skills versus time in service, or providing seamless transitions from duty-station to duty-station or back to home of record, JAKE is prepared for that.

What does Empower Employ do?

Empower Employ is seeking to bridge the gaps in knowledge and culture related to the military community by educating employers how to attract, onboard, and retain military Veterans and spouses while optimizing their bottom line with diverse, educated, and experienced talent. This in conducted through one-on-one training, consulting, and sourcing (Where you'll come in to help build out the best version of JAKE, our proprietary applicant tracking system.) 

What is Empower Employ creating?

Empower Employ is working on an Applicant Tracking System, JAKE. This system tracks any job applicant that uses our services in order to find employment with companies that are prepared to onboard military-affiliated individuals to their team. With the tracking app, Empower Employ is able to see the resumes and other materials that are submitted by the applicants.

Additionally, resume, career, and interview coaching will be available to those individuals using our services. Through this tracker, we're able to see the progress of the applicant, where they are in their personal development, and when they're ready to move on to the next big steps. This system allows for these military-affiliates to enter the interview room strong, prepared, and ready for their next life-changing career!

Who gets to use Empower Employ's software?

Our Applicant Tracking System will be used as an internal tool by Empower Employ. Our goal in the future is to also sell our software to companies that want to hire military spouses and veterans. This will give direct access to those that are seeking employment with specific companies. 

What do I get with my donation?

For the first 50 people that donate $30, they will be sent a tee shirt to thank you for your support. 

For a $1,000 donation, you'll be able to look behind the scenes as to what our technology looks like and how it functions before our big launch. 

For a $12,000 donation, you'll get 6 months of unlimited use; unlimited job posts, talents searches, and the works!

For a $20,000 donation, you will get one year of unlimited use. 

How much funding do you need?

Our overall goal is to raise $100,000 in order to not incur any debt. 

When is Empower Employ launching their program?

Our current launch date in June 17th, 2021!

What does Empower Employ hope to accomplish with their platform?

Our goal at Empower Employ is do eliminate the number of unemployed and underemployed military spouses, find long-term careers for both military spouses and Veterans, and to change the civilian company culture everywhere in order to create a better understanding and longevity for transitioning military members and their families.

Our goal in the future is to also sell our software to companies that want to hire military spouses and veterans. This will give direct access to those that are seeking employment with specific companies. What do I get with my donation?For the first 50 people that donate $30, they will be sent a tee shirt to thank you for your support. For a $1,000 donation, you'll be able to look behind the scenes as to what our technology looks like and how it functions before our big launch. For a $12,000 donation, you'll get 6 months of unlimited use; unlimited job posts, talents searches, and the works!For a $20,000 donation, you will get one year of unlimited use. How much funding do you need?Our overall goal is to raise $100,000 in order to not incur any debt. When is Empower Employ launching their program?Our current launch date in June 17th, 2021!What does Empower Employ hope to accomplish with their platform?Our goal at Empower Employ is do eliminate the number of unemployed and underemployed military spouses, find long-term careers for both military spouses and Veterans, and to change the civilian company culture everywhere in order to create a better understanding and longevity for transitioning military members and their families.

story:
JOIN WAITLIST FOR NEXT BATCH

Pre-Orders are now closed. Sign up at neurable.com to be notified when orders open again!

This is the average time individuals spend actively getting tasks done during a standard work day. And every time we lose focus, it takes an average of 11 minutes to regain it! 

Let’s face it: we all get distracted throughout the day. 

With our attention devoured by wandering thoughts, physical interruptions, and barrages of messages and notifications, it’s no wonder we feel overwhelmed with: 

  • Unfinished work
  • Work-related stress
  • Increased late-night work sessions
  • Poor mental health

Enten by Neurable shows you how and when you work best, empowering you to take back your time so you can focus on what matters most to you.

 

 

 

 

When Enten senses your focus is at high levels, it signals your app to automatically mute notifications.

An optional “do not disturb” light on the headphones communicates to family members, friends, and colleagues that you’re in the zone.

No small talk, no chit-chat. Nothing to disrupt your flow.

 

 

Dr. Ramses Alcaide is passionate about creating a world without limitations. When Ramses was young, his uncle was in a truck accident and needed prosthetics for both of his legs. After watching his uncle go through this experience, he decided he wanted to create technology for the differently-abled. As he progressed with his research, he realized the capabilities of the technology he was creating, and its several applications. He realized he could help people around the world by creating an everyday brain-computer interface.

Dr. Ramses Alcaide and Adam Molnar met at the University of Michigan and became the co-founders of Neurable. Since their meeting, they won several business challenges including the Rice Business Challenge. Over the years, they developed several products, making each product easier to use but more technologically advanced than the one before.

 

 

 

 

We are able provide free shipping to the US and Canada.

We plan to ship starting in May 2022. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. 

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of Enten.

 

Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product!

We can't do this without you.

 

Fresco is a product design studio that uses strategic innovation, design execution, and experiences to create products that stand out. Without Fresco, Enten’s beautiful design would not be possible.

 

Apricity is a consumer electronics engineering and prototyping firm. Thanks to Apricity’s resources, expertise, and experience in consumer electronics design, Enten will be a quality product for years to come.

 

Hedgehog is a software development consultant. Their team, knowledge, and skillset accelerates Neurable’s  software development and testing. They help us create products that last for the long-run.

 

LaunchSquad helps companies with public relations. Launch Squad was able to help Neurable word and prepare for interviews with reporters and set up events pre-launch.

 

Double Jump creates high quality visual videos that captures brands in seconds. Neurable partnered with Double Jump to create all the videos to capture Enten's true colors and value.

 

Potato helped Neurable validate the product’s value proposition, ensuring Enten solves the needs of customers, and identifying the people who will benefit most from Enten.

 

Studio Freight is an independent branding and digital design studio based in Columbus, OH and New York, NY. Select clients include: Root Insurance Co, Netflix, Easol, Loop Returns, Path Robotics, Drive Capital, Abrams Books, United Way, The Fresh Prince, Patrick Mahomes, Italic, and Neurable.

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory’s experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.
