story:
The iPad Pro sits alone atop of the tablet game. For a tablet, it’s as close to perfection as you’re going to get, but it is still missing one major feature: A powerful stand&case to match its capabilities. 

Until now, the most portable stands and cases did not offer eye-level viewing and adjustable angles for ergonomic working. Your iPad Pro is your next computer and it deserves a well-prepared stand&case.

We hope mobile working can not only be lightweight but also relaxed and comfortable. That’s why we create MOFT Float. With its innovative and patented double-hinge structure, it can elevate the screen to a suitable height with a comfortable viewing angle no matter where you are.

 

It brings you a game-changing mobile experience while working with the iPad Pro. Most importantly, it's still lightweight as MOFT product always does.

MOFT Float is crafted with a built-in stand. It remains consistent with the MOFT "invisible design" philosophy of providing more functions and protections while remaining the same slim design. Floatable when you need it and make it invisible when you don't.

 

Created with our unique "FLOAT" design, MOFT Float can elevate your screen up to 3.15 inches. It takes home the crown of the tallest portable stand&case on the market, allowing you to work anywhere without neck and shoulder pain. 

 

 

Besides the adjustable angle&height, The MOFT Float also provides 3 different modes that take your iPad Pro to the next level,  helping you use your iPad Pro in many creative ways.

With Floating mode you won’t ever have to bend your neck down for hours during extended Zoom meetings, browsing the internet, or even watching Netflix.

 

Perfect for using iPad as the second display

 

 

Quickly adjust the base to stable mode. Now you can immerse yourself in creation while enjoying a seamlessly stable experience. It is perfect for any creator who wants the most out of their iPad Pro

Most stand&case can't offer portrait mode. That doesn't make sense in 2020 since we need a lot of jobs done in portrait mode. MOFT Float is one of a kind that offers portrait mode that elevates your reading experience. Whether you’re at the office, at home, or even outdoors, read and enjoy at the perfect eye level, hands-free. 

 

 

 

It’s simple to set up – just rotate the hinge to open and fold it down to close, which happens in a slip second. It can be easily slipped into any bag when you’re ready to hit the road again.

The hinge of MOFT float is made by light and solid aluminum alloy, offering a smooth and flexible experience. Even after being open and close over 8000 times, it's still as strong as the first time.

The exclusively designed legs increase all-around stability, while the soft edge materials make it easy to install for work and uninstall to match other accessories. 

Shock the people around by pulling out this one of a kind stand from your case. You’ll be the only one in the room sitting with your back straight and good posture, enjoying the wonders of your iPad Pro.

If you are typing a lot. no problem! We also prepare a kickass keyboard. So that you can build your own lightweight workstation anywhere you want.

We designed an exquisite, fully magnetic Apple Pencil 2 holder. It easily attaches to the Float using fully surrounded magnetic borders.

The Pencil Case gives full protection to your Apple Pencil all the way. You can use it separately or attach it to the MOFT float stand&case.

 

As a collective, we never stop exploring solutions that can perfect the way we work with our mobile office devices, this time we turned our focus to the iPad Pro. The iPad Pro has climbed to the top of the list when it comes to the most suitable and useful mobile devices for working on the GO. The problem is that the portable stands on the market are not able to offer proper heights and angles that fit an iPad’s ergonomics.

From then on, we began working on a stand that is lightweight, easy to carry, and capable of elevating the iPad to suitable heights while maintaining a simple appearance and delicate structure. 

All that was left for us was to figure out, was how to get it off the ground. We have put a tremendous amount of time and effort, persevering through trial and error to bring the ideal iPad stand to life.

 

Eventually, we found that our patented double-hinge structure is the key to the realization of our vision. It goes beyond providing suitable heights, and surprisingly offers unlimited angles that can be easily adjusted, allowing every road warrior to work anywhere, at any time with boosted convenience.

 

With the achievement of combining comfort and flexibility for the iPad stand, we couldn’t wait to bring it to Indiegogo, to the creativity lovers here.

We hope that all our research and innovativity can make a difference in your mobile life for the better, giving you a game-changing experience for your comfort, health and productivity at work. Your interest in and support for our creations are always appreciated.

MOFT stands for “Mobile Office for Travelers”. We design innovative, easy-to-use productivity accessories, that transform your devices to work your way, giving you the ability to be productive anywhere. So you can make the world your office.

In 2018, a group of young and passionate people gathered together to work on the world’s first invisible laptop stand and one year later the MOFT laptop stand was launched on Kickstarter.  It was an exciting journey and it turned out to be quite a blockbuster. After the success of the first MOFT stand we knew we were on the right track and began pushing the limits of what our products were capable of. We developed and launched a series of creations for various mobile devices at a steady pace, including the invisible and foldway MOFT X phone & tablet stand, the 4-in-1 invisible MOFT Z sit-stand desk, and the MOFT Carry Sleeve with an invisible stand and storage.

All of our projects were received very well and we are grateful to receive all of the positive feedback from our supporters, without them this would not be a reality. We owe our achievement to you and we can’t thank you enough.

This is going to be our fifth crowdfunding project and we hope we can surprise the community once again with a brand spanking new solution to problems associated with working on the go.

With your support as our strong shelter and feedback as our roadmap, we will keep thriving as hard as we can. Your better mobile work lives will always be at the heart of our development.

Distributor/Retail Business

MOFT welcomes global distributors/retail to join us. And we will continue to share the awesome products and great marketing service as always. Please contact sales@moft.us if you are interested.

story:
... our most sharp and durable Damascus knife series we have ever made.

Germanicum Arminius is the result of hundreds of hours in refinement of Damascus forging techniques, refinement of production technologies and design improvements on every level.


Our team of dedicated engineers, black smiths and designers put all their passion into this new series of Damascus knives and today we are proud to share these beautiful new knives with you.

Sternsteiger started its own production of Damascus knives back in 2015 and the companies passion for tradition and technology since then has driven the company to new innovations.

Our engineers did not limit themselves to Damascus knives and brought beautiful knives like the popular Sternsteiger Titanium and Achilles Series to market. These endeavors not only helped us to understand the needs of our customers, but also provided us with the experience to improve on our original classic Damascus knife design. 

In case you are interested to learn more about the development process of Germanicum Arminius scroll down to the development section, but let us focus for now on what we have improved based upon our original VG10 series below.

Finger-guard and bolster tip

We completely re-engineered the finger-guard and bolster tip section of the knife in order to shorten the distance between handle and blade. This much more compact design results into a higher degree of control over the blade.


The Bolster

 For more pressure point and grip, a new added Bolster has been added below. 

The new bolster is made of the same Damascus steel and is held in place with two brass pins that are polished in a way that they optically merge with the steel.


The Blade

The new blade is overall more straight than the old design. On the picture below you can see how the old blade falls off towards the edge, while our new blade offers an almost straight surface.

The tapered shape of the old blade makes the knife very stable, but also inflexible. The new flatter shape gives the blade more flexibility and thanks to the new steel we don't lose anything in terms of durability.

In addition the new blade has been straightened with a slightly more curved belly while adding some width in the middle of the blade, providing a greater surface area for improved cuts. 

The Steel

The biggest difference between the two series is the steel which now consists of 440 instead of 67 layers of steel. This increased amount of steel layers gives the blade much more rigidity and therefore increases the durability and lifetime of the blade.

In addition the blade itself becomes a piece of art. Our black smiths have become very creative in regards to possible patterns that can be forged into the blade and therefore making each blade a unique master piece.

Handle design:

The prominient but important feature is this handle, its made up of pure wallnut wood, as compared to our VG-10 series, which has an Micarta handle.

The handle is finished by a pure Damascus cap which compared to the basic stainless steel cap from the VG-10 series gives these knives an even better look and durability.

The old VG-10 series had an Oval shaped bigger Cap, where as the new Arminius series has an Egg shaped oval Damascus forged cap with a pin.

The handle diameter has been trimmed making the Arminius handle thinner -tubular and easier to hold even for smaller hands. 

The same applies to the new handle cap as explained above.

New & verstile bread knife

The Arminius series has different blade serrations for cutting bread.

Blade difference  ( Wavy & saw edge )  

Even the Tip of the Arminius bread knife has been changed below ( continous form) below. 

The handle features the same updated characteristics like the brass pins and the red leather ring inlays with an added U sahped or V shaped forged Bolster below.

The exciting striking feature of the new Arminius Series is its completely hand-made forging production as compared to the mechnical industrial production of our old VG-10 series.

Since the carbon content is more in the Arminius series, its non stainless steel and have an increased tendency to oxidation process, which is a standard normal behaviour of all original historical hand forged damascus forge.


Arminius Series is an inspired historical handmade forging process as compared to our old VG-10 series which is actually done via closed die forging or impression die forging. Our bladesmiths have used same old age forging methods to have this unique series for you.

Damascus Steel & great warriors in history.

It is been said that the great ancient warriors loved the damascus weaponary originated from the city of Damascus ( modern day Syria ). In those days, the damascus forgeing steel was forged with bringing the steel into a wootz form. 

Our team has been trying to forge a knife that has the unique combination of finest elements of steel & wood. For this reason, we included the 440 layers of damascus & the wallnut wooden handles for Arminius damascus Series. 

 This unique damascus knife series will be presented in two damascus design patterns 

 A- Raindrop damascus Pattern 

 B - Twist damascus  Pattern 

 Note:     ( patterns can slightly varry due to hand forge)


              What our backers say about us and our Products 

We have deliverd successfully intime, to more than 4000 backers during our past amazing campaigns here in Kickstarter and  below are some of the Feedbacks for you to experiance, what they say about STERNSTEIGER products.


 Combining the Elements together: 

 Arminius damascus - A Star born within a known collection

The unique design inspired by the great fighter Arminius gives it an elegant look.

Though Arminius Damascus Knife stands out of most Sternsteiger products, some special features of this masterpiece are as follows 

High-end Blade: The Damascus steel blade is certainly the best part about Arminius Damascus Knife. The unique design inspired by the great fighter Arminius gives it an elegant look. If you’re concerned about quality, worry no more because it’s going to cut through any to everything. 

Handle: The handle of Arminius Damascus Knife is made up of walnut wood and works for a lifetime. Yes, if you’ll take good care of the blade, the handle isn’t going to fade, broke, or lose its stylish look even after 10 years. In addition, it offers a firm grip to handle hard or raw vegatables.  

Handle Cap:

The perfect harmony of joining the specially forged damascus cap adds up the stunning look to this amazing master piece series.The handle cap is made up of damascus steel which adds up an extra flare to this series.


The forged Bolster:

one of the added uniqueness to Arminius series, is its special forged blade bolster, which is a wedge shaped forged but gives the blade an added  ` U ` shaped support forge with colourfull red leather filled spacing to look after the joining effect to its amazing handle.This special forge bolster was developed for giving an additional cutting balance retention to this amazing knife series. ( see below the ` U `` shaped bolster with pins ) 


So, now we see the hype behind popular Damascus steel knives. If we talk about this particular knife set, it is guaranteed to provide the best hunting or cooking experience ever. 


 Arminius Damascus Knife is made with the highest quality of steels and a prolonged  manufacturing procedure of blacksmith.

                        360 ° revolvation of Arminius Blade to show more details.  ( see above ) 



 The basic idea & design:

Prototype Section: CAD Designs 






Designers message 



Design Hallmark & useability Series: 

Combined with tradational classic design & focus onto better cuttings, our team tried to achieve a tool collection covering daily home use aswell the commercial use. 

Arminius bread knife has been inspired by the japanese saw inorder to break the tradational bread knife blade serations. 

The paring knife:

Our team has designed a special small santoku for the Arminius Germanicus Series below


The Arminius Complete Set: 

The master pieces joining together in the modern wooden stand to form a complete Set.

Detailed Specification of our new Arminius Series:

  • Curved edged which works even well with rocking cuts.
  • 100% Damascus Steel with 440 layers of  Ultra sharp razor edge.
  • Special seratted blade for bread knife ( not like an all day bread knife curved edges ) 
  • Hand-sharpened 16° double-bevel blade (32°)    
  • 440 Layers of  high carbon Steel
  • Walnut wooden Handles with damascus forged handle cups
  • 100 % Hand-forged & hand made product.
  • Combination of 440 layers of pure damascus steel ( non Stainless-steel). 
  • A special extra care is needed for this series to oil it after each use.
  • Forged blade bolster  with forged handle cap & Brass pins 
  • Full Tang damasucs steel 
  • weight of Chefs hand forged knife lies  between 324 g - 335 g ( wooden handle weight varies) due to special feature of wallnut wood. 
  • Blade thickness = 0,65 mm at edge   &  2,42 mm at the back ( slight varietions may occur due to hand forge).
  • Set weight with box =  1,1 Kg
  • Chefs knife weight =  204 - 230 g  ( a slight weight variation due to hand forgeing) 
  • Hand crafted in Germany 
  • well balanced & ultra Razor sharp series 
  •  Liquid nitrogen treated blade Hardness: 57-59HRC 
  • Sharpening: Solinger Dünschliff 
  • Nano-Coated for enhanced durability and reliability 
  • Designed  by UBUTT DESIGN  GERMANY.

Special Care for your new damascus forge :

After each use, we highly recommend to immidiately wash up your knife with slightly warm water and apply a thin coating of cooking oil or olive oil. The oil keeps this amazing blade 's steel young and keeps away the building up of typical patina

Germanicum Arminius in action below:

... our most sharp and durable Damascus knife series we have ever made.

                                                            Arminius Germanicum 


In case you are interested to learn more about the development process of Germanicum Arminius scroll down to the development section, but let us focus for now on what we have improved based upon our original VG10 series below.



                                                                   Arminus Germanicum 












Finger-guard and bolster tip



The finger guard and bolster tip designs compared


We completely re-engineered the finger-guard and bolster tip section of the knife in order to shorten the distance between handle and blade. This much more compact design results into a higher degree of control over the blade.

The Bolster
 For more pressure point and grip, a new added Bolster has been added below. 



               New U shaped  added forged bolster with two brass pins to right above 


The new bolster is made of the same Damascus steel and is held in place with two brass pins that are polished in a way that they optically merge with the steel.

The Blade
The new blade is overall more straight than the old design. On the picture below you can see how the old blade falls off towards the edge, while our new blade offers an almost straight surface.





The tapered shape of the old blade makes the knife very stable, but also inflexible. The new flatter shape gives the blade more flexibility and thanks to the new steel we don't lose anything in terms of durability.
In addition the new blade has been straightened with a slightly more curved belly while adding some width in the middle of the blade, providing a greater surface area for improved cuts. 



Arminius on right with slight wider belly.between A - B  ( which gives it more penetrating effect)


The Steel



High contrast picture of the new 440 layer blade


The biggest difference between the two series is the steel which now consists of 440 instead of 67 layers of steel. This increased amount of steel layers gives the blade much more rigidity and therefore increases the durability and lifetime of the blade.





In addition the blade itself becomes a piece of art. Our black smiths have become very creative in regards to possible patterns that can be forged into the blade and therefore making each blade a unique master piece.
Handle design:
The prominient but important feature is this handle, its made up of pure wallnut wood, as compared to our VG-10 series, which has an Micarta handle.



    Arminius handle is more thinner & plain wood compared to micarta industrial handle


The handle is finished by a pure Damascus cap which compared to the basic stainless steel cap from the VG-10 series gives these knives an even better look and durability.
The old VG-10 series had an Oval shaped bigger Cap, where as the new Arminius series has an Egg shaped oval Damascus forged cap with a pin.



Arminius ( right )  Old Series ( left )  Plain & pure damascus handle Cap above.


The handle diameter has been trimmed making the Arminius handle thinner -tubular and easier to hold even for smaller hands. 



                                                  Handle diameter changes above


The same applies to the new handle cap as explained above.



                                               Arminius Cap dia above ( in inches ) 





                                                Old VG-10 Cap handle diameter 


New & verstile bread knife
The Arminius series has different blade serrations for cutting bread.



Different bread knife designs with different serrated edges above & forge & handle changes


Blade difference  ( Wavy & saw edge )  



                        Different  serations for the Arminius Series above 


Even the Tip of the Arminius bread knife has been changed below ( continous form) below. 



Arminius ( right ) with japanese saw serations and in continous serrations vs old series bread knife ( left ) 


The handle features the same updated characteristics like the brass pins and the red leather ring inlays with an added U sahped or V shaped forged Bolster below.



                                Added red leather spacer to new Arminius series 
















 























View our press-kit









The exciting striking feature of the new Arminius Series is its completely hand-made forging production as compared to the mechnical industrial production of our old VG-10 series.



                               Arminius :  Finest pure damascus steel knife 


Since the carbon content is more in the Arminius series, its non stainless steel and have an increased tendency to oxidation process, which is a standard normal behaviour of all original historical hand forged damascus forge.






Arminius Series is an inspired historical handmade forging process as compared to our old VG-10 series which is actually done via closed die forging or impression die forging. Our bladesmiths have used same old age forging methods to have this unique series for you.



                                          Arminius blade close up view after cuttings 


Damascus Steel & great warriors in history.
It is been said that the great ancient warriors loved the damascus weaponary originated from the city of Damascus ( modern day Syria ). In those days, the damascus forgeing steel was forged with bringing the steel into a wootz form. 










Our team has been trying to forge a knife that has the unique combination of finest elements of steel & wood. For this reason, we included the 440 layers of damascus & the wallnut wooden handles for Arminius damascus Series. 



                                        Arminius  Raindrop damascus Pattern design 







 This unique damascus knife series will be presented in two damascus design patterns 
 A- Raindrop damascus Pattern 
 B - Twist damascus  Pattern 
 Note:     ( patterns can slightly varry due to hand forge)



                                          Twist & Raindrop designs above 



              What our backers say about us and our Products 
We have deliverd successfully intime, to more than 4000 backers during our past amazing campaigns here in Kickstarter and  below are some of the Feedbacks for you to experiance, what they say about STERNSTEIGER products.






 Combining the Elements together: 
 Arminius damascus - A Star born within a known collection
The unique design inspired by the great fighter Arminius gives it an elegant look.



                                                 3d Arminius damascus Series view


Though Arminius Damascus Knife stands out of most Sternsteiger products, some special features of this masterpiece are as follows 
High-end Blade: The Damascus steel blade is certainly the best part about Arminius Damascus Knife. The unique design inspired by the great fighter Arminius gives it an elegant look. If you’re concerned about quality, worry no more because it’s going to cut through any to everything. 





Handle: The handle of Arminius Damascus Knife is made up of walnut wood and works for a lifetime. Yes, if you’ll take good care of the blade, the handle isn’t going to fade, broke, or lose its stylish look even after 10 years. In addition, it offers a firm grip to handle hard or raw vegatables.  



                                             Arminius series handle overview


Handle Cap:
The perfect harmony of joining the specially forged damascus cap adds up the stunning look to this amazing master piece series.The handle cap is made up of damascus steel which adds up an extra flare to this series.



                                       Arminius damascus forged handle cap with pin



The forged Bolster:
one of the added uniqueness to Arminius series, is its special forged blade bolster, which is a wedge shaped forged but gives the blade an added  ` U ` shaped support forge with colourfull red leather filled spacing to look after the joining effect to its amazing handle.This special forge bolster was developed for giving an additional cutting balance retention to this amazing knife series. ( see below the ` U `` shaped bolster with pins ) 



                                           Arminius  blade bolster with brass Pins 



So, now we see the hype behind popular Damascus steel knives. If we talk about this particular knife set, it is guaranteed to provide the best hunting or cooking experience ever. 



                                                            Arminius Germanicum 



 Arminius Damascus Knife is made with the highest quality of steels and a prolonged  manufacturing procedure of blacksmith.









Play








Replay with sound









Play with  sound










00:00


00:00































                        360 ° revolvation of Arminius Blade to show more details.  ( see above ) 







 The basic idea & design:



                                   The Early Cad drawings & development of Arminius 


Prototype Section: CAD Designs 









Play








Replay with sound









Play with  sound










00:00


00:00


































                          Arminius CAD 3d printed version with first handle prototypes 





               The  3d printed version of Arminius with the first Prototype below







Designers message 









Play








Replay with sound









Play with  sound










00:00


00:00

































Design Hallmark & useability Series: 
Combined with tradational classic design & focus onto better cuttings, our team tried to achieve a tool collection covering daily home use aswell the commercial use. 
Arminius bread knife has been inspired by the japanese saw inorder to break the tradational bread knife blade serations. 



                                                    Arminius  Bread Knife 


The paring knife:
Our team has designed a special small santoku for the Arminius Germanicus Series below











The Arminius Complete Set: 
The master pieces joining together in the modern wooden stand to form a complete Set.















Detailed Specification of our new Arminius Series:

Curved edged which works even well with rocking cuts.
100% Damascus Steel with 440 layers of  Ultra sharp razor edge.
Special seratted blade for bread knife ( not like an all day bread knife curved edges ) 
Hand-sharpened 16° double-bevel blade (32°)  	  
440 Layers of  high carbon Steel
Walnut wooden Handles with damascus forged handle cups
100 % Hand-forged & hand made product.
Combination of 440 layers of pure damascus steel ( non Stainless-steel). 
A special extra care is needed for this series to oil it after each use.
Forged blade bolster  with forged handle cap & Brass pins 
Full Tang damasucs steel 
weight of Chefs hand forged knife lies  between 324 g - 335 g ( wooden handle weight varies) due to special feature of wallnut wood. 
Blade thickness = 0,65 mm at edge   &  2,42 mm at the back ( slight varietions may occur due to hand forge).
Set weight with box =  1,1 Kg
Chefs knife weight =  204 - 230 g  ( a slight weight variation due to hand forgeing) 
Hand crafted in Germany 
well balanced & ultra Razor sharp series 
 Liquid nitrogen treated blade Hardness: 57-59HRC 
Sharpening: Solinger Dünschliff 
Nano-Coated for enhanced durability and reliability 
Designed  by UBUTT DESIGN  GERMANY.

Special Care for your new damascus forge :
After each use, we highly recommend to immidiately wash up your knife with slightly warm water and apply a thin coating of cooking oil or olive oil. The oil keeps this amazing blade 's steel young and keeps away the building up of typical patina





Germanicum Arminius in action below:

story:
Auto Scan, No More Measuring & Drafting

 

5 Mins Scan Entire House

 

Multi Format Export (SVG, JPG, PNG)

 

Floor Plan Bot Tech Spec

  • Latest Lidar technology measure accuracy within 5cm. 
  • Single scan distance range: 20m
  • Max mapping area: 90000 square meter
  • Laser points sample  rate: 7000Hz

Our Story

We are small software and hardware engineer tech team based in Sydney Australia. The project start 2 years ago and we already test the device in the field for real job over a year. The product already successful scanned over 2000 floor plans by professional floor planner

We work closely with floor planner, photographer and real estate agents.  The goal of our job is to release the our client from boring repeative daily work

story:
With more than 20,000 backers and 150,000 users around the world, we at CZUR thought to ourselves, what can we do next for our loyal fans? We wanted to create something that digitises and preserves your most precious printed creations and memories, and at the same time, is more affordable and more portable! After a lot of hard work, we have it with the CZUR Shine Ultra.

CZUR Shine Ultra is a revolutionary book scanner that covers all your scanning needs! Featuring our patented "curve-flatten technology", auto-focus, auto page-turning detecting,it scan books even faster, with an incredible of 1 second per page, so scanning an entire book will only take you minutes. Along with a lot more features, this is your perfect scanning companion.

Using a traditional scanner to scan books is exhausting. Existing machines’ bulky size and price also mean it’s not for everyone. That’s why we set out to create CZUR Shine Ultra. Thanks to its auto-focus and auto page-turning detecting, plus a super handy foot pedal for hands-free operation, Shine Ultra is the fastest scanner on the market.It allows youto scan at an incredible one second per page - so you can easily scan an entire 300-page book, book in 10 minutes or so.

 

With OCR (Optical Character Recognition) functionality, Shine Ultra enables you to transfer scanned pages into editable files, which elevates scanning possibilities to a whole new level. With over 180 languages supported, this powerful scanner gets it all done! Bring an entire library with you everywhere you go!

Featuring a raft of cutting-edge technologies, CZUR Shine Ultra makes scanning a breeze. With our patented Curve-Flatten Technology, it automatically removes curvature and saves you the time-consuming awkwardness of flattening pages by hand. Along with other features including Correct Position, Multi-target Scanning, Remove Fingerprint, Smart Paging, Purify Background and more, this is really the best scanning you can achieve!

Remove Fingerprint

Memories are a precious asset. CZUR Shine Ultra helps making them permanent. Producing amazing 13 full-sized megapixel hi-res scans at 340 DPI, Shine Ultra gives you crystal clear scanning quality. Besides books and documents, it can also scan a wide range of things, such as your ID, passport, receipts, stamps, bar codes, QR codes, even your kids’ first drawings and toys.

Multi-target Scanning

Pictures not enough for your scanning needs? How about videos? CZUR Shine Ultra has a new video-recording functionality, which allows you to record a video while you are scanning. This really comes in handy for office presentions, or for teachers.

Although CZUR Shine Ultra is extremely powerful, its portable size will amaze you. Weighing only 1 kg, and with its compact size, this is easily the most portable scanner on the market. Take it with you anywhere work takes you, - library, office, coffee shop, airport lounge, home, wherever!

Tired of using a traditional scanner? Try CZUR Shine Ultra. With the Shine Ultra, you are not restricted to where you happen to have your scanner set up? Bring CZUR Shine Ultra anywhere you go! Scanning on the go has never been easier!

Auto Page-Mending

Correct Position Functionality

Multi-target Scanning

How To Use CZUR Shine Ultra

You can bring the CZUR Shine Ultra anywhere with the ultra safe PortaPack

What's In The Box

You will find the following in the box:

  • black work mat
  • USB cable
  • manual
  • foot pedal
  • CD

Our packing will make sure your CZUR Shine Ultra gets to you safely during its shipping journey

Every detail, no matter how small it is, we make sure it will receive our full attention.

The CZUR Shine Ultra is in production stage already, we are ready to ship them to our backers all over the world!

As an innovator of a cutting-edge technology company and the inventor of a smart book scanner, CZUR is committed to designing and developing products that can reshape the modern workplace environment. Our team always believes that technology can provide convenience at work through continuous improvements and innovations. CZUR Tech focuses on addressing the existing overlooked part of the office or workplace.

We started shipping already!!!!

story:
We’re glad you’re here.  
He has been waiting for you.  
Gather around, the ritual is about start. 
Chucky will be here soon

 

     “Charles” is a whole new re-imagining of Chucky. The feature length movie follows Michael and Samantha who just moved into a new house. Little do they know, Charles Lee Ray lived in the house before his death six months earlier. 
 

The couple finds a nostalgic Good Guy doll in their basement that wants something from them and will stop at nothing to get it. 
 

“Charles” looks to put Chucky on the map as one of the scariest horror icons again. The movie will be a horrific rollercoaster, with similar styles to “The Conjuring”, “Annabelle”, and “The Haunting of Hill House”.  
 

With an intense, suspenseful story, cinematic visuals,  authentic hand-made dolls, and a beautifully frightening music score, “Charles” will make Chucky even SCARIER!

 

PERKS

As a THANK YOU, we will be offering perks such as:

- Special Thank You

- Blu-rays 
- Charles Posters

& MORE!

-Blu-rays comes with a 2X2" custom ARTWORK by storyboard artist D.J. O'Conner, decal sticker of Chucky as seen below.

Those that download will get a FREE 11X17 art poster made by storyboard artist DJ O'Conner!

 

OUR GOAL This campaign is to cover the costs that come with the post production process to completing this film. A lot of money has come out of our own pockets already to fund this project. Now that we have just about wrapped filming, we now shift our focus to post production. 
 

That’s where our supporters come in to help us achieve the best. 
 

Our goal is to raise $30,000. That will cover:

• Visuals Effects - We had a lot of practical effects in this movie but we are also using VFX to really top off our film.  
 

• Audio Production - Audio is very important and can make or break a film. We will have this film properly mixed and mastered. It will be theater quality no matter where you watch it. 
 

• Marketing - We will be using money to push this film out to festivals, blogs, and sites . Putting together and executing a marketing plan. 
If we are able to reach this goal, we will be able to deliver the best Chucky experience that we possibly can. The Chucky fans deserve it. 


• Traveling- A lot of the cast & crew live in different cities & states & the cost of traveling are very expensive with flights, hotels & transportation

 

MEET THE TEAM

 

 Tony started this project. After writing the story, he brought a team together that had the talent to pull this movie off. He leads the way with a drive and passion to deliver the best Chucky movie this team can deliver.

 

  Mitch was brought onto this project early for his cinematic style. The award nominated filmmaker is able to create beautiful visuals and drive a story forward with his creative and cinematic style. 

 

 Mike brings a fire to the team and won’t settle for anything less than perfect. Working to get all the gears going to make this project work. Along with producing is also creating the music for “Charles”. His beautifully haunting scores will send shivers up your spine. 

 

  This production was bumped up to the next level when Michael was brought on board. His custom made dolls are better than any other. Also, he is creating animatronic Chucky dolls and is in charge of all of the special effects and making all of the props. Because of him this film will have practical effects and less CGI. 

 

 

We would like to formally acknowledge that Tony Bizz Productionz and CINEMAGIC PICTURES state that our project CHARLES - A CHUCKY FAN FILM is a NON-PROFIT fan film and is in no way afﬁliated or represented with Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (MGM), Orion Pictures, Rogue Pictures, Universal Pictures and any other organization that owns the rights of Child’s Play or Chucky. 

We recognize that fan films are popular across the web and studios seem to support them (as long as it’s not making any profit) and use it as a free marketing tool. Horror movie slashers like, Michael Myers, Jason Voorhees, Freddy Krueger, Ghost-face and of course, CHUCKY are flooding all over the web. Also not forgetting large franchises like Star Wars, Harry Potter, Marvel, and DC are popular as well. 

The budget for this campaign is meant to cover the unavoidable expenses of independent film production. We are partnering with horror fans to fund a new Chucky story that all fans can enjoy.  

We are huge fans of Chucky, and movie fans! This is a friendly non-profit fan film that’s being created with so much heart and passion for the fans of the Child’s Play franchise and horror movies in general. We are celebrating over 30 years of Chucky and want to pay homage to writer and director DON MANCINI for creating such an iconic character, CHUCKY.  

Thank you so much for taking the time to visit this campaign. We hope this clears up any questions in regards to this project. If you have any other questions, please contact us at, tonybizzfilms@gmail.com.

story:
Why

With remote working and virtual learning, many of us spend a ton of time on virtual calls with different apps: Zoom, Team, Slack, Skype, Meet, Webex, etc. A key component of any online meeting is to timely mute and unmute yourself. However, it is not always easy to toggle to the meeting window, locate your cursor, and find the mute bottom in different programs, and know whether you are muted/unmuted now. We often have to open multiple windows to take notes and do other tasks, which makes it harder to mute/unmute with the meeting window in the background. It is especially difficult for children when they attend online school. My 6-year old son uses Meet for virtual school, Zoom for extracurricular classes, and Skype for his Chess club. Muting/unmuting ourselves should be as easy as a simple tap regardless which app you are using or which active window you are on. 

Our approach

M-Button is a small button that plugs into a USB port on your laptop. When tapped, it triggers the M-Button app to mute or unmute yourself in any meeting program. The M-Button app shows a tray icon to indicate if you are muted/unmuted. It mutes and unmutes your microphone at operating system level. 

Benefits:

  • You can mute and unmute any virtual call apps with a tap on M-Button.
  • No need to bring the meeting window to the front.
  • No need to locate your cursor or find the button in the program.
  • Bring it with you anywhere.
  • No extra wires means no mess.
  • Kids friendly means less chaos in classroom.

What have been done

1. MacOS app is fully developed.

 
 

 

Both Zoom's mute button and M-Button app's tray icon respond to taps from M-Button even when they are not the active windows. 

 

2. Finished the mute button prototype.

What are the next steps

  1. Integrating the 2 PCB boards into one customized PCB board.
  2. Add support for other operating systems.
  3. Manufacture Zinc alloy enclosures.

Why do we need money

Start manufacturing the hardware including PCB board and Zinc alloy enclosure.

However, it is not always easy to toggle to the meeting window, locate your cursor, and find the mute bottom in different programs, and know whether you are muted/unmuted now. We often have to open multiple windows to take notes and do other tasks, which makes it harder to mute/unmute with the meeting window in the background. It is especially difficult for children when they attend online school. My 6-year old son uses Meet for virtual school, Zoom for extracurricular classes, and Skype for his Chess club. Muting/unmuting ourselves should be as easy as a simple tap regardless which app you are using or which active window you are on. Our approachM-Button is a small button that plugs into a USB port on your laptop. When tapped, it triggers the M-Button app to mute or unmute yourself in any meeting program. The M-Button app shows a tray icon to indicate if you are muted/unmuted. It mutes and unmutes your microphone at operating system level. Benefits:
You can mute and unmute any virtual call apps with a tap on M-Button.
No need to bring the meeting window to the front.
No need to locate your cursor or find the button in the program.
Bring it with you anywhere.
No extra wires means no mess.
Kids friendly means less chaos in classroom.
What have been done1. MacOS app is fully developed. 
 

 

Both Zoom's mute button and M-Button app's tray icon respond to taps from M-Button even when they are not the active windows. 
 
2. Finished the mute button prototype.
What are the next steps
Integrating the 2 PCB boards into one customized PCB board.
Add support for other operating systems.
Manufacture Zinc alloy enclosures.
Why do we need moneyStart manufacturing the hardware including PCB board and Zinc alloy enclosure.

story:
People invented various sit-stand desks since many years ago. But these desks didn’t change much more so far. They usually come with a bulky size and limited by the workspace environment. And some with cumbersome setup may let you go crazy.

To make people get a flexible posture wherever they are, we realized we’d have to come up with the most convenient sit-stand desk ever.

MOFT Z is a truly lightweight and versatile sit-stand desk at an affordable price. It’s designed to offer THE HEAVEY LAPTOP USER a maximum comfort with maximum freedom on location.

 

 

A Magazine-sized Desk with 4 Positions

 

With the origami-inspired Z structure, MOFT Z provides one mode for standing and three-mode for sitting.  It helps you develop a healthy sit-stand working posture in the easiest way, keeping you active and productive all day.

 

Working From Home with Right Postures

 

The ultra-versatile yet like a paper-thin desk body makes it friendly to any working environment, not only to be used in the office but also at home or co-workspace.  

 

We designed MOFT Z with a continuous one-piece structure. No tool is needed for setup. Stand it up easily when you need it, and unfold it back quickly when you don’t.

Most people usually only want to take a short standing, not a giant stand on the desk all day long. As the same size as a magazine, you can store MOFT Z in any corner you like. Keep it "invisible" on your desk. So you won’t notice it when you don’t need it.

It follows the consistent design philosophy of MOFT: unseen, unfelt, unnoticed. 

MOFT Z is a fast-blade to open and close. It quickly switches your sit and stand posture and takes the stress off your back in seconds, letting you get a joyful and relaxing posture.

 

Sitting all day in the office can be stressful for both your body and mind. A quick switch to standing not only helps you stretch a bit for a relaxing back, but also refreshes your mind with a different angle to see your works.

 

 

Standing Mode

When you are standing, MOFT Z offers a natural height for your palms to rest onto the laptop, and your eyes to look at the screen with no strain or tension.

 

Sitting Mode

Surely, you would want to sit back after a short break. Does MOFT Z stop working by then? Absolutely not. We also prepared three modes to fit your own working style while sitting.

The light-weight body foldable design makes MOFT Z the ONLY sit-stand desk that you can use on your laps.

 

We didn't trade thinness for durability. Apart from the rock-steady Z structure and tri-angle bottom support, We used the fibre-glass to ensure the toughness of panels and a maximum of 22-lbs weight.

 

The magnetic flap to reinforce the frame, and the PU material to shield all the scratches and heat, while keeping everything soft and premium to touch.

 

As thin and light as it is, you can always take MOFT Z away like grabbing a magazine and work anywhere you feel like, in anyway you feel right.

 

You would never see a desk at the size of an iPad Pro. MOFT Z stays perfectly in your backpack. You can have a flexible working setup anywhere you go like never before.

To complete a product is not simply fixing the structure, we want you to feel good even if you aren't actually using it. The vast coverage of PU material makes everywhere you touch feels soft and smooth to your hands.

 

The color on the back not only adds an energetic vibe to your desktop, but also works as an indicator of how you act & use the product.

 

A reliable structure also needs to fight the test of time, all corners and folding lines were reinforced to make sure you can always keep using it without wearing or tearing.

 

MOFT always aims to make products that all people can buy without having to worry about the steep price. A good design should be everyone’s design. 

 

We found three biggest problems that other products have had: They were too big & heavy for such short time standing; They usually took even longer to store than the already tedious installment; They would still be there even if you don’t want to use them again.  

And we got three answers as well: Small & thin enough to help you forget it’s there； Fast & easy to use just to save time; Disappear when you are done using it.

But a desk is much smaller & cramped than a room, which means we must shrink the size of a chair all the way back while keeping the same rigidity & stability.

We then chose fibre-glass as the basic structure for its toughness and flexibility—it restores most deformation under 60° foldings, much stronger than usual paper structure. It’s a more expensive material, but it’s more durable for the price. 

To enhance the basic structure support, we also used 11 built-in magnets between joints to make it even stronger, and snappier when you fold it back and forth.

 

 

People would still sit down after a standing break, that’s why we must keep the triple angles for sitting position, offering much better usability than a usual standing desk.  

 

To wrap things up, we need to make it aesthetically minimalistic so that it looks and feels just like a MOFT product.

 

 

 

 

MOFT=Mobile Office For Travelers.

We are a team dedicated to design & create products to help digital nomads to work better, healthier, more energized and focused.

In 2019 we have launched MOFT Stand and MOFT X Series, receiving hundreds of thousands of support from all around the world, and a whopping $3.2million+ sales throughout the year, making them one of the best-selling stands on the market.

And now we are proud to announce that MOFT Stand has won the iF Design Award!

 

This time, we bring MOFT Z sit-stand laptop desk to you. We hope that all our research, work and creativity has produced a product that will make your office working better. Your support is greatly appreciated. 

Distributor/Retail Business

MOFT welcomes global distributors/retail to join us. And we will continue to share the awesome products and great marketing service as always. Please contact sales@moft.us if you are interested.

 

This campaign is promoted by LemoreLab. Since 2015, LemoreLab has successfully helped creators crowdfunded over $10,000,000 from 30,000+ backers.

story:
For 5 years we have been immersed in the ADHD community, providing solutions and gathering insights. In the last year, it has become increasingly obvious that adults with ADHD, Autism, and similar mental challenges struggle with the essential components of organization and structure as well. Their superpower potential is overshadowed by the constant struggles of daily life. These incredible individuals deserve better, they deserve a solution that: 

 

 

This is why Brili has grown up. Your resilience has inspired us to improve, the new app is currently under development and planned to light up your screens by the end of 2020. But first we need your help.

 

 

 

With the help of experts, we launched the Brili Kids app to be dedicated to helping families and their children challenged with ADHD. Little did we know, the idea of what Brili could be for people was larger than we thought. Adults began reaching out to us,  and shared their struggles to find that one solution that fit them, and we listened.

We began developing the all new Brili app for adults earlier this year. As we began, we reached out to the community to see how they felt, and we have been blown away ever since. The feedback, ideas, and recommendations we have gotten are so valuable. 

Now we have ideas for features to bring us into the new millennium, but not the resources to bring them to life. That is where we can use your help.  With every dollar you donate, we get closer to adding new features, expanding the Brili community, and realizing our vision. 

We have begun to reapproach and redesign the core elements from Brili Kids, those features that have changed the lives of adults, not just children and their families, around the world. These features are the first of many to be added to this revolutionary app.

    Our Dynamic Timer   

Our answer to time blindness. The dynamic timer is based on developing your conception of time, filling in the blank spots of a daily plan, and having the app work for you not against you.

 

     Customization

Our answer to lack of focus. With customizable colors pallets, ways of organizing your tasks and pictures to visualize your routines. Brili fits your life and extends your creativity, so you feel comfortable opening it up and using it on a daily basis.

 

   Extra supportive features

Our answer to expert advice. Audio and Voice Prompts are proven techniques for getting people through their daily challenges. These two features have always been at center focus for us here at Brili. With this new adults app nothing has changed, except for our determination to bring the benefits of these techniques to your hands. 

 

      Reward System

Our answer to lack of motivation. Our new rewards systems will incorporate both personal and community based incentivization. We are improving on our idea of free time, reward points per task completed, and creating a system that is endlessly motivating.

 

   Languages

Our answer to a global need. As an international family, Brili does not only want to work in countries where these disorders are recognized and more accepted, we also want to work in countries where there is still much work to be done. We will be offering the app in Spanish, German, French and English

 

So what is your money going towards exactly? For the past year, assisted with the latest tech, we have begun the redesign and development process for the basic features of this new app. However, we have our sights set higher. With the feature ideas we have collected, we have the ability to create an app that is truly revolutionary in helping people make it through their day. In hopes of bringing you on the journey with us, here are our milestones!

    $10,000

  • Improved routine creation, editing and execution.
  • More custom images for tasks and routines.
  • Additional flexibility for reordering tasks and routines.

       $20,000

  • Now you can run the app in the background.
  • Notification for tasks in your routine.
  • Consistent reminders for routines keep you on schedule.

​$30,000

  • Do you need an extra push? Get inspired with motivational messages.
  • Voice prompts help guide you through you routines.

     $40,000

  • Do you want a more comfortable look? Enable dark mode.
  • Prioritize your routines with color coding.
  • Flexible options in setting routine days of week/month.
  • Join the community and share routines with others.

 

If we surpass our goal...

 

          $50,000

  • Earn badges and achievements the more you improve.
  • Motivate and reward yourself with custom rewards.
  • Add friends and motivate one another with Brili community.

    $75,000

  • View routine and task statistics to monitor your success.
  • Receive a weekly progress report via email.
  • View and start routines in your personal calendar

         $100,000

  • Apple watch compatibility.
  • Kindle Fire Version.

   $150,000

  • One infrastructure, same support and reliability
  • Community collaboration within the app
  • Any money raised beyond our goal will help us tremendously as we build our team and tackle new features in addition to the one outlined above.

 

As we are working on a volunteer basis, the responses and development times might not be as fast as in other companies.

 

  • Press the BACK IT button to donate
  • Spread our message through FB, Instagram or LinkedIn
  • Don't forget to use the indiegogo share tools.

story:
What's This All About?

Campaign is closed... find us on: http://www.planogol.com

Planogol is a Dream and Goal Management Tool that:

  • Focuses on life areas that need improvement
  • Adds inspiration and emotional drive to your dreams and goals
  • Ensuring you are working on S.M.A.R.T. goals
  • Guides you towards action-based progression
  • Facilitates you working with accountability partners
  • Drives you towards achievement!

Planogol is a Dream and Goal Management Tool that focuses on life areas that need improvement, adds inspiration and emotional drive to your dreams and goals, ensures you are working on S.M.A.R.T. goals, guides you towards action-based progression, facilitates you working with accountability partners and drives you towards achievement!

We are solving life imbalance (for individuals and families), business culture issues, employee retention and project management need for small businesses.

What are the basics?

  • A beginning-to-end system, walking you through the process above
  • Free to use (limited version)
  • Most expensive license per person is $4.99 per month

What aren’t we?

  • Bucket list
  • To-do list
  • List of dreams
  • Habit bully
  • Telling you what to dream about
  • Fitness app
  • Wishy-washy encouragement
  • Project management software
  • (but we have pieces of all of the above, integrated together)

 

Planogol is an all-encompassing life fulfillment system for real people, focused on changing how the world thinks about dreams and goals. The Planogol process was developed by founder Lee Autore on a personal camping retreat during a time when Lee needed to transform his own story. The dreams and goals that came out of following this process led to Lee dating the woman who is now his wife and them having a beautiful baby girl.  He also had career-altering conversations with his boss about his professional life, and turned many more dreams into accomplished goals.

After forming the initial process, Lee hosted a few retreats with friends and ultimately decided to turn the idea into a system for the world to use.

We want our success to be measured by our users achieving their dreams and goals. Every time someone feels better about one of their life areas, we are winning with them. By contributing to this project, you will be driving the work that will bring this unique set of tools to the world.

Where Are We in the Process?

In 2020, Lee kicked Planogol into high gear with business strategy and planning under the guidance of an advisory team, including his Small Business Development Center (SBDC) advisor. Coming into 2021, Lee has personally invested more than $75k in the business, we have two smaller investors, a development partner lined up, some Letters of Intent (LOI), a dedicated office, and a full advisory board.  Our advisory board includes multiple entrepreneurs and previous senior executive leaders, as well as a licensed counselor, a CPA, marketing and sales leaders, and creative folks.​

We are a privately held business, open to investors through S.A.F.E. notes and other equity options.

We expect to have a released website within 1 year of investor funding (or IndieGoGo funding, if it gets that high!).

Our team is ready to kick everything into motion, and we just need your help to start. Join the movement and help everyone to transform their story.

 

What Is Our Goal? Stretch Goals?

We've got a goal that will get everything going. If we can raise $20k, we will have enough to get the boat in the water and start rowing!

  • $20k is our official goal, which should show enough interest in the campaign to get investors on board. It also covers the cost of getting the beanie plush and tokens out to everyone who contributes.
  • $50k is our first stretch goal. If we reach it, we will develop and start publishing a series of PDFs to walk our users through our process.  These PDFs will probably come out bi-weekly or monthly.
  • $75k as a stretch goal will allow us to actually kick off the developers on the project, and get things really rolling! As a thank you, we will double the number of Early Access Tokens for everyone who pledged up to this goal being met!
  • Want more??!? We have great ideas, and we'll update when we start hitting these goals!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are starting with a $20k ask to kick the business into gear. Here's a rough breakdown of the initial and stretch goals, and how that money will be spent.

  • Business Kick-Off ($20k)
    • If this is all we get, then we'll be using some of this money to find the investors we need (if we still need investors when the campaign is over).
    • We'll also be using it to create the initial rewards — the invite tokens and Planogol beanie plush toys!
    • The interest shown by all of you will be a great driving factor for investors!
    • Some money will go to intellectual property lawyers, to protect some key details of our idea.
  • Development of the website ($130k)
  • Infrastructure build and fees ($50k)
  • Alpha and beta testing ($200k)
  • Launch and initial marketing ($200k)
  • Mobile companion app ($200k)
  • Scaling to self-sufficiency ($700k)
  • Bringing you all of the other crazy perks / stretch goals ($500k)

 

What are These Perk Items?

  • OUR THANKS: ​You get our sincere thanks.
  • SUPPORTER PAGE RECOGNITION: We are designing a section of the site that will recognize all of our personal supporters, as well as those who funded perks that include Support Page Recognition.  Say the word, and we will anonymize or remove your donation.
  • EARLY LAUNCH TOKEN: This is a legitimate clay "casino" chip, custom-printed with the logo and a special invite code to get you access to the site before we open it to the public!

  • BETA PROGRAM ACCESS: Want to be in on testing the site with us? Good at reporting bugs? Join us!
  • PLANOGOL 6" BEANIE PLUSH: We have had a custom 6 inch tall plush designed of Planogol, our platypus mascot.  He's absolutely adorable, and we're having them manufactured just for us!

  • LIFETIME FULL MEMBER: Your perk represents ~3 years of membership up-front, and you get your account for life! If you decide to upgrade your account to a Couple, Family or Small Business account, we will work with you to make it worth your while!
  • DREAM COACHING SERIES: Lee Autore or another team member will host 6 online sessions to walk you (or your group of 5, for the group version) through our process before the site launches.  Learn how to follow our process, and then it just gets easier when you've got our platform to work on!
  • PERSONAL SPONSORSHIP: FLEXIBLE*: We're leaving this as a flexible option. We'll figure out how you'd like to be recognized and do our best to make it happen!
  • ADVERTISING CREDIT*: The site will contain ads.
    • We call them "Resources"
    • We truly hope that you find them useful
    • They start collapsed with any paid account (including lifetime accts.)
    • One ad per page, located at the bottom of the screen
    • Ad sizes will be limited to not interfere with the page
    • Can always be closed with a single click

We don't want to give people "junk", so we will display ads targeted to the things our users are working on in their lives, by keywords. You get one of our business sponsorships, and we give you back a hefty percentage of your donated money in advertising credit on the site in the future!

  • SMALL BIZ SPONSOR RECOGNITION*: You'll be listed as one of our sponsors for a few years, as our thanks for helping to get us going! 
  • CORPORATE SPONSOR RECOGNITION*: Your sponsorship will be recognized on our site, printed materials, videos, and we can talk about other locations, for a few years. 
  • IN PARTNERSHIP / SPONSORED BY*: We're only doing one of these... and it will place your name with ours, in just about all of the places we use our logo.  Think of "Planogol Sponsored by MYCOMPANY" or "Planogol In Partnership with MYCOMPANY". We'll get our design teams together and figure it out.
  • THE BIG PARTY: Seriously... our friends, your friends, and a theme.  We'll throw a party to remember. We'll just have to be sure that we are following appropriate Covid precautions.
  • THE WOW: We have no idea what we're going to do to thank you for sponsoring the entire project, but you tell me what you want, and we'll work with both of our legal teams and boards, and make something magical happen.

* Our sponsors and advertisers will have to pass some qualifications by our legal team and board... but we think we can work together... if you aren't sure, contact us before buying in!

What Happens if We Don't Make Our Goal?

That's a great question. It could happen. We're counting on a large response, and a lot of interest shown. With that interest, we're going to seek out investors (assuming we don't end up fully funded). If nothing works out, we'll keep trying, and eventually take what's left and give it to a charity.

In the words of our founder, Lee Autore, "This is MY life-dream, to make this happen, and I've sunk a lot of money into it.  It won't die easily!"

 

The Impact

We want to bring about positive change to the world.  Here's how we believe you can help the world, by helping us.

  • Having the tools to better yourself means being able to help others!
    • During every airline safety announcement. You’re asked to put your own mask on.
    • Once you are in a good place, you can help those around you, too.
  • Making these tools available to EVERYONE is our goal... we don't want this to be an exclusive thing!
  • We will be launching with a "Non-Profit Application" page, and slowly giving away free group accounts to non-profits as we scale!
    • This is important to us.  We want to change the world, and giving away tools like this are one of the ways we can do that.
    • This makes our hearts happy.

 

Risks & Challenges

We need this push of YOUR interest expressed, and there's no better way to get things rolling than by speaking with your wallet (even the smallest amounts!).

  • We could raise the $20k, and not get the rest of the funding needed.
    • Founder, Lee Autore, has invested $75k into this business already.
    • We have minor advisors that we have to answer to.
    • Even if we only reach our initial goal, we should have your "interest" expressed enough to bring in additional investors.
    • If we *do*  reach our stretch goals, we can rely less on investors in the future, and spend more of our resources doing great things for our supporters and users.
  • Someone might beat us to the punch and build this before we can.
    • We have put so much thought into this (working on technical project is what Lee does for a living!), that we don't believe someone will launch as good of a project as we have planned before we can.
    • The extent of the features that we are going to offer should dwarf any competition, existing or new.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you can contribute financially or not, you can help us in other simple ways!

  • Share this campaign page on any and social media platforms, and tag us wherever possible.
  • Find us as Planogol or @Planogol on most social media pages. Like and Follow us to keep up to date and help us grow! Share your dreams with us, and share our goals with the world!
    • https://www.facebook.com/planogol
    • https://www.linkedin.com/company/planogol
    • https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQimhW2EvLGftfh_OkdyI-Q
    • https://www.instagram.com/planogol/
    • https://twitter.com/planogol
    • https://medium.com/@Planogol
    • https://www.pinterest.com/Planogol/
    • https://www.tiktok.com/@planogol
    • https://nextdoor.com/pages/planogol-llc-miamisburg-oh/
  • Tell your friends and family about us, and encourage them to Like and Follow us too.  Start dreaming! Start setting goals! And tell us all about them!
  • Know any investors? Tell them about this amazing idea, and get them in touch with us!

 

Thank You.

Sincerely... if you are reading this line, it means that you took a lot of time with us.  And for that you have our eternal gratitude.  We hope you will join our mission, and that we can work and play with you in the future! If you can donate, please do, and if not, please follow us to keep in touch!

- The Planogol Team

  • Lee Autore
  • Founder, Planogol
  • 937-203-0679
  • lee@planogol.com
story_txt:
What's This All About?
Campaign is closed... find us on: http://www.planogol.com
Planogol is a Dream and Goal Management Tool that:

Focuses on life areas that need improvement
Adds inspiration and emotional drive to your dreams and goals
Ensuring you are working on S.M.A.R.T. goals
Guides you towards action-based progression
Facilitates you working with accountability partners
Drives you towards achievement!

Planogol is a Dream and Goal Management Tool that focuses on life areas that need improvement, adds inspiration and emotional drive to your dreams and goals, ensures you are working on S.M.A.R.T. goals, guides you towards action-based progression, facilitates you working with accountability partners and drives you towards achievement!
We are solving life imbalance (for individuals and families), business culture issues, employee retention and project management need for small businesses.
What are the basics?

A beginning-to-end system, walking you through the process above
Free to use (limited version)
Most expensive license per person is $4.99 per month

What aren’t we?

Bucket list
To-do list
List of dreams
Habit bully
Telling you what to dream about
Fitness app
Wishy-washy encouragement
Project management software
(but we have pieces of all of the above, integrated together)

 
Planogol is an all-encompassing life fulfillment system for real people, focused on changing how the world thinks about dreams and goals. The Planogol process was developed by founder Lee Autore on a personal camping retreat during a time when Lee needed to transform his own story. The dreams and goals that came out of following this process led to Lee dating the woman who is now his wife and them having a beautiful baby girl.  He also had career-altering conversations with his boss about his professional life, and turned many more dreams into accomplished goals.
After forming the initial process, Lee hosted a few retreats with friends and ultimately decided to turn the idea into a system for the world to use.
We want our success to be measured by our users achieving their dreams and goals. Every time someone feels better about one of their life areas, we are winning with them. By contributing to this project, you will be driving the work that will bring this unique set of tools to the world.

Where Are We in the Process?
In 2020, Lee kicked Planogol into high gear with business strategy and planning under the guidance of an advisory team, including his Small Business Development Center (SBDC) advisor. Coming into 2021, Lee has personally invested more than $75k in the business, we have two smaller investors, a development partner lined up, some Letters of Intent (LOI), a dedicated office, and a full advisory board.  Our advisory board includes multiple entrepreneurs and previous senior executive leaders, as well as a licensed counselor, a CPA, marketing and sales leaders, and creative folks.​
We are a privately held business, open to investors through S.A.F.E. notes and other equity options.
We expect to have a released website within 1 year of investor funding (or IndieGoGo funding, if it gets that high!).

Our team is ready to kick everything into motion, and we just need your help to start. Join the movement and help everyone to transform their story.
 
What Is Our Goal? Stretch Goals?
We've got a goal that will get everything going. If we can raise $20k, we will have enough to get the boat in the water and start rowing!


$20k is our official goal, which should show enough interest in the campaign to get investors on board. It also covers the cost of getting the beanie plush and tokens out to everyone who contributes.
$50k is our first stretch goal. If we reach it, we will develop and start publishing a series of PDFs to walk our users through our process.  These PDFs will probably come out bi-weekly or monthly.
$75k as a stretch goal will allow us to actually kick off the developers on the project, and get things really rolling! As a thank you, we will double the number of Early Access Tokens for everyone who pledged up to this goal being met!
Want more??!? We have great ideas, and we'll update when we start hitting these goals!


 
What We Need & What You Get
We are starting with a $20k ask to kick the business into gear. Here's a rough breakdown of the initial and stretch goals, and how that money will be spent.

Business Kick-Off ($20k)
If this is all we get, then we'll be using some of this money to find the investors we need (if we still need investors when the campaign is over).
We'll also be using it to create the initial rewards — the invite tokens and Planogol beanie plush toys!
The interest shown by all of you will be a great driving factor for investors!
Some money will go to intellectual property lawyers, to protect some key details of our idea.


Development of the website ($130k)
Infrastructure build and fees ($50k)
Alpha and beta testing ($200k)
Launch and initial marketing ($200k)
Mobile companion app ($200k)
Scaling to self-sufficiency ($700k)
Bringing you all of the other crazy perks / stretch goals ($500k)

 
What are These Perk Items?


OUR THANKS: ​You get our sincere thanks.

SUPPORTER PAGE RECOGNITION: We are designing a section of the site that will recognize all of our personal supporters, as well as those who funded perks that include Support Page Recognition.  Say the word, and we will anonymize or remove your donation.

EARLY LAUNCH TOKEN: This is a legitimate clay "casino" chip, custom-printed with the logo and a special invite code to get you access to the site before we open it to the public!




BETA PROGRAM ACCESS: Want to be in on testing the site with us? Good at reporting bugs? Join us!

PLANOGOL 6" BEANIE PLUSH: We have had a custom 6 inch tall plush designed of Planogol, our platypus mascot.  He's absolutely adorable, and we're having them manufactured just for us!




LIFETIME FULL MEMBER: Your perk represents ~3 years of membership up-front, and you get your account for life! If you decide to upgrade your account to a Couple, Family or Small Business account, we will work with you to make it worth your while!

DREAM COACHING SERIES: Lee Autore or another team member will host 6 online sessions to walk you (or your group of 5, for the group version) through our process before the site launches.  Learn how to follow our process, and then it just gets easier when you've got our platform to work on!

PERSONAL SPONSORSHIP: FLEXIBLE*: We're leaving this as a flexible option. We'll figure out how you'd like to be recognized and do our best to make it happen!

ADVERTISING CREDIT*: The site will contain ads.
We call them "Resources"
We truly hope that you find them useful
They start collapsed with any paid account (including lifetime accts.)
One ad per page, located at the bottom of the screen
Ad sizes will be limited to not interfere with the page
Can always be closed with a single click



We don't want to give people "junk", so we will display ads targeted to the things our users are working on in their lives, by keywords. You get one of our business sponsorships, and we give you back a hefty percentage of your donated money in advertising credit on the site in the future!


SMALL BIZ SPONSOR RECOGNITION*: You'll be listed as one of our sponsors for a few years, as our thanks for helping to get us going! 

CORPORATE SPONSOR RECOGNITION*: Your sponsorship will be recognized on our site, printed materials, videos, and we can talk about other locations, for a few years. 

IN PARTNERSHIP / SPONSORED BY*: We're only doing one of these... and it will place your name with ours, in just about all of the places we use our logo.  Think of "Planogol Sponsored by MYCOMPANY" or "Planogol In Partnership with MYCOMPANY". We'll get our design teams together and figure it out.

THE BIG PARTY: Seriously... our friends, your friends, and a theme.  We'll throw a party to remember. We'll just have to be sure that we are following appropriate Covid precautions.

THE WOW: We have no idea what we're going to do to thank you for sponsoring the entire project, but you tell me what you want, and we'll work with both of our legal teams and boards, and make something magical happen.

* Our sponsors and advertisers will have to pass some qualifications by our legal team and board... but we think we can work together... if you aren't sure, contact us before buying in!
What Happens if We Don't Make Our Goal?
That's a great question. It could happen. We're counting on a large response, and a lot of interest shown. With that interest, we're going to seek out investors (assuming we don't end up fully funded). If nothing works out, we'll keep trying, and eventually take what's left and give it to a charity.
In the words of our founder, Lee Autore, "This is MY life-dream, to make this happen, and I've sunk a lot of money into it.  It won't die easily!"
 

The Impact
We want to bring about positive change to the world.  Here's how we believe you can help the world, by helping us.

Having the tools to better yourself means being able to help others!
During every airline safety announcement. You’re asked to put your own mask on.
Once you are in a good place, you can help those around you, too.


Making these tools available to EVERYONE is our goal... we don't want this to be an exclusive thing!
We will be launching with a "Non-Profit Application" page, and slowly giving away free group accounts to non-profits as we scale!
This is important to us.  We want to change the world, and giving away tools like this are one of the ways we can do that.
This makes our hearts happy.



 

Risks & Challenges
We need this push of YOUR interest expressed, and there's no better way to get things rolling than by speaking with your wallet (even the smallest amounts!).

We could raise the $20k, and not get the rest of the funding needed.
Founder, Lee Autore, has invested $75k into this business already.
We have minor advisors that we have to answer to.
Even if we only reach our initial goal, we should have your "interest" expressed enough to bring in additional investors.
If we *do*  reach our stretch goals, we can rely less on investors in the future, and spend more of our resources doing great things for our supporters and users.


Someone might beat us to the punch and build this before we can.
We have put so much thought into this (working on technical project is what Lee does for a living!), that we don't believe someone will launch as good of a project as we have planned before we can.
The extent of the features that we are going to offer should dwarf any competition, existing or new.



 

Other Ways You Can Help
Whether you can contribute financially or not, you can help us in other simple ways!

Share this campaign page on any and social media platforms, and tag us wherever possible.
Find us as Planogol or @Planogol on most social media pages. Like and Follow us to keep up to date and help us grow! Share your dreams with us, and share our goals with the world!
https://www.facebook.com/planogol
https://www.linkedin.com/company/planogol
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQimhW2EvLGftfh_OkdyI-Q
https://www.instagram.com/planogol/
https://twitter.com/planogol
https://medium.com/@Planogol
https://www.pinterest.com/Planogol/
https://www.tiktok.com/@planogol
https://nextdoor.com/pages/planogol-llc-miamisburg-oh/

Know any investors? Tell them about this amazing idea, and get them in touch with us!

 Thank You.Sincerely... if you are reading this line, it means that you took a lot of time with us.  And for that you have our eternal gratitude.  We hope you will join our mission, and that we can work and play with you in the future! If you can donate, please do, and if not, please follow us to keep in touch!- The Planogol Team
