story:
The way we work is changing. Our workstations must change as well. Enter the Maxtand: a portable, versatile, heavy duty standing arm for laptops, monitors and keyboards. The Maxtand’s blend of rugged construction and practical design allows workers to convert practically any flat surface into a comfortable, ergonomic workstation. 

As more employees work remotely, whether that is at home or as digital nomads, the Maxtand will assist them in feeling more comfortable wherever they work. From coworking spaces to coffee shops, workers must be able to set up their workstations quickly and portably, whether that is for big presentations or just a more comfortable work experience, and that is precisely what the Maxtand delivers.

An adjustable and  portable standing desk 

With its aero-grade aluminum construction and practical design, the Maxtand can safety and securely raise laptops, monitors and keyboards up to 15 inches and adjust them 360 degrees, to more than 18 positions. The Maxtand is rated to hold more than 40kg (88lbs), but as you can see from the photo above, it can hold Oliver, who weighs about 70kg (do not attempt this at home). For more detail please see update: How much weight can Maxtand hold?

The Maxtand’s three pivot points (Base, Middle, Top) can be individually adjusted into eighteen different configurations. Each pivot point’s magnetic cover gives the Maxtand a sleek, modern look, while covering up the rotating screws underneath the cover. 

3 Adjustable pivot points to more than 18 positions. You discover more!

  • Solid, made of aero grade aluminum alloy 
  • Portable standing desk
  • Take up minimal space on your desk 
  • Raise your laptop or PC monitor up to 15 inches 
  • 3 Adjustable pivot points to more than 18 positions, multiple heights 
  • 5 Seconds transition from sitting to standing work, and vice versa 

In addition to being portable and versatile, the Maxtand can turn just about any desk into a standing desk! Enjoy the health benefits of a standing desk by using the Maxtand to raise your laptop or keyboard up to 15 inches. Standing desks have been linked to numerous health benefits, such as more energy, a stronger cardiovascular system, increased focus and even the potential to prevent deep vein thrombosis and blood clots that come from long periods of sitting.

 

Not sure if a standing desk is your thing? The Maxtand can give provide the flexibility to try out the standing desk concept without spending hundreds of dollars on a full-fledged standing desk. In fact, you can adjust the Maxtand so easily that you can alternate between sitting and standing as you see fit throughout the day.

Be well prepared - wherever you are 

The Maxtand’s versatility not only allows you to do more with your workstation, it allows you to work in more places. Weighing less than five pounds, the Maxtand is compact, portable, and ready to follow you to wherever your next assignment demands. From hotel rooms to shared workspaces, any place can become a comfortable workspace with the Maxtand (even the floor!). 

Whether it be as a stylish home base from which you manage your deck, or as a functional part of your presentation, the Maxtand has multiple uses in your daily life.

Get some tilt with our Rmour Stand Pro (previously called Ridge Stand Pro) || Add on option

Stuck in an airport? Waiting for a desk to open up in your coworking space? With the Maxtand, there’s no reason those down times should impact your comfort or your effectiveness. Not only that, but the Maxtand’s ability to put a laptop at eye level, even from couches or recliners, makes it a great tool for remote workers and multitaskers.  

 The Adjustable Arm for Your Monitor (add-on)

The Maxtand’s simple monitor adapter(add-on item) allows you to attach a monitor or smart TV simply and effectively. With this monitor arm, you can not only adjust the viewing angle but also raise your monitor to the height you like. 

The mounting plate is an add-on item, it can replace either the base plate or top plate as you prefer.

VESA compliant: 100 x 100 mm, 75x 75mm. Fits most 10"-30" monitors.

With the Maxtand, you can quickly adapt to any conference room scenario, whether it is a space for your keyboard during a larger screen presentation, or as a place to quickly mount a monitor for an impromptu demo. Plus, with the Maxtand’s sleek design, it will look like you planned it that way from the start (don’t worry, your secret is safe with us!). 

You still can get tired from staying in the same position for too long, so when you sit down for work and the Maxtand is not in use, fold it up if you like and it won't waste your desk space. The Maxtand can be an integral of your desk - you can put any stationery on its flat surface. 

The LED light kit is an add-on item. When using it, turn the desk upside down and clamp the lamp kit onto the base plate.

The Maxtand can be used reversely as a light stand for your bedside or desk. Check the add on list and feel free to add one to your pledge!

With Maxtand, There’s No Place Unlike Home

Let’s face it – when it comes to work, there is a definite home field advantage. We do our best work in familiar settings, where the keys feel like they are in the right place, our distractions are minimalized and we feel comfortable. However, there are times when we don’t have the luxury of working in that space. The Maxtand seeks to change that by giving you the freedom to work the way you want, wherever you are. From conference rooms to couches, the Maxtand helps you turn any space into your workspace.  

About shipping

Although we have years’ experience on fulfillment and can ensure every package arrives at your place safe and sound, we can’t guarantee the customs. Generally we are not able to do duty prepay or EU friendly but we do whatever we can to assistant you with that.

Delays

Manufacturing takes a lot of work, and things sometimes go wrong. In our last campaign, the mold used for mass production went wrong and had some small issues which lead to shipping delays. For the Maxtand, there’s no such problem because we don’t need a mold this time. We know a lot of crowdfunding projects have delays. Keeping quality first in mind we will control the timeframe with factory manufacturing, shipping companies and try to avoid this happen. However, strike, freight stuck, customs, and such are beyond our control.

Imperfections If there’s a problem with your reward, do let us know and we will find a way to fix it. Just be assured – we check every product before it’s shipped.

story:
Hello, I am Andres, Msc Babson and CEO of Coally, a latinx entrepreneur who has bootstrapped to launch a company. Coally is an edtech+ freelance platform that connects young professionals with small businesses and gives them education&guidance while working.  With your support I will be able to launch the platform internationally. I strongly believe this will disrupt the labor industry and will democratize access to professional services. 

I need 10.000 USD to design the fullstack version of my MVP, which is already functional and you can check it out here. If I dont get the complete funds I will drop features form the app but I will launch it anyway. 

We are unique in: 1. quality: we accompaign freelancer work with tech. 2. Speed: we deliver in less than 4 weeks, 3. Impact: we generate positive impact, 4. Price: we deliver at an affodable price

This platform will enable human capital connection with small and medium enterprises and will give employment opportunities to young professionals. So far we have developed 30 projects with  companies based in US, Chile, Mexico and Colombia, and we have generated more than 80 working oportunities.

story:
Introducing the FinalHub

FinalHub is the only portable workstation that perfectly combines the features of a Thunderbolt 3 USB-C docking hub, a mobile pocket router, and a power bank. It’s designed so you can be safely connected and productive wherever you go. 

 

 

 

 

Thunderbolt 3 USB-C Hub

 

 

FinalHub’s docking function provides all the ports you need for your Type-C laptops (MacBooks, Lenovo X1 series, ChromeBooks, etc), normal laptops, and mobile devices. It is designed to work perfectly with Windows, MacOS, iOS, and Android devices. Its compact size helps organize a crowded desk and it offers twelve practical ports to connect your system simultaneously to a wide variety of accessories, including HD monitors. It can also deliver 87 Watts of power to your laptop, charging it at maximum speed. 

 

Connect external monitors to increase productivity

 

Mobile Pocket (Wi-Fi) Router 

 

Designed so you can stay safely connected wherever you are, FinalHub’s Pocket Router offers two different ways for connectivity - a Gigabit Ethernet port and a SIM card slot for true wireless freedom. It is 4G LTE network-unlocked and can connect up to ten different devices.  

​Share a secured Wi-Fi connection to a maximum of 10 devices

With the need for cyber security and privacy becoming more important than ever, FinalHub’s built-in security includes firewall, ad and tracking script blocking, secure DNS, VPN and Tor Client support. The router firmware is 100% open source, based on OpenWrt, so you know we won’t be tracking your web traffic. It's perfect for protecting your privacy when connected to your hotel room's unsecured internet when you're on vacation or business trip. 

 

Power Bank

FinalHub’s onboard Li-Po battery has 12,000 mAh of capacity - giving your MacBook Pro an additional 150% of power or providing up to 48 hours of 4G connectivity. It is also equipped with QC 3.0 and PD 3.0 standards to help fast charge all your mobile devices. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Design 

We started with the concept of a portable docking hub that can replace all the adaptors we are forced to use with the new MacBook Pro. We wanted to make it even better and more powerful than the existing hubs on the market, yet keeping it as minimal as possible. 

While designing the FinalHub, we noticed more and more young professionals working from cafes and coworking spaces, which gave us the idea of adding some features to protect users’ information from unsecured internet connections and also improve their mobility. The Gigabit Ethernet and Micro SIM ports were eventually added, which allow users to be safely connected and share Wi-Fi to other devices. 

To achieve our vision of the most portable docking hub ever, we flawlessly fitted two compact Li-Po batteries into the FinalHub’s minimal design. Now it is also a portable power bank to charge other portable devices such as USB Type-C laptops and smartphones.

 

Concept Proof

 

 

 

Project Timeline

 

Risks & Challenges

Creating a brand new product without corporate support is often risky. Our team is incredibly experienced in the field of design and production. The design of the FinalHub has been finalized. The next step is going to be mass production after funding.

The FinalHubs shown in the video and the campaign content are fully functional prototypes.

Our manufacturing partner is very experienced in battery and circuit design. But we also have taken the precaution of production and shipment delays and we’re aligning our schedule to minimize the impact to our backers.

Li-po batteries are seldom an air-restricted item. We’ve done lots of research to ensure the Finalhub are completely Airsafe. FCC, RoHS, CE, UN38.3 safety certification will be obtained when FinalHub reaches mass production level.
story_txt:
Introducing the FinalHub
FinalHub is the only portable workstation that perfectly combines the features of a Thunderbolt 3 USB-C docking hub, a mobile pocket router, and a power bank. It’s designed so you can be safely connected and productive wherever you go. 
 

 

 
 

Thunderbolt 3 USB-C Hub
 

 
FinalHub’s docking function provides all the ports you need for your Type-C laptops (MacBooks, Lenovo X1 series, ChromeBooks, etc), normal laptops, and mobile devices. It is designed to work perfectly with Windows, MacOS, iOS, and Android devices. Its compact size helps organize a crowded desk and it offers twelve practical ports to connect your system simultaneously to a wide variety of accessories, including HD monitors. It can also deliver 87 Watts of power to your laptop, charging it at maximum speed. 
 

Connect external monitors to increase productivity

 
Mobile Pocket (Wi-Fi) Router 

 
Designed so you can stay safely connected wherever you are, FinalHub’s Pocket Router offers two different ways for connectivity - a Gigabit Ethernet port and a SIM card slot for true wireless freedom. It is 4G LTE network-unlocked and can connect up to ten different devices.  

​Share a secured Wi-Fi connection to a maximum of 10 devices
With the need for cyber security and privacy becoming more important than ever, FinalHub’s built-in security includes firewall, ad and tracking script blocking, secure DNS, VPN and Tor Client support. The router firmware is 100% open source, based on OpenWrt, so you know we won’t be tracking your web traffic. It's perfect for protecting your privacy when connected to your hotel room's unsecured internet when you're on vacation or business trip.

FinalHub’s onboard Li-Po battery has 12,000 mAh of capacity - giving your MacBook Pro an additional 150% of power or providing up to 48 hours of 4G connectivity. It is also equipped with QC 3.0 and PD 3.0 standards to help fast charge all your mobile devices.

The Gigabit Ethernet and Micro SIM ports were eventually added, which allow users to be safely connected and share Wi-Fi to other devices.

Li-po batteries are seldom an air-restricted item. We’ve done lots of research to ensure the Finalhub are completely Airsafe. FCC, RoHS, CE, UN38.3 safety certification will be obtained when FinalHub reaches mass production level.

story:
Testimonials for CavnessHR

Testimonial from David Meltzer - Founder David Meltzer Enterprises and Cofounder Sports 1 Marketing and Advisor to Gary Vaynerchuk

 

Testimonial from Elena Valentine - CEO/Cofounder Skill Scout 

 

 

Testimonial from Kevin Goldsmith - CTO at Anaconda, Inc. International Speaker and Advisor, former VP Engineering, Consumer at Spotify

"The mission of CavnessHR is compelling and the company fills a real need for small businesses.  This isn’t a boutique solution for twenty-something start up founders or disrupting an existing industry by using venture-dollars to make the unprofitable possible. CavnessHR is a solution that all small businesses can take advantage of where most currently go without because they can’t afford a full-time HR person."

Since meeting Jason, I have been impressed by his acumen and tenacity. He has excelled at building a brand and finding opportunities. He is pragmatic and disciplined. I have full-faith that CavnessHR will be successful under his leadership.

Testimonial from Dr. D. Anthony Miles - CEO and Founder of Miles Development Industries Corporation

"I want to definitely congratulate Jason for the wonderful job he has done in growing his business. I know that he grew cavnessHR to be one of the best emerging companies to look out for. Jason, will be one of the people to watch for the future. He is the vision behind one of the most exciting startups. Jason is the foundation of the company and he is just getting started! I expect to see some great moves from him."

Testimonial from Jon Neff - Founder & CEO at SKU CANDY

"I'm not an HR expert, but Jason Cavness, from CavnessHR is! Making the decision to outsource this critical component of my business has not only helped me save time and money, but also helped me sleep better at night.  Jason and his team always put us first and constantly go above and beyond, without being asked to do so. We used to spend countless hours researching important questions regarding HR, now we spend that time working on our business. Thanks Jason and the CavnessHR team!"

Testimonial from Matt Boyer - CEO at ZYLTER SOLUTIONS LAB

"Jason is growing CavnessHR to focus on the unique HR challenges and decisions of the startup journey. He and his team are building a scalable solution that blends responsiveness with scalability to meet the range of needs for high-growth start-ups. Jason is a true guide and partner for the journey. This is a need across startups, regardless of industry and size, that CavnessHR are passionate about meeting.

I have been a supporter of Jason’s mission with CavnessHR and it would be great to have you join me in helping CavnessHR grow!"

Testimonial from  Christina Brennan - Communication Consultant | Presentation Coach | Poor People's Campaign Organizer 

"Jason and I met a few years ago through an entrepreneur community event in Seattle called 1 Million Cups. I got to hear him pitch this amazing idea that would help small business owners save time and money, as well as hear a bit about of his story. Unlike most people, Jason actually followed up and continues to support me. I’m grateful for the times he’s given me a platform to tell my story and talk about my business, as well as connected me to several opportunities. I see him doing this all the time. We have a shared passion for helping others and I’m excited to see what the CavnessHR team is building."

Testimonial from  Jared Wharton - Founder & President at Forward Operating Base Brewing Co.

"Jason Cavness is everything a Veteran entrepreneur should be. He boldly set a difficult  goal and began a steady march towards achieving them. He has embraced the challenges and got into the entrepreneurial fight with guns blazing. HR is not the most exciting topic and many businesses don’t want to give it any thought until they absolutely have to. Jason sees the needs of a business before they do and is reshaping how HR can be utilized by businesses in a rapidly changing world. I am proud to call Jason a friend and fellow Veteran Entrepreneur!"

Testimonial from Ricardo Perez - Cofounder of Snohomish County Hispanic Chamber of Commerce

"Jason Cavness of CavnessHR has been critical in helping many small businesses move forward. His experience with HR matters, podcast platform, and diverse networks put him in a unique position allowing him to help small businesses with their HR problems and business owners with resources needed for success in today's rapidly evolving startup scene. With CavnessHR, we anticipate assisting many minority-owned small businesses get started on the right foot by ensuring their HR issues are being adequately addressed. CavnessHR allows owners to focus on pushing their business forward, and I look forward to recommending their services at our Chamber of Commerce soon!"

Testimonial from Bernard Edwards - BAE Consulting

“Jason is one of the most customer obsessed leaders I know. Jason works vigorously to earn and maintain client trust and confidence. I recommend all of my small and midsized businesses consulting clients to utilize the CavnessHR services to boost their Human Resources capabilities. I can’t wait to see the CavnessHR AI powered tools innovative the Human Resources space.”

Summary

At CavnessHR we are building a remote, diverse and transparent company.

According to the SBA there are over 5M companies in the U.S with 49 or fewer people. Most of them don't have dedicated HR. An internal HR hire can be $50,000 or more per year plus benefits.

HR consultants, who we want to put out of business, over charge on price and under deliver on value.  Then the large HR companies are known for having horrible customer service.

Because of this, it is estimated that small businesses lose $27B or the equivalent of $10,000 per employee per year because of bad HR. It is also estimated that small business owners spend 25% of their time on HR. This time can be better spent taking care of their people, customers and building their company.

At CavnessHR we want to solve this through a voice enabled AI platform along with access to a dedicated HR business Partner. 

At CavnessHR, we want to help small business owners save time and money.

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $25,000.  This money will be used to continue the build out of CavnessHR. To include the following:

Tech platform

Marketing/Sales

Internal CavnessHR business tools

We are offering the following rewards.

You are also able to make a custom donation just because you want to support us.

$10 - A public thank you on Social Media

We have around 40,000 followers across social media and The Jason Cavness Experience averages around 2,500 downloads.

Take part in a CavnessHR webinar. The webinar topics may include HR considerations for 2021. HR for small business or some other relevant webinar topics.

Receive a CavnessHR T-shirt  

A public thank you on Social Media

The Impact

We are raising $25,000.  This money will be used to continue the build out of CavnessHR. To include the following:

Tech platform

Marketing/Sales

Internal CavnessHR business tools

By contributing  to our campaign you help us save small business owners time and money on HR. It is estimated that small business loses $27B or $10,000 per small business employee each year. It is also estimated that small business owners spend 25% of their time on HR related items. Time that would be better spent taking care of their people, their customers and building their business.

Your contribution will help us to continue to build out CavnessHR so we can solve this small business owner pain through our voice enabled AI solution while providing a dedicated HR Business Partner

Risks & Challenges

There are many challenges for us in ensuring CavnessHR will be a successful company. The failure rate for startups can be as high as 90% depending on what source you use. 

1. An estimated 90% of new startups fail. (Source: Medium)

How many startups fail in the first year? Around 20%.

34% of startups close within their first two years.

Just over 50% of businesses make it to their fifth year.

Only 25% of businesses make it to the 15-year mark.

What percentage of startups become successful? Only 1 in 10 survive in the long run. 

There are many factors that cause startups to fail. Among them are the following along with our plan to face those challenges.

Building something no one wants

 We initially talked to 331 small business owners of which 90% said they would be open to using CavnessHR. We have continued to talk to thousands of small business owners. A majority of which believe in the concept of CavnessHR.

Not the right team: 

Below is the CavnessHR Team - We believe we have the right team to solve this problem and provide the solution

Jason Cavness Founder/CEO

 I am an INFJ disabled retired U.S. Army Officer with 30+ years of HR experience. I am HR certified and I have a Masters in HR. I have previous startup experience.

Danielle Anneman CoFounder

Danielle Anneman has 20 years of film, Corporate and start up knowledge that she is bringing with her to CavnessHR. She has held instrumental roles in HR, operations and management at companies like Microsoft and WeWork.

Mario Mitchell Tech CoFounder

Having served in the military, Mario learned to become a leader while perfecting his skills at design thinking and relation management. After getting out and entering the world of tech, Mario has been growing from there. He has used his skills to open a coding school to expand the tech community for everyone.

We have a very strong Board of Advisors:

Todd Dean

Founder/President Seattle Chapter Keiretsu Forum

Associate Partner - Blackhawk Partners, Inc

Managing Partner - Todd Dean and Co

David Meltzer 

  

Host of The Playbook Podcast

Co-Founder Sports 1 Marketing

Founder David Meltzer Enterprises

Advisor to Gary Vaynerchuk

3x Best Selling author

Dr. D. Anthony Miles 

 

Startup/Marketing Expert

Venture Capital and Acquisitions

Ph.D in Entrepreneurship and General Business

Kevin Goldsmith

 

Former VP Engineering, Consumer - Spotify

CTO - AVVO

CTO - Onfido

CTO - Anaconda, Inc.

Lack of focus and passion

Here at Cavness HR we are very focused and passionate about saving small business owners time and money. We have been working on this for a couple of years and we will continue to be devoted to this. 

Lack of marketing/sales

 We have a strong marketing effort as evidenced through our 40,000 connections/followers across social media. Plus through our podcast, The Jason Cavness Experience.

Lack of cash

This is a concern as we need cash flow to continue the build out of CavnessHR. We are working on this by having a crowdfunding campaign, increasing our sales/marketing efforts and entering numerous pitch competitions.

Not asking for help

We are big believers in asking for help and also providing help to others.

No partnerships

We have partnerships with the following organizations to provide additional value to our clients.

 

Everee Payroll: https://cavnesshr.co/startedeveree47533  

 

 

Tawk.To: https://www.tawk.to/?pid=byo1znq 

 

 

PeopleKeep: https://www.peoplekeep.com/cavnesshr  

 

 

The Genesis:  https://thegenesisgrind.home.blog/ 

 

 

NovaPoint Capital: https://novapointcapital.com/   

 

 

PeopleTrail: https://www.peopletrail.com/  

Leverage Benefit Consulting: https://www.leveragebenefit.com/  

 

Ignoring user feedback

We have made several small pivots on feedback gained from our numerous conversations with small business owners. We continually do user testing to improve the CavnessHR platform and we are constantly iterating.

We have a strong network that we are using extensively to build CavnessHR. We believe that we should talk to at least one new person each day about CavnessHR.

Startup Competitions and Programs

Veterans in Residence

CavnessHR was accepted into the Veterans in Residence program.

A partnership of WeWork and Bunker Labs, Veterans in Residence is a six-month startup incubator and leadership program that provides veteran and military family member entrepreneurs the community, business support, and workspace to help launch and grow their businesses.

 

Patriot Boot Camp

CavnessHR was accepting into the Patriot Boot Camp program

Since 2012, Patriot Boot Camp has been on a mission to assemble and activate an inclusive community that advances military members, veterans, military spouses in their mission to become creators, innovators, and entrepreneurs leading the new economy.  

 

 

 

Hofstra Veterans Venture Challenge

CavnessHR competed in and made it to the semi-final round of the 2020 Hofstra Veterans Venture Challenge.

The Hofstra Veterans Venture Challenge was designed as both a pitch competition and a virtual business bootcamp encompassing sales, marketing, and leadership mentoring to help veterans entrepreneurs get clarity on their go to market strategy and groom their businesses for sustainable growth.  

 

 

NYU Future Labs

CavnessHR was accepted into NYU Future Labs

The NYU Tandon Future Labs are the first public-private partnership with New York City tasked with creating a sustainable incubation program focused on increasing the success rate of new ventures and generating positive economic impact.

Patriot Boot Camp Elite 8 Presented by Google for Startups and Powered by FounderTrac

CavnessHR was accepted into the initial Patriot Boot Camp Elite 8 Accelerator.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share the CavnessHR Indiegogo link https://CavnessHR.co/crowdfunding with your networks and on your social media platforms.

The more people we make aware of our campaign the better the chance of our success.

Take part in a CavnessHR webinar. The webinar topics may include HR considerations for 2021. HR for small business or some other relevant webinar topics.
Receive an E-Book,
Take part in a CavnessHR webinar,
Links to your business and whatever else you want us to share on our social media and on The Jason Cavness Experience Podcast. We have around 40,000 followers across social media and around 2500 downloads per podcast episode.
Receive a CavnessHR T-shirt  
A public thank you on Social Media
$2,200 - CavnessHR will do HR for your company for one year if you have 11 to 19 people
One on one with Jason Cavness or possibly be a guest on The Jason Cavness Experience or possibly guest host The Jason Cavness Experience
Take part in a CavnessHR webinar. The webinar topics may include HR considerations for 2021. HR for small business or some other relevant webinar topics.
Receive an E-Book,
Take part in a CavnessHR webinar,
Links to your business and whatever else you want us to share on our social media and on The Jason Cavness Experience Podcast. We have around 40,000 followers across social media and around 2500 downloads per podcast episode.
Receive a CavnessHR T-shirt  
A public thank you on Social Media
$2,800 - CavnessHR will do HR for your company for one year if you have 20 to 34 people
One on one with Jason Cavness or possibly be a guest on The Jason Cavness Experience or possibly guest host The Jason Cavness Experience
Take part in a CavnessHR webinar. The webinar topics may include HR considerations for 2021. HR for small business or some other relevant webinar topics.
Receive an E-Book,
Take part in a CavnessHR webinar,
Links to your business and whatever else you want us to share on our social media and on The Jason Cavness Experience Podcast. We have around 40,000 followers across social media and around 2500 downloads per podcast episode.
Receive a CavnessHR T-shirt  
A public thank you on Social Media
$3,400 - CavnessHR will do HR for your company for one year if you have 35 to 49 people
One on one with Jason Cavness or possibly be a guest on The Jason Cavness Experience or possibly guest host The Jason Cavness Experience
Take part in a CavnessHR webinar. The webinar topics may include HR considerations for 2021. HR for small business or some other relevant webinar topics.
Receive an E-Book,
Take part in a CavnessHR webinar,
Links to your business and whatever else you want us to share on our social media and on The Jason Cavness Experience Podcast. We have around 40,000 followers across social media and around 2500 downloads per podcast episode.
Receive a CavnessHR T-shirt  
A public thank you on Social Media

The Impact
We are raising $25,000.  This money will be used to continue the build out of CavnessHR. To include the following:
Tech platform
Marketing/Sales
Internal CavnessHR business tools
By contributing  to our campaign you help us save small business owners time and money on HR. It is estimated that small business loses $27B or $10,000 per small business employee each year. It is also estimated that small business owners spend 25% of their time on HR related items. Time that would be better spent taking care of their people, their customers and building their business.
Your contribution will help us to continue to build out CavnessHR so we can solve this small business owner pain through our voice enabled AI solution while providing a dedicated HR Business Partner

Risks & Challenges
There are many challenges for us in ensuring CavnessHR will be a successful company. The failure rate for startups can be as high as 90% depending on what source you use. 
1. An estimated 90% of new startups fail. (Source: Medium)
How many startups fail in the first year? Around 20%.
34% of startups close within their first two years.
Just over 50% of businesses make it to their fifth year.
Only 25% of businesses make it to the 15-year mark.
What percentage of startups become successful? Only 1 in 10 survive in the long run. 
There are many factors that cause startups to fail. Among them are the following along with our plan to face those challenges.
Building something no one wants
 We initially talked to 331 small business owners of which 90% said they would be open to using CavnessHR. We have continued to talk to thousands of small business owners. A majority of which believe in the concept of CavnessHR.
Not the right team: 
Below is the CavnessHR Team - We believe we have the right team to solve this problem and provide the solution
Jason Cavness Founder/CEO

 I am an INFJ disabled retired U.S. Army Officer with 30+ years of HR experience. I am HR certified and I have a Masters in HR. I have previous startup experience.
Danielle Anneman CoFounder

Danielle Anneman has 20 years of film, Corporate and start up knowledge that she is bringing with her to CavnessHR. She has held instrumental roles in HR, operations and management at companies like Microsoft and WeWork.
Mario Mitchell Tech CoFounder

Having served in the military, Mario learned to become a leader while perfecting his skills at design thinking and relation management. After getting out and entering the world of tech, Mario has been growing from there. He has used his skills to open a coding school to expand the tech community for everyone.
We have a very strong Board of Advisors:
Todd Dean 
Founder/President Seattle Chapter Keiretsu Forum
Associate Partner - Blackhawk Partners, Inc
Managing Partner - Todd Dean and Co
David Meltzer 
  
Host of The Playbook Podcast
Co-Founder Sports 1 Marketing
Founder David Meltzer Enterprises
Advisor to Gary Vaynerchuk
3x Best Selling author
Dr. D. Anthony Miles 
 
Startup/Marketing Expert
Venture Capital and Acquisitions
Ph.D in Entrepreneurship and General Business
Kevin Goldsmith 
 
Former VP Engineering, Consumer - Spotify
CTO - AVVO
CTO - Onfido
CTO - Anaconda, Inc.
Lack of focus and passion
Here at Cavness HR we are very focused and passionate about saving small business owners time and money. We have been working on this for a couple of years and we will continue to be devoted to this. 
Lack of marketing/sales
 We have a strong marketing effort as evidenced through our 40,000 connections/followers across social media. Plus through our podcast, The Jason Cavness Experience.
Lack of cash
This is a concern as we need cash flow to continue the build out of CavnessHR. We are working on this by having a crowdfunding campaign, increasing our sales/marketing efforts and entering numerous pitch competitions.
Not asking for help
We are big believers in asking for help and also providing help to others.
No partnerships
We have partnerships with the following organizations to provide additional value to our clients.
 
Everee Payroll: https://cavnesshr.co/startedeveree47533  
 
 
Tawk.To: https://www.tawk.to/?pid=byo1znq 
 
 
PeopleKeep: https://www.peoplekeep.com/cavnesshr  
 
 
The Genesis:  https://thegenesisgrind.home.blog/ 
 
 
NovaPoint Capital: https://novapointcapital.com/   
 
 
PeopleTrail: https://www.peopletrail.com/  
Leverage Benefit Consulting: https://www.leveragebenefit.com/  
 
Ignoring user feedback
We have made several small pivots on feedback gained from our numerous conversations with small business owners. We continually do user testing to improve the CavnessHR platform and we are constantly iterating.
We have a strong network that we are using extensively to build CavnessHR. We believe that we should talk to at least one new person each day about CavnessHR.
Startup Competitions and Programs
Veterans in Residence
CavnessHR was accepted into the Veterans in Residence program.
A partnership of WeWork and Bunker Labs, Veterans in Residence is a six-month startup incubator and leadership program that provides veteran and military family member entrepreneurs the community, business support, and workspace to help launch and grow their businesses.
 

Patriot Boot Camp
CavnessHR was accepting into the Patriot Boot Camp program
Since 2012, Patriot Boot Camp has been on a mission to assemble and activate an inclusive community that advances military members, veterans, military spouses in their mission to become creators, innovators, and entrepreneurs leading the new economy.  
 
 


 
Hofstra Veterans Venture Challenge
CavnessHR competed in and made it to the semi-final round of the 2020 Hofstra Veterans Venture Challenge.
The Hofstra Veterans Venture Challenge was designed as both a pitch competition and a virtual business bootcamp encompassing sales, marketing, and leadership mentoring to help veterans entrepreneurs get clarity on their go to market strategy and groom their businesses for sustainable growth.  
 

 
NYU Future Labs
CavnessHR was accepted into NYU Future Labs
The NYU Tandon Future Labs are the first public-private partnership with New York City tasked with creating a sustainable incubation program focused on increasing the success rate of new ventures and generating positive economic impact.

Patriot Boot Camp Elite 8 Presented by Google for Startups and Powered by FounderTrac
CavnessHR was accepted into the initial Patriot Boot Camp Elite 8 Accelerator.

 
Other Ways You Can Help
Share the CavnessHR Indiegogo link https://CavnessHR.co/crowdfunding with your networks and on your social media platforms.
The more people we make aware of our campaign the better the chance of our success.

story:
PrinCube is the ultimate handheld, portable printer. It’s ultra-lightweight, fits in the palm of your hand and lets you create fast, vivid, color printing anywhere. It works over Wi-Fi with your phone to easily upload any text, image, or design and instantly print onto virtually any object or surface at the touch of a button. Printing has never been more mobile and more convenient.

This incredible lightweight, the color printer is portable enough to take the power of inkjet printing on-the-go anywhere you want. It's color inkjet personalizes ordinary objects, makes messages that stand out and is the perfect tool for arts and crafts. It’s perfect for business travel, events, art, and fun.

 

 

  • Works on any material

The biggest limitation of traditional printers is that they can only print on paper. Until now, expensive laser engravers and screen-printing were required for putting logos and lettering on everyday objects. Now, with the PrinCube handheld portable printer, virtually any object can be printed upon. It makes precise prints on virtually any materials including paper, metal, textiles, plastics, wood, leather and other building and artistic materials.

  • Print on the rough, curved and uneven surface

It works on any texture or shape even on the skin, and can print over uneven surfaces with ease.

 

In addition to other surfaces, PrinCube is perfect for making safe temporary tattoos on the skin. Get creative with any design to add art or messages to the skin in a safe way.

 

 

 

PrinCube is designed for practicality and convenience. It works with both iPhone and Android and getting started is easy. After a simple scan (or visit the online app), this palm-sized printer is ready to go in just three simple steps:

PrinCube works seamlessly with your smartphone and all the printing operations can be controlled with a single print button. It can connect to a mobile hotspot or Wi-Fi to a smartphone or computer. Then, simply select an image or text, hit the button and print away!

 

  • Lifelike Vivid Color

Until now, other portable printing options were limited to Black & White printing only. PrinCube is the world’s only portable full-color printer. It utilizes the latest 3-Color Thermal Ink-jet Technology that provides vivid color printing. Now the portable printing experience is elevated with lifelike, full-color printing on any surface.

  • Multi-line printing

PrinCube Enables multi-line printing feature. You can print a total of 3m/9.8 feet content when using the powerful multi-line feature.

Using the latest battery technology, PrinCube is always ready to work. A single charge provides 6 hours of working time and an incredible 1 year of standby time! The high efficiency printer has 20 times more memory than other mobile printers and is capable of printing over 415 pages of A4 paper on a single cartridge! The extended working time and high output volume makes PrinCube perfect for business travel and special events where charging may not be possible.

 

PrinCube’s revolutionary compact design sets users free from the desk. It is wireless, works over Wi-Fi and is lightweight and ultra-portable. At only 72x51x68mm it is small enough to fit into a pocket or handbag and travel anywhere.

The ergonomic design makes it easy to print with one hand and at only 160g (including print cartridge) , which the lightest printer available today.

 

When it’s time to change the ink cartridge it is easy to do in seconds, simply open PrinCube, press in the new cartridge and get back to printing. 

 

 

PrinCube has a contemporary design that makes it portable, ergonomic and stylish. With simplicity in mind, all the printing operations can be controlled with a single print button. It charges using the latest USB Type-C port that is preferred for reliability and fast throughput for mobile devices.

  

 

We included fun and a useful bonus feature that makes PrinCube even more unique. Its Secret Printing function allows two users to share encrypted information with each other. The information sent is only revealed once it is printed out. A great way to share a secret or keep classified information hidden.

 

Technology changes fast and we understand the need to stay on the cutting edge. PrinCube supports API secondary development to meet the unique needs of makers now and in the future. Future upgrades will continue and be made available to all users.

Youtuber Review

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

Try The PrinCube PWA(Progressive Website Apps) In Advance by Visiting HERE.
 
 

1. Color-print an Excel form. (By using the ruler)

2. Print an ultra-wide picture on the curved track.

3. "Add text" feature showing & Print on the metal surface (Macbook).

4. Print on glasses.

PrinCube Multi-line  Photo Printing:

 

 

2nd Trial-producing & Final Testing - PCB + Production material preparation

 

‘The God Things’ is an exciting new startup dedicated to new technology and innovative printing solutions. We're a remote team based in New York, US and Shenzhen, China. The team is made up of experts from the field of inkjet printing technology, industrial design, and software development.

Our goal is to make high-quality portable printing accessible and simple for everyone. We have devoted years of R & D to create PrinCube and are ready to share PrinCube with the world! 

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

1. What are the maximum printing dimensions with a single pass?

The maximum printing hight is 14.29 mm/0.5625 inch. For a single pass, it can print 1.3m/4.26 feet long. On multi-line printing mode, it can print up to 3m/9.8 feet. If you want to print the pattern with larger dimensions, you can use the multi-line feature with the help of rulers to put them together.

2. Normally, how often do I need to refill or change the cartridge?

A single cartridge can print up to 415 full pages of paper (A4), enough for a year of daily use. If you need to replace the cartridges, you can purchase the corresponding cartridges on our official website after the campaign ends at https://www.thegodthings.com/

3. How long does the ink last on shirts and other washable objects?

The printing will last for a long time until you wash it or it’s soaked with water or sweat, which will wash away the ink. If you want a permanent printing, we recommend you take our permanent ink cartridge, which uses the eco-solvent ink. You can choose it in the add-on options.

4. How’s the working time/battery life?

Princube integrates a 900 mAh battery. For a single charge, it can continuously print for 6 hours with 1 year of standby time.

5. How does it take to fully charged?

2 hours normally. For a single charge, it can continuously print for 6 hours with 1 year of standby time.

6. Can I print on metal/glass?

If you print on paper material, whether it's the standard ink or the permanent ink, the printing pattern will dry quickly without being smeared.

If you want to leave a lasting pattern on metal, glass, plastic or clothing, choose the permanent ink cartridges. PrinCube permanent ink is the gel-based ink. It will be water-resistant and not washed away by water once the ink has dried.

However, due to the smooth surface of metal, glass, plastic and other materials, and different temperature and humidity in each place, the permanent ink dries for a long time. If you are looking for faster and better long-lasting printing, you can purchase additional clear varnish spray and it can keep the color fixed.

7. Are you selling the PrinCube on other places?

PrinCube has no distributor partners so far and is only live on Indiegogo now, We'll ensure our Indiegogo backers are the first users that receive the PrinCube. If you do see these Scam Wesbsite and Facebook Ads, please help us to report their ads and page. We think as more people report this problem, the Facebook team will get aware of this issue!

 

8. How can I order extra ink if we have already purchased the printer?

If you ordered the PrinCube but wants to purchase more ink cartridges, we are able to offer the additional perk for you now: The Permanent Ink: https://bit.ly/2MzvP0O; The Standard Ink: https://bit.ly/2VwBvwO. The Ink Cartridge will be sent out together with the Perk you ordered before. Thanks for your support!

 

9. Can this printer print on black surface? or white?

PrinCube can print on Black Surface but it can not show the color perfectly if the ground color is too dark. Printing white color is not supported.

 

10. How can this print black if it just uses the tri color cartridge?

The Black color you see in the video or campaign page is printed by the PrinCube. The cartridge prints black by combining percentages of cyan, magenta and yellow. and that's how the tri-color works.

 

11. Printers clean themselves periodically to avoid getting clogged, does yours?

We suggest you clean the PrinCube ink outlet at least once a month. When you're not using it, it's better to put the lid on. Btw, PrinCube has the clean function, which supports you long-press the button and it will print 3 color line so you know the printing status in advance.

 

12. What is the shelf-life of the ink?

The shelf-life of the ink cartridge is 18 months. If it is the used ink cartridge, you stored properly in the correct environment, you may still be able to use it for 18 months (15° - 30°）

 

Risks and challenges

With our team’s years of experience with printing technology and the successful production of previous products, we have reliable suppliers and excellent manufacturing partners, making us confident in our production schedule for PrinCube. However, we understand that challenges often occur with shipping and logistics.

To avoid potential delays, we have already confirmed with our suppliers that production is ready and shipping can begin on time. Our most important task is to satisfy the promises we make to our backers.

If any unexpected problems arise we will keep our backers updated and informed about how we are solving the issue. We are excited to bring PrinCube to the world and thank you for your support.

story:
Meet Blokwat™| The Line of Hi Tech Notebooks

 

The Blokwat brings 5 amazing features together and creates an ultimately advanced notebook. With Blokwat you get all of these and even more...

✅ Non-transpirable, completely waterproof and tear resistant paper is one of kind

✅ The cloud based app makes it a must for your office 

✅ It is made of completely recycled materials

✅ Pen with Erasable Ink

✅ FREE SHIPPING

 

 

Blokwat is made of completely waterproof  paper thanks to a mix of polypro particles and minerals. The Cover of Blokwat is made of separate stain and water repellent texture, you are completely safe with Blokwat!

 

 

Now your morning coffee☕ can’t ruin your notes. Not water or liquid of any kind can harm the pages with your precious notes. The cover of Blockwat is made water repellant to ensure that waterproof feature works perfectly. So we dare you to check yourself the quality of Blokwat!

 

 

The WaterProof feature is not the only feature for Blokwats' paper, you also get the non-transpirable paper, no ink stains/bleeding✒️ of any kind, better grove, and tracking when writing. Using the pen was never so satisfying and easy.

 

 

Being a combination of stones and minerals which can be found in certain places in Africa. It is made to be extra durable and tear resistant. With Blokwat you are more than covered for a long-long time.

 

 

With customized AR and QR codes on pages, the Blokwat can be integrated with various apps such as Evernote and many others. With the QR code you can do following...

✅ Scan With Your Phone

✅ Connect to Printer via Wifi

✅ Save your notes to File Manager

✅ And much more...

 

 

At the same with Blokwat comes an application, with scan, wireless connection to printer and many other features. Now You’re more productive. With our app you will be able to put your office in your pocket and be always on top of your game.

 

We value our planet and we pay Precise attention to maintenance of our planet. We value the resources of the planet we live on. We understand the seriousness of the product we make and that is why we decided to decrease our ecological footprint by completely shifting to eco-friendly materials.

 

Get an extra product with your Blokwat. Our pencil is made of fully recycled plastic and comes with the special erasable ink. Get it for as much as 5$. Hurry it's limited time offer!

✅ Erasable Ink

✅ Recycled Plastic

✅ Free Shipping!!!

 

MEET Blokwat's own Organizer's set. Set of Sticky notes, tags, sketch notes and index tabs with all the Blokwat's amazing features!  Set of Paper Tags 80 Sheets, Sticky Notes 120 Sheets, Sketch Notes 60Sheets.

 

✅ Completely waterproof and tear resistant 

✅ The cloud based app applicable

✅ It is made of completely recycled materials

✅ FREE SHIPPING

We took our competition seriously and that is why we set the bar to the highest possible standard. With Your help, support and feedback we will be able to get the results we all want and desire. All we need now is Your feedback on our Job.

We have passed through a lot and now finally being able to realize our dream into reality means a whole world to us. There is only one small step ahead, we need Your support and our dream will become a reality. A contribution of any kind will bring us one step closer to our goal. Thank you for making this far and reading till the very end of our Story.
story_txt: Meet Blokwat™| The Line of Hi Tech Notebooks The Blokwat brings 5 amazing features together and creates an ultimately advanced notebook. story:
the Cigar Router   

Developed by entrepreneurs Sean Dixson and Gerald Haessig, the Cigar Router is the solution many cigar lovers have been looking for.  It is the first and only power tool for your cigar that will give you a perfect draw every time and save too-tightly rolled cigars as well.  

An avid cigar fan, Sean proposed the idea of the cigar router to Gerald and they immediately set out to create this innovative product for the cigar industry.

The Cigar Router offers a new way of approaching a cigar.  With virtually no significant technological development in the cigar cutting industry, the Cigar Router brings a patent pending technical advancement that surpasses all current items on the market.

The Cigar Router :  

1) routes out a center core of a cigar

2) creates a better draw  

3) save tightly rolled cigars  

4) you now have a power tool for your cigar -  and who doesn't love a power tool.


What Your Support Will Do

  • We are looking to raise $10,000 to place our first order of materials needed to fabricate the Cigar Router
  • We have a supplier in China that we are sourcing to make component parts
  • We will be assembling the Cigar Router in the USA
  • We will also be using some funds to promote our product at the International Premium Cigar and Pipe Retailers convention in New Orleans.
  • If we do not reach our goal, we will still bring our product to the market.


Choose from 5 Colors

Supporters will be able to choose from 5 different colors for their Cigar Router. Gold, Black, Silver, Red and Blue.



Track Record

This is the first time we are launching a product on Indiegogo but that does not mean we lack experience.  As award winning artists and designers, we have created many quality hand made items that we have sold in our gallery.

The Cigar Router will revolutionize the cigar cutting industry.  With our patent pending technology, we are poised to be take the market by storm and become a world wide brand.


Risks & Challenges

We have been developing the Cigar Router for over a year and are extremely confident and proud of our product.  We have our suppliers lined-up and ready to produce.   Our risks are low  because of preparations taken to bring our product to market.

Supply, manufacturing delays or other unexpected issues beyond our control may occur; this could present us with  our biggest challenges.  If this happens, we will keep you up to date on our  progress and solve any issue ASAP.


Help Us Get The Word Out

We know not everyone smokes a cigar but we would be eternally greatful for your help in getting the word out.  Please share our social media platforms on your favorite platform.  Be sure and use the Indiegogo share tools as well!


Cigar Router on Social Media

story:
Short Summary

  Hello, I'm Shawn Cross. I am a born and raised Alaskan. I grew up racing motocross and snowmachines. Ultimately, I became a Power Lineman with the IBEW. It's been a fun and fast paced life. 
  Throughout my whole life, I have been using gas cans for my hobbies and at work. Eventually, gas can companies were forced to change their designs, due to new safety regulations. Nobody can tolerate these new style cans. They are difficult to use and they pour so slowly. I'm here to change all of that! 
  If you search on google or on youtube "new style gas can", what comes up is a plethora of people ranting, videos on how to modify the new fuel cans, and even where to by the old stye used gas cans, at a high price, that are well beyond the expected life of the product. This is a huge safety issue and it needs to be resolved. 

What We Need & What You Get

  I have dedicated virtually every day of the past four months to get to this point. I didn't have enough time to work as a Power Lineman full-time and expect to take on this task. I put my job aside and have been budgeting on my savings. I eat, sleep, and breath this. Its safe to say I'm obsessed. That was the birth of my company #ONECAN.

  Through countless hours of Research & Development and multiple meetings with designers, manufacturers, attorneys and the EPA, I have come up with a cost of about $200,000 to bring this product to market.

  If the financial goal is not met, then I will use what I have to get as far as It will allow me and take it from there. Where there is a will, there is a way. I have a plan and failure is not a part of it. Its not a matter of if I'm going to bring this product to market, its just a matter of when.  

The Impact

  One out of three people own a fuel can and can relate to the frustrations associated with using it. 100 Million fuel cans are in circulation in the U.S., today, and 17 Million fuel cans are purchased by U.S. consumers each year. While handling 30lbs of a highly flammable substance, its the worst time to be having complications. There are a lot of people having a lot of issues with the new fuel cans, and we need to change it.

  The portable fuel can regulations were put into place to create safer fuel cans. This made fuel cans much more inconvenient to use. This causes consumers to bypass the safety features of the fuel can, making it more dangerous. This entails puncturing holes in the can, removing parts, installing home-made valves or even completely removing the spout to pour directly out of the can.

  By creating this new and innovative fuel can, the world will be a happier and safer place, while refueling their vehicles and toys.

Risks & Challenges

  There are an array of hurdles when tackling such a large task. First of all is protection. There are the "innovators", the "imitators" and the "wannabes". As the innovator, I need to take every precaution possible to keep everything that I've worked so hard to achieve. Therefore I'm taking a very passive-aggressive approach. I make a plan, get everything in place, then strike while the iron is hot and keep striking.

  The designing, manufacturing and marketing are otherwise pretty straight foreword. While maintaining plasticity and being forever vigilant, these obstacles will be overcome. The people who do the difficult tasks are those who can.

Other Ways You Can Help

  Contact us and follow us on hashtagonecan.com. We offer clothing with our brand on it, to help fund the mission. It also allows you to follow our progress throughout the whole process. We will also be found on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.

  It would be much appreciated if you would share, like, blog, tweet, etc. about #ONECAN. Every person makes a huge difference and is much appreciated. 

THANK YOU FOR EVERYTHING!

Shawn Cross

story:
Methodology - What is under the hood?

The name PAIR and all the design decisions that went into our "Goal Oriented Week Planner" comes from a simple formula:

Which really means; what ever you do, start with a solid strategy. After that take the necessary actions to meet your objectives. In the process learn from yourself and once this is all over, restart this process!

All PAIR does, is to provide a playbook to make this happen on a weekly basis. We believe if you can deeply focus on the week ahead of you and truly get the most out of it, week after week... You can achieve your short and long term objectives.

The idea of short, flexible and highly dynamic iteration cycles is at the heart of Agile, Scrum and Lean Development workflows. Companies developed these techniques over the past two decades to make leading products in an environment of constant change.

PAIR takes these methodologies and applies them to our personal lives. We believe, just like companies, these techniques can also be used to help us get the most out of our everyday lives.

What is inside the Box?

40 week bundles! This means a 12 pages (6 sheet) week planner that you can be used standalone and easily carried wherever you go. It is probably the lightest physical planner you can get... which doesn't give up anything from it's rich content.

So What is a PAIR Week Bundle?

Week Bundle is the 12 pages of PAIR that you will be using on a weekly basis. It covers all the pages that make up to a complete week planner and consists of the following sections:

Page Features of a Week Bundle

In the upper section you have seen how the 12 pages PAIR is broken into their sections. But it is the detail of the individual layouts that make PAIR work! Here are each of the layouts in greater detail.

1) Brainstorming & Mind Mapping Area:  Free your mind from remembering things... and set a foundation for setting your goal buckets.

2) Write Your Dates Yourself: Who said we need to start planning from Jan 1st? Peel off a week, name the dates and you are set to go!

 

3) Goal Buckets: are chunks of actionable tasks with their respective value points.

4) Value Points: Serves two purpose 1) Motivate you to start daunting tasks 2) Helps you to see your weekly capacity.

5) Planned Tasks : Which of the tasks can you do today?

10) Unplanned Tasks: We are not living in a cage. We can't plan everything from getgo. So when unplanned tasks occur you write them in this section. (Remember no points for these!)

14) Key Performance Indicators: How many of your Goal buckets did you completely filled. How many points you earned in total and when did you perform the best.

15) Week Reflections: Take some time to reflect on your past week. How did it really go?

16) FlexiCharts: One of the most fun part of PAIR is the Flexicharts. There are no fixed values but only indicators on them.

Size & Dimensions

Product Stage = Production

Shipping

I will be sending PAIR planners without waiting for campaign to end every Friday with Express Airmail. It takes 6 to 10 days to 95% of the world.

*   *   *   *   *

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?
A: The backer is responsible, please check your country's import duties before purchasing. It is 0% in the US and varies internationally. You can check this comprehensive list to get started.

Risks & Challenges

PAIR Project is submitted to Indiegogo in Production stage. If you are able to see this page that means at least we were able to gain the trust of Indiegogo team for our shipment ready PAIR planners. (They look absolutely fabulous by the way!)

In order to cover the worldwide shipping, I partnered with DHL. With their amazing door-to-door service, I believe we are totally covered from that end.

So the only risk at this point seems like, if this project doesn't succeed, I will end up with a house full of PAIR planners :S Even than, that would mean I won't need to print another planner for the rest of my life! (Though your support would be very much appreciated by my wife!)
