story:
Construction of a prototype is not only for technological products, but can also be for various patents and tangible ideas for a variety of forms prior to mass production.

In this way, many entrepreneurs in various fields can take their idea as a prototype to groups of investors and raise money for the project, and create partnerships with production companies and many other useful actions.

In the past, one needed to seek the services of special commercial companies to build a prototype, one with professionals that can interpret your idea, create a graphic design and then print it in three dimensions using a special printer that works with the 3D method for printing the prototype.

Because the costs to print of prototype are considered expensive, in recent years special printers have been developed for professional use by private consumers at prices that meet their needs.

Today, there are three types of 3D printers tailored to the end consumer that can print a prototype for any use, whether it's a manufacturing technology product, patented, electronic device or anything else.

The most popular 3D printer that works on technology is FFF. Although this type of printer is considered new in the market, it is gaining momentum due to the fact that it uses relatively inexpensive materials for production of a prototype. Let's look at what is happening in the market and understand the main problem encountered when printing a prototype with the 3D printer.

Biggest problems with 3D printing

Currently there are bobbins of filament suitable for use in 3D printers. The common denominator among them is that you can use only one end of the filament and need to thread on the head of the printer and work with it to the point where the bobbin ends and a new bobbin needs to be replaced. This sometimes occurs in the middle of the printing process and creates significant economic loss.

The other end of the wire coil is hidden and cannot be accessed in order to make a connection between the two wires to continue the printing operation, creating significant damage and many losses for printers worldwide.

By using the new bobbin of our company, NEXTFILA, you can access the second end of the filament of the bobbin and plug it at any stage of the printing process using a specially developed welder. This is done at minimal cost, thereby ensuring quality work, operation flow and significant savings of time and money.

- wasted remaining filaments

- Vacantly wait until the old filaments to be all consumed to change filaments.

- Printing failure will occur because of shortage of the filament.


These problems will be solved if you can connect the old filament to the new one in advance.

NEXTFILA, the world's first connectable filament.


NEXTFILA is the world's first connectable filament. You can simply connect a new filament to the remaining filament while printing without stopping your 3D printer.


This can be achieved without a highly complex mechanism.

NEXTFILA' filament is wound to our specially-designed bobbin, which makes filaments' connection possible.

You can connect your remaining filaments to the new one using a special filament welder.
After all of remaining filament is consumed, the joint filament will naturally follow through the gap and the new filament will start to be consumed.


Try use a NEXTFILA filament.

It enables you to work with 3D printer using endless filaments, and it is even possible without any printer modification and additional cost.

? You can save your money and save the environment because there is no wastage of filament. You can completely use the filament to the end.

? You can save your time because you can connect a new filament to the remaining filament at any time you want without stopping your printing job.

? You would have no printing failure due to a lack of filament.

You can use all of these advantages just by changing your filament to a NEXTFILA filament without an additional cost.


Product Size

Check the size of a bobbin assembly.Refer to the upper diagram whether you can use NEXTFILA filament to your printer or not.

(The bobbin’s diameter is 200mm(7.87in), and the width across two bobbin assembly is 86mm(3.39in). A filament holder size of your printer has to be bigger than these sizes.)

If the assembly size is bigger than your printer holder, you might need an extra filament holder.

NEXTFILA filaments would be used for a 3D printer that has a bobbin center hole support type holder.
You may need a special holder for a 3D printer that has a bobbin flange support type holder.
If you need a special holder, I recommend this "Universal stand-alone filament spool holder (Fully 3D-printable)" designed by Creative Tools.

If you want more smooth rotating action when you are using the Universal spool holder, use a "bearing type rotating table adapter" (Check our web site nextfila.com)


Filament Welder - E01


A filament welder is needed to use a NEXTFILA filament. Therefore, we have developed a special filament welder. This welder has very simple structure to achieve economic price point. It doesn't have a heater, a temperature sensor, a temperature controller and a power supply.
It is simple and cheap but fully functional.

An automatic temperature controlled welder is also good and convenience but it'll be expensive than this manual welder E01.
Most of normal individual 3D printer users might use less than 5kg of filament per year.
In case of that, the users will use the filament welder within 10 times per year.
So a cheaper welder is better than a expensive welder.

*** Welding tutorial ***


PTFE blocks are consumable parts. We will sell it individually on on-line markets after end of this campaign.

A price of PTFE blocks(without other parts) would be $15~$20.


Development History


The Gwacheon National Science Museum in Republic of Korea


Several types of 3D printed test bobbins

We have proceeded with a connectable filament development acquiring a patent since Oct. 2014 to solve several 3D printing problems.

A shape of a NEXTFILA bobbin was tested using 3D printer with the help of Fablab of the Gwacheon National Science Museum in Republic of Korea and, the design was finalized in Dec. 2015.


There are many size of bolts and nuts(to assemble two of NEXTFILA filaments) STL files in NEXTFILA homepage. Download STL files as your choice and print to use. The shapes of these bolts and nuts are being tested using a 3D printer for many cases.


The NEXTFILA filament can

Save your money,
Save your time,
Save the earth.

In fact, we have built and prepared everything for this project. We designed the new bobbins, used the best filaments and created a perfect kit to offer at lower prices than what is available on the market today.

The only thing hindering the process is mass production to consumers around the world and for that we need $ 10,000 to complete the entire project.

This amount will give us the possibility for mass production as a first step and a massive marketing worldwide as a second step.

Packages & Perks

* We will ask your colors of choice at the end of the campaign


*** If the campaign goal is exceeded, we will send additional 1kg(2.2lb) white PLA filament for every contributors who get PLA 4kg,Welder Packs or PLA 5kg Packs.(only during campaign, not InDemand) ***

* ABS packs were removed because of less demand - 30.Mar.2016










NEXTFILA - ABS, PLA, Welder Pack :   ABS 1kg(2.2lb) X 2 ,  PLA 1kg(2.2lb) X 2 ,  Welder E01 X 1 


NEXTFILA - ABS, Welder Pack :   ABS 1kg(2.2lb) X 4 , Welder E01 X 1 


NEXTFILA - ABS filament :   ABS 1kg(2.2lb) X 5


* Two of 500g(1.1lb)/box, Each 500g is individually vacuum vinyl packed with a desicant. You can select 4 colors for filament/welder pack, 5 colors for filament-only pack.

* Selectable Colors :  1.Natural  2.White  3.Black  4.Gray  5.Red  6.Blue  7.Yellow  8.Green  9.Orange  10.Gold

Development & Production Schedule


Risks & Challenges

We had done all the tests on a bobbin shape, a welder, bolts, and nuts and will upload design files of these(a bobbin, a welder, a bolt&nut,a holder) to an open source project. (GitHub : https://github.com/nextfila/connectable-filament)
We also have already ordered a bobbin mold.
Your fund will be used to produce our first mass production.
Future Plans (after INDIEGOGO funding is finished) : 
  • Develop a connectable bobbin for a 1kg (2.2lb) filament.
  • Develop a special purpose filament material with the Korea Research Institute of Chemical Technology; one of Korea's government funded research centers.
  • Develop an automatic filament welder
  • Develop a bobbin holder for a NEXTFILA filament

FAQ

  • Why 500g(1.1lb) filament is wound in a bobbin?
    * Reason #1 - To use for more commercialized3D printers. A size of two 500g NEXTFILAfilament assembly is almost the same as a 1kg filament.
    * Reason #2 - Most filaments (especially for a PLA) absorb humidity in the air. Therefore, its printing quality will get lower and lower as time goes by starting with opening a vinyl pack. A 500g filament has shorter air exposure time than a 1kg filament.
    NEXTFILA’s 1kg filament box has two of 500g filaments that is individually vacuum vinyl packed with a desiccant.

  • Do you sell a welder only?
    We don't sell a welder E01 only. If you want to buy the welder, please choose one of a welder packs.

  • Explain about your filament material(ABS,PLA).
    We had tested on filaments from more than 10 OEM companies and had carefully selected the best filament materials with high quality.
    NEXTFILA's ABS, PLA filaments are ROHS certified and have a good printing quality.

  • Will you sell welder parts individually?
    A PTFE block is a consumable part. We will sell the welder parts in our web site  after first main delivery finished.

  • Is there a filament except ABS, PLA in your product category?
    We are working on adding several kinds of filaments in our production category in the future.

  • Yes, I see a NEXTFILA filament can connect two filaments together. But how can I connect a third filament?
    You can connect a third filament to a second filament after removing a first empty filament bobbin from a bolt(that is used to assemble two filaments together). You can connect 4th, 5th and more filaments like this way.

  • This campaign is "flexible funding". What happens to my money?
    Don't worry about that. I have money to produce filaments for your orders.
    A main purpose of this campaign is for finding out customer needs before entering an online markets.

  • You have less filament colors.
    Sorry for that. This is a very early stage of the connectable filament business. Several filament colors will be added gradually.

  • Heating the welder with two gas lighters seems awkward and unreliable.
    Yes. The manual welder might be inconvenience. I had been concerned about that. Which welder type might be better to individual users?
    A manual type? or an automatic temperature controlled type?
    A manual type is cheap but awkward and inconvenience, an automatic temperature controlled type is easy to use and reliable but expensive.
    An individual users might use 3~5kg filaments per year and this means, they might use a filament welder less than 10 times per year. So I decided a manual welder would be launched first, an automatic welder after that.
    An automatic temperature controlled welder will be launched sooner or later.

  • Why a title of this campaign is a "connectable filament" not a "connectable filament spool"?
    Yes, right.
    My idea is based on a "connectable bobbin". But if I sell a bobbin itself, users have to wind their stock filament to the "connectable bobbin". This work is not  easy. So I decided to sell a "filament wound connectable bobbin".
    This is the reason why I set a campaign title as "the connectable 3D printer filament" not "the connectable 3D printer filament spool".

Please visit NEXTFILA site for more information :  
nextfila.com

World's first connectable 3D printer flament
story_txt:
Construction of a prototype is not only for technological products,
but can also be for various patents and tangible ideas for a variety of forms
prior to mass production.
In this way, many entrepreneurs in various fields can take their
idea as a prototype to groups of investors and raise money for the project, and
create partnerships with production companies and many other useful actions.
In the past, one needed to seek the services of special commercial
companies to build a prototype, one with professionals that can interpret your
idea, create a graphic design and then print it in three dimensions using a
special printer that works with the 3D method for printing the prototype.
Because the costs to print of prototype are considered expensive, in
recent years special printers have been developed for professional use by
private consumers at prices that meet their needs.
Today, there are three types of 3D printers tailored to the end
consumer that can print a prototype for any use, whether it's a manufacturing
technology product, patented, electronic device or anything else.


The most popular 3D printer that works on
technology is FFF. Although this type of printer is considered new in the
market, it is gaining momentum due to the fact that it uses relatively
inexpensive materials for production of a prototype. Let's look at what is
happening in the market and understand the main problem encountered when
printing a prototype with the 3D printer.Biggest problems with 3D printing


Currently there are bobbins of filament suitable for use in 3D
printers. The common denominator among them is that you can use only one end of
the filament and need to thread on the head of the printer and work with it to
the point where the bobbin ends and a new bobbin needs to be replaced. This
sometimes occurs in the middle of the printing process and creates significant
economic loss.
The other end of the wire coil is hidden and cannot be accessed in
order to make a connection between the two wires to continue the printing
operation, creating significant damage and many losses for printers worldwide.
By using the new bobbin of our company, NEXTFILA, you can access the
second end of the filament of the bobbin and plug it at any stage of the
printing process using a specially developed welder. This is done at minimal
cost, thereby ensuring quality work, operation flow and significant savings of
time and money.- wasted remaining filaments
- Vacantly wait until the old filaments to be all consumed to change filaments.

- Printing failure will occur because of shortage of the filament.

These problems will be solved if you can connect the old filament to the new one in advance.
NEXTFILA, the world's first connectable filament.




NEXTFILA is the world's first connectable filament. You can simply connect a
new filament to the remaining filament while printing without stopping your 3D
printer.







This can be achieved
without a highly complex mechanism.
NEXTFILA' filament is wound to our specially-designed bobbin, which makes filaments' connection
possible.


You can connect your remaining filaments to the new one using a special filament welder.After all of remaining
filament is consumed, the joint filament will naturally follow through the gap
and the new filament will start to be consumed.


Try use a NEXTFILA filament.
It enables you to work
with 3D printer using endless filaments, and it is even possible without any
printer modification and additional cost.
? You can save your money
and save the environment because there is no wastage of filament. You can completely use
the filament to the end.
? You can save your time
because you can connect a new filament to the remaining filament at any time you
want without stopping your printing job.
? You would have no
printing failure due to a lack of filament.
You can use all of these advantages just by changing your filament to a NEXTFILA filament without an additional cost.


Product Size

Check the size of a
bobbin assembly.Refer to the upper diagram whether you can use NEXTFILA
filament to your printer or not.
(The bobbin’s diameter
is 200mm(7.87in), and the width across two bobbin assembly is 86mm(3.39in). A
filament holder size of your printer has to be bigger than these sizes.)
If the assembly size is
bigger than your printer holder, you might need an extra filament holder.
NEXTFILA filaments would be used for a 3D printer that has a bobbin center hole support type holder.You may need a special holder for a 3D printer that has a bobbin flange support type holder.If you need a special holder, I recommend this "Universal stand-alone filament spool holder (Fully 3D-printable)" designed by Creative Tools.

If you want more smooth rotating action when you are using the Universal spool holder, use a "bearing type rotating table adapter" (Check our web site nextfila.com)

Filament Welder - E01



A filament welder is
needed to use a NEXTFILA filament. Therefore, we have developed a special filament
welder. This welder has very simple structure to achieve economic price point.
It doesn't have a heater, a temperature sensor, a temperature controller and a
power supply.It is simple and cheap but fully functional.
An automatic temperature controlled welder is also good and convenience but it'll be expensive than this manual welder E01.Most of normal individual 3D printer users might use less than 5kg of filament per year.In case of that, the users will use the filament welder within 10 times per year.So a cheaper welder is better than a expensive welder.
*** Welding tutorial ***
PTFE blocks are consumable parts. We will sell it individually on on-line markets after end of this campaign.
A price of PTFE blocks(without other parts) would be $15~$20.


Development History

The Gwacheon National Science Museum in Republic of Korea
Several types of 3D printed test bobbins



We have proceeded with a
connectable filament development acquiring a patent since Oct. 2014 to solve
several 3D printing problems.
A shape of a NEXTFILA
bobbin was tested using 3D printer with the help of Fablab of the Gwacheon
National Science Museum in Republic of Korea and, the design was finalized in
Dec. 2015.

There are many size of bolts and nuts(to assemble two of NEXTFILA filaments) STL files in NEXTFILA homepage. Download STL files as your choice and print to use. The shapes of these bolts and nuts are being tested using a 3D printer for many cases.
The NEXTFILA filament can


Save your money,Save your time,Save the earth.


In fact, we have built and prepared everything for this project. We
designed the new bobbins, used the best filaments and created a perfect kit to
offer at lower prices than what is available on the market today. 
The only thing hindering the process is mass production to consumers
around the world and for that we need $ 10,000 to complete the entire project.

This amount will give us the possibility for mass
production as a first step and a massive marketing worldwide as a second step.

Packages & Perks

* We will ask your colors of choice at the end of the campaign*** If the campaign goal is exceeded, we will send additional 1kg(2.2lb) white PLA filament for every contributors who get PLA 4kg,Welder Packs or PLA 5kg Packs.(only during campaign, not InDemand) ***
* ABS packs were removed because of less demand - 30.Mar.2016





NEXTFILA - ABS, PLA, Welder Pack :   ABS 1kg(2.2lb) X 2 ,  PLA 1kg(2.2lb) X 2 ,  Welder E01 X 1 

NEXTFILA - ABS, Welder Pack :   ABS 1kg(2.2lb) X 4 , Welder E01 X 1 

NEXTFILA - ABS filament :   ABS 1kg(2.2lb) X 5

* Two of 500g(1.1lb)/box, Each 500g is individually vacuum vinyl packed with a desicant. You can select 4 colors for filament/welder pack, 5 colors for filament-only pack.


* Selectable Colors :  1.Natural  2.White  3.Black  4.Gray  5.Red  6.Blue  7.Yellow  8.Green  9.Orange  10.Gold

Development & Production Schedule

tests on a bobbin shape, a welder, bolts, and nuts and will upload design files of these(a bobbin, a welder, a bolt&nut,a holder) to an open source project. (GitHub : https://github.com/nextfila/connectable-filament)

story:
The paper that just became core to your digital life. Read, Write, Sketch and even Type with the power of the internet on digital paper

We love Paper. But in Today's world, it has many limitations. nextPaper is Paper with the power of the internet and the connected world. It is an evolution of what we love about paper and fused together with what we love about the internet. It allows us to read, write, sketch, share and even type on a Paper like environment (meaning it's so easy to read on) with digital powers that unlock the true potential of what Paper should be in today's connected world.

We have been using paper for centuries, since the time when it was introduced on the bank of the river nile, Papyrus. Since then there has not been much change on how paper can be used. In fact, not many people use it in today's connected world. People would rather use their laptops and iPad to read, write, learn, design or innovate - they have no choice! It’s time for a revolution. Companion brings you nextPaper, the evolution of paper.

formatted for your reading pleasure.

why print? Send it to the nextPaper and read it instantly!

nextPaper is a great way to get more reading in your life. Because its so easy and fun to read on this device, consuming textual information is addictive. So much amazing content live online and for so many people, reading it on an LCD discourages them from reading on and continuing a laborious almost chore-like behaviour . Not only is it distracting with the Ads and unnecessary clutter around the article or content, for many people it’s also hard on their eyes. By sending it to the nextPaper, reading is now fun, easy on the eyes and formatted how it was meant to be read! - Like Paper! No ads, just the content and formatted just the way it should be. We found that we were reading a lot more while using the nextPaper. It just seems so natural to pick it up, and read on. No distractions, no clutter - just information ready to be consumed.

nextPaper runs on Android, giving you all the popular e-book apps in the Google Play store. Whether the e-book was formatted for Kindle, Nook or Kobo and many more, they all run on the nextPaper’s beautiful Paper like display. And E Books are just the tip of the iceberg... 

Write and Sketch with ease and Share instantly using existing services like google, dropbox and more!  

We did not stop until input lag was comfortable enough to feel like writing on paper. You should feel right at home as soon as you pickup your nextPaper Pen.  

nextPaper is Familiar - It is running Android

nextPaper allows you to quickly jot down notes, with built-in templates such as grid lines, margins and line spacing, familiarity remains the main theme with nextPaper. We want you to pick it up and be right at home with using its features. Just like paper, we don't need a manual or an instructions booklet on how to use it. It just works!

nextPaper is using Android. And as such, there are already thousand of familiar apps and services in the Android eco-system. Download over 100,000 apps already existing from the playstore. And nextPaper formats them to look beautiful on the e ink display.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need your support to make this happen.

  • In order to meet the price of $280USD or below we will need to meet at least 1000 people to put their hands up and pledge a nextPaper device. This will ensure we have the $280,000 minimum goal to purchase each device and start the manufacuring process.
  • With this you will recieve the ready made product and be the first to utilize such an amazing tool you will soon find you cannot live wtihout.
  • The funds will go into development and manufacturing of the Product nothing more. We will focus our spending money on the product itself and not on marketing.

The Impact

You will be directly responsible for launching this product :

  • This product could change the way we see e ink devices. No more will they be in a closed system and the ability to share content and consume the world's information on a device more suited for reading will be accessible and open for all.
  • This is not out first product. Companion Ink 1 was considered a success to closed groups of people testing and re-testing the concept. It is so valuable we decided to make it even better! But this time we want to make sure its accesible to as many people as possible. hence why we need 1000 units in order to get it down to this price!

Risks & Challenges

Even though we have planned this launch to a TEE for almost 12 months since Companion Ink 1, we understand that just like any other projects we have done in the past, there can be some unforeseen circumstances that could be a potential risk to both the launch date and the execution of turning this into the device we all dream of having.

THE PARTS: 

The right PCB and the E Ink screen combination are not an easy task to marry up. It needs careful engineering and the right parts to get it right. Although our prototypes are great so far, we want to make it even better, even faster, and even more awesome to meet the standards of our backers and our supporters. Everyone is counting on this idea to be able to free the e-reader and finally innovate the E Ink space with what's important to all of us. We will not take this lightly. We feel really passionate about bringing a device that everyone will love and reading is one of our passions and believe everyone should be able to read anything in an E Ink screen un-chained and in an open environment. This means we need to get the best parts from the right suppliers. The best support and the best factory to produce it for us. This also means someone from Companion needs to stay wherever the factory is located and oversee production to make sure every little detail is met - whilst also reporting back to the community.

LOGISTICS:

To meet our shipping dates we need to develop a good relationship to both our suppliers and our manufacturers. Money makes the world go round as they say, so we need to meet their minimum order quantity once we have the parts list and our build requirement. Money is always an issue and a potential problem, so we have to be VERY careful where we spend it. We need to be frugal at certain points but also be able to splurge when it comes to others. We need the right balance of strategy and poise to make sure the Companion Ink has the best opportunity when it is born into this world.

Companion has always been about openness, and we thrive when we help each other out. This is something we can all discuss freely to make sure we get the BEST possible product at the most efficient capital that we manage to raise. With all hands on deck I have no doubt we can turn this into a pretty cool and very useful gadget.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways you can spread the news.

  • Please share this campaign and spread the word to people who may be interested in this device. People who love to read, who love e ink screens and who love paper! Please tell me about this as im sure they will love it!
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Other Ways You Can Help
There are many ways you can spread the news.

Please share this campaign and spread the word to people who may be interested in this device. People who love to read, who love e ink screens and who love paper! Please tell me about this as im sure they will love it!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
TechStop

On-demand tech services at your finger tips

Facebook                  Twitter                  Website

Short Summary

Having worked as an IT Support Specialist for a few years, I've gained a reputation for delivering amazing technical support within several large and successful businesses. However, I noticed that the quality of IT service that exists in business is not offered to personal technology owners at home.

Technology is hugely important to our every day lives and great support should always be available. I founded TechStop to bring that better quality of IT support from the office and into your homes at affordable rates while empowering technology professionals to make additional cash for providing that service.

HOW IT WORKS

Get help in 3 easy steps

 

Easy communication with your TechPro.

TechStop saves the user time and money and guarantees them dedicated tech services without the travel, long waits, painful phone calls or high fees, all while enabling technology professionals to earn their own additional cash.

Meet TechStop

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to have a fully functional beta app, a small support team and beta customers and beta tech freelancers to use the app for a 6 month trial run starting in February 2018. We're seeking $150,000 to invest into Phase 2 of our 7 Phase Growth Plan.

Your Pledge Will Allow Us To Do The Following

  • Pay a professional App Development Team to build a working beta app.
  • Invest into 10 months worth of Quickbooks Online Simple Startup, office in a coworking space, cloud hosting and background checks for technology professionals through goodhire.com.
  • Cover fees for legal services that may be sought during Phase 2.
  • Invest into online marketing to grow our online following and boost visibility

Rewards

  • Perks include a 10%, 15%, 20% and 25% Promo Code. After the release of the official version, users can apply the codes to their account which will automatically discount them for any ticket they submit for 6 months.
  • Have your name added to a Thank You list on our website and within the app.
  • Claim the Beta Tester Perk to become a customer beta tester for the 6 month trial and provide feedback on the product to help us improve it for the official version.
  • Donate to support the Fair Repair movement, which empowers people to fix, or pay to have fixed, their own electronics without having to rely on the manufacturers or pay their high fees.

Risks And Challenges

Our biggest immediate challenge is the development of the beta app. Reginald, our founder, is not an app developer but designed the overall look and function of the prototype using marvelapp.com's canvas tools. A professional App Development team would need to build the beta and final product. Currently a one man team, Reginald seeks to hire additional team members to help him take his startup to the next level.

CLICK HERE TO VIEW PROTOTYPE

Additional Challenges

  • To ensure the security of our users and their technology, TechPro's signing up to use the app must agree to background checks through Goodhire.com.
  • Prior to the release of the beta app, an additional IT Specialist with experience managing a a helpdesk will be sought to help create the support structure, back end support model and screening process for freelance TechPros.
  • We'll also seek to educate users through the app by offering tips and tricks to managing their own devices and protect themselves.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign and follow us on Facebook and Twitter @techstopapp. Your support of this campaign is the first step in bringing affordable and reliable tech support to your city. You'll also be supporting technology professionals in your city.

THANK YOU!
story_txt:
TechStopOn-demand tech services at your finger tipsFacebook                  Twitter                  WebsiteShort SummaryHaving worked as an IT Support Specialist for a few years, I've gained a reputation for delivering amazing technical support within several large and successful businesses. However, I noticed that the quality of IT service that exists in business is not offered to personal technology owners at home.Technology is hugely important to our every day lives and great support should always be available. I founded TechStop to bring that better quality of IT support from the office and into your homes at affordable rates while empowering technology professionals to make additional cash for providing that service.HOW IT WORKSGet help in 3 easy steps Easy communication with your TechPro.TechStop saves the user time and money and guarantees them dedicated tech services without the travel, long waits, painful phone calls or high fees, all while enabling technology professionals to earn their own additional cash.Meet TechStopWhat We Need & What You GetOur goal is to have a fully functional beta app, a small support team and beta customers and beta tech freelancers to use the app for a 6 month trial run starting in February 2018. We're seeking $150,000 to invest into Phase 2 of our 7 Phase Growth Plan.Your Pledge Will Allow Us To Do The Following
Pay a professional App Development Team to build a working beta app.
Invest into 10 months worth of Quickbooks Online Simple Startup, office in a coworking space, cloud hosting and background checks for technology professionals through goodhire.com.
Cover fees for legal services that may be sought during Phase 2.
Invest into online marketing to grow our online following and boost visibility
Rewards
Perks include a 10%, 15%, 20% and 25% Promo Code. After the release of the official version, users can apply the codes to their account which will automatically discount them for any ticket they submit for 6 months.
Have your name added to a Thank You list on our website and within the app.
Claim the Beta Tester Perk to become a customer beta tester for the 6 month trial and provide feedback on the product to help us improve it for the official version.
Donate to support the Fair Repair movement, which empowers people to fix, or pay to have fixed, their own electronics without having to rely on the manufacturers or pay their high fees.
Risks And ChallengesOur biggest immediate challenge is the development of the beta app. Reginald, our founder, is not an app developer but designed the overall look and function of the prototype using marvelapp.com's canvas tools. A professional App Development team would need to build the beta and final product. Currently a one man team, Reginald seeks to hire additional team members to help him take his startup to the next level.CLICK HERE TO VIEW PROTOTYPEAdditional Challenges
To ensure the security of our users and their technology, TechPro's signing up to use the app must agree to background checks through Goodhire.com.
Prior to the release of the beta app, an additional IT Specialist with experience managing a a helpdesk will be sought to help create the support structure, back end support model and screening process for freelance TechPros.
We'll also seek to educate users through the app by offering tips and tricks to managing their own devices and protect themselves.
Other Ways You Can HelpPlease share this campaign and follow us on Facebook and Twitter @techstopapp. Your support of this campaign is the first step in bringing affordable and reliable tech support to your city. You'll also be supporting technology professionals in your city.THANK YOU!

story:
"Newspapers serve local communities full of everyday people. Everyday people in local communities should be reliable ad buyers on their local newspaper website. They're not." 

Let's Impact an Industry!

Hello I'm Rod Harris, founder of AdModX; launched Feb. 2017 to help newspaper websites make everyday people part of their ad strategy — new model, new ads, new buyers. (My Linkedin) Right now it's newspapers, but the opportunity for spin-offs in other industries is huge — conferences / conventions, real estate, galleries / museums, bereavement, direct sales, etc.

▷ Connect add-on to paper's site... paper sells next-level ads to community.

I'm a newspaper junkie! It's how I learned to read as a child... I remember the feel of the paper, its smell, and the enormous rush from the knowledge it held.

My 20+ years in the industry confirms... One of the biggest challenges newspapers face is generating revenue in the move from print to digital.

The Issue...

In simplest terms, the standard for online advertising is some form of banner/pop-up ad with cost-per-"something" pricing driven by analytics.

The standard for online advertising leaves a sizable, untapped market of less savvy ad buyers out of the ad mix. Everyday people with everyday businesses in newspaper communities all over are not buying online ads:

  • Everyday people aren't interested in cost-per-click, cost-per-thousand, or a lot of analytics
  • Everyday people are skeptical about the pricing model — one more way to take their money
  • Everyday people want to know a price; and know what they get for that price... no guessing

Our Response...

AdModX Community AdHub!... Web Ads for Newspapers from Their Community

▷ CLICK IMAGE! AdHubs do two things: 1) Display ads from people in the community so others in the community can come see and share them; and 2) Let the community buy 3 types of ads online, on the paper's site — Business Ad, House-for-Sale Ad, and Event Ad. (our $200 Perk)

Our AdHub solution turns everyday people into ad buyers on their local paper's website. The model is about sharing and flat-rate pricing — no cost-per-"anything" or heavy dose of analytics. It's another piece of the puzzle:

  • Newspaper sites deliver new ads that look better, do more, and cost less
  • Newspaper sites become a gateway for seeing, sharing, and buying ads
  • Newspaper sites fill a void in their community that's a win for all involved

HOW IT WORKS: (1) Papers sign up and pay 1-time setup fee... token monthly fee due only in months paper does not sell ads. (2) We apply paper's brand; send link; paper puts link in their site menu. (3) Now everybody does their job.

▷ The AdHub (right) is a universal web add-on branded like the newspaper site it's linked to.

  • Paper's Job! Tell community about new AdHub. Tell them ads cost $85 and run 30 days (from 1st of each month). Tell them to select & buy ads on your AdHub. Tell them all they need is text and 1 photo. Tell them everyday.
  • Community's Job! Meet up at the paper's AdHub. See ads from people in their community. Share ads for people in their community. And buy their own ads so others can see & share them. All on the paper's site.
  • Our Job! Manage AdHub activities. Process payments. Fullfill ad orders. Post newly sold ads (1st of each month). Increase ad selection for ordering. Distribute paper's 70% of monthly ad sales at end of each month.

ADHUB ADS: The x-factor is the ads... a novel mix of design, function, and value targeting low-end budgets. Select from 3 types — Business Ad, House-for-Sale Ad, and Event Ad. Complete order form and pay... we do the rest.

▷ CLICK IMAGE! Sample Order Form: Ad buyers submit text... 1 photo... and pay. Simple!

  • Ads Look Better. They come to life with whiz-bang visual effects
  • Ads Perform Better. They expand reach (exposure) via social media sharing
  • Ads Sell Better. They cost less than standard web ads, yet over-deliver

▷ CLICK IMAGE! Business Ads (like all ads) click to ad buyer's website. (our $75 Perk)

▷ CLICK IMAGE! House-for-Sale Ads (like all ads) click to paper's website.

▷ CLICK IMAGE! Event Ads (like all ads) live on paper's site, get shared all over.

MARKET ENTRY: Our debut market? African-American newspapers — a niche of about 200 papers nationwide we covet for their collective need and interest.

  • Need? Most papers are (to some degree) underfunded, understaffed, or under-equipped... African-American papers, even more so
  • Interest? Most papers are playing catch-up, eager to leverage their news brand in digital... African-American papers, even more so

▷ CLICK IMAGE! Fully-operational... just click "AdHub" in the paper's site menu.

Industry Impact

Progress!!!... AdModX broadens the market of potential advertisers for newspaper websites; which broadens the margin for their advertising success:

  • More Revenue. Income from a previously non-existent market of ad buyers. Papers leverage low out-of-pocket costs and established credibility.
  • More Exposure. All ads display their paper's logo... seen by more people in more places more often; everywhere papers' ads are shared and seen.
  • More Traffic. AdHubs are destinations for community engagement on newspaper websites where ad buyers urge friends to go help share their ad.

▷ CLICK IMAGE! Sharing Tips (in AdHub) take the guesswork out of sharing.

AdModX Needs Your Help…  

Your generosity will position us to onboard 100 newspapers by the end of 2017. The funds will be used to acquire third-party automation and additional software seat licenses to streamline order fulfillment from about 90% manual... down to 50% or less. Increased productivity means increased capacity to satisfy a higher volume of ad orders in less time — i.e., more newspaper clients sooner. Remaining funds will be used to target select newspaper gatherings to maximize our exposure to potential users.

Stretch Goals! Funds beyond our goal will go first to commissioning new ad designs; then to obtaining more advanced ad hosting for next-level playback and delivery; and finally to facilitating development and implementation of spin-off solutions in other industries — conferences / conventions, real estate, galleries / museums, bereavement, direct sales, etc.

Risks and challenges

The risks for this project are low. We've launched and are fully-operational with newspapers already signed on. As stated, our biggest challenge is productivity; for which successful project funding will be key to improving. Then, we can aggressively pursue our goals.

"Impacting an industry is no small feat. But... industrious, small feats are how impacts always begin. Let's impact an industry!"

story:
INTRODUCING //SKID

Hello world, I am //SKID, LIGNUMs first wooden chef knife that is exclusively available here on INDIEGOGO.

//SKID is the result of our idea to realize ecologically sustainable products without a compromise in functionality. It took us nearly two years to create this unique wooden chef knife: the perfect synergy between cutting-edge steel and sustainable wood with exceptional durability.

 

hardwood + oil-wax infiltrated + finest steel + seamless design = durable

 

WHAT WE NEED

//SKID is ready for production. What we need: SUPPORT for building up our new workshop with CNC and sanding machines and for paying our helping hands for manufacturing. We successful passed all the steps of the product development process. 258 Backers from Kickstarter are already waiting for their individual Chef Knife.

 

SHARP WITHOUT COMPROMISES

The blade of //SKID light and dark contains high alloyed carbon steel (1,3503). Alloyed by a high amount of chrome and tungsten we reach a hardness around 59 - 61 HRC. Traditional Japanese blacksmith use this kind of steel to create the sharpest knifes in the world. We are using a self-developed technique to connect wood and steel. The result: a food safe, durable and seamless connection.

 

WHAT CHEFS ARE SAYING

We build a lot of prototypes, tested our chef knife in every manner: Professional Chefs used //SKID in their kitchens, a lot of friends that are cooking enthusiasts used it more than usual in their home kitchens.

 

THE TALK

 

SPECS

 

DURABILITY

Every //SKID is vacuum infiltrated with a special mixture of oil and wax to close the pores and to make the chef knife food safe. With this combination of wood and finishing we keep up the ability of self-cleaning and antibacterial properties of tannin. With the closed pores, //SKID is not getting porous and can't contain germs.

oil infiltrated + hardwood + antibacterial + seamless

 

TESTINGS

"Test Stand"

 
 

 PERKS

 

//SKID - EDITIONS

from €189

 

LIGNUM BOARD

€129

LIGNUM Board made of Walnut or Robinia wood 
Dimensions: 
(cm) 54 x 35 x 3.5
(inch) 21.26 x 13.78 x 1.18

 

BEHIND THE SCENES

During our studies we were asked to rethink a product of everyday use. Our professor presented us to the idea of wooden scissors - unfortunately that hasn’t worked out so far, sorry for that Prof.

However, cutting with wood - the idea captured us. Since then we couldn’t stop thinking about creating a wooden knife but remained sceptical about the viability of the project. We then experimented with various kinds of wood, combinations with different materials and 3D printing with woodfill.

The result: A wooden body combined with a very thin blade of steel. More precise: 97% Robinia wood and 3% high alloyed carbon steel making a familiar handling and cutting experience for all daily purposes in the kitchen.

 

WHY IS //SKID SUSTAINABLE?

A conventional chef knife produces 2133 gram of carbon dioxide. //SKID just produces around 67. With the same energy you need for one steel chef knife, we can create 32 //SKIDs. Furthermore we are planting trees for our knives and even use the off cut for packaging and holding systems.

With every produced //SKID we plant a new tree

 

THE BENEFITS OF HARDWOOD

antibacterial + durable + lightweight + renewable resource

 

Wood has many great characteristics: Robinia and Walnut, the woods of our choice have a very high percentage of tannin. Tannin is the stuff that kills bacteria and gives wood the ability of self-cleaning. Consequently, all you need for cleaning your //SKID is warm water. On top it is durable and lightweight, harder than oak and a renewable resource.

no dishwasher + no chemical cleaner = just water!

 

THE TEAM

Sven, Michael, James, Peter

We are a group of engineers, designers, computer scientists and blacksmiths. Together we form a team with an extended set of skills and expertise. 

 

Risks and Challenges

We already have fully established relationships with our suppliers and manufacturers in Germany. 
All //SKIDs and Cutting Boards are manufactured by ourselfs and our partners and 100% made in Germany - even our CNC machines are made here.
Unexpected hiccups can happen along the way. If so, we’ll be open and upfront. We know how important transparency is and we commit to always keeping you in the loop about the status of our campaign.

story:
Vuwable makes live streaming easy and allows individuals, groups, and organizations to stream to their own websites AND social media at the same time -- even host a permanent live stream channel on your website. Invite others to stream with you with the click of a button, so interviews are a breeze. Truly have ownership over your content by archiving your streams in the cloud or on your own desktop. Users can even do post-edits to their recorded streams, for further posting as video memes or other messaging purposes. Vuwable makes live streaming powerful and simple.

The idea for Vuwable came about when Tatsu first started live streaming about a year ago, but found it almost impossible to get his broadcast out to multiple platforms simultaneously. To do so, he had to fidget with two laptops, three cell phones, and restreaming software for every live stream! Worse -- he was frustrated with not having real ownership of the videos he created. He was also not thrilled with users’ information being sold to advertisers and videos constantly facing threats of being censored or de-monetized.

Join us in making the vision of a truly open live streaming platform that solves all the major issues with current broadcasting options, allowing individuals, businesses, and organizations the potential to reach as many viewers around the world as possible, come true!

What We Need & What You Get

The Vuwable prototype has been built. We just need your support to hire some awesome engineers and complete the backend development of the web app. Join us in creating a fully open and accessible live streaming platform, and be rewarded with the cool perks we’ve got for you, PLUS a first access invitation to take Vuwable for a test drive!

The Impact

Change the future of live streaming with Vuwable, to reach a wider audience with ease and free ourselves from censorship.

Features and Functions

Vuwable is the ultimate all-in-one live streaming web platform. Utilize the powerful built-in functions to tailor your broadcast to your target audience.

Live stream modes
​Stream solo or with up to three friends. Conduct interviews with ease directly from Vuwable instead of fidgeting with third party apps.


 

Multiple Destinations
Link your social media networks to Vuwable, set the destinations of your broadcast to stream to multiple platforms simultaneously, and reach the widest audience possible. You can even host a permanent live stream page on your personal website using Vuwable’s embed feature.

 

 

Contacts Organizer
Import your contacts from your linked social media accounts, sort them into groups, and have to option to do private streams to these groups.


 

Video Editor
Edit your videos with our in browser video editor. Trim, splice, add a logo, make a meme -- it’s all easy to use in one place.

 

 

Video Archive
Your videos will automatically save to the Vuwable cloud after your broadcast where you can keep them organized, edit, download to, or upload from your hard drive.

 

 

Change Log
Keep track of when you made a video edit, deletion, downloads, or upload.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help!
Share our campaign with your friends and family, link us on your social media pages, and help us make some noise!

story:
Content Launch is the first complete content marketing software built for marketing agencies and small and medium sized businesses (SMB’s).

Cloud based and intuitive, the application enables you to plan, create, distribute and measure any type of content, helping you to connect with your online audience and positively impact engagement and sales.

It provides dynamic, web based editorial calendars, complete workflow tools, distribution to ten integrated platforms and the ability to connect with industry influencers to amplify your content.

ContentLaunch also offers content writers to assist with creating compelling content for your target market. 

TECHNOLOGY   

Content Launch brings content marketing software to the masses with a complete content platform that fits any budget. In addition:

•A tool for ALL areas of the content lifecycle: content planning, content creation, content distribution and content measurement

•Best and easiest user interface of any content tool in the industry 

•Custom in app tools (Content Score & Content Prescription)....Content Prescription is an industry first. and our Content Score is the easiest content performance tool in the industry.

•Provides the highest quality, most affordable content writers and journalists of any industry tool (all writers are certified and U.S. based)

•THE definitive SMB/small agency content marketing platform of record in the industry

•Most affordable content tool in the industry

•Multi-tenant agency version...agencies can create client accounts in their parent account

•Aggregation of best in class CM tools in a singular platform (Content topic generator, Content curation, Influencer search, Writing Marketplace)

•Only content tool with a full freemium version

•Planned AI/VR Content toolset: Both through partnerships & custom development (Through aggregation, we will rapidly source & include future marketing tools) \

•Planned New Modules: Amplify (for Paid Tools integration like Outbrain) and Measure (Full content analytics)

Jon Wuebben is a content marketing industry thought leader. His book, “Content is Currency: Developing Powerful Content for Web & Mobile”, has helped thousands of companies learn how to plan, create, distribute and manage content. Jon has spoken at Content Marketing World, Online Marketing Summit, South by Southwest (SXSW), Marketing Profs B2B Forum, Search Marketing Expo (SMX), Social Media Marketing World and many other events. He is also the author of "Future Marketing: Winning in the Prosumer Age" and "Content Rich: Writing Your Way to Wealth on the Web".

WHY WE'RE DOING THIS

Content Launch has been in the content writing space for 14 years. With 300 writers on our team, we have written for over 500 companies and 200 agencies. But content marketing has been miscommunicated to small and medium sized businesses. The education of content marketing and a discussion on how it can replace and improve upon current advertising approaches has also been sorely lacking. Fact: There has been no content marketing tool designed for small marketing agencies, solopreneurs and other small companies. Now there is.

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

We'd like to raise $25K to help us get the word out to all of the small agencies and other small businesses out there. We'll do email campaigns, social media promotions and more. We've bootstrapped and had some angel investment, but have not received any venture capital money. 

What can we offer you? 

  • Free subscription to our content marketing platform ($2400 value)
  • Co-marketing to our database for your offer or service (10K folks in our database)
  • I'll come speak at your event for free - any topic in the area of marketing, entrepreneurship or starting a small business
  • I'll provide you with free content marketing and content strategy consultation for your business
  • We'll provide you with steeply discounted content for your business (blogs, site pages, ebooks, case studies, white papers, whatever you need!)
  • Joint partnership with our company on anything that makes sense between your business and ours
  • Joint webinars, blog posts, press releases, we partner with lots of companies
  • EQUITY, if you are interested in having a stake. 

THE IMPACT

We want to change the way small businesses market their companies and we believe we can help them do just that with our new platform. We are passionate about helping small businesses succeed; in fact, we've been helping them do that for 14 years with our content writing services.

We are also starting a non-profit, Urban Entrepreneurs (http://www.urbanentrepreneurs.org/), which will help inner city men and women learn how to start a business. We're very excited about the potential of this idea. Your contribution will also help us get this organization off the ground in 2019.

It provides dynamic, web based editorial calendars, complete workflow tools, distribution to ten integrated platforms and the ability to connect with industry influencers to amplify your content.
ContentLaunch also offers content writers to assist with creating compelling content for your target market.

story:
☽◯☾

This is for all my stargazing goddesses.

My name is Nicole. I am an artist, changemaker, and the kind of person who's going to live my life no matter what. At 22 years old, I built my own art business. Since leaving school, I taught myself how to speak three foreign languages fluently and how to play the flute. For a time I worked for TEDx designing visuals, recruiting performing artists, and referring TEDx speakers. Now I am working for myself, making art, and adventuring with as much world travel as possible.

I consider myself a modern student of spirituality, a wild woman who wants to follow the rhythms of Nature and intuit on my best life by staying in alignment with cosmic intelligence. You have felt this, too. With creative minds and ambitious, hungry hearts, we need a way to organize ourselves for clarity.​

So as a moon child and a graphic artist, I took a year to create the planner I would want :

moon phases, the names of each month’s moon, information about meteor showers or eclipses of the year, astrological forecasts, moonifestos, self-reflection, ayurvedic advice about seasonal transitions, zen inspiration, journal/notes pages, and illustrations from an internationally recognized artist BrokenIsntBad, who happens to be one of my favorites.

Seeing this planner manifest into reality would put stars in my sky, because I believe in the quality of the tools I have laid out -- they are the ones I have used for my own success. I created the Moontime Planner entirely by myself as one of the results of my mindful productivity.

 

 

The Moontime Planner was made to spark self-reflection, productivity, and holistic inspiration in our lives. See the features below to understand the full scope of the planner.

Contributions to this special project help see the Moontime Planner into creation. As a new business, I need 150 minimum orders of planners before the printing company will agree to manufacture our lovely moon guides. We’ve already started selling planners on our website, but we still need the extra boost so that we aren’t vulnerable to not being able to start because of failing to meet the minimum. But with your active contribution, we can do it!

Go check out our awesome, made-with-love website www.moontimeplanner.com 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We have until December 4th to raise the funds for manufacturing 150 planners. This breaks down to $5250 for manufacturing costs, plus estimated shipping costs. 

 

To manufacture this planner we need to be able to order a minimum of 150 planners for our printing company to agree to complete this project. If we don't fill this minimum amount, the Moontime Lunar Planner will not be able to go into production. Since we have self-funded up until this point, we are proud to spread this opportunity to contribute throughout our network and communities.

 

All funds go to printing, manufacturing, and shipping. Extra funds raised go directly to making copies of the Moontime Lunar Planner to share with more people, and goodies and perks for the moontribe of contributors.

 

A note about profit: I am making very slim profit on the planners because of the manufacturing costs for all the features. Why did I price my planner so low despite all of its features? Because I wanted to keep it affordable and something that I would buy. This isn’t a boojee scheme to rip people off because I’m selling them something holistic. No. This is a project that contains ingredients from my heart and soul. I so badly want to share with people the inspired, ambitious, and balanced way that I live my life that I don't prioritize direct personal gain from this project.

The Features

What Makes The Moontime Planner Magical

☽◯☾

  ephemeris - guide to celestial events

moonifestos 

new-moon reviews + self-reflection

ayurvedic advice 

weekly/monthly spreads

brokenisntbad illustrations 

moonifestation techniques

back pockets, pen loop, indexed tabs 

unlined journal/notes pages

"moon missions" - prompts for adventure 

habit + water tracker

and a weekly manifestation exercise I call "Taking It Too Far" 

☽◯☾

also:

☽◯☾  silver foil cover made in premium vegan leather  ☽◯☾

5.7 x 8.7 in spiral bound planner 

-portable

-lays flat

-convenient use

 

Perks Perks Perks

First of all, every contributor gets access to a Moonifestation webinar in the second week of January 2019 that passes on knowledge about following the moon for manifestation, connecting to lunar productivity, as well as how to use the Moontime Planner for optimum success.

 

As a special gift, the planners will include a lunar phase belly band, which turns into a regular bookmark or a space-holder in the planner itself.

 

Shipping Note: If you live in California, there will be select options to pick up your planner from metaphysical stores in Newport, Long Beach, and Santa Monica. If you choose this pick-up option, email magic@moontimeplanner.com, and you will be refunded shipping.

 

The Impact

Following the moon makes us feel connected even when we feel very disconnected from ourselves. Reminding ourselves of the sources of our joy, the magic we are already feeling, and where we should flow our energy in the next cycle calms down our whirlwind overstimulation, and helps us remain calm and intentional. You can follow the cycles of Nature without going barefoot and drinking wheatgrass all the time. Although, going barefoot on grass is fun and makes you feel super giddy, so do that anyways.

This planner is for people like me who have a natural curiosity about when the next meteor shower is, when the moon or sun is eclipsing, and how Ayurvedic medicine advises us to adjust to the changing seasons. Your contribution means so much to the crucial process of getting this product from a dream we share, to a life we can live -- together.

By contributing, you are part of the Moontime Tribe and are connecting to the generations of our spiritually attuned ancestors who cultivated an exquisite sensitivity to the natural world. After all, we are separate from Nature. We are Nature."

The Story

 

This Moontime Lunar Planner began with my Moonifestos, which started when I was doing full moon rituals every single full moon with my best friend, Rose. We had self-care playdates where we would pamper ourselves, light candles, organize crystals, pull oracle cards, all the works. Most times, we would journal, but they were often just vague wish lists about what we were manifesting and releasing.

I wanted a writing ritual that was more defined, one that excavated a little deeper into the transformation that I'd experienced in that last cycle, and how I was preparing for the next. One night I just sat down at my desk with my ruler, drew out and titled certain boxes, and sat back with a fully-formed Moonifesto.​

    Since then, my Moonifestos have helped me tremendously, because I fill them out every New Moon and use the inner wisdom that they naturally draw out of me to live a more inspired life, right now. The idea for my own lunar planner was a natural development of that habit, and became a yearlong project. I added every feature that I would want in a planner and mindfully designed the self-reflection and productivity tools to be minimalistic yet inspired. Now, after a year, I am unveiling the planner. Yee!

Disclaimer

Manufacturing these planners

We are manufacturing these planners with BookBlock, because we are based in the US. There is an expected 4 weeks manufacturing time included in their manufacturing process.

Delivery time

It is totally possible that your planner may not arrive on time given that we are a new business. If that happens to be your case, you can email magic@moontimeplanner.com and will immediately receive all of the necessary print-outs of the planner to keep on top of your game while the planner arrives.

Feel Secure

100% money-back guarantee. We pay for shipping on returns. Planners must be returned in original condition, unused and without marks.

Sharing the Love

(Other Ways You Can Help)

Some of you looking at this just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help.

Pass this sacred opportunity on to those who you think will swoon at the idea of a moon phase planner that is this intentional. The message of the Moontime Planner is meant to be shared.

Use the Indiegogo share tools and make Moontime something cool you can share, where you get to be the one who passes this on to people who can contribute.

Consider that you are powerful and your participation makes a big difference.

 I believe that we all have a natural best self that is constantly being born, even through the chaos. What this planner can do for you is give you space to ebb the chaos, and flow with the inspired momentum. Korean philosophy says our true self is a bell stuffed with cotton. We only have to pull out the cotton to ring true.

 

IG: @moontimeplanner

FB: /moontimeplanner

moontimeplanner.com
