story:
In some way, everyone is a leader.  My unique experience may just help you become a better one AND I need your help to make it a reality.

Using my lessons learned, I’ve cracked the code on how to get great results fast as a leader.  Having grown up in the technology boom, and, produced results by leading the most elite teams in the United State Military – there is something you’ll get out of this book that is not available anywhere else.  It'll be unique to you.  Why, it is a passion of mine to help others because the world becomes better when we have better leaders.  So, why listen to me?  Keep reading.

Meet…me.

My name is Joshua Aultman and for me, service is and has always been a family business. My great grandfather was a police Captain.  Grandfather and father, both served in elite military units.  My grandmother, mother, aunts, uncles and cousins contributed to service to other and supported other serving families from the home front.  Growing up, and still today, my family always recognized three things: family, continuous learning/improvement and service to our nation.  When I see others doing great things in these areas, I’m naturally drawn to them.  These people are my community and they become my extended family – if you are new to this world, welcome.

My personal military journey has made me an award-winning leader -- top 40 under 40 (in the world) for Armed Forces technology achievements.  I’m a person who has first-hand experience with multiple cultures, and I’m an avid writer - that's dangerous to the status-quo.  And let's be honest, just because it's worked in the past - doesn't mean it's going to work in the future.  This also means I have practice in making short, concise, and straight to the point messages.

I’ve been personally involved in major technology growth and process changes during a time of major evolutions in cyberspace, natural disasters, and worldwide pandemics.  These hard problems led to new methods of leadership applied to warfare, national strategy, and humanitarian missions worldwide – I’m covering these topics in the book.

All of the units I was assigned to were recognized with major organizational awards.  The people I have worked with earned top honors in military, leadership, academia and industry.  Even though we always found a way to win, I never took the credit as a personal accomplishment or destination– but I always took notes.

Now to you.  I don’t know you, but my need to serve you runs deep.  For you, I have finished a book that includes notes on tried-and-true leadership methods and some stories from my leadership endeavors.  I took my journey and notes and placed in a well organized and easy to consume layout.  This is not just some leadership book; it’s written to help you.

What’s different than other “leadership” books.

Many may think “another leadership book, why should I pick this one up?”  Besides the fact that it’s packed with quick wins you can apply to your life, this book is way different.  For one, this book is also the guide to a leadership certification.  Meaning, you not only get a book with great material and experiences, you also get something other books don’t give you.  Proof that you read it.  Proof that you can lead others.  Proof that you can show your employer or customers.  This may help you make more money; it will help you make a difference as a leader!  There are others, but you’ll have to read it to find out.

Now – I need your help.

Although several well-known and established publishers have offered to assist with this book, the words, stories, and delivery matter.  The only way to totally control the messages and ensure it comes to you direct from me is through self-publishing.  In order to do this the right way, it takes money.

From the options below, you can see that you have multiple ways to assist in getting this book of experience out into a world of leaders who are looking for it.  Your donations will fuel all the associated fees that go along with a professional and polished production that many need, and many will purchase.

As a gift for your help, I will ensure you get one of my first copies of the book.  I will sign it and send it to your doorstep.  If we know each other, you’ll get a message from me included in the book.

 

No purchase – no problem. I still need your help.

Send this link out to your social media friends.  Like and share my content.  I can’t get to everyone who will benefit from reading this book.  Please help by liking, subscribing, following and or commenting on my IG (Joshua_Aultman), YouTube (Leaders-KIT) and TikTok (Joshua_aultman_author).  This cost you nothing and you never know who will thank you for putting them onto the track for a future promotion/win or a birthday, graduation, and/or holiday gift.

 

The Book.

The book is based on the common observation that leaders who focus on no more than three priorities, accomplish those priorities.  This is the rule of 3 and it is a direct correlation between how we have been trained to think, and how we are trained to act. 

From childhood stories (Goldilocks and the 3-bears) to sporting events (Gold, Silver, Bronze), our formative years have trained us that three things are part of everyday life.  As adults in leadership positions, we sometimes try to focus on too many tasks and end up loosing focus on what is truly important.  This is where a leader could use the rule of 3.

Furthermore, I have found that the rule of 3 consist of three main focus areas for leaders who have led highly productive units.  These areas are something that every leader must consider.  Once learned, this tool can be added to any leaders-kit.  True to the military environment that I was taught to lead in, I have developed an acronym and I call it M3.  Others have called it the platinum process for leadership, and I explain that in the book.

 

The Layout.

A speed-readers dream.  For each of the three main M3 topics, I have taken my notes of what I have deemed important over the years and called them “Lessons Learned.”  These LL appear at the beginning of each note in a summary fashion.  Then a further explanation is provided for added context. 

For entertainment, I have added stories from each of my assignments that were enlightening moments that I shared with my teams and later formulated through more experiences.

The final part of the lesson is a “Best Practice.”  These are the things that I hope you may be able to make your own to develop success in your own endeavors.

The book is structured in a way that will allow you to consume the materials faster than any other book in its class.

 

Thank you!

Your donation is helping get this work out to those who need it.  The book will help future leaders, so thank you for helping all of us AND no matter where you lead - thank you for your leadership.

 

Respectfully, Joshua
story_txt:
In some way, everyone is a leader.  My unique experience may just help you become a better one AND I need your help to make it a reality.
Using my lessons learned, I’ve cracked the code on how to get great results fast as a leader.  Having grown up in the technology boom, and, produced results by leading the most elite teams in the United State Military – there is something you’ll get out of this book that is not available anywhere else.  It'll be unique to you.  Why, it is a passion of mine to help others because the world becomes better when we have better leaders.  So, why listen to me?  Keep reading.
Meet…me.
My name is Joshua Aultman and for me, service is and has always been a family business. My great grandfather was a police Captain.  Grandfather and father, both served in elite military units.  My grandmother, mother, aunts, uncles and cousins contributed to service to other and supported other serving families from the home front.  Growing up, and still today, my family always recognized three things: family, continuous learning/improvement and service to our nation.  When I see others doing great things in these areas, I’m naturally drawn to them.  These people are my community and they become my extended family – if you are new to this world, welcome.
My personal military journey has made me an award-winning leader -- top 40 under 40 (in the world) for Armed Forces technology achievements.  I’m a person who has first-hand experience with multiple cultures, and I’m an avid writer - that's dangerous to the status-quo.  And let's be honest, just because it's worked in the past - doesn't mean it's going to work in the future.  This also means I have practice in making short, concise, and straight to the point messages.
I’ve been personally involved in major technology growth and process changes during a time of major evolutions in cyberspace, natural disasters, and worldwide pandemics.  These hard problems led to new methods of leadership applied to warfare, national strategy, and humanitarian missions worldwide – I’m covering these topics in the book.
All of the units I was assigned to were recognized with major organizational awards.  The people I have worked with earned top honors in military, leadership, academia and industry.  Even though we always found a way to win, I never took the credit as a personal accomplishment or destination– but I always took notes.
Now to you.  I don’t know you, but my need to serve you runs deep.  For you, I have finished a book that includes notes on tried-and-true leadership methods and some stories from my leadership endeavors.  I took my journey and notes and placed in a well organized and easy to consume layout.  This is not just some leadership book; it’s written to help you.
What’s different than other “leadership” books.
Many may think “another leadership book, why should I pick this one up?”  Besides the fact that it’s packed with quick wins you can apply to your life, this book is way different.  For one, this book is also the guide to a leadership certification.  Meaning, you not only get a book with great material and experiences, you also get something other books don’t give you.  Proof that you read it.  Proof that you can lead others.  Proof that you can show your employer or customers.  This may help you make more money; it will help you make a difference as a leader!  There are others, but you’ll have to read it to find out.
Now – I need your help.
Although several well-known and established publishers have offered to assist with this book, the words, stories, and delivery matter.  The only way to totally control the messages and ensure it comes to you direct from me is through self-publishing.  In order to do this the right way, it takes money.
From the options below, you can see that you have multiple ways to assist in getting this book of experience out into a world of leaders who are looking for it.  Your donations will fuel all the associated fees that go along with a professional and polished production that many need, and many will purchase.
As a gift for your help, I will ensure you get one of my first copies of the book.  I will sign it and send it to your doorstep.  If we know each other, you’ll get a message from me included in the book.
 
No purchase – no problem. I still need your help.
Send this link out to your social media friends.  Like and share my content.  I can’t get to everyone who will benefit from reading this book.  Please help by liking, subscribing, following and or commenting on my IG (Joshua_Aultman), YouTube (Leaders-KIT) and TikTok (Joshua_aultman_author).  This cost you nothing and you never know who will thank you for putting them onto the track for a future promotion/win or a birthday, graduation, and/or holiday gift.
 
The Book.
The book is based on the common observation that leaders who focus on no more than three priorities, accomplish those priorities.  This is the rule of 3 and it is a direct correlation between how we have been trained to think, and how we are trained to act. 
From childhood stories (Goldilocks and the 3-bears) to sporting events (Gold, Silver, Bronze), our formative years have trained us that three things are part of everyday life.  As adults in leadership positions, we sometimes try to focus on too many tasks and end up loosing focus on what is truly important.  This is where a leader could use the rule of 3.
Furthermore, I have found that the rule of 3 consist of three main focus areas for leaders who have led highly productive units.  These areas are something that every leader must consider.  Once learned, this tool can be added to any leaders-kit.  True to the military environment that I was taught to lead in, I have developed an acronym and I call it M3.  Others have called it the platinum process for leadership, and I explain that in the book.
 
The Layout.
A speed-readers dream.  For each of the three main M3 topics, I have taken my notes of what I have deemed important over the years and called them “Lessons Learned.”  These LL appear at the beginning of each note in a summary fashion.  Then a further explanation is provided for added context. 
For entertainment, I have added stories from each of my assignments that were enlightening moments that I shared with my teams and later formulated through more experiences.
The final part of the lesson is a “Best Practice.”  These are the things that I hope you may be able to make your own to develop success in your own endeavors.
The book is structured in a way that will allow you to consume the materials faster than any other book in its class.
 
Thank you!
Your donation is helping get this work out to those who need it.  The book will help future leaders, so thank you for helping all of us AND no matter where you lead - thank you for your leadership.
 
Respectfully, Joshua

story:
Smart toolbox for dopamine storytelling. Or storyselling 

When you present your idea – there are a lot of barriers between you and your audience. Fears. Doubts. Phones. Opinions. Inner voices. Of course, your perfectly beautiful PPT with brilliant ideas is good enough to get there. However, sometimes it is not

AirPPT is a set of smart tools – creative helpers – invented to eliminate barriers between presenter and the audience. Each helper fits its own situation we see so often during presentations

Today no success destined to those who just read slides to people. AirPPT turns your speech into dopamine performance. Engage your audience, make their hearts beat as one, make them love your idea as you do. We have ready solutions to do it in a nice and smarter way

Let's see how it works with a couple of helpers

 

Good start is a half of the path. So here is a tool for a good start of your performance. This helper is an elegant occasion to turn the dialogue mode on. Well, 7 occasions indeed. Ask people to guess the movie, talk about their interests and likes, warm-up their imagination for better absorbing your ideas in future. Turn boring waiting for a start into positive and emotional one

 

The black pearl in our Helpers’ collection. If you see that you audience is not too happy with too many slides – turn the Elevader pitch on right now. It`s a great way to make long story short as a shot. It`s not too disturbing – it let your audience to keep focus not on slides but on your idea

A few more examples of creative helpers you’ll find below. They already make our presentations more effective and yes - more cool

As you see it's as simple and smart as it can be. There can be dozens of helpers to choose from – and now it also depends on you if it comes true. Not to finish here but to start something outstanding

 

We have bullets - helpers, now we need to create the gun - mobile app to rule them all

AirPPT mobile app should be the nicest thing invented in presentations since the presentations were invented. Just upload your PPT (or Keynote, whatever) to AirPPT mobile app, choose proper helpers for your audience – and fire up

 

We already enjoy power of helpers during our zoom presentations (even without ready app). It is not a magic box that makes everyone love you. It is a set of fancy tools that can make most of them fall in love with your ideas

 

No pigs in a poke. Test drive any helper for $1, and then make a decision  

What is most important – several helpers are ready to use right now and you can test drive them for just $1 each

Here is step 1 of the plan: to create cool things that help many people to tell their ideas better and stronger. What we need is your support – and it's not always about the money. It's about your impression and feedback

Test our helper for just $1 and tell us how it goes. Also welcome if you have any ideas of other helpers – we shall send it to our tech division and it comes to life.

And of course for early birds we shall keep the best subscription rates when AirPPT deploys.

First airppt ads we prepared just for 1 hour. The secret is below 

If we launched first airppt ad campaign, then it would look like this. We prepared it just for 1 hour – the time you need to prepare presentations with airppt-ready helpers. That’s the idea, not The Economist ads themselves….

 

The founder sold his favorite car to make it happen. We ask for less than we invested

Our developers work on it for now but you can help us to release it faster & better with more helpers ready to rock your presentations

Here is our cost estimate for the gun & bullets. We ask for $9 500 to finalize app & 7 helpers on time

 

Our dream to-do goal is to make AirPPT your secret source of inspiration for a long time

We want to create community of people who build their own AirPPT themselves. Like Instagram or any other social network. All extra features serve that goal:

+$4 000 - To share your advice and user experience with TipsFeed

+$6 500 - To customize your helpers for your needs with HelperEditor

+$5 500 - To open MarketPlace where you get money & glory with your own helpers

 

The Big Bang timeline. < 40 days left to beta release

 

The team of three. All for one and one for all

 

The biggest risk is not taking any risk. With you, guys, we’re stronger than any wannabe

We’re open to the world with airppt.

It’s a great opportunity for all of us. And it’s a certain risk. Right now our main concern is the speed with which we release airppt. We have a couple of secrets but still majors (like Microsoft) can copy idea in several months

Crowdfunding & crowdsourcing is crucial (everybody counts!) since we're currently three people working hard at nights

 

A few more examples of creative helpers for your $1 test drive

To enjoy “I’ll be back in time” effect, turn on ZEN BREAK helper. You can do it both on public and zoom presentations

Nice LADYBUG helper lowers perception barriers of highly cluttered slides. It works like a mask on Instagram. Just put the helper on your messy slide and turn negative emotions into positive ones

 

Use 1000W VACUUM helper to cut a long story short. It works like a mask on Instagram. Put it on a slide with a key message instead of thousand words

 

Q&A PEPPER HELPER leaves no answer unquestioned. OK, here it goes!

story:
Streamline Your Workflow 

  We are the creators of the SmartPad®, and feel your pain when it comes to over stuffed pockets, having everything from your pen, notebook, business cards, and headphones scattered. We also know the pain of having low battery in those important moments. The struggle is real, and these very issues that we had ourselves was how we created the SmartPad®. The ultimate solution to streamline all your essentials into one mini notebook, which also features our patented Qi charging pad on the cover and over 10+ features.  

 Now we need YOUR help to make this come to life. By helping us hit our goal of $5000 CAD, you're allowing us put the SmartPad®  into production at our factory based in Vancouver and help us offer it to everyone at the lowest possible price.  Please consider that we worked for over two years just designing the SmartPad® to make it as good as it can be and super user friendly, also to be made with the finest quality available with an attention to detail.  

 

Features

                                                            Magnetic Snap Closure 

                     Premium Stainless Steel SKYBORNE Ballpoint Pen Included

                              Hard Cover Black Leather A5 Notebook Included

                                                      Pop-up Hands-free Smart Phone Stand

                                           Premium Hand-crafted Quality & Design 

                                                   Anti-theft RFID Card Holder

                                     Universal USB cable compatible with Apple devices,                                                                    Android, Google pixel, and any smartphone in the world.

 

 

                                                                  World Class Packaging 

 

                                                                              Reward Tier!

 

 

                                                                          Who We Are 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Like any company big or small, there are such thing as power outages, factory machine issues, and other rare occurrences that do happen and is completely out of our control. With that being said, we have already launched an Indiegogo campaign before with our previous factory manufacturing the goods, and we not only delivered on time, but delivered an outstanding quality item to our contributors. We will do everything in our power to work around the clock to get the SmartPad into your hands as fast as possible after quality testing!

 SHARE SHARE SHARE! 

 

And that's all there is to it. Please share our campaign with friends, family, ANYONE who would like our product. It would mean the world as a start up to get some exposure through social media and word of mouth. It would mean the world :) 
 
 Thank you all, lets kick this out of the park! If you have any questions feel free to contact us at any time and we'll get back to you ASAP. 

Be sure to follow us on instagram @Skyborne.inc We do exclusive giveaways, and create AWESOME travel content. 

 Cheers!

story:
AirView wireless touchscreen bring you advanced touchable multi-touch screen without cable need.

Advantages of AirView wireless IPS full-laminated touchscreen:

✅Touchable wirelessly and wired all supported

✅Support any mobile devices and smartphones video display

✅Support wireless smartphone desktop as well as cabled

✅Both USB-C and HDMI video-in support

✅Support both Android & iPhone mirror screen or desktop mode

✅Faster response times, minimal input lag

✅Ultra-wide 178-degree vertical and horizontal viewing angles

✅sRGB 100% color space, optimal color/contrast than other panels

✅Outstanding color accuracy and screen consistency

✅Fully laminated, higher optical transparency (>94%), brilliant color clarity and brightness, perfect for indoor and outdoor use.

✅Built-in battery 10500mAh, lightweight and thinness for mobility

 

 

Just wired portable monitor? No way. AirView is an entire suite of office and entertainment features packed into the advanced portable touchscreen monitor ever. It’s your wireless screen, it’s your dock, it’s your charger, it’s your speakers, and it’s fully customizable to be whatever else you need. Get rid of all the cable or clutter in your briefcase or backpack. Now it’s deliverable worldwide, no wait, instant obtainable via crowdfunding.

How many wires and gadgets are linked to your computer right now? AirView liberates you from clutter and streamlines your productivity by combining all the features you need into one wireless, touchable, ultra-bright monitor.

 

How long you have been expecting a touchable wireless display? Now it’s come true. How much more could you get done by connecting any devices with a touchable display?  AirView ultra-responsive touchscreen is perfect for any usages of wireless or wired monitor circumstance. Not only for tranditional laptop, game station or PC, but also for smartphone or mobile devices, and they can become mobile desktop. Wireless touch give you boundless connection of various devices touchable.

 

 

AirView is not a common wireless display. Forget other impossible products. AirView already fully support Apple iPhone wireless touchable. Beyond your imagnation, many feature are come true and not been constrained by cable anymore.

 

For smartphone desktop, AirView not just support type-c cabled touchable, it can also support wireless desktop as long as the smartphone has wireless desktop enabled. Once you got AirView, you never fall behind in the future. More and more smartphones have built-in desktop mode as Android 10 onward coming popular.

 

 

For smartphone wireless desktop, AirView is a super optimal companion of them. Extremely convenient and advanced. For instance, TNT desktop give you more advanced feature than others.

Here has more details:  youtu.be/i9bc2ko-a8k

Smartisan smartphone are available in our website. It’s so premium to have full pack of AirView & TNT desktop together.

 

 

 

AirView built-in long last battery support joyful gaming anywhere. With type-c new technology, AirView supports any DP alt mode devices over USB-C with screen touchable. Which means not only Nintendo Switch, but also other Android games, iPhone games are all playable and touchable over wired or wirelessly.

Whether desktop gamer, mobile gamer or just leisure, the versatile AirView turn up the game with more details display, color space and clarity. With Hi-Fi sound, playing really joyful immersively.

 

AirView has wide frequency range and higher sensitivity rating stereo speakers. These integrated speakers provide robust, crystal-clear, and natural sound reproduction, so all of audio scenes sound impressive great.

Audio engineers, composers, musicians, and music lovers will benefit from dynamic, rich sound no matter where they go. When working on a laptop, two extra speakers make all the difference when mixing tracks and editing. When on a phone or tablet, AirView transforms your media into a cinematic experience with crystal clear audio.

 

AirView beyond common touchscreen monitor, even for producer, vlogger, photographer, filmmaker, director can monitor on-camera videos while shooting without cable constraint. Professionals can see more details on bigger screen, and real-time control each element via touch.

For computer or mobile users, AirView support wired/wireless touchable and built-in battery give more flexibilities and mobilities. Whatever in any circumstance, AirView is full comperhensive capbilities support your usages.

 

AirView as car infotainment system give you unlimited connectivities to your smartphone and car integration. Over APPs abilities, you will get much more advanced than your built-in navigation system thanks to APP’s fantastic features like Car Connectivity, Real-time Traffic Information, Speed Limits, Fuel Prices, Voice Guided, Parking Services and more.

       

 

Fully laminated LCD display, greatly reduce glare and eliminating the air gap,combining the cover glass and touch panel layers. This offers higher optical transparency (>94%) than conventional display, resulting in brilliant color clarity and brightness, make your pictures even more transparent and colorful, perfect for indoor and outdoor use.

The surface of the screen is fully laminated with tempered glass and treated with electroplated oil-repellent layer to improve touch control Fluency and comfort, and screen protection.

The spectacular 15.6-inch wide gamut display makes photos, videos and games look exquisite and vivid. And, thanks to the IPS panel’s full-view technology, viewing from all angles is visually pleasing.

 

Two-way PD quick charging protocol, full charge just in 2 hours, you can play for 4 hours, and can be used as PD mobile power supply, charging your other devices at any time.

 

AirView wireless display is made of light aluminum alloy, lighter weight and better compression resistance, making it super easy to carry.

 

 

 

  • PD charger
  • Holster stand
  • USB-C charging cable
  • USB-C data cable
  • HDMI cable
  • Free universal travel adapter

 

 

We have completed the production of AirView in February 2020, and the products can be delivered now. Please feel free to contact our customer service staff if you have any questions, and we will reply as soon as possible.

story:
Has this ever happened to you?

You find a job posting online for a position you’re PERFECT for …

… you submit your resume online or by email, and …

… nothing happens.

The phone doesn’t ring. They don’t answer your emails or voicemails.

And that perfect job goes to someone else … while you wonder why.

 

Stop Putting Up with Employers and HR Gatekeepers Who Don’t Call You Back

Stop Putting Up with Emailing Your Resume and Never Getting Called for Interviews

 

Finally! How to get the names of employers who can hire you, contact them, and get interviews -- even if they’re NOT hiring.

 

MyNewJobHunt.com

 

MyNewJobHunt.com is a step-by-step online system which combines all the best content from the best-selling Guerrilla Marketing for Job Hunters books, videos, workshops, courses and virtual boot camps.

MyNewJobHunt.com combines the guerrilla job search content with a suite of online integrated tools which have been designed to keep you focused and on target every step of the way.  This creates an unfair advantage for you as compared to your competition.

If you’re truly motivated to take complete control of your life and your future, you’ll select one of the perks to the right and help us scale the platform. 

Why should you care?

 

Let’s be honest. It’s tough out there. Scary even…We’ve been there ..

For every job posted, hundreds of people apply, hoping it will be theirs. You’ve probably discovered that getting a new job has been an exercise in frustration. Especially if you’re playing by the old rules.

Because, as you’ve learned…

 

The Old Rules for Job Hunting Don’t Apply – Not Anymore 

Most job seekers are doing the same things: sending resumes, applying online through job websites, and reading the help wanted ads.

You, too?

Ask yourself: “Am I finding any success by doing it this way?”

 

Why use guerrilla tactics?

 

Unlike regular military units, Special Forces face the most-daunting assignments. David Perry is a former military man, he will tell you from experience that Special Forces units rely on their unconventional experience, training, and creativity to achieve their objective.  This is where the term Guerrilla comes from.

In fact, America started in “guerrilla” fashion, more than 235 years ago.

British soldiers marched toward Lexington and Concord to gather the stored arms of the “rebellious colonists” and to arrest their leaders John Hancock and Samuel Adams.  Those British soldiers in their red coats marched in long straight lines. They were the best in the world. And yet they lost — badly — to a bunch of farmers, carpenters, and regular folk.  Why?  Because the colonists adapted, used their versatility, and creativity… and chose not to play by the old rules.  They became guerrillas.

Those “new rules” secured America’s place in history.  Now it’s your turn, to secure your future.

The team that put together MyNewJobHunt.com are the same exact people who created the Guerrilla Job Search products and services --- professional headhunters (recruiters) and marketing gurus.  And, because you get our “inside” knowledge, you will maximize your personal experience, training, and creativity to land your next job faster.

 

We won’t teach you to do anything unethical

Instead, we’ll change how you think, make you adaptable, unleash your creativity, and maximize all your personal assets.

You will transform from just another job seeker into someone who stands-out.   In essence, you will become a Special Forces Guerrilla who’s ready to experience victory.

 

Here are some of the media who have covered the Guerrilla Marketing for Job Hunters story:

 

 

Here is how we do it

When you have the right guidance.  The right insider knowledge.  The right tools.  The power is in your court. 

 MyNewJobHunt program leverage's the strategies and job-hunting techniques that are not available as free information on the internet and were previously only known by a handful of recruiting insiders. Insiders like David Perry, who sold the 10 Week Instructor lead Guerrilla Job Search Boot Camp, for thousands of dollars. ($4,999).

MyNewJobHunt.com is the online version of the 10 Week Guerrilla Job Search Boot Camp.  It will be more affordable and uses all of David Perry’s material, the entire curriculum including the videos, audios and exercises.  The difference is there’s no live instructor, unless you want/need additional professional help, from someone like Mark J. Haluska,

 

 MyNewJobHunt will show you:

  • How to pick your most marketable skills, in 30 seconds or less (as a result, every resume, cover letter and conversation you will take on a crystal clarity and will cut through the clutter in any job market);
  • Lead you through the tricky process of crafting a resume that connects directly with your preferred employer (based on 100 years of principles used in advertising copy-writing);
  • Zero in on the best jobs fast at the highest salary because they know exactly what employers value most and want to see in the cover letter and resume.   (this transforms them from “unwanted pest” to “desired guest” in the minds of employers)
  • Leverage Facebook, LinkedIn, ZoomInfo, Twitter, Google, and other social networking sites, to take advantage of “the secret lives of top recruiters”;
  • Learn how to present your skills in creative new ways that stand out in today’s hyper-competitive job market (we demonstrate that if Paris Hilton can get work despite having no known employable skills, anyone can);
  • Employ little-known search engine optimization tricks used by top headhunters (who have to make placements or starve) – and;
  • Design, launch and execute a multimodal job hunting campaign based on the same success principles used by General Norman Schwarzkopf in Operation Desert Storm.

 

Become A Special Forces Guerrilla

If you’re truly motivated, you will digest and act on what you just discovered just now and select one of the perks to the right to help us scale the platform.

The faster you do so, the faster you will land a new job.  It’s that simple.

You won’t read any “theories” or untried ideas here.

Instead, you will discover exactly what to do and say, in your regular and Guerrilla Resumes, cover letters, and job interviews.  Nothing is left to chance.

This is state-of-the-moment advice — including such topics as LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter — puts you ahead of your competition and top-of-mind with hiring managers.

 

Real Success Is Just Ahead

One last thing: you deserve more than a job. You deserve a fulfilling life. Few people get that.  In fact, the U.S. Commerce Department tells us that 80% of employed people are not content with their job.

What a shame.

Because, the truth is, landing the job of your dreams is not as hard as you think. It’s simply a matter of changing how you think.  That’s exactly what you’ll learn here — how to think differently.   And most important of all, you’ll learn how to act differently. So, you can get hired faster.

You’re in the right place.

If you want more people calling you for interviews, if you want more people knowing your name, sharing your links, and singing your praises, if you want to take your interviews to their rightful conclusion while cutting the number of hours you spend looking dramatically … we teach people how to do that all the time.

Because you need to be ready to change jobs in the “gig economy” every 18-24 months you need to keep the jobs coming your way.  MyNewJobHunt is the place to keep all your job search materials and manage your ongoing campaign

 

 

MyNewJobHunt’s job finding system includes:

 

Job Management System (JMS) - a powerful job search engine system that even aggregates the aggregators( like indeed)  themselves placing all those jobs into a single view which delivers a summarized email of all the opportunities suitable for you. You spend your time on more important tasks – like interviewing – and never miss a posted job. 

The Education Information Management System (EIMS) – guides you daily, step-by-step, through the program keeping you focused and on track.  Specific actionable tasks and exercises are completed each day, keeping your job search running smoothly.  You remain motivated and on target to land quickly.

Contact Relationship Management (CRM) - keep track of the companies you're interviewing with, remembering what stage you are at with each company, recording which resume & cover letter you used, which thank you note you sent, as well as and the last email and voice-mail message you left, and most importantly what actions you need to take next.

Content Management System (CMS) - provides online 24/7 access 365 days of the year to the resources for all the of the program’s daily exercises.  Supporting video and audio material helps create a personalized job search strategy. The strategies and tactics are designed to get you noticed and interviewed for the jobs you actually want - even when they are not advertised.

Calendaring Tool - to help you schedule your interviews and phone calls; and keep track of all the things you need to do during your job search along with complete information on the company as well as your contact people at the company. 

 

More specifically - here's exactly what the 7-Step System entails...

 

  1. CHOOSE: The Career Clarity Formula. Because you can’t hit a target you can’t see, you will get crystal clear on the job you seek and the 10-20 employers most likely to hire you. Includes how to research decision makers at up to 20 different employers in your industry, using a proprietary insight. 
  2. CREATE: Attention Getting Resumes and Cover Letters. Your resumes and cover letters aren’t working. If they were, you’d be working now, right? We fix that, by creating a Guerrilla Resume and Cover Letter templates that are easy to customize and use over and over for the rest of your career.
  3. BUILD: The Online Profile Builder. The easiest way to find a job is to have the job find you. So, we guide you on creating a LinkedIn profile that makes employers and recruiters want to meet you. You work using a  recruiter's inside knowledge  as your "virtual" coach, giving you a tremendous edge over other candidates.
  4. LAUNCH: The Extreme Networking System. Raise your hand if you love networking. We thought so. The solution? Stop pestering friends and former co-workers with “elevator pitches” and other canned nonsense. Start having real conversations with hiring authorities who want to meet you. We show you how.
  5. MEET: The Hidden Job Finder. This is where the rubber meets the road, typically within 30 days. After your network is humming with activity, we tell you how to ethically “force” hiring authorities to meet with you. This is where unadvertised jobs are often offered to you or created for you.
  6. IMPROVE: The Interview Multiplier. Why settle for just one or two job interviews? It’s not uncommon for Guerrilla Job Hunters to average one interview for every two Guerrilla Resumes submitted. We help you build unstoppable momentum that leads to a rewarding new job.
  7. LAND: The Job Offer Maximizer. When it comes to negotiating your highest salary, nothing beats multiple job offers. We help you maximize your chances and become the “MWC” (Most Wanted Candidate) employers pay top dollar for.

Fact: No other web site, career coach, guru, or “expert” can do what MyNewJobHunt can do for you.  This is the only job finding platform built for job hunters with the help of successful recruiters and marketers. 

Only MyNewJobHunt.com uses David Perry’s proprietary 7-Step “recruit-yourself” system that’s the basis for the best-selling book, “Guerrilla Marketing for Job Hunters 3.0.”

It's easy to get started right away. Just select one of the perks on the right and get ready to interview and land job offers while we scale the platform.

Investing with us today is an investment in your future’s tomorrow. 

After you choose your perk, forward this page to the 10 people you care about most…

story:
PromoPilot is social app to send or receive personalized messages (255 char) in near real time or broadcast a message to your channel subscriber.

You will get messages only from subscribed people or channels that interests you.

All your messages are private. You can view messages from public channel only

You can create your own channel to broadcast messages to your friends, family, or team.

PromoPilot beta version is available for Android  http://www.promopilot.co

But, Why private channel?

Promo Pilot is come with concept like to send one to one message or create  private and public channel to broadcasting messages to subscriber.  

Promo pilot will be next big social IoT (internet of things) where user can provision a private channel for connected devices and will keep you or your family/ team updating about the device or status.  

For example, you can create private channel(s)

1.  To track kids current location.

2.  To Get real time update about your website visitor  

3.  To Monitor and track health of Assets to reduce cost etc.

(Note: Private channel implementation is in progress)




Why I am here?

At this point, PromoPilot needs to raise an amount of money to further development and to setup office , add development team and marketing persons etc.

More specifically, I needed an amount of $1000000 to

1.  To implement additional feature in android app ( currently its beta 1.5)

2.  To Develop iOS  and Windows phone app

3.  To develop developer web api for partner and developer so that they can create their own mobile app based on promo pilot framework.  

3.  Develop and launch a web portal for paid customer.

4.  Reach new users through advertisement & marketing campaigns targeted to different locations in the world

5.  Operational costs & fees that will keep our team & servers up and running for as long as we need to make this thing happen.

story:
This is Not an IDEA!!!

It's Not a CONCEPT!! 

It's not a FUTURE GOAL!


It's a FINISHED PRODUCT and READY TO ROLL

We found out that most crowd funding projects, small business owners, start up companies, musicians, product inventors and so many more had no way of competing with bigger competitors in the technology game. Especially when it came to mobile iPhone and Android Apps.  Non of them could afford the thousands of dollars it cost to develop an App and on top of that pay programers ongoing fee's every time you want to change or add something.  It's just not very realistic or affordable for most people. Imagine the possibilities if it was affordable.

 

At Mobile App-ocalypse we have reinvented mobile apps for small business owners, associations, musicians, artists, production companies, crowd funding and more at the lowest industry price.  We created a user friendly app design platform that makes it easy and affordable for anyone to compete against the largest of competitors in the technology game.  At Mobile App-ocalypse we are always striving to bring more exciting technology and make sure our clients have an incredible advantage over their competition, big or small. The reason we're doing a Indiegogo Campaign is to raise money for our national launch (TV Commercials, Radio, GoogleAds, Facebook and so on)  But you get the product NOW...


With our state-of-the-art platform we make it easy for your App to be up and running on all platforms fast.  You pick your layout, Select the features you want, Insert your businesses information and publish to the Apple and Android Stores. Wait till you see how cheap we've made the price for you to have an amazing App...

Imagine the possibilities for your: Business, Band, Project, Product or even your Crowd Funding Campaigns.  With our technology you can update customers and investors every minute of everyday through push notifications.  That means that everyone that downloads your App.  Integrate Facebook and all other social media platforms in seconds.  We have hundreds of features all included with our service.

It's so Simple to have a Awesome App Up and making you money with our:

Ready for Some Inspiration:

Select From our Unbelievable Features or Create your Own

Imagine if everyone of your clients could pay you over the App... Buy your Product... Get Updates... or even Scan your Free QR Codes to download your app or go to your mobile website.  


Again we are not asking you to donate on a promise of getting something in the future if everything works out.  Our product is ready to go today and you can start building your App Now, Getting more Clients or Fans and Making More Money.

story:
iWi Rent App allows you to rent items from other users as well as uploading your own items to rent out 

This app allows users to upload and rent out items sitting around in their house or in their garage for a profit .  This multi-screen technology for IOS, Android and Web also allows users to browse and rent items from other users in their area.  No need to take cash or carry a credit card all transactions are completed with just the push of a button on their smartphone.

RENT OUT YOUR BELONGINGS

Let's say that you want to make some extra cash, but you do not have the time to start a business nor the energy to take on a second job.  The one thing that you do have is stuff that you do not use all the time sporting equipment, tools, camping equipment, clothing, luggage, party supplies well you get the idea.  So you download iWi Rent App or visit www.iwirent.com create an account, upload some pictures, answer a few questions and that is it you wait for people to rent out your stuff and make extra cash.  Don’t worry about your items making it back home in one piece if something happens… Your belongings will be insured. 

Simple and Secure!


RENTING ITEMS FROM OTHER USERS

Let's say you need something but you do not want to buy it because it is too expensive, too bulky, too seasonal  or just do not see the point of buying it.  So you download iWi Rent App or visit www.iwirent.com create an account, browse thru desired items in your area and rent them.  Then just return the items when you are done. 

Simple and Affordable!


It is our belief that our platform will help men and women across the world...

help us make it a reality

story:
First of all, let all of us here at LumID thank you for taking interest in our revolutionary idea! Our team came together in a business class at Brigham Young University in Provo, Utah. Our team is comprised of five members from various backgrounds. We came together, thanks to our mentor Nick Greer, a successful entrepreneur and our teacher. We all have different strengths and feel that our talents and abilities will complement one another’s. A few of us have expertise in software development and technology, others have networking opportunities in education and advertising, and all of us have a common goal: create a product will change the world.

Our goal is to develop a projector that you can interact with through touch, at an affordable price. With your help, that will be just the beginning. We hope to develop these projectors with education in mind. We want to deliver a more interactive and fulfilling educational experience, capable of adapting to all kinds of learning and teaching styles. The possibilities are endless! Imagine being in a biology class as a student and having an interactive model of DNA on your desk that you can pull apart and put together. Imagine being able to see and interact with the processes of mitosis and meiosis. Imagine being a teacher for those students and having the ability to guide students through their own discoveries. Imagine being in an art class and being able to sketch out and design ideas a million times without ever wasting materials before putting them on canvas. There are countless applications inside and outside of education. This is our vision, and we hope you’ll join us in it!

What We Need

Let’s break it down in more detail:

We are asking for $10,000 to move forward with our prototype and market our idea so that we can continue to find people who are interested in our vision

Every contribution helps no matter the size. You can feel free to donate as much or as little as you’d like.

If we don’t reach our goal we won’t stop and we won’t let your donations go to waste! We’ll continue to work on our project as best we can for as long as we can, investing our own time and money until we succeed.

The Impact

As we said earlier, we hope that with time this product will truly revolutionize education—at first—and technology in general with time. We’re in this for the long haul, and we want to see this idea change the way we all interact with technology.

Risks & Challenges

We understand that we are not the only ones with this technology or this idea. We know that, eventually, all of the big electronic companies will be competing with us. That’s why we need your help! The more funds we get and the faster we receive them, the better off we’ll be. We’re asking you to root for the underdog here! We know we’re a small business, but we know we can do it, we won’t be the first small businesses to revolutionize technology, i.e. apple and Microsoft.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren’t able to make monetary contributions, we get it! We are college students after all. There are things you can still do! Please, if nothing else, make sure to share this on your Facebook wall, Instagram feed, Snapchat it to all your friends, and if you happen to know any millionaire entrepreneurs looking for new ventures, feel free to send them our way!

story:
JKM is a very user-friendly desktop ceramic 3d printer. It can print clay and porcelain which is different from traditional FDM 3d printer, this technology is called LDM. JKM allows you to print your special vase, cup and bowl, and it’s a new tool for ceramic art-making.

VASE 01

VASE 02

VASE 03

  • Models - you can design the models by using sketchup, blender, fusion 360, SolidWorks, rhino, etc. Or you can download the models from the website Thingiverse directly. And we will share some models with you too.
  • Slice - Import your model file to the slicer software, and generate the G-code.
  • Prep - prepare the clay or porcelain which you can buy anywhere.
  • Print - click start to print.

        Also, you can glaze it with different colors, then fire it via kiln. 

  • Environment-friendly
  • Easy to get: the clay and porcelain materials are easy to get.
  • Affordable: the clay and porcelain is affordable for everyone, and they are reusable material.
  • Ceramics are suitable for both prototyping in architecture and for small serial production in design, the arts and crafts.​

Compatibility:

JKM Extruder can be compatible with many existing FDM 3D printers. It has good performance, removes bubbles out of clay, that will make it easier to prepare the ceramic printing material, and improve the accuracy of printing.

 

Comparison:

LUTUM is an excellent clay 3d printer, but its price is too high that stopped most people to try it.

Hardware:

  • Firmware: open source motherboard compatible with Repetier firmware.
  • Exturder: high-precision stepper motor-driven screw extrusion structure.

 

JKM V2.0 Upgrades:

1. Upgrade the clay cartridge from 500CC to 1200CC.

 

2. Optimize the FDM parts.

 

3. Upgrade the control box from 3d printed parts to acrylic.

 

Software:

  • Support Windows, Mac, or Linux
  • Connection: SD card or USB
  • Support model formats: STL, OBJ, G-code
  • Print control software: Slic3r, Cura
  • Print speed: 15-100mm/s
  • Print materials: clay, porcelain

More videos can be watched on our YouTube channel HERE.

1.

 

2.

 

  • Free Shipping.
  • Whole Set Not Include Air Compressor.

  • Idea Bursts - December, 2016
  • Prototype - March, 2017
  • Industry Design - May, 2017
  • The 1st-generation product - October, 2017
  • The 2nd-generation product - March, 2018
  • Preparation for indiegogo - March, 2018
  • Launching on indiegogo - April, 2018
  • Production - June, 2018
  • Delivery - August, 2018

My name is Michael from Jingdezhen which is a small town in China. Almost all people here work for ceramic and porcelain. My uncle is an artist who paints and draws on porcelain, and I am a maker. In 2016, I worked in Shenzhen where I learned something about 3d printer that prints PLA or ABS. “Why not try ceramic 3d printing? “, one day my uncle talked with me. So, the idea of making a ceramic 3d printer came to me. My first ceramic 3d printer is an open source ceramic 3d printer, which is designed by Mr. Jonathan Keep, a great artist potter. However, I still want to make a user-friendly ceramic 3d printer, which will have larger build volume, will be more stable and affordable. So I spent almost one year to design and test this ceramic 3d printer, JKM. Hope more people can start their ceramic 3d printing journey easily.

 

TEAM

Michael Cheng : Founder, Maker

Pluto Lee: Software Engineer

 

THANKS

We could not have done it without standing on the shoulders of giants. Specifically, we would like to thank:

  1. Jonathan Keep
  2. Jack Hardie ,Dries Verbruggen ,Tom, Joe, Hans, and other friends of the Google+ Community “Make Your Own Ceramic 3D Printer” - it’s a great community full of helpful and intelligent enthusiasts! 
  3. Liu, Peng.
  4. Open source software - Repetier. (https://www.repetier.com/)

 

Risks and Challenges

Before launching this Indiegogo, we have tested our machine for several months. We've also done extensive research to make sure international logistics would not be an issue.

On the hardware side, we have been sourcing right components, testing component quality again and again. On the software side, we choose the open source Repetier, and we will make it easy to use.

However, like with any Indiegogo project, delays or minor mishaps are always a possibility. We'll try to keep them at a minimum, if anything does pop up, we'll be sure to keep every one of you updated.

 

If you have any questions, please get in touch with us. We will be happy to answer all your questions.

mohist1215@gmail.com

Our Google Community

Our YouTube

 

FAQ

1, How do I start ceramic printing?

    We will provide a series of step-by-step tutorial videos.

2, Does this printer support auto leveling?

    Auto leveling is unnecessary when you print clay or porcelain.

3, What is working pressure?

     It works at 4-5 bar.

4, What kind of clay can it print?

    Almost all clay and porcelain can be printed, as long as they are smooth. You should test and find the best clay in your market, we will provide you the testing model to print.

story:
Dear INDIEGOGO Supporters,

Difficult times help us clearly see and appreciate what truly matters.

My mom, diagnosed with Alzheimer’s, was slowly robbed of her ability to communicate. We eventually developed a “sign language,” such as understanding twinkling eyes and wiggling toes meant she was happy.

For me, this clarified the importance of “together-time” for two—not just when time is running out, but throughout our lives. So I created jathi (jaa-tee), short for “joined at the hip,” invites for two. It’s an iPhone app that helps you handpick the perfect activity and easily schedule time to spend one-on-one with people who matter most.

We're trying to build something special here. Together, let’s create a cultural trend that shifts how we think about being face-to-face with one special person at a time.

Let’s start with jathi!

Together-time happens when we prioritize one-on-one time.

We’re all busier than ever with work and chaotic lives. When we do find undistracted time, only 5% of it is spent together, mostly engaged in passive activities such as Internet surfing or watching TV.

Although 86% of us want to be active, only 22% are actually enjoying experiential activities such as playing beach volleyball or exploring an art gallery. Here are more "time spent" stats to consider.

jathi is an effortless and fun way to schedule the perfect together-time activity for two, whether it’s a cup of coffee with your mother-in-law, a wilderness hike with your buddy, or a weekend getaway to Paris with your partner.

 

jathi’s look and feel is inspired by two Hindi words — jathipatri (jaathipatree), which means nutmeg-mace and jathi (jaa-tee), which is a dance sequence. We combined a spicy color palette, hand-carved logo, and fanciful design with a user-friendly, decision tree-driven UI.

 

Create a customized invite for two in 4 simple steps.

 

 

Post messages and your photos on your private jathi bulletin board. Build guest profiles to track favorite activities.

jathi invites for two is a new one of a kind app that makes everyday and special activities between two meaningful, and ensures invitation customization is fuss free. 

Feature Highlights:

  • Beautiful, easy, and fun to use UI.
  • Customizable invites and editing tools.
  • Activity ideas (over 100) based on guest preferences.
  • International artwork gallery, or upload your own.
  • Pre-written sentiment options, or write your own.
  • Calendar and reminder tools.
  • Private message board per activity.

1.0 SPECS

  • Compatible with IOS 5.0 or later.
  • Currently unavailable for iPad/Android platforms.
  • English only.

Post campaign we will release the Holiday Edition 2018 sneak peek in October; national release ships in November. Stretch goal work items will begin August 2018 should we receive the additional funding.

Our startup, focused on developing the jathi app, has been self-funded. Now, additional funds are needed to launch the Holiday Edition 2018.

Work Plan:

  • App: integrate Facebook, update the IOS, and purchase more holiday images and sentiments.
  • Marketing: refresh website, blog, and Pinterest page; create presence on additional social media platforms.
  • Staff: hire three contractors - developer, social media manager, and PR assistant.                                             

With your support, we will introduce new versions such as Valentine’s Day and National Girl Friend’s Day and the Android platform. In addition, we will launch jathi for the Cloud, which will allow us to process in app transactions such as ticketing.

$25,000; 55% to update the product and 45% to build a marketing infrastructure to launch the Holiday Edition 2018.

I am frugal and will be able to stretch the budget to ensure the work plan is executed. And, I work for gummy bears.

With your support, we will introduce new features, editions and platforms.

jathi has been approved for publication on the App Store.

We will hire a team-oriented contract developer who will be responsible for updating the app and adding the Android and Cloud platforms should we reach our stretch goals. Please leave a  message, including your contact information, in the comments section if you qualify and or if you have a recommendation.

A serial entrepreneur, I have an MBA from Harvard and experienced in driving marketing efforts for Fortune 500 companies.  I will manage a team of three contractors: developer and social media and public relations/marketing managers, and will lead the marketing effort.  I love content coding (long story) and will continue to do so for the next two editions.  

ABOUT THIS CAMPAIGN

Do I have to pay VAT and duty?

We do not control VAT or duty. The T-shirt and Kolo album prices do not include taxes or shipping.

Is jathi internationalized?

No, we offer only an English version at this time.

When will you ship/launch the items?

The ship and or release dates are as follows:

T-shirt & Kolo album: September 2018

Holiday Edition, IOS

  • sneak peek: October 2018
  • national launch: November 2018

ABOUT THE PRODUCT

Why use jathi over a tweet, text, or email?

jathi makes it truly special with a hand-picked activity, sentiment, and picture. Imagine a daughter’s delight when she receives a customized jathi invite via email or Facebook to have an ice cream cone date vs. a text invitation.

What’s the cost?

jathi is free to download and explore and 25-cents per invite to send.

How long does it take to create an invitation?

An average of 10-15 minutes.

What type of customer support do you offer?

Help is available on jathi.com and via email at info@jathi.com.

Where can I get the jathi iPhone app?

You may download the Holiday Edition 2018 from the App Store on your iPhone or from iTunes® on your computer by November 2018; the sneak peek perk will be available October 2018.

Find additional answers to your questions on jathi.com

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

Private message board per activity.
1.0 SPECS
Compatible with IOS 5.0 or later.
Currently unavailable for iPad/Android platforms.
English only.
Post campaign we will release the Holiday Edition 2018 sneak peek in October; national release ships in November. Stretch goal work items will begin August 2018 should we receive the additional funding.Our startup, focused on developing the jathi app, has been self-funded. Now, additional funds are needed to launch the Holiday Edition 2018.Work Plan:
App: integrate Facebook, update the IOS, and purchase more holiday images and sentiments.
Marketing: refresh website, blog, and Pinterest page; create presence on additional social media platforms.
Staff: hire three contractors - developer, social media manager, and PR assistant.                                             
With your support, we will introduce new versions such as Valentine’s Day and National Girl Friend’s Day and the Android platform. In addition, we will launch jathi for the Cloud, which will allow us to process in app transactions such as ticketing.$25,000; 55% to update the product and 45% to build a marketing infrastructure to launch the Holiday Edition 2018.I am frugal and will be able to stretch the budget to ensure the work plan is executed. And, I work for gummy bears.With your support, we will introduce new features, editions and platforms.jathi has been approved for publication on the App Store.We will hire a team-oriented contract developer who will be responsible for updating the app and adding the Android and Cloud platforms should we reach our stretch goals. Please leave a  message, including your contact information, in the comments section if you qualify and or if you have a recommendation.A serial entrepreneur, I have an MBA from Harvard and experienced in driving marketing efforts for Fortune 500 companies.  I will manage a team of three contractors: developer and social media and public relations/marketing managers, and will lead the marketing effort.  I love content coding (long story) and will continue to do so for the next two editions.  ABOUT THIS CAMPAIGNDo I have to pay VAT and duty? We do not control VAT or duty. The T-shirt and Kolo album prices do not include taxes or shipping.Is jathi internationalized?No, we offer only an English version at this time.When will you ship/launch the items?The ship and or release dates are as follows:T-shirt & Kolo album: September 2018Holiday Edition, IOS
sneak peek: October 2018
national launch: November 2018
ABOUT THE PRODUCTWhy use jathi over a tweet, text, or email? jathi makes it truly special with a hand-picked activity, sentiment, and picture. Imagine a daughter’s delight when she receives a customized jathi invite via email or Facebook to have an ice cream cone date vs. a text invitation.What’s the cost? jathi is free to download and explore and 25-cents per invite to send.How long does it take to create an invitation?An average of 10-15 minutes.What type of customer support do you offer?Help is available on jathi.com and via email at info@jathi.com.Where can I get the jathi iPhone app?You may download the Holiday Edition 2018 from the App Store on your iPhone or from iTunes® on your computer by November 2018; the sneak peek perk will be available October 2018.Find additional answers to your questions on jathi.comTHANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
Fabalist currently has more than 140 major restaurants using the Fabalist platform in Dade (Miami) and Broward (Ft. Lauderdale) Counties in Florida.  We have more than 6578 restaurant employees using the platform and receive more than 22,000 hits on the platform per month. There are 528 jobs currently listed on the platform. Every week several additional restaurants join the platform with virtually zero marketing on our part.  

We have begun to receive requests to join the platform from restaurants around the country.  In order to achieve the proper penetration in markets outside of south Florida, we need to make a major effort to open the additional 8 to 10 largest markets throughout the country.  This is what the funds we are raising will be primarily used for.

Cheers,

The Fabalist Team

story:
Woodsum Pinhole Camera is a wooden, analog film camera that is assembled by each user. 

For ease of use, Woodsum uses 35 mm film which is the most common type of film. The retro design along with the analog concept enhances the value of the product and is a perfect gift for those who love photography. 

We use high quality wood for each part and finish it off with UV coating to give it a premium feel and so that everyone can enjoy the experience of assembling this wooden pinhole camera.

 Woodsum is best for those who are seeking for a new hobby. Enjoy your healing time with this fabulous camera and create your own value as you experience the charm of engaging in this creative activity!

 

 

 

 

We received a gold medal in the furniture category and in the Toy/Game category in the 2016 Pittsburgh International Inventionsand was recognized for product value. 

 

 

A pinhole camera is an analogue camera that allows you to take a picture through a small pinhole instead of a lens. You cannot expect a clear picture as you would from a digital camera, but you can enjoy the “nostalgic aesthetics” as you can take pictures by adjusting the amount of light on your own.  

 

 

 

This data may vary slightly depending on your specific situation, so please just refer to this as a rough guideline and adjust accordingly!

 

 

 

 

 

Main Target : Those who “enjoy assembling and prefer a unique product that is worth keeping.”

Assembly Time: 1 hour to assemble for adults (can differ per person)

 

 

 

We have obtained KC, the Independent Safety Certification for Industrial Products, and also have the CE mark, which is the safety certification in Europe.

In addition, it is a safe product that has passed the EN717-12004 test, which is a formaldehyde emission test for the export of wood products to Europe.

We also have our own factory in order to product high quality products, and also have the ISO9001, which is the international standard for quality management system. 

 

I’m sure you’ve assembled a DIY product and then end up leaving it in storage or even throwing it away when moving. The reason why the things you’ve made with so much effort get discarded so quickly is probably due to the product's low quality, lack of utility, or it simply becomes too much of a hassle to use.

WOODSUM’s wooden assembly kits have continuous utility and also has value as an interior accessory. We created it to be a high-quality product by manufacturing each part with luxurious wood and by applying a UV coating on the surface. Unlike other wooden assembly kits, WOODSUM has a retro design with an analogue concept, making it great as an item to show off during usage as well as decor for your home. It will certainly be worthy to keep after assembly.

WOODSUM’s pinhole camera is even more precious because it is assembled by you!

 

 

 

We've made fully functional wooden assembly kit.

We launched WOODSUM with its DIY Wooden Kits back in 2015.  We've been making new products continuously with various designs. The retro Pinhole Camera, is the combination of all the best technology and designs we have to offer. 

 

We have CE and ISO 9001

We have the CE mark, which is a European certificate, andthe ISO9001 which is the international standard for quality management system established by the International Organization for Standardization. 

 

We are in charge of manufacturing our products.

Our products are made using a laser machine. We operate our own factory to produce this delicate and high-quality wooden kits without any defects. 

 

We attended a lot of exhibitions in the world.

We recently participated in world renowned exhibitions such as 2019 NY Toyfair and Maison&Objet Paris, where we have been recognized for Woodsum's value. Our history serves as a testament to Woodsum's brand value.

story:
What is the zPower Trio?

The zPower Trio is a desktop charger that can replace up to three of your current chargers. You have a charger for your USB-C laptop, a charger for your smartphone, and a charger for your tablet or e-reader. Now you only need one charger for all of them.

You may ask what makes this better than a power strip? Isn't a power strip the same thing but more powerful and versatile?

Here's why this charger is different. 

Travel-friendly

Slips easily into your backpack for travel use. Portability is key if you're someone who is always on-the-go, and if you hate opening your bag and seeing a bunch of messy chargers and cables, this is for you. 

The zPower Trio is small, compact, and lightweight, so you can save space in your bag for other things. A lot of chargers on the market are unnecessarily large and heavy. We pack in as much utility as we can and make efficient use of every square inch of this charger.

If your hotel room or dorm doesn't have enough outlets or the nearest outlet is hard to reach,  the zPower Trio and its long 5ft AC lead cord will come in handy. 

Rugged, durable design

Travel-friendly means more than just portability. Who knows what will happen while you're traveling? The last thing you want is a broken charger and dead batteries on all your devices. The zPower Trio is designed to withstand all the beatings of daily use, including drops and knocks. This charger will keep chugging along and give you peace of mind.

Charge USB-C laptops

USB-C makes charging simpler. If you have a USB-C laptop like the MacBook Pro or Dell XPS 13, just connect the laptop to the leftmost port of the zPower Trio via a C to C cable.

 

Three devices, three ports: 2 USB-C + 1 USB-A

USB-C is the future of charging. That's the philosophy behind our previous project, PowerPack Ambi, and that's why the zPower Trio has two USB-C ports. In the future where USB-C is everywhere, you'll only need one cable type and one charger for all your devices. To smooth the transition to USB-C,  the single USB-A port will support legacy devices.

Fast charge your iPhone

Got an iPhone 8 or later? With a USB-C to Lightning cord, you can take advantage of 18W PD fast charging.

 

65W USB-C output for your laptop

65W is the sweet spot between a charger that doesn't have enough output to charge your workhorse laptop and a charger that is too heavy to carry. The zPower Trio is the perfect combo of power and portability.

18W USB-C output for phones and tablets

The middle port when used alone can output 18W to PD capable devices. You can use this port to fast charge your iPhone or Pixel phone. It can also charge USB-C tablets, including the iPad Pro 2018. 

18W USB-A output for fast charging

The right port is a USB-A port that when used alone can deliver 18W to your Quick Charge compatible devices. For example, if you need to fast charge your Samsung Note9 or LG phone, this is the port you'll use. This port is also good for devices like e-readers that use USB-A to Micro-USB cables.

Charge a laptop and fast charge a phone at the same time

Need to recharge your laptop and phone at the same time? No problem, even when two ports are used, the port you use for your phone will still output 18W and the port for your laptop can output 45W. 45W is plenty of power for your laptop if you are browsing the web, checking email, or watching a YouTube video. You'll only need a higher wattage output if you plan on doing battery-intensive tasks like video editing or graphics-heavy gaming.

Charge a tablet and a phone at the same time

If you have a tablet or e-reader and a phone that needs to be charged, you can charge both at the same time.

Charge a laptop + 2 phones or laptop + tablet + phone

Even when all three ports are being used, the charger will still output enough power to charge your laptop at 45W.

Engineered with compatibility in mind.

Works with a wide variety of devices, including the latest USB-C laptops, tablets, phones, and other USB devices. Here is an expanded list of compatible devices: compatibility spreadsheet.

 

Safety

Multiple layers of protection against lightning, overheating, short-circuiting, overcurrent, overvoltage, undervoltage, etc. The enclosure of the product is made of flame-retardant UL 94 V-0 rated polycarbonate.

Safety and regulatory certifications (work-in-progress): NRTL, FCC, DOE, TPCH, CA65

 

Box Contents (expected)

 

 

Who is ZMI?

ZMI USA was founded by Dr. Yunpeng Pan (Brian) in late 2016. Prior to starting the company, Brian worked as a professor teaching college mathematics, graduate-level operations research and data analytics courses at South Dakota State University. Brian holds MSc degrees in Computer Science and Operations Research and a PhD in Industrial Engineering from the University of Wisconsin-Madison. He began his career in the private sector and has many years of experience working in the communication device, e-commerce, and medical equipment development industries.

ZMI USA is backed by a generous investment from Zimi Corporation. Zimi Corporation is the exclusive mobile power accessories supplier and a subsidiary of Xiaomi, Inc and specializes in the design and manufacturing of backup battery packs, power adapters, and charging cables for cell phones, tablets, laptops, and other mobile/smart devices. ZMI USA's best-known product is the PowerPack 20K, which has been the Wirecutter's #1 choice among the Best USB Power Banks for Laptops since June 2018. 

ZMI USA is an independent, forward-thinking company that seeks to bring pure, simple, and economical gadgets to the US market. We believe in saving money on unnecessary embellishments and frills and passing on those savings to our customers. We spend most of our time and money improving the quality and reliability of our products and helping our customers. We only focus on two things: our products and our customers.

 

Timeline:

Progress Photos

Sketch

Rendered CAD image as of 8/2019

Handmade mockup as of 9/2018

We went through an arduous process of optimizing the wattage splitting scheme. Below is one of the transient ideas we had and eventually had to scrap.

We settled on the following wattage splitting scheme as of 10/2018. We think it's an optimal solution after factoring in various design constraints and use case considerations.

Electrical testing of one of the USB-C ports:

 

Product development is usually not a linear process. Board layout change that resulted in the flipping of the two USB-C ports:

(Before)

(After)

In 2/2019, we made a major design change to the casing: Instead of making the AC socket panel a separate piece from the main casing, we changed the tooling so that the  AC socket panel became an integral part of the main casing, and the USB port panel became a separate piece in the casing assembly.

 

We chose a coarse texture to improve scratch resistance of the casing.

 

Why Indiegogo?

Our product is already past the prototype, development, verification, certification self-test stages, and is currently in the testing and certification process. We wanted to take on some risk and develop the product beforehand, so our pledgers don't have to wait forever to see the product actually launch. This also means there's less risk for our pledgers. However, there are still some things that we need to finalize before this product is fully ready for launch.

We believe we've created an amazing product that people will love, but certification and manufacturing are expensive and risky. We need your help to get a better sense of the demand for this product. We don't want to have thousands of units lying around in our warehouse, and we don't want to have too few units and be out of stock all the time as well. In addition, this crowdfunding campaign will help us raise money to recoup some of the design and development (NRE) costs we’ve already invested into the product.

Your pledge will give us the confidence to launch this product to the market.

Press Kit

 

Support us. We'll reward you.

There is no pressure to donate to our campaign, although if you do, we’d greatly appreciate it and reward you for your generosity. You don’t have to donate, but if you could spread the word about our campaign and let people you know check it out, that would be awesome!
