story:
Short Summary

Hello! My name is Arkadiy Deliev and I am the CEO of DAPP Inc. Me and my business partners were always passionate about becoming world wide known entrepreneurs. We were even more passionate about making the world a healthier place! Last semester we had to make a presentation in Physical Education about hydration and its importance, but instead of using a regular Power Point we decided to use Android Studio for making an app, that not only describes what hydration is, but also provides useful tools any hydration seeker wants and needs.


Later, after that successful startup at our school, we decided to expand the app in its Alpha at that time to something even bigger! We decided to make it a tool for people who seek help to lose weight. We explained morbid obesity, as well as provided one very well structured food plan. If you back us up, we will construct even more plans, which can be customised especially for your weight and wanted weight in the end.

This campaign is very important to us! We are dreaming of changing the world, and you can be part of that same change! 

What We Need & What You Get

A minimum funding of $500 is needed for us to succeed! $150 of the money we earn will be used to publish the app on Android, iOS and Amazon. Half of the money left will be send to the ASMBS Foundation to help obese people battle their disease and for their further research. More about ASMBS Foundation - http://asmbsfoundation.org/about-the-asmbs-foundation/. The other half of the money that will be left after the publishing fees will be saved for later updates of the app and our university scholarships, we want our parents to be relieved from stress of paying those enormous tuition fees! But, of course, for donating curtain amounts of money on perks, you will get a lot of cool goodies!


We have got a wide range of perks! Any Amount Less Than $2 - We Thank You. $2 - We will follow you on Facebook, Twitter or Google +. $4 We will send you a personalised email to thank you (All of the above included). $8 - Become A Bronze Investor On Our Backgrounds On Facebook, Twitter and Google + (All of the above included). $16 - Become A Silver Investor On Our Backgrounds On Facebook, Twitter and Google + (All of the above except Bronze included). $32 - Become A Gold Investor On Our Backgrounds On Facebook, Twitter and Google + (All of the above except Bronze and Silver included). $64 - We will call you on Skype! (All of the above except Bronze and Silver included). $128 - We will send you the beta builds before anyone else! (All of the above except Bronze and Silver included). $256 - You will be included in the "Special Thanks" subsection (with a photo) under the "About" section on the app! (All of the above except Bronze and Silver included).

If we don't reach our goal, we will still try our best to publish the app and send all of the money left to the ASMBS Foundation. The only thing that will be cancelled are our scholarships, which is kind of sad...

The Impact

The app is targeted at Dubai, the city that we live in, but it will work flawlessly for anyone in the world! You see, it is a big problem here in Dubai, 20% of the people older than 40 years of age have developed diabetes, and half of these people are morbidly obese. It is certain that they need help, and the help needs to come fast! The climate in Dubai is also very dry and hot, so hydration is one of the key points to stay alive here!

If you are asking us if this is for real, because we are just 14 year olds, than we will have to prove you wrong! As they say in Arabic "Wallah" which basically means "I swear by everything that I've got!"

Risks & Challenges

The main risk in this campaign is time! Common, we are school students! We have got a hill of homework to be done every single day! Sometimes I go to sleep at 2 am! 


But, I will assure you, that if we have to, we will not sleep until 4 am, or even pull all nighters, but we will release the app! We think that it is even more important than education! JUST... JUST... DON"T BE WORRIED, EVERYTHING WILL BE JUST FINE AND EVENTUALLY RELEASED!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute by donating money, you could like our page at: https://www.facebook.com/dapptheapp. Be sure to invite all of your friends and post a message with #DAPP-The-App.

Also share this campaign with your friends using the Indie Go Go share tools!

We love every single person who is promoting the app and helps us turn it into reality!
story_txt:
Short Summary Hello! My name is Arkadiy Deliev and I am the CEO of DAPP Inc. Me and my business partners were always passionate about becoming world wide known entrepreneurs. We were even more passionate about making the world a healthier place! Last semester we had to make a presentation in Physical Education about hydration and its importance, but instead of using a regular Power Point we decided to use Android Studio for making an app, that not only describes what hydration is, but also provides useful tools any hydration seeker wants and needs.


Later, after that successful startup at our school, we decided to expand the app in its Alpha at that time to something even bigger! We decided to make it a tool for people who seek help to lose weight. We explained morbid obesity, as well as provided one very well structured food plan. If you back us up, we will construct even more plans, which can be customised especially for your weight and wanted weight in the end.


This campaign is very important to us! We are dreaming of changing the world, and you can be part of that same change! 


   What We Need & What You Get A minimum funding of $500 is needed for us to succeed! $150 of the money we earn will be used to publish the app on Android, iOS and Amazon. Half of the money left will be send to the ASMBS Foundation to help obese people battle their disease and for their further research. More about ASMBS Foundation - http://asmbsfoundation.org/about-the-asmbs-foundation/. The other half of the money that will be left after the publishing fees will be saved for later updates of the app and our university scholarships, we want our parents to be relieved from stress of paying those enormous tuition fees! But, of course, for donating curtain amounts of money on perks, you will get a lot of cool goodies!


We have got a wide range of perks! Any Amount Less Than $2 - We Thank You. $2 - We will follow you on Facebook, Twitter or Google +. $4 We will send you a personalised email to thank you (All of the above included). $8 - Become A Bronze Investor On Our Backgrounds On Facebook, Twitter and Google + (All of the above included). $16 - Become A Silver Investor On Our Backgrounds On Facebook, Twitter and Google + (All of the above except Bronze included). $32 - Become A Gold Investor On Our Backgrounds On Facebook, Twitter and Google + (All of the above except Bronze and Silver included). $64 - We will call you on Skype! (All of the above except Bronze and Silver included). $128 - We will send you the beta builds before anyone else! (All of the above except Bronze and Silver included). $256 - You will be included in the "Special Thanks" subsection (with a photo) under the "About" section on the app! (All of the above except Bronze and Silver included).


If we don't reach our goal, we will still try our best to publish the app and send all of the money left to the ASMBS Foundation. The only thing that will be cancelled are our scholarships, which is kind of sad...


   The Impact The app is targeted at Dubai, the city that we live in, but it will work flawlessly for anyone in the world! You see, it is a big problem here in Dubai, 20% of the people older than 40 years of age have developed diabetes, and half of these people are morbidly obese. It is certain that they need help, and the help needs to come fast! The climate in Dubai is also very dry and hot, so hydration is one of the key points to stay alive here!

If you are asking us if this is for real, because we are just 14 year olds, than we will have to prove you wrong! As they say in Arabic "Wallah" which basically means "I swear by everything that I've got!"
   Risks & Challenges  The main risk in this campaign is time! Common, we are school students! We have got a hill of homework to be done every single day! Sometimes I go to sleep at 2 am! 


But, I will assure you, that if we have to, we will not sleep until 4 am, or even pull all nighters, but we will release the app! We think that it is even more important than education! JUST... JUST... DON"T BE WORRIED, EVERYTHING WILL BE JUST FINE AND EVENTUALLY RELEASED!

   Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute by donating money, you could like our page at: https://www.facebook.com/dapptheapp. Be sure to invite all of your friends and post a message with #DAPP-The-App.

Also share this campaign with your friends using the Indie Go Go share tools!



 We love every single person who is promoting the app and helps us turn it into reality!

story: Save your pet's full genome DNA sequence so he/she dog or cat can be reproduced with a suitable mate now, or synthesized from the digital record thousands of years into the future.

story:
I'm Off To Share The Gospel In Tisovec Slovakia

In July, I will be participating in a short-term mission trip through the LCMS.  I will be serving in Tisovec Slovakia at a summer camp.  Because my family is so involved in our own local Lutheran School I love that I will participate with a Lutheran School summer camp, Evanjelické gymnázium Tisovec.  I am so excited to be joining a wonderful team of others from the LCMS.  My hope is to support the Pastor's, Missionaries, Teachers, and Volunteers who are currently serving the youth in this school and community.  I pray that through this mission the message of Christ's saving work will be shared and witnessed to the youth and their families. As I go to serve I remember that I am blessed to be a blessing to my neighbors in Slovakia and that through these efforts God's name may be glorified. 

Follow my stories and details of the mission trip on my personal blog

Under The Fig Tree

http://lisamarie24209.blogspot.com

What Support I Will Need

  • Most importantly I need to be prayed for as I  prepare for this extraordinary opportunity.
  • I am also humbly asking for funding to help cover the cost of travel expenses and supplies while I serve.  Any extra funding raised beyond the estimated trip cost ($2,500)  will be given towards a love offering for the school and community. 

Thank You For Your Support

Your support is much appreciated.  I am greatly impacted by the love and  support of my brothers and sisters in Christ. I look forward to sharing the stories of my experience with all of you upon my return.  
For those of you who find this sort of mission opportunity interesting I highly recommend considering the short term mission opportunities available through the Lutheran Chruch Missouri Synod.  http://www.lcms.org/service

story:
Qkadoo Platform Launched to the Public August 27th, 2015

My Mission and Vision

Through my own struggles in life and watching other people struggle, I became determined to do my part to make a difference in the world. Hi. My name is Shirley Lynette (Artin) Crawford, Founder and CEO of Qkadoo.

I created Qkadoo, an online platform that not only gives people from all walks of life their rightful ability to earn revenue generated from the very content they contribute to the Internet every single day, but also provide amazing value to the advertisers paying for the engaged audience attention from the users on the Internet that they have desired all along.

Why We Need Your Support

Qkadoo is experiencing explosive growth.  We have laid a solid foundation and we are ready to take Qkadoo to the next level.  Qkadoo has many other milestones to reach which include increasing our user base and securing major advertisers.

Together with your help, our goal of completing the Qkadoo platform will provide people a solid platform to earn from the content they post through the advertising revenue, a $600 Billion dollar industry.

We offer you the perks you see on the right side of this page as tokens of our appreciation, as part of our thank you for your support which are detailed in the column to your right. Thank you for sharing our vision and playing an active role in creating a change that is long overdue online.

Qdat! App Is on Its Way

Qdat! is an all-in-one app which allows you to snap pictures, create videos, share news, chat and post your favorite thoughts, videos, music and activities. Turn your mobile devices into money making machines by publishing content, checking the sponsor box and clicking submit, even while on the go. Imagine the money that could be made when something you create goes viral!

Support our Mission with a minimum $100 Funding Contribution and you can be the FIRST to download and earn using Qdat!


Qkadoo is in Patent Pending Status

Our Design, System, and Methodologies are copyright protected and have been created with cutting edge technology by a top of the line expert software engineering team. 

Ready to Share This Collaboration with the World!

My dream to create a better world by empowering people toward their personal success and financial growth will be accomplished through the Qkadoo Platform.  

Qkabid Project Auctions Give Back to the Community 

Qkadoo is excited to offer the entertainment of our Qkabid Penny Auction.  Every product that is auctioned, 100% of the proceeds goes to funding various projects, improving communities, sheltering the homeless, providing financial medical relief to the sick and wounded, feeding the hungry, and so much more.  Qkabid Penny Auction goes live in November.  So please get involved, have fun and help Qkadoo help others in dire need.

Global Gathering 

The Internet is a major part of our everyday lives.  Whether we are catching up on family, local or global news, buying, selling, taking courses to learn something new, even looking for a soul mate; at this point in time, we would be lost without the Internet.  People spend an average of 30 hours a week online.

Teens, College Students, Moms, Dads, Seniors

Everyone including the hungry, homeless, disadvantaged, and disabled will find that the Qkadoo's system is the key, capable of unlocking the door to prosperity which only a few were able to enjoy during the internet boom of the 1990's.

Qkadoo Bridges the Gap between Online Users and Advertisers

Qkadoo is the next generation Search, Social, Advertise, and Monetize platform which brings businesses' ads and Qkadoo users' content together so that everyone is a winner.  The better the content, the higher the engagement, the more ad revenue is earned and the more times the ads are actually happily viewed. It's simply brilliant! 

Qkadoo Stands Alone - Our Proof of Concept Stage is Complete

Although other social networks may entice you, in all honesty, when you look under the hood of Qkadoo, you will find it IS empowering, it IS life changing, and it IS creating a financial boost to the every day user.

Charitable Organizations and Affinity Groups

Monetizing private and public networks in ways that have never been done before, groups will now be able to engage more people with high-quality content, which will lead to invitations to donate instantly.

Imagine this ...your very own Qkadoo Private Social Network, where you will keep ALL of the advertising revenue within your network and also have a way to collect charitable contributions all in one place!

Qkadoo is Creating Real Changes Around the World

Daring to be different, Qkadoo is leading newly empowered masses to economic freedom. Our mission is to change lives for the better on a global scale.

Qkadoo has tremendous potential to become an integral part of stimulating the economy worldwide by providing an income for all who are willing to participate.

Qkadoo's platform is interesting, fun, and profitable. Our users love to spend time reading, liking, commenting, posting and sharing. They average an incredible 55 minutes and 33 seconds on the site.  Even our bounce rate proves people find value in our platform and choose to stick around.

Our Qkadoo Core Team

Our Core Team is comprised of 50 highly experienced technology, advertising, marketing, legal, charity, and business subject matter experts.  Putting our heads and resources together, Qkadoo was born. I am proud of our Core Team and extremely grateful for each one. This photo represents some of our fabulous team.

What People are Saying About Qkadoo


Thank you for your support

Owner:  Shirley Lynette Crawford

Email Contact: qkadoo@qkadoo.com

Phone Contact: 1-844-752-3661

Website:  https://qkadoo.com

story:
After exposing the BioRing and Goodsomnia Indiegogo scamspaigns, we're taking on Aido: the Next Gen Home Robot:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/aido-next-ge...

The Aido campaign wants you to believe that it has a robot that will guard your home, suggest recipes, take pictures, read stories, help with home repairs, recognize guests, play songs and movies, send and receive video chats, set your thermostat, play with a ball, entertain your pet, project interactive menus, and wake you up, among other capabilities - all for a just $549 (multimedia projector and charging base docking station sold separately for an additional $400).

Ball-rolling robots do exist - in university robotics programs and multi-million dollar companies, that have spent millions of dollars and years on robotics research, experimentation, and custom-fabricated parts.  There's one on TED that even dances like Cinderella at the ball.  And they can't do even a fraction of what the creators of the Aido campaign claim their robot can do.  In fact, it's so innovative, they claim to have won a prestegious "Game Changer" award by T3, a popular online and print tech magazine in the UK:

We wanted to verify that assertion, so we simply e-mailed T3's Editor in Chief, Rob Carney.  Here is his response:

Wait, what?  It's NOT an actual award, and T3 didn't screen worthy robotics candidates - it was PITCHED to them by - drum roll... INDIEGOGO!!!  And we of course know the reasons why: getting articles about Indiegogo campaigns published drives traffic to the campaign, thus leading to more backer contributions, with 5% of each payment transfered to Indiegogo's business checking account, while the rest waits for disbursement to the campaign.  CHA-CHING!

So what, they lied?  Oh no! I wonder what else they deceived us about...  Let's see.  How about the claim below that Aido can project a bright, visible, interactive menu on a white cutting board under bright overhead kitchen lights, without a laser beam, not to mention it projects gray objects, which, if you understand high school optics, gray or black are simply the absence of light?  That's not possible, of course, when there's multiple sources of white light directly overhead...

Oops!  The universal height of kitchen counter tops, according to the American Institute of Architects, is 36" (3 ft).  But Aido's TOTAL height is just under 3 ft.  So it can't be projecting ANYTHING onto a cutting board.  Solution?  Off comes its head and upper torso!

But once again, how does it project ANYTHING onto the counter top when its head can't even rotate down far enough to do so?  Look at the previous video screen shot - there is NO WAY that head can tilt far down enough to project an image onto a horizontal surface at ANY height!

As the kids say: EPIC FAIL.

Then they claim Aido can project movies (or the Bat Signal) onto a wall if you add the multimedia LED DLP projector for $199.  That's pretty damn cheap for a good digital projector, most of which cost $500 & up.  But whatever - let's say, for the sake of argument, they found a great volume discount deal in China.  Note that they don't specify how many lumens it's rated at - in other words, HOW BRIGHT (and by extension, HOW FAR) you can project a sharp image before it begins to fade.  To remind you, here's what you saw in the scampaign's promo video:

Kind of embarrassing, isn't it?  It's not so hard to produce a really bad promo video using unrelated images, computer graphics, and added footage, that defies the laws of optics, just like the fake and impossible kitchen counter projection in bright overhead light.  You don't have to be an expert to know we're right - use your common sense.  It just looks so unbelievably wrong...

What's in Aido's head, anyway?  The "face" is nothing but a Samsung Galaxy 3 8.0 Android tablet, mounted inside a 3D-printed enclosure.  No interactive LED DLP projector - not above the tablet or below it...



Once again: embarrassing... 

Want some more embarrassing lies?  How about the album full of videos Aido's team uploaded to their DropBox?  Here they are - watch a couple:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/oa7fayon2iyb73f/AACk...

What's the first thing you notice, if you have a keen eye?  Well, the office is illuminated from a very brightly lit hall way.  Anything inside the office - like the person in the video, Aido, furniture, walls, etc. - should be reflecting that light back.  But when you only see Aido's head, neck, and the wall and behind it are in total darkness, you just know these scenes are spliced from two different videos - one shot in well-lit conditions, the other in darkness.  Does it bother you even slightly knowing that all these videos allegedly demonstrating voice and facial recognition, machine vision, and interactive dialogue  ARE ALL FAKED????

In fact, every scene in the promo video is fake and staged.  Aido is never seen in its entirety: either the upper torso, or the lower torso.  But never together.  Never complete.  You never see Aido from ball to head.  It's just a puppet - a mock-up.  A dummy.  Don't believe it?  Watch it again.  Pause each time you see Aido.  Look for one sequence - JUST ONE - where you see Aido roll, turn, and stand, from head to floor?  (Hint: you won't find any...)  Here's some help - nearly every shot of Aido from the video:

(and don't tell us you didn't notice how Aido's blue puppy-dog eyes kept shifting and floating - as if they were added digitally in post-production - oh, wait...)

Our favorite and most endearing moment in the promo video is of course... THE PEEK-A-BOO SCENE!!!

That's a good 15-20 degree tilt there, Aido!  But what's this?  the FAQ mentions that its maximum tilt is 8 degrees???  Somebody's got some 'SPLAININ' to do!!!  To make matters worse for themselves, the Aido scammers mention in that same FAQ entry that if Aido is about to fall over (i.e., a tilt past 8 degrees), retractable legs pop out just in time to save it from a bad warranty-voiding fall:

Wait, WHAT???  Legs?  WHERE?   Certainly not in the slick rendering full of fake components and imaginary drive wheel configurations:

Even Space X had a bitch of a time getting its 3-legged stage rocket from falling over at the end of a flawless landing.  But since there's no room in Aido's crowded body for a complicated retractable leg mechanism just above the fake-as-hell drive mechanism, why bother adding it?  Why bother explaining how the legs actuate and lock in place?  (Hint: they don't exist...)

 And finally - let's ask this simple question:  Who is making Aido?  Apparently a bunch of Indians who snagged an office at 2600 El Camino Real, Palo Alto, CA. 94306...  Wait - no suite number?  No floor number?  Do they have the entire building to themselves???

They call their company "Ingen Dynamics."  Why does that sound familiar?  OH YEAH!!! Ingen is the name of the fictitious company founded by fictitious gazillionaire John Hammond in the science-fiction blockbuster, Jurassic Park:

Now why has no other Real World company used that name since the movie came out in 1993?  The answer, simply, is that Universal Studios owns the copyright to the name, and nobody else can use it.

 

If Universal wanted to, they could sue the Aido campaign for copyright infringement and win a handsome judgment.

Let's see what these two Universal executives have to say about it (yep, we contacted them for comment):

 

 

 

Interestingly, in Swedish, Danish, and Norwegian, Ingen means "no-one."  How fitting is that for a product that doesn't exist?

In conclusion: we've raised A LOT of difficult questions about Aido's claims, performance, capabilities, cost, shipping date, lack of evidence of working prototypes, faked videos and ludicrous simulations.  We're not robotics experts.  We're not criminal investigators.  But we're not stupid, and we used our common-sense, healthy skepticism, and critical thinking to unravel a sloppy, tangled, web of lies, deceptions, and distortions.  If you ask yourself and the campaign creators the right questions, you will inevitably reach the same conclusion we have: that Aido is vaporware - a hoax - a sham - a fraud - a fake - a scam.

Is anyone at Indiegogo responding to the warnings its received?  Nope.  No-one.  Ingen.

We'll be posting periodic updates to bring you new information and more in-depth analysis of this scampaign.  Until then, please pledge $1 and lend your voice to ours in the comments section.  Tell us how we're doing and if we missed a critical detail.  If you post anything usable, we will give you full credit in the updated story or allow you to write & post your own update!

If you're already a backer - do whatever is legally possible to obtain a refund or credit-card charge-back.  Warn others.  Comment on blind endorsements and favorable puff-piece articles on Aido published by the oblivious digital media, which could care less if Aido is a scam, as long as the story drives traffic to their advertisers.  Remember that Indiegogo ACTIVELY SOLICITS these media sites, tech blogs, and even PR and marketing firms!  While you might not feel it's worthwhile, report Aido to Indiegogo.  If they get enough reports, it might reach critical mass and lead to action.  Post your tough questions and genuine concerns in the Aido scampaign's comments section.  We did very early on, but our comments were deleted or ignored, and our pledges refunded, effectively silencing us.  The Aido scammers have already made off with close to $1 million on Indiegogo.  In Demand means that Indiegogo cuts them weekly checks based on new contributions.  That's YOUR money they stole, or worse - money belonging to a friend or relative YOU referred to the scampaign.   How does that make you feel now?

There's more to come, so "heart" this campaign and expect our first update soon!

I wonder what else they deceived us about...  Let's see.  How about the claim below that Aido can project a bright, visible, interactive menu on a white cutting board under bright overhead kitchen lights, without a laser beam, not to mention it projects gray objects, which, if you understand high school optics, gray or black are simply the absence of light?  That's not possible, of course, when there's multiple sources of white light directly overhead...Oops!  The universal height of kitchen counter tops, according to the American Institute of Architects, is 36" (3 ft).  But Aido's TOTAL height is just under 3 ft.  So it can't be projecting ANYTHING onto a cutting board.  Solution?  Off comes its head and upper torso!But once again, how does it project ANYTHING onto the counter top when its head can't even rotate down far enough to do so?  Look at the previous video screen shot - there is NO WAY that head can tilt far down enough to project an image onto a horizontal surface at ANY height!As the kids say: EPIC FAIL.Then they claim Aido can project movies (or the Bat Signal) onto a wall if you add the multimedia LED DLP projector for $199.  That's pretty damn cheap for a good digital projector, most of which cost $500 & up.  But whatever - let's say, for the sake of argument, they found a great volume discount deal in China.  Note that they don't specify how many lumens it's rated at - in other words, HOW BRIGHT (and by extension, HOW FAR) you can project a sharp image before it begins to fade.  To remind you, here's what you saw in the scampaign's promo video:Kind of embarrassing, isn't it?  It's not so hard to produce a really bad promo video using unrelated images, computer graphics, and added footage, that defies the laws of optics, just like the fake and impossible kitchen counter projection in bright overhead light.  You don't have to be an expert to know we're right - use your common sense.  It just looks so unbelievably wrong...What's in Aido's head, anyway?  The "face" is nothing but a Samsung Galaxy 3 8.0 Android tablet, mounted inside a 3D-printed enclosure.  No interactive LED DLP projector - not above the tablet or below it...Once again: embarrassing... Want some more embarrassing lies?  How about the album full of videos Aido's team uploaded to their DropBox?  Here they are - watch a couple:https://www.dropbox.com/sh/oa7fayon2iyb73f/AACk...What's the first thing you notice, if you have a keen eye?  Well, the office is illuminated from a very brightly lit hall way.  Anything inside the office - like the person in the video, Aido, furniture, walls, etc. - should be reflecting that light back.  But when you only see Aido's head, neck, and the wall and behind it are in total darkness, you just know these scenes are spliced from two different videos - one shot in well-lit conditions, the other in darkness.  Does it bother you even slightly knowing that all these videos allegedly demonstrating voice and facial recognition, machine vision, and interactive dialogue  ARE ALL FAKED????In fact, every scene in the promo video is fake and staged.  Aido is never seen in its entirety: either the upper torso, or the lower torso.  But never together.  Never complete.  You never see Aido from ball to head.  It's just a puppet - a mock-up.  A dummy.  Don't believe it?  Watch it again.  Pause each time you see Aido.  Look for one sequence - JUST ONE - where you see Aido roll, turn, and stand, from head to floor?  (Hint: you won't find any...)  Here's some help - nearly every shot of Aido from the video:(and don't tell us you didn't notice how Aido's blue puppy-dog eyes kept shifting and floating - as if they were added digitally in post-production - oh, wait...)Our favorite and most endearing moment in the promo video is of course... THE PEEK-A-BOO SCENE!!!That's a good 15-20 degree tilt there, Aido!  But what's this?  the FAQ mentions that its maximum tilt is 8 degrees???  Somebody's got some 'SPLAININ' to do!!!  To make matters worse for themselves, the Aido scammers mention in that same FAQ entry that if Aido is about to fall over (i.e., a tilt past 8 degrees), retractable legs pop out just in time to save it from a bad warranty-voiding fall:Wait, WHAT???  Legs?  WHERE?   Certainly not in the slick rendering full of fake components and imaginary drive wheel configurations:Even Space X had a bitch of a time getting its 3-legged stage rocket from falling over at the end of a flawless landing.  But since there's no room in Aido's crowded body for a complicated retractable leg mechanism just above the fake-as-hell drive mechanism, why bother adding it?  Why bother explaining how the legs actuate and lock in place?  (Hint: they don't exist...) And finally - let's ask this simple question:  Who is making Aido?  Apparently a bunch of Indians who snagged an office at 2600 El Camino Real, Palo Alto, CA. 94306...  Wait - no suite number?  No floor number?  Do they have the entire building to themselves???They call their company "Ingen Dynamics."  Why does that sound familiar?  OH YEAH!!! Ingen is the name of the fictitious company founded by fictitious gazillionaire John Hammond in the science-fiction blockbuster, Jurassic Park:Now why has no other Real World company used that name since the movie came out in 1993?  The answer, simply, is that Universal Studios owns the copyright to the name, and nobody else can use it. If Universal wanted to, they could sue the Aido campaign for copyright infringement and win a handsome judgment.Let's see what these two Universal executives have to say about it (yep, we contacted them for comment):   Interestingly, in Swedish, Danish, and Norwegian, Ingen means "no-one."  How fitting is that for a product that doesn't exist?In conclusion: we've raised A LOT of difficult questions about Aido's claims, performance, capabilities, cost, shipping date, lack of evidence of working prototypes, faked videos and ludicrous simulations.  We're not robotics experts.  We're not criminal investigators.  But we're not stupid, and we used our common-sense, healthy skepticism, and critical thinking to unravel a sloppy, tangled, web of lies, deceptions, and distortions.  If you ask yourself and the campaign creators the right questions, you will inevitably reach the same conclusion we have: that Aido is vaporware - a hoax - a sham - a fraud - a fake - a scam.Is anyone at Indiegogo responding to the warnings its received?  Nope.  No-one.  Ingen.We'll be posting periodic updates to bring you new information and more in-depth analysis of this scampaign.  Until then, please pledge $1 and lend your voice to ours in the comments section.  Tell us how we're doing and if we missed a critical detail.  If you post anything usable, we will give you full credit in the updated story or allow you to write & post your own update!If you're already a backer - do whatever is legally possible to obtain a refund or credit-card charge-back.  Warn others.  Comment on blind endorsements and favorable puff-piece articles on Aido published by the oblivious digital media, which could care less if Aido is a scam, as long as the story drives traffic to their advertisers.  Remember that Indiegogo ACTIVELY SOLICITS these media sites, tech blogs, and even PR and marketing firms!  While you might not feel it's worthwhile, report Aido to Indiegogo.  If they get enough reports, it might reach critical mass and lead to action.  Post your tough questions and genuine concerns in the Aido scampaign's comments section.  We did very early on, but our comments were deleted or ignored, and our pledges refunded, effectively silencing us.  The Aido scammers have already made off with close to $1 million on Indiegogo.  In Demand means that Indiegogo cuts them weekly checks based on new contributions.  That's YOUR money they stole, or worse - money belonging to a friend or relative YOU referred to the scampaign.   How does that make you feel now?There's more to come, so "heart" this campaign and expect our first update soon!

story:
Shooter's Aid Elite mobile app tool and personal trainer for ISSF, PPC and other Sport Shooters was released in android version and was accepted by the shooting community with positive response.

We are listening to all feedbacks and there is a huge demand for an IOS version.

We would be glad to develop the IOS version with our resources, however we would need the help of the community to reach our goals the more, to be able to give a FULL FREE IOS VERSION to everybody who may need the functionality of this mobile app for their trainings

Here is our ADROID VERSION: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...

story:
Dear contributors,

Visual Pathways do not promote only paper-based system but rather supports both digital and analog tools. It encourages the proper use of a paper-based system when it is most appropriate and a digital method when it is most effective.

This book is not capable of making me rich nor buying me a house; I intend to change the world by having a dominant impact on things and helping people. I want the book to be a token for the generations to come so that they can become efficient. Join hands with the growing community of those who use Visual Pathways and are improving every day.

The future sales of this book will be dedicated to the development and continuation of Visual Pathways methodology.

Your contribution is thoroughly appreciated.

YOUR FUNDS ARE SAFE

This campaign was created as a flexible as we have three funding goals, I will not keep the funds if the book is not published.

Below $1,000 - Refund the money back
$1,000 - Complete the book and send you the selected perk
$4,000 - Add illustrations to the book
$6,000 - Publish to Amazon and iBook store

Download a FREE sample - Click here

Download the FREE productivity sheets - Click here

 

Daily activity workflow

At the beginning of each day, planning is an essential part towards a fruitful and productive day. This checklist is used to make sure you have everything in place, and you are set to go on your daily activity when everything is clarified.

Going thru this list takes 30-45 minutes a day and allows you to be more relaxed and in control.

Daily activity sheet

The daily activity sheet is a single page where you keep and manage all of your todos for the day. Into this sheet, you will make plans for the upcoming daily actions you need to complete.

having a single location to support your obligations keeps your focus and eliminate distractions.

You can download the activity sheet template here

Your notebook format

Working on a notebook has a specific yet flexible format to allow you a clear view of the day to come.

 

The due date calendar

This planner tool reflects back the load of work for each day of the month. For each project, you set single lane that begins at the start date and ends at the due date. By laying all your commitments, you will be able to reflect back the amount of workload you are expected to have on each day of the month. 

Before taking any new commitments this planner will allow you to identify days of which you are probably able to commit to new responsibilities.

 

Insights from the book

Email processing - How to process incoming emails by priority and importance, recognize the emails which require your immediate attention. How to follow up on your queries and make sure nothing slips away. Creating a set of rules which allows you to respond to high-value requests and defer other emails with low importance.

Daily planning - Before starting any work, make sure that you know what is your daily tasks is made off. What are you going to finish today and what tasks you postpone? Communicate these obligations to your team and boss in a proper way. Scan your daily agenda, How much time left for work and how much spent on meetings - make the appropriate decision.

Planning for the long term - looking forward into the coming weeks, planning the timing of each obligation and commitment will allow you to become more efficient and recognize risks. How to clear them before they happen and how to mitigate them.

Allocating time for each task - After reviewing your daily work queue, Create a stable and precise planning. Budget each task with proper time segments.

How to prioritize and identify high-value tasks - On average we get about 50-70 requests a day. To which one should you obligate? What tasks will yield high revenue regarding your career and personal life?

When and how commit to due dates - When a new request comes in how would you know if you can commit to it? When can you commit on that and how would you plan your days ahead to finish them on time?

Multi-tasking - Learn how to split your time between several obligations and projects correctly, how to skip from one task to another in a very efficient way without losing focus. When to allow interruption and how to track back people who needed our attention when you could not answer them.

How to use a paper notebook - Just writing on your notebook is not sufficient, you need to properly split and define sections in your notebook so you can reference and locate documentation in time.

Methods to capture ideas - Best practices to capture ideas coming into your head, how to manage and store these ideas so you can reference them later on and get value out of them.

Properly managing meetings and agendas - Sometimes we have many meetings, better make each one efficient. Learn how to manage agenda's well and clear these meetings out of the day to have more working time.

organizing your working environment - To be effective at your work you need a properly organized working environment,  A desk and a computer which will serve you as a bench work to maximum efficiency.

What is Visual Pathways?

Visual Pathways emphasizes on utilizing your entire environment to manage your commitment rather than just using a computer screen. The flat surface of a computer tends to limit your working capacity whereas you can do a lot more than working with the finite options provided by a single mouse pointer. So why not utilize your own environment in order to enhance your creativity, right?

Regrettably, most of us are so dependent on this flat virtual world that we have ignored a significant part of our daily lives. Consequently, we have also forgotten about the physical working space and the people around us. Here the question arises how would you utilize your physical working space? Visual Pathways motivate you to use a paper-based to-do system while clearly defining the role of the computer which is to store and analyze data.

The fundamental tools in Visual Pathways are action cards and lists; each of them holds a particular task or a group of tasks which needs to be completed. A group of tasks belongs to a Silo – project. The usage of cards to hold single task gear you up. By specifying actions on individual cards, you can become more attentive with what needs to be done, since you can place the card in front of you to have a more vivid perspective of your tasks.

Putting your responsibilities outside of your computer makes them highlighted and even more visible. Progressively arranging your cards by priority, making a queue of actions and constructing a structured flow of work make you efficient. Visual Pathways enables you to learn effective routines and techniques as in how to start your morning at the office, managing reminders, and efficiently reviewing commitments daily and how to have more productive meetings.

Improvements in your performance will be evident after you will first start using this method. It will be easier for you to focus on multiple projects simultaneously. You will feel the new burst of confidence, and it will be easier for you to deal with interruptions.

Time is the only constraint that can take you forward, so pay less attention to low fulfillment actions and focus on most valuable ones in order to drive desired outcomes.

Visual Pathways is all about comprehending plethora of work and is concerned with the impact you can make in your life. It will let you perform more specifically and prospectively so that you can get least stressed and more systematic.

Benefits of Using Visual Pathways

Visual Pathways lets you focus on your individual tasks; therefore, you become more focused and clear on your goals. All you need is to plan your next day with clear aims and achievements. It tells that the goal is to become efficient, by properly budgeting everyday time so as to maximize your output. You will learn about how to properly handle emails and achieve “inbox zero”. Visual Pathways also tells you the suitable way of dealing with the interruptions such as phone calls or text messages. It lets you properly prioritize, delegate and differ what you should do.  In addition, Visual Pathways makes you create a good project plan and split big tasks into smaller ones. You can simultaneously deal with many project commitments and become a multi-tasker. Moreover, you will be able to conduct effective meetings and use your paper notebook with effectiveness. It progressively tells how to capture ideas which pop into your head and properly execute them. Furthermore, you can become a better communicator, and will be able to properly plan meetings and run them effectively. Also, you can learn standard and useful workflows for completing tasks on time and on budget whilst learning when and how to follow-up on your queries with others. Visual Pathways lets you deal with long term vacations or your absence from the office.

Who will get Benefits from this Book

This book will benefit plethora of people out there, especially those who need to deal efficiently with their commitments. People, who have bulks of projects to deal with, can learn a lot from this book. This book is extremely beneficial for you if you are working on a startup, high-tech or any other office work. In addition, this book will provide you with great ways to manage tasks if you are a mobile at your work.

Self-employees will have a significant impact from reading this book since it helps in boosting their efficiency and constructing more with the time they have.

What People Say

"What you did in the last six months is truly amazing, you have improved times fold!” - Natan, Graphic designer. 

"By using this method everything I do is now much more clear, I am more focused and relaxed"   - Adi, VP personal assistance.

"My boss tells me I have managed to do twice as much as I did before" - Ella, 2nd-year music student.

"I am going to ask people to consult with you how to do more in less time" - Ronen, My boss.

“Wow, how can you complete all these tasks and still leave at 5 pm? Teach me!” – Marom.

How The Budget is going to be spent

About me

Throughout my entire life, I have struggled to deal with deadlines, interruptions and properly managing my time. I have tried plethora of to-do software tools and other such methods but all in vain. I have least tendency to resist technology; therefore, I am a quick adaptor of it. I, thus, used every single app one can think of in order to efficiently manage my commitments, but none of them worked. After these hectic efforts, one day as I was watching TV, I saw a program about how air traffic controllers operate the incoming and outgoing flights. Seeing all that came as a surprise to me, and I realized about the level of engagement and visual of one’s to-do. I discerned if they are hidden inside notebooks or app you are always in the need to switch back then that consequently creates the lack of segment. You direly need to be engaged with your projects and tasks during your entire working day and certainly life. Taking in consideration what I saw on the air traffic controller movie, made me gradually develop a system which creates better engagement and encompasses proper workflows and disciplines to get better and right and productivity and time management. That is what we call Visual Pathways.

Who am I?

Since I was really young, I have struggled to remember things. I was very bad at remembering and memorizing. My school grades were not considerable and my ability to complete assignments was substantially poor. Today, I work as a product manager for a very successful high-tech company. My role is to create and develop vision and products which people use. I like technology and adore it. Although I believe that some of the information and techniques we are relying upon still cannot solely exist inside the computer screen. They tend to create fewer obligations and fulfill fewer commitments, and you are not properly engaged with them.

Why do you do what you do

High-end sales of this book will not make me rich nor will they let me buy a house on the beach. I am dream pursuer; my aim in life is to change things in order to make things better. I want this method to reach as many people as it can because I want to help them as I have helped my own self during the last six months. I have my own job, and I like it a lot. I want to use my future incomes which I will get from selling the book to spread and improve this method all around the globe. To do so, I need funds to make this book a changing reality.

Why I'm passionate about this project

This method has helped me so much. It is more of impossible for me to explain in words how I evidently experienced a remarkable change in my work performance. As the month passed and the system effectively got developed, people from all over my office came to my desk and asked how do I do it? How do I manage to do so many tasks simultaneously and still complete them on the appropriate time? Many amongst them asked me to teach the method and they actually followed it and I am glad to have added and changed their experience.

What you will learn

By having this book you will gain valuable insights and learn how to become the conqueror of your own time. You will significantly be able to act and move so fast around the office in terms of how to do tasks faster and efficiently. It will make your work effortless as if you are juggling your tasks in one hand while your other hand is tied up behind regardless of your'e being self-employed or a worker for a company. You wouldn’t comprehend the positive changes that this method brought and you will totally love them.

How the book is better

The method is extraordinarily unique and is really inspiring than any other system you or I might have encountered. It feels like it is made for people since it is simple and intuitive. You won’t need complicated gadgets or so-called sophisticated software to become more fruitful, but even if you want to incorporate technology, you certainly can.

How the book is different

The book and its methodology are different because it has been an event of success since it was invented for me and for the people of my friends and family. It made me feel exceptionally relaxes while I was dealing with over 13 projects at a single time. Now when I am writing this book, I have 13 projects and products I support and it all seems a lot easier than it has been ever. Before this method was implemented, I was working for straight 11 hours to keep up with all my commitments and to-do was unfortunately left unattended.

How the book is unique

This book is unique because it explains in a practical way how to make the change happen. It also explains the step by step process of implementing this method. It is decided to levels of accent and lets you construct yourself a systematic learning curve of how to control your time within in a period of a month. It will have more than 40 illustrations which will efficiently explain the logic and working process of how this system works. They are neither flowcharts nor sophisticated graph charts, which will show on practice how to deal with your obligation.

Why should people invest in this book

People should invest in this book because it changes things and it has substantially changed and improved the working methods of me and my friends, and the proof of which is evident. When you will read the book, you will feel the change running within you right after the few chapters. It will definitely make sense for people because it was designed for them.

What are you gaining

After you will implement this method, you will become so efficient that you will barely believe that the previous incompetent version of yourself was you. You will eventually become more professional and will be able to have the clairvoyance on the work to come. You will feel that your level of stress is lower, your obligations and deadlines will be in your reach and doable. Sudden interruption which will come your way won’t bother you anymore. You will be able to plan ahead any project with confidence and see into the future.

Taking in consideration what I saw on the air traffic controller movie, made me gradually develop a system which creates better engagement and encompasses proper workflows and disciplines to get better and right and productivity and time management. That is what we call Visual Pathways.Who am I?Since I was really young, I have struggled to remember things. I was very bad at remembering and memorizing. My school grades were not considerable and my ability to complete assignments was substantially poor. Today, I work as a product manager for a very successful high-tech company. My role is to create and develop vision and products which people use. I like technology and adore it. Although I believe that some of the information and techniques we are relying upon still cannot solely exist inside the computer screen. They tend to create fewer obligations and fulfill fewer commitments, and you are not properly engaged with them.Why do you do what you doHigh-end sales of this book will not make me rich nor will they let me buy a house on the beach. I am dream pursuer; my aim in life is to change things in order to make things better. I want this method to reach as many people as it can because I want to help them as I have helped my own self during the last six months. I have my own job, and I like it a lot. I want to use my future incomes which I will get from selling the book to spread and improve this method all around the globe. To do so, I need funds to make this book a changing reality.Why I'm passionate about this projectThis method has helped me so much. It is more of impossible for me to explain in words how I evidently experienced a remarkable change in my work performance. As the month passed and the system effectively got developed, people from all over my office came to my desk and asked how do I do it? How do I manage to do so many tasks simultaneously and still complete them on the appropriate time? Many amongst them asked me to teach the method and they actually followed it and I am glad to have added and changed their experience.What you will learnBy having this book you will gain valuable insights and learn how to become the conqueror of your own time. You will significantly be able to act and move so fast around the office in terms of how to do tasks faster and efficiently. It will make your work effortless as if you are juggling your tasks in one hand while your other hand is tied up behind regardless of your'e being self-employed or a worker for a company. You wouldn’t comprehend the positive changes that this method brought and you will totally love them.How the book is betterThe method is extraordinarily unique and is really inspiring than any other system you or I might have encountered. It feels like it is made for people since it is simple and intuitive. You won’t need complicated gadgets or so-called sophisticated software to become more fruitful, but even if you want to incorporate technology, you certainly can.How the book is differentThe book and its methodology are different because it has been an event of success since it was invented for me and for the people of my friends and family. It made me feel exceptionally relaxes while I was dealing with over 13 projects at a single time. Now when I am writing this book, I have 13 projects and products I support and it all seems a lot easier than it has been ever. Before this method was implemented, I was working for straight 11 hours to keep up with all my commitments and to-do was unfortunately left unattended.How the book is uniqueThis book is unique because it explains in a practical way how to make the change happen. It also explains the step by step process of implementing this method. It is decided to levels of accent and lets you construct yourself a systematic learning curve of how to control your time within in a period of a month. It will have more than 40 illustrations which will efficiently explain the logic and working process of how this system works. They are neither flowcharts nor sophisticated graph charts, which will show on practice how to deal with your obligation.Why should people invest in this bookPeople should invest in this book because it changes things and it has substantially changed and improved the working methods of me and my friends, and the proof of which is evident. When you will read the book, you will feel the change running within you right after the few chapters. It will definitely make sense for people because it was designed for them.What are you gainingAfter you will implement this method, you will become so efficient that you will barely believe that the previous incompetent version of yourself was you. You will eventually become more professional and will be able to have the clairvoyance on the work to come. You will feel that your level of stress is lower, your obligations and deadlines will be in your reach and doable. Sudden interruption which will come your way won’t bother you anymore. You will be able to plan ahead any project with confidence and see into the future.

story:
GIN : GIN (pronounced JEAN) is a person from your inner-circle, someone you can trust and rely on.

In today’s gig economy where many of us are struggling to look for work on a daily basis, how we secure our next gig or project is largely dependent on referrals from others. Such is the case for a freelance photographer, writer, graphic designer, or a skilled laborer such as a handyman or a mechanic and so on. By not being a part of the corporate work-force, our next paycheck entirely depends on who we know and can trust.  Ads are messy and usually a waste of money, and most job posting sites and services are geared towards the nine to five salary worker. That is why we are so passionate about our project G:IN SNS. We felt the need to create a platform that could enhance and expand the network of the skilled freelance artist’s and gig worker’s through their own inner circle.

G:IN is the first true SNS mobile application that can help you find a babysitter, photographer, writer, lawyer, programmer, auto dealer, travel agent, graphic designer, chef, cleaner, musician, tutor, doctor, yoga instructors and many others all through the network you already have, your own friends, family and co-workers

story:
Ever felt super overwhelmed with all your tasks? Too much work to get done, with too little motivation to even get started?

Meet Bounty Tasker.

Bounty Tasker is a gamified to-do list that combines powerful productivity features with motivating game elements to help you become productive and stay motivated all-day long.

 

Bounty Tasker has a clean interface and a simple flow that makes your experience a breeze — everything revolves around completing your real life tasks.

 

Be warned — if you start slacking, your health might decrease as surviving monsters attack you overnight!

However, don't worry one bit. Keep working on your tasks and in no time, you’ll start killing all the monsters, recover your health, and loot awesome new equipment to increase your power.

Before you even know it, you will become more productive than EVER.

 

At it's core, Bounty Tasker is a to-do list designed to truly maximize your productivity. Through a highly-praised clean and simple interface, you can access powerful productivity features that will easily help you stay organized.

 

Personal Taskboard

On your Taskboard, you can list down one-time to-do's, as well as any repeating daily tasks. You can also create checklists for each task to easily keep up with every detail.

All of these will be compiled in your done list once completed, so you'll always get to keep track of your achievements.

P.S. We're working on Weekly and Monthly tasks as well!

 

Reminders

Set a time, save, and you'll receive an alert whenever you need to be reminded of something. It's that easy! You'll never miss a thing from now on.

 

Tags and filters

Create your own personalized, colored tags to organize your Taskboard, and filter through different types of tasks easily. You won't have to worry about cluttered, overwhelming lists anymore.

 

What people love about Bounty Tasker is the game elements that have truly made a difference in their day-to-day productivity. Almost every game aspect in Bounty Tasker revolves around completing real-life tasks, so there is no distracting, monotonous gameplay activity such as farming and grinding.

 

Level up in-game, and in real life

In role-playing games, many people find themselves with a natural urge to keep growing stronger and reach for higher levels. Simulating a similar environment and applying this phenomena to our daily productivity essentially means that we can have a genuine desire to be productive and keep moving forward with our tasks!

In Bounty Tasker, all you have to do is complete your tasks to see yourself level up, and in the blink of an eye, you'll actually enjoy being super productive.

 

Health system that encourages hard work

Your health may be threatened by unfinished dailies and surviving monsters, but fret not — all you have to do is complete tasks to recover your HP and subsequently defeat the monsters!

 

Dangerous (but cute) monsters

Don't be fooled by their appearances! These monsters will ambush you and attempt to bring down your health overnight. If left surviving for a few days, their accumulated damage can be deadly —  but staying productive proves an easy way to defeat them. 

 

Get new loot and grow stronger

To kill monsters efficiently, you need to increase your power rating. That means getting new, awesome, strong items.

 

Being on your phone, Bounty Tasker is a to-do list you can bring with anywhere, whether it be for your work...

Or when you're doing a grocery run.

Our prototype is currently available on iOS, so you can already try it out. We're targeting to launch on Android by June 2018 with your help, so every dime is appreciated!

 

In Bounty Tasker, you can find a vibrant collection of pixel art amidst the modern, minimalist user interface. Ranging from the cool characters to the cutesy monsters, the nostalgic art style significantly adds on to the entire experience.

 

Our roadmap prioritizes user requests and needs, received through prelaunch surveys, App Store reviews, and email feedback. This Indiegogo campaign primarily helps us get to our next major milestone —which is the Android release— and will also help us complete the next few major features in accordance to the planned timeline.

 

Alongside this Indiegogo campaign, you can head over to crowd.bountytasker.com to participate in our ongoing event.

Simply invite your friends along to unlock the exclusive Wanderer character, get free Elite subscriptions, and behold the grand prize: a free tier upgrade to your Indiegogo perk! 

 

The more contributions we receive, the more features we can build with better speed, but that's not all — it also means more rewards for every single backer like you!

Every stretch goal will unlock a mystery reward or upgrade, so remember to share this with all your friends and get the funding multiplied!

 

1. Can I try Bounty Tasker already?

Bounty Tasker is already soft-launched on iOS, so feel free to head to the Apple App Store and download it on your iPhone or iPad.

 

2. What if I'm using Android?

The Android version will be released in 2018, hopefully in June if this Indiegogo goes well! We're super eager to bring Bounty Tasker to Android, and we thank you for waiting patiently with us.

 

3. How can I claim my perks? 

For iOS and Android users alike, you will be granted with a redeem code when the relevant perk is ready. This redeem code will be unique to you, and instructions will be included in an email sent to you when the perk is ready to be claimed.

 

4. When can I claim my perks?

Each perk's arrival date might be different based on our development schedule, as you can see under each perks' estimated delivery date. We'll definitely work on it as fast as we can to bring it to you. When it is ready, we will send you an email along with your redeem code. 

 

5. Can you add X feature to Bounty Tasker?

We are happy to work on any highly requested features by all users, including you! During development planning, we prioritize features that have a high need or demand. There's still a long way ahead of us with plenty of room and potential to improve the app, so we hope you're as excited as we are.

 

6. What if the funding goal isn't achieved?

The development speed of Bounty Tasker may end up being at slower pace, but rest assured that the development will still continue regardless. This little passion project is something we want to create to meaningfully enhance and bring fun to your life, so you have our word that we'll keep on working on it.

 

7. Can't I just cheat my way through Bounty Tasker and get to a high level?

You're accountable for your own productivity, and Bounty Tasker is here to help boost it and keep you on the right track. There's no race here — cheaters who spam task completions simply cheat their own productivity. Being honest to ourselves give us the most benefit.

 

8. I would like to find out more about Bounty Tasker. Where can I do that?

Visit our website, or our Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram to check out what we're usually brewing. You can also email us at bountytasker@gmail.com anytime — we'd love to chat!

story:
Welcome to Vigen

With data becoming more readily available we are able to build targeted adverts which speak to the customer in ways like never before.

With Vigen you are able to build unlimited dynamic adverts by introducing variable text, audio, and video clips to target audiences with precision. With our simple to use interface, you will be able to build your next advert campaign within minutes, and adopt hyper-targeting strategies in your video media plans..

To improve your advertisements, we will run your output through our Artificial Intelligence engine to ensure your advert is hitting the correct target audience, and suggest edits to increase engagements.

Our AI analyse each element in the frames of your advert to give you the best understanding of who the target audience will be by age, gender and interests.

A brand develops a single video to showcase its latest offer. With Vigen, a different message can be shown to the user depending on multiple factors.

Here’s a photo from the original video:

Here is an image of four separate videos generated by Vigen that speak to a viewer’s preferences:

Simple to use

With a simple and intuitive UI, our drag and drop interface will get you generating videos in a matter of minutes.

Powerful

Video generation takes a lot of processing power, to get your videos processed and analysed quickly we launch a dedicated multi GPU server to get 4k videos encoded in near real time. You never have to worry about hardware costs again.

Plugins

Import/Export your assets from a DAM, Google Drive, Dropbox, Twitter, Youtube or Facebook

Features

Timeline

Our integrated timeline allows you to quickly arrange a storyboard and rearrange elements with precision.

You are also able to fine tune any elements on the timeline by double clicking them to see advanced options, from start and end time to transitions.

You can create as many text, video and audio tracks as you need, and rename them to suit your needs.

Track can also be arranged and grouped to keep your video tidy.

Transitions

Some simple transitions will be available on the release of this application. Phase 2 will bring more transitions and the ability to crease your own transitions using out SDK.

Preview

When you start adding items onto the timeline you will see a live preview in the preview panel

DAM/Import

We are currently working on different Digital Asset Management API connections.

If there is a specific DAM connection you would like to see please let us know.

Export

You will be able to export videos directly to your DAM, YouTube account or download to your local machine

Progress
