story:
NEW PERK ANNOUNCEMENT!

Introducing the AZIO Retro Classic Palm Rest. Made with genuine top grain Italian leather and nested in a sturdy aluminum alloy frame, this palm rest makes no compromises in materials or quality. Designed to be the perfect complement for your Retro Classic Keyboard, the RCPR comes in Gunmetal Black, Posh White, Artisan Copper, and Walnut Elwood. 

  • 100% Genuine top grain Italian leather
  • Chrome Tanned for a softer and suppler feel
  • Aluminum alloy base with anti-slip rubber feet
  • Dimensions: 455 x 80 x 25mm (17.9 x 3.2 x 1.0in)
  • Weight: 322g (0.71lbs)

For a limited time, pre-order now and save 35% off retail price. This deal ends on 10/16/18. Shipping for the palm rest is estimated in early December, 2018.

 

 

Inspired by vintage typewriters and crafted with ultra-modern features, the Azio Retro Classic is the perfect amalgam of past, present and future. A backlit mechanical keyboard with round key caps that evoke nostalgia of yesteryear complemented with durable Zinc alloy frame and a sumptuous genuine leather or wood surface.

By combining genuine material and innovative technology in a classical typewriter-inspired form factor, we were able to achieve a new luxury in computing. We call it the Azio Retro Classic Keyboard.  


AS FEATURED IN

 

 

GENUINE & LUXURIOUS

We wanted to incorporate natural materials that not only translates into higher quality build but also bring back the nostalgia of vintage goods that are personable to the physical touch and senses. This keyboard is not just about technical specifications but to provoke a certain tangibility that one can feel and connect with.

Through countless prototyping with different materials, we decided to use genuine leather or wood for the top plate. Traditionally, these materials has always been associated with high-end customized goods and exclusiveness. It reflects taste, craftsmanship, and culture while emitting a unique charm that inspires.

 

 

FORGED. POLISHED. PLATED.

The keyboard frame is forged with zinc aluminum alloy, then polished and plated into a beautiful black chrome (or satin copper finish) to accompany the leather/wood top plate.  Hex bolts are added for structural enhancements and to add an industrial vintage element to the keyboard.

This alloy frame is corrosion free but through time and use, it will eventually start to bear weathering marks. This adds character to the product and is where we truly see the beauty of using genuine materials.

 

 

CLICKY. TACTILE. BACKLIT.

Beneath every key is a backlit mechanical switch that not only delivers a satisfying tactile feel but also illuminates each key evenly and beautifully.

 

AZIO TYPELIT MECHANICAL SWITCH

We specifically tuned the Retro Classic keyboard’s key switch to be tactile and modestly clicky, not too noisy yet reminiscent of the vintage typewriters.  

  • Operation Force: 50±10gf (40-85gf for total travel)
  • Pretravel: 1.6±0.5mm
  • Total travel: 3.6±0.3mm
  • Operating Life: 50,000,000 Cycles

 

 

 

EXCLUSIVE & EXQUISITE FINAL TOUCH

Each Retro Classic keyboard is finished with a logo plaque made with premium grade brushed aluminum. Each plaque is embossed with the product name and filled with a glossy lacquer paint for a classy shine. This exquisite finish provides a feel of luxury and exclusiveness.

 

VINTAGE CLASSIC FUSED WITH MODERN INNOVATION

 

 

 

TWO INTERFACE TYPES TO CHOOSE FROM

USB (Wired): Windows layout with USB connection only. ↓

 

Bluetooth+USB Hybrid (Wired or Wireless): Both Windows and Mac layouts are fully supported. Included are interchangeable Mac-specific key caps as indicated in orange color in the diagram below. Simply use the built-in switch to select Windows or Mac mode and swap the respective key caps. This version also have both Bluetooth and USB connections built-in. When in USB mode, simply connect the included Type-C cable to your computer and type away.

 

Bluetooth/Hybrid Version with PC Layout ↓

Bluetooth/Hybrid Version with Mac Layout ↓

Rear View of Bluetooth Version ↓

 

 

PRODUCTION & SHIPPING

All models of Retro Classic keyboards are now in production and shipping. Please see Perk details for actual shipping date estimations. During the InDemand phase of our campaign, we will only offer USA layout and free shipping to USA and Canada. There will be a $20 to $40 charge for shipping outside of USA. For customers outside of USA (including Canada), please note that you will be responsible for any applicable import Duty, VAT, or other custom related charges. We recommend you to check with your local customs to learn more about the process in your country. We will, of course, do whatever we can to assist. 

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS CHART

 

 

 

 

MEET TEAM AZIO

 

 

 

 

 

FAQ

Please email any questions or feedback to us at support@aziocorp.com. We'd love to hear from you!

Q: Are there different backlight modes available? 

A: The USB version have two backlight modes, Reactive & Breathing. The Bluetooth version does not have different backlight modes except on/off and brightness adjustment.  

Q: Will the Retro Classic ship outside the US during InDemand? 

A: Yes. We will ship internationally during InDemand but only in USA layout. 

Q: How much is shipping?

 A: Shipping is FREE to USA and Canada. There's a $20 to $40 shipping charge to rest of world. 

Q: Will there be taxes such as VAT/GST?

A: Unfortunately there may be VAT/GST outside of the US. The recipient will be responsible for the taxes levied in their respective country as well as custom clearance and duties, if any.

Q: Does the USB version of Retro Classic support Mac?

A: The USB version is designed specifically for Windows PC. It does work on a Mac to the extent of using any PC keyboard on a Mac. Limitations include the F-Hotkeys (Exposé, Mission Control, Screen Brightness, Multimedia controls) will not work and special keys will need to be familiarized. For example, Alt = Option, Windows Key = Command, Backspace = Delete, etc.  

Q: What type of mechanical switch does Retro Classic use?

A: Though the physical color may be different, these keyboards use a customized Kailh Blue switch which is clicky and tactile.

Q: What other region keyboard layouts will be offered?

A: In addition to USA layout, we are in the process of adding United Kingdom, German, Russian, Nordic, Korea, Japan, Portuguese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish, and French. 

Q: For the Bluetooth version, how long does the keyboard last on a single charge?

A: With the backlight off, we estimate it to be about a year. With the backlight on, about 2 months, depending on backlight intensity.

Q: For the Bluetooth model, what kind of cable is included? 

A: The cable included has a Type-C (male) connector on one end to connect to the keyboard and a Type A (male) connector on the other, to connect to your PC.

Q: Is the backlight color different for the three models?

A: Yes, the backlight colors for Elwood, Onyx, and Artisan is white. For Posh, the backlight color is orange.

Q: Is the surface made of genuine or artificial leather?

A: We use 100% genuine leather for the surface. Once you touch/feel/smell the leather you will know the difference. 

Q: What's the material for the key cap rings and the pillar feet?

A: The key cap rings are electroplated plastic and the pillar feet is made of plastic.

 

WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING...

 “I have a complaint about my Retro Classic Artisan keyboard. It’s so beautiful - such a work of art - that I have trouble getting my work done because I just stare at the keyboard. It’s just this classic piece of completely retro industrial art I can’t take my eyes off of. This is all your fault.”
-Thomas Leo

"Hi Folks. Got my Elwood yesterday. It's gorgeous! Your product belongs in MoMA (The Museum of Modern Art) or the Steampunk Hall of Fame. Thanks! More please..."
-Ian Lim

“Just got mine today and holy poop is this thing rad… the detail not only in the keyboard itself but the packaging, contents and the warranty card ;) had to buy another one for my other iMac so we can match now!!! thanks so much!!”
-Kevin James

“The back light is such an added bonus! Great conversation starter at the office. Elegant, cool and functional. Love this keyboard!”
-Kathleen Dotoli

“Hey folks – absolutely loving my Artisan, which is getting many amazed comments at work. Very excited to hear that a matching mouse is planned – hoping it’ll be ambidextrous for left-handed folk like me…”
-Colm Buckley

“Hello, I just received my Onyx keyboard and I’m loving it (this is my first Azio product). I want to congratulate you for doing this exquisite piece. On the other hand, I would like to ask for any update on the status on the unique backers plaque I once read about. Is there any extra info on that? Once again, congratulations for making this elegant keyboard (now I’m typing just because I like how it feels to type on this keyboard). Thank you very much. Keep up the good work!”
-Luis Felipe Meneses

"It’s wonderful! It took my breath away when I opened the box. So beautiful.”
-Natalia Sokolova

“Hey guys, received my keyboard today and just wanted to give you props!! It is absolutely AWESOME!! Never had so much fun banging away on the keys. You guys did a fantastic job, really like the new ELEGANTLY FIERCE plate. I also want to commend you on the packaging, great job all around!! You can really tell when a company loves what they do, the small details do matter. Congrats!!!”
-Jerry Mitchell

“Just got mine in and it is absolutely beautiful! Congrats on a job well done! I plan on buying another one!!!”
-Dave S

“Received yesterday and it is INCREDIBLE! I have never seen so many of my coworkers get so envious of a keyboard. :)”
-Jason Tucker

“Just got my keyboard today! I am loving it so far. The keyboard looks like top quality in every aspect. Great job with the packaging and presentation as well.”
-Mike

“I just wanted to say that I received my keyboard and it is BEAUTIFUL! Amazing packaging and beautifully functional. LOVE!”
-Quyen Epstein-Ngo 

"Thank you for a fantastic keyboard! I love it so much I fear the loss I will experience when it inevitably ceases working (hopefully later rather than sooner). Beautiful packaging, easy key switchout, great action, wonderful features. THANK YOU!!!"
-E. Francis Kohler

"I received my keyboards before Christmas & I love them. I’m using the Artisan & everyone that sees it comments on it, it looks amazing! It also feels amazing typing on it, I love the clicking feel & sounds it reminds me of an old typewriter. It’s also much heavier then I thought. I started taking online typing lessons again, I type fairly well but I really enjoy typing on this keyboard. I can say that this is one of the best projects I’ve ever funded till now. What an awesome job you guys did!"
-JaMina EnGram

"Very much enjoying my Azio Posh bluetooth keyboard :-) It feels lovely and smooth. It looks slick and refined. I can tell Team Azio poured their heart and soul into the production. It's incredible to experience first-handed the craftmanship and devotion that brought this amazing product to life~ "
-Sumin Lee

"I just got my numbered plaque with all the necessary screws and its own wrench to replace it on my keyboard! Still happy and in LOVE with it. Thank you again for such a wonderful product. It was definitely worth the wait!"
-Kori W

"Keyboard is great! Everything about it screams high class. When do we get a chance to buy a mouse with the same style?"
-Chris Rebstock

"Hi! Just wanted to say, I am a very happy owner of an ONYX BT version. Fantastical keyboard to use, the look and feel is breathtaking. It looks fabulous in front of my iMac 27. I certainly hope that You will go on creating a BT mouse or trackpad in the same style!"
-Geir Th. Follestad

"mine came a week ago and is even better than i hoped, It oozes quality and class. A pure pleasure to type on. Only problem i have now is my mouse looks like garbage when compared to the keyboard, any suggestion?"
-Sam Faulkner

"So, after 5 Months and nine days I have my Exotic New retro copper/black Keyboard – WOW and WOW again I am actually typing this message with it. And more than worth the wait – Took about 5 seconds to set up as Bluetooth and is working perfectly. What a lovely looking machine and as promised the machine is made using beautiful materials – Do we get the Founders Plaque or not? Looking forward to hearing from you"
-grandennis

"Hi all, I just want to say a big thank you. Just plugged in my new keyboard. Amazing product. Im a film editor and use it my keyboard in my edit suite. My clients are very impressed. Thank you for an incredible product."
-Clay Lonie Jr.
story_txt:
NEW PERK ANNOUNCEMENT!Introducing the AZIO Retro Classic Palm Rest. Made with genuine top grain Italian leather and nested in a sturdy aluminum alloy frame, this palm rest makes no compromises in materials or quality. Designed to be the perfect complement for your Retro Classic Keyboard, the RCPR comes in Gunmetal Black, Posh White, Artisan Copper, and Walnut Elwood. 
100% Genuine top grain Italian leather
Chrome Tanned for a softer and suppler feel
Aluminum alloy base with anti-slip rubber feet
Dimensions: 455 x 80 x 25mm (17.9 x 3.2 x 1.0in)
Weight: 322g (0.71lbs)
For a limited time, pre-order now and save 35% off retail price. This deal ends on 10/16/18. Shipping for the palm rest is estimated in early December, 2018.  Inspired by vintage typewriters and crafted with ultra-modern features, the Azio Retro Classic is the perfect amalgam of past, present and future. A backlit mechanical keyboard with round key caps that evoke nostalgia of yesteryear complemented with durable Zinc alloy frame and a sumptuous genuine leather or wood surface.By combining genuine material and innovative technology in a classical typewriter-inspired form factor, we were able to achieve a new luxury in computing. We call it the Azio Retro Classic Keyboard.  AS FEATURED IN  GENUINE & LUXURIOUSWe wanted to incorporate natural materials that not only translates into higher quality build but also bring back the nostalgia of vintage goods that are personable to the physical touch and senses. This keyboard is not just about technical specifications but to provoke a certain tangibility that one can feel and connect with.Through countless prototyping with different materials, we decided to use genuine leather or wood for the top plate. Traditionally, these materials has always been associated with high-end customized goods and exclusiveness. It reflects taste, craftsmanship, and culture while emitting a unique charm that inspires.  FORGED. POLISHED. PLATED.The keyboard frame is forged with zinc aluminum alloy, then polished and plated into a beautiful black chrome (or satin copper finish) to accompany the leather/wood top plate.  Hex bolts are added for structural enhancements and to add an industrial vintage element to the keyboard.This alloy frame is corrosion free but through time and use, it will eventually start to bear weathering marks. This adds character to the product and is where we truly see the beauty of using genuine materials.  CLICKY. TACTILE. BACKLIT.Beneath every key is a backlit mechanical switch that not only delivers a satisfying tactile feel but also illuminates each key evenly and beautifully. AZIO TYPELIT MECHANICAL SWITCHWe specifically tuned the Retro Classic keyboard’s key switch to be tactile and modestly clicky, not too noisy yet reminiscent of the vintage typewriters.  
Operation Force: 50±10gf (40-85gf for total travel)
Pretravel: 1.6±0.5mm
Total travel: 3.6±0.3mm
Operating Life: 50,000,000 Cycles
   EXCLUSIVE & EXQUISITE FINAL TOUCHEach Retro Classic keyboard is finished with a logo plaque made with premium grade brushed aluminum. Each plaque is embossed with the product name and filled with a glossy lacquer paint for a classy shine. This exquisite finish provides a feel of luxury and exclusiveness. VINTAGE CLASSIC FUSED WITH MODERN INNOVATION 



 
 TWO INTERFACE TYPES TO CHOOSE FROMUSB (Wired): Windows layout with USB connection only. ↓ Bluetooth+USB Hybrid (Wired or Wireless): Both Windows and Mac layouts are fully supported. Included are interchangeable Mac-specific key caps as indicated in orange color in the diagram below. Simply use the built-in switch to select Windows or Mac mode and swap the respective key caps. This version also have both Bluetooth and USB connections built-in. When in USB mode, simply connect the included Type-C cable to your computer and type away. Bluetooth/Hybrid Version with PC Layout ↓Bluetooth/Hybrid Version with Mac Layout ↓Rear View of Bluetooth Version ↓  PRODUCTION & SHIPPINGAll models of Retro Classic keyboards are now in production and shipping. Please see Perk details for actual shipping date estimations. During the InDemand phase of our campaign, we will only offer USA layout and free shipping to USA and Canada. There will be a $20 to $40 charge for shipping outside of USA. For customers outside of USA (including Canada), please note that you will be responsible for any applicable import Duty, VAT, or other custom related charges. We recommend you to check with your local customs to learn more about the process in your country. We will, of course, do whatever we can to assist.   SPECIFICATIONS CHART    MEET TEAM AZIO     FAQPlease email any questions or feedback to us at support@aziocorp.com. We'd love to hear from you!Q: Are there different backlight modes available? A: The USB version have two backlight modes, Reactive & Breathing. The Bluetooth version does not have different backlight modes except on/off and brightness adjustment.  Q: Will the Retro Classic ship outside the US during InDemand? A: Yes. We will ship internationally during InDemand but only in USA layout. Q: How much is shipping? A: Shipping is FREE to USA and Canada. There's a $20 to $40 shipping charge to rest of world. Q: Will there be taxes such as VAT/GST?A: Unfortunately there may be VAT/GST outside of the US. The recipient will be responsible for the taxes levied in their respective country as well as custom clearance and duties, if any.Q: Does the USB version of Retro Classic support Mac?A: The USB version is designed specifically for Windows PC. It does work on a Mac to the extent of using any PC keyboard on a Mac. Limitations include the F-Hotkeys (Exposé, Mission Control, Screen Brightness, Multimedia controls) will not work and special keys will need to be familiarized. For example, Alt = Option, Windows Key = Command, Backspace = Delete, etc.  Q: What type of mechanical switch does Retro Classic use?A: Though the physical color may be different, these keyboards use a customized Kailh Blue switch which is clicky and tactile.Q: What other region keyboard layouts will be offered?A: In addition to USA layout, we are in the process of adding United Kingdom, German, Russian, Nordic, Korea, Japan, Portuguese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish, and French. Q: For the Bluetooth version, how long does the keyboard last on a single charge?A: With the backlight off, we estimate it to be about a year. With the backlight on, about 2 months, depending on backlight intensity.Q: For the Bluetooth model, what kind of cable is included? A: The cable included has a Type-C (male) connector on one end to connect to the keyboard and a Type A (male) connector on the other, to connect to your PC.Q: Is the backlight color different for the three models?A: Yes, the backlight colors for Elwood, Onyx, and Artisan is white. For Posh, the backlight color is orange.Q: Is the surface made of genuine or artificial leather?A: We use 100% genuine leather for the surface. Once you touch/feel/smell the leather you will know the difference. Q: What's the material for the key cap rings and the pillar feet?A: The key cap rings are electroplated plastic and the pillar feet is made of plastic. WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING... “I have a complaint about my Retro Classic Artisan keyboard. It’s so beautiful - such a work of art - that I have trouble getting my work done because I just stare at the keyboard. It’s just this classic piece of completely retro industrial art I can’t take my eyes off of. This is all your fault.”-Thomas Leo"Hi Folks. Got my Elwood yesterday. It's gorgeous! Your product belongs in MoMA (The Museum of Modern Art) or the Steampunk Hall of Fame. Thanks! More please..."-Ian Lim“Just got mine today and holy poop is this thing rad… the detail not only in the keyboard itself but the packaging, contents and the warranty card ;) had to buy another one for my other iMac so we can match now!!! thanks so much!!”-Kevin James“The back light is such an added bonus! Great conversation starter at the office. Elegant, cool and functional. Love this keyboard!”-Kathleen Dotoli“Hey folks – absolutely loving my Artisan, which is getting many amazed comments at work. Very excited to hear that a matching mouse is planned – hoping it’ll be ambidextrous for left-handed folk like me…”-Colm Buckley“Hello, I just received my Onyx keyboard and I’m loving it (this is my first Azio product). I want to congratulate you for doing this exquisite piece. On the other hand, I would like to ask for any update on the status on the unique backers plaque I once read about. Is there any extra info on that? Once again, congratulations for making this elegant keyboard (now I’m typing just because I like how it feels to type on this keyboard). Thank you very much. Keep up the good work!”-Luis Felipe Meneses"It’s wonderful! It took my breath away when I opened the box. So beautiful.”-Natalia Sokolova“Hey guys, received my keyboard today and just wanted to give you props!! It is absolutely AWESOME!! Never had so much fun banging away on the keys. You guys did a fantastic job, really like the new ELEGANTLY FIERCE plate. I also want to commend you on the packaging, great job all around!! You can really tell when a company loves what they do, the small details do matter. Congrats!!!”-Jerry Mitchell“Just got mine in and it is absolutely beautiful! Congrats on a job well done! I plan on buying another one!!!”-Dave S“Received yesterday and it is INCREDIBLE! I have never seen so many of my coworkers get so envious of a keyboard. :)”-Jason Tucker“Just got my keyboard today! I am loving it so far. The keyboard looks like top quality in every aspect. Great job with the packaging and presentation as well.”-Mike“I just wanted to say that I received my keyboard and it is BEAUTIFUL! Amazing packaging and beautifully functional. LOVE!”-Quyen Epstein-Ngo "Thank you for a fantastic keyboard! I love it so much I fear the loss I will experience when it inevitably ceases working (hopefully later rather than sooner). Beautiful packaging, easy key switchout, great action, wonderful features. THANK YOU!!!"-E. Francis Kohler"I received my keyboards before Christmas & I love them. I’m using the Artisan & everyone that sees it comments on it, it looks amazing! It also feels amazing typing on it, I love the clicking feel & sounds it reminds me of an old typewriter. It’s also much heavier then I thought. I started taking online typing lessons again, I type fairly well but I really enjoy typing on this keyboard. I can say that this is one of the best projects I’ve ever funded till now. What an awesome job you guys did!"-JaMina EnGram"Very much enjoying my Azio Posh bluetooth keyboard :-) It feels lovely and smooth. It looks slick and refined. I can tell Team Azio poured their heart and soul into the production. It's incredible to experience first-handed the craftmanship and devotion that brought this amazing product to life~ "-Sumin Lee"I just got my numbered plaque with all the necessary screws and its own wrench to replace it on my keyboard! Still happy and in LOVE with it. Thank you again for such a wonderful product. It was definitely worth the wait!"-Kori W"Keyboard is great! Everything about it screams high class. When do we get a chance to buy a mouse with the same style?"-Chris Rebstock"Hi! Just wanted to say, I am a very happy owner of an ONYX BT version. Fantastical keyboard to use, the look and feel is breathtaking. It looks fabulous in front of my iMac 27. I certainly hope that You will go on creating a BT mouse or trackpad in the same style!"-Geir Th. Follestad"mine came a week ago and is even better than i hoped, It oozes quality and class. story:
Introducing Pero, a wearable controller that makes your smart devices even smarter. Pero turns your simple hand motions into customizable shortcuts for your device. Now, you can control the cursor and input commands with this single device so that you can focus more on getting the job done. 

 

 

AAD function | Active Applicaiton Detection

PERO can perform Active Application Detection through the User Custom Program. You can send separate commands according to each application, even with the same gesture.

 

Provide customized settings according to gesture usage patterns

Our “User Support Program” analyzes your natural gesture habits and patterns to learn your command preferences. Instead of fitting your needs to predefined shortcuts, make your own shortcuts that meet your exact needs!

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Pero also gives you full range cursor control. It does everything you want your mouse to do and more.

 

 
 

Pero lets you control the user-interface with just your gestures alone. 

Yes, just like Minority Report but better. Since this is real. Turn your simple hand motions into customizable shortcuts for your device.

 

 

 We manage applications by type. 

UCP can manage many applications easily by dividing types according to popular shortcuts and commands. And new applications can be updated faster. These advantages, combined with the AAD function, help effectively control the commands of the application through the Pero. 

 

 

Upcoming Supported applications 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 

* Pero is not fully compatible with drone control at the moment. The video above is a demo test.

 

 

 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Pero also gives you full range cursor control. It does everything you want your mouse to do and more.

 
 
 
 
Palmcat’s Gesture Sensing Algorithm detects movement on the back of your hand while the touch panel strapped around the palm tracks the pressure from each of your fingers. Combining these two factors give you an almost unlimited choice of combinations! For example, even if you swipe your hand horizontally, it’ll carry different meanings depending on which fingers you place on the touch panel.

 

 

Comfortable Wrist

The positioning of the arm while using Pero prevents the build up of pressure and pain in the wrist. But Ordinary mice force the wrist into a bent shape  which causes discomfort and pain over time

 

When working with a mouse, you have to always work in the same pose and posture. However, you can work in a variety of poses and poses.

 

 

 

 PERO does not need space to control the cursor.

So Pero reduces the time you spend moving between the mouse and trackpad. It also helps you use your computer efficiently even in a desk-free working environment.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The movement of the hand is captured by the IMU sensor located on the back and the movement is detected through gestures through Palmcat's GR algorithm. The GR algorithm is a technique that can calculate each gesture in a lightweight chipset environment without the need for a separate analysis process or system by utilizing the advantages of the Palmcat hardware.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
The thumb button was designed to work like a mouse click. It’s placed right next to your thumb so all options to click, right-click, or drag are within finger reach.
 
 
Our fingers do a lot more than we give them credit for.  

Think of the diverse purpose that each finger serves. The subtle differences in a tap, press, and pinch. The array of meanings they convey. We took the admiration of our nifty fingers to heart by utilizing their full potential in Pero. Its highly sensitive touch sensor recognizes each individual fingertip and when they’re being pressed down.

 
 
 
 

Simply connect it just like connect your wireless earbuds, easy and effortless! No external receiver needed. And PERO uses BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy). So you can use 37 hours on a 30-minute charge. 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Setting appropriate commands in advance according to the user's gesture usage pattern, 
  • Improve the accuracy by grasping the position of the finger touching the palm, 
  • It detects the application you are using and delivers the command.
  • It helps you set the commands you want in gestures.

UCP is our team's best gift to PERO buyers.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

You could be typing away, drinking coffee, or chatting with your coworkers. Thanks to its 4mm-thin palm strip, Pero remains unobtrusive for you to wear as you carry out the rest of your day’s tasks.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
As an IT engineer, I used to work in small and confined spaces which forced me to use the trackpad or track pointer because I didn’t have enough room for a mouse. However, when I was working with a lot of cursor control, I gradually began to experience more pain in my elbows up to the point where it was difficult to move my arm. This led me to imagine a device that could recognize the movement of my hand.
 
 
 

And so, after years of research and development, I came up with a device that could recognize gestures and translate it into specific commands. This is how Pero was born in 2017, but the current version of Pero is the most popular version among the people who participated in our user experience research tests (28 touch panel silicon insertion tests, 28 touch panel types, 9 product designs, 8 board modifications, and 8 sets of molds produced). We are doing our best and will continue to work hard in order to create innovative products that will provide incredible value for anyone!

 

  • Process of developing the touch panel

In order to make a recognition panel that can accurately recognize gestures even when worn roughly, a capacitive touch sensor was included in the design. However, it was necessary to make a panel to block the natural static electricity that can form in the palm while simultaneously recognizing the static electricity on the fingers. Eventually, we were able to succeed and ended up creating a thin but powerful discernment panel that accomplished everything we wanted it to accomplish.

  • Software

User support software is where we focused a lot of our efforts in order to make it easy and simple for anyone to use. In the future, we planning on further developing the software so that more third-party applications are integrated and that additional customized gestures can be recognized. In order to reach this next step, we will try to develop motion recognition optimization by making sure that Pero outputs can be analyzed by 2,800 data bits per second.


 

Risks and challenges

Our team has prepared to launch a crowdfunding for months. We understand that there are risks and challenges involved with launching and fulfilling a crowdfunding. In order to prevent any mistakes from occurring, we have partnered with several crowdfunding experts to cover each aspect of our campaign. That means that from campaign transparency to fulfilling rewards, we have every base covered. However, since this is our first time creating a product of this scale, there may be some unforeseen hurdles that we may have to overcome. If issues do arise and impact the quality of the product or delay the shipment of rewards then we will do our best to overcome the problem and be completely transparent with our backers.

However, we are not free from the influence of COVID-19. Please understand that COVID-19's impact will become stronger, which could disrupt the production schedule.

story:
"MadeInItaly is Ferrari and Lamborghini, Versace and Gucci, Pizza and Spaghetti, da Vinci's Gioconda and Tower of Pisa, Verdi's Traviata and Villa's Volare... Your contribution now is for a New Italian Project... Don't waste your time!"


Hello, we are       

two Italian Brothers with an age difference of 10 years and who sadly are forced, because of work, to live a thousand kilometres apart but who dream one day to be re-united at last. We just founded the Easy Solution srls company to product and commercialize our patent pending Idea, which we firmly believe in and whose preview we are gladly presenting here. The success of this project will fulfil our desire to get together again working on a common project. 

A traditional selfie only includes the usual close-up of just few faces, no one elements essential to preserve in a static image the poetry and memories surrounding a special moment.

a traditional selfie:  

our idea of selfie:


So, in our view, shooting selfies at arm's length is outdated and very limiting indeed! We wondered why would one bother to repurpose randomly found objects on the street such as cans, stones or side-walks which ultimately result in a poor camera angle and image quality and with the associated risk of damaging the mobile device, when we can create an ad hoc support?

That's where the idea came from.


Characteristics

Universal stands, for both smart phones and mini-tablets, innovative in terms of functionalities and design, allowing multiple tilt angles for different uses. Not only limited to selfies, it can also take for instance video recordings without the unpleasant flickering of your child's school play or of your boyfriend's live music concert, and audio recordings of your lessons and meetings, so you can comfortably take notes hands free, videocall and periscope app.

They are completely made in Italy, 

and are so so useful, nice, lightweight, compact, portable, fashionable and colourful that carrying them with you will never be an issue, whether in your bag, pouch, or even attached to your keys as with the key chain version.

It's true, there are other solutions around that look similar ranging from from simple stands, tripods to mechanical arms but each one has got some limitations in terms of functionality, aesthetic and practicality and most importantly none of them groups together all the benefits that MySelf and KeySelf concentrate in a single object.

These characteristics have allowed us to file a patent application that we are planning to extend worldwide, despite the higher costs.



Support

Your opinion is very important for us. We would ask you to leave us a comment about your doubts, or if you have any question or suggestion. 

We firmly believe this object has a lot of potentials, being a useful and economical solution, an object so useful that everyone should own one and that once adopted it will be difficult to do without. 

Your support is very important to us, because it makes us feel even more enthusiastic about it. But your economic support is important because it helps us to amortise costs of startup. It is difficult today start a business, but our dream is succeed and create jobs.

Please support our project at a special introductory price and you will be amongst the early adopters of an accessory that very few people currently know about, but that soon many more will get to use. Your support will help towards the costs of the moulds needed to take the the first batch to production. This is for us a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity and with your trust we will not miss it!


App for FREE

We want to reward you with a gift: our smartphones app that allows delayed automatic shooting and voice controlled shooting. 

A simple and intuitive app with different Filter Color Effect that lists all the pictures taken and allows sharing them with your contacts.


Contacts

If you have any questions, please write as at postmaster@selfieandstand.com, we will answer soon as possibile.


How to choose

At the end of campaign, we will send and email, and you will choose between keychain (KeySelf) and simple stand (MySelf), and between different colors available.


How does it works



Who we are


Follow us on TWITTER, FACEBOOK, INSTAGRAM...

The MySelf&KeySelf Fever Explodes!



disclaimer: we assume no responsibility for improper use of the stand

Patent Pending

story:
The pleasure of building your own toys.

We believe that constructing and playing with our own toys is as primordial as it has been for the Human race to learn and build things.
It’s that need to see things take shape, to create, to learn and to play with them.

Your support will help us to have an in-house printing and finishing solution for our paper toys. We’ll reduce our production costs, making it much easier to create and to share our paper toys ”all over the World”.

In return, you’ll be the first to receive our newest paper toys.




We love to feel that our creations bring joy and happiness to everyone.

Our new paper toys have a new MAXI Series specially developed for this crowdfunding. Each MAXI Series Kit contains 2 Paper Toys - the adult and the juvenile.

This new MAXI Series Paper Toys is the answer to our inner instincts to cuddle
and to love our favorite animals, without removing them from their natural habitats.

You can bring them to your home, office or any other place you want,
without causing any harm to the environment. 

The new Animal Series Paper Toys Kits have a special feature - you can move their heads. In the Robots Paper Toys Kit you can play with some new features: make them walk, stretch arms, change faces and even make them hug each others!

All of these new paper toys are the perfect way to interact with your family, friends and co-workers. You can animate them, create stories and share them online
with everyone. 

As we say, to cut, fold, glue and play.















































PUKACA was founded in 2005 by the designers Isabel Vaz & Nuno Dias. 
Isabel loves to draw small creatures and Nuno loves to make them alive. In 2015, Sara Vaz joined our design team, bringing her bright and fresh ideas to PUKACA.

Isabel & Nuno started to work together in the university and some years later decided to create their our own brand – PUKACA – and began to put ideas into practice. Now, PUKACA is a company that is committed to design and manufacture unique paper toys.


Isabel Vaz
She´s the soul of PUKACA. Isabel has a work background in industrial design
due to her unique Research Design skills combined with 20 years teaching
Arts & Design. Her countless sketchbooks with thousands of hand drawn creatures are a proof that many more wonders are ready to come to life in a near future.

Nuno Dias
Since early ages, he’s been creating and constructing things. Nuno worked for 20 years on some of the most challenging design projects in Portugal.
He specializes in product design, development, branding, marketing
and he’s a wizard in print production.

Sara Vaz
Sara is a designer with unmatched design skills in graphic design and multimedia.
She specializes in product design and her work methodology is as bright and fresh as her ideas. Her expertise in animation and Japanese culture are truly precious.


Our mission is to make your days colorful ones.

Our toys are genuine. They aim to enhance in the child, or in whom handles them, an active and creative intervention.

Creating each paper toy is a great challenge. From the initial idea to the final product there are countless prototypes and hours of hard (fun!) work.

We’re always delighted with the traditional tales, the Brothers Grimm tales,
the La Fontaine fables, the Medieval stories, the Natural World and all the other worlds that belong to the children’s imaginary.

We believe in the principle that the difference enriches us. It’s important to have toys that raise creativity, provide new experiences, highlight the human individuality and allow interactivity with others.


PUKACA chooses to design paper toys in which it knows the origin
of its components, its type of production and raw materials involved. 

In our paper toys we only use 100% recycled paper – from PEFC and FSC certified suppliers. This 250 gm2 - 92 lb recycled paper it’s easy to cut and solid for the task.

All kits are packed in crystal plastic and heat sealed to guarantee the hygiene
and safety of your paper toy.



We have a wonderful feedback about our paper toys. Our work has been featured by Apartment Therapy, Anorak Magazine, LMNOP Magazine, Do It Yourself Magazine, Etsy, My Child Magazine, A Lovely Lark, Design Is Yay, Oh Happy Day, Popsugar, Bambino Goodies, Mum’s Grapevine, Style.it and in Loubilou's Small Wonders.


One year ago, we decided that we would start this crowdfunding.
Before it started, we wanted to have the products tested and ready to ship on time.

We aren’t talking about a concept, we’re talking about a finished range of wonderful paper toys. We’ve just finished testing our final versions and they’re ready to go.We can guarantee you that our paper toys are ready to be shipped in time
for 2015 Christmas - shipping in middle of November.

Your support will be the cherry on top of a one year cake, of course. : )



- How will I choose my Paper Toys?
You'll be contacted by us via your email. You'll be asked to choose which kits you want to receive through an online form.

- If this project doesn’t get completely funded will I receive my paper toys?
Yes, we’ll have them ready for shipping. All rewards will be shipped even without reaching the goal. That’s why we took 1 year preparing everything.

- Will you ship my paper toys on middle of November 2015?
Yes. We’ve got 5 years of experience developing and delivering paper toys and until today we’re proud of having a 100% success rate in thousands of orders shipped worldwide.

- How will you send my order?
All paper toys will be sent via CTT International Priority Mail.

story:
Locate our booth on map



Oronote sticks to any firm surface. No more fumbling with paper sticky notes, searching for a pen or having notes drop to the floor. Simply write or record messages using the Oronote app.




When Oronote has something to say, it lets everyone know by lighting up and announcing that there is a message waiting. They can then tap or walk by to hear its message.





Oronote is packed with sensors. Motion, temperature, tap accelerometer, ambient light and time can all be used to deliver your message at the right moment.




Stick Oronote on any magnetic surface using its strong magnets. An included wall plate screws onto surfaces like brick or tile to let you dock and undock Oronote magnetically anywhere you want.






Oronote’s versatile, simple-to-use app works with both iOS and Android devices. Use it to store/manage dozens of messages with different trigger actions and control Oronote’s settings.





For typed messages, Oronote app’s smart text-to-speech engine supports multiple languages. Messages can also be left via the microphone in your own voice.





Oronote can replace stacks of sticky notes. Save paper, save the environment and save your refrigerator from becoming a multi-colored mess.





Oronote does more than just playing back notes and messages. It can announce the time and temperature after set intervals or when someone taps.





Oronote understands the value of beauty rest. You can set it to “do not disturb” mode using the Oronote app so that it will never activate during certain hours.





Change the color of Oronote’s “message waiting” glow to fit your fancy. You can also adjust other settings like message playback volume.





Oronote doubles as a motion-detecting night light that can be set to light up at certain times. It also can optionally announce the time and temperature when you wake up.





  • Arm Cortex-M3 Processor
  • Sensitive Passive Infrared Sensor
  • High Accuracy Temperature Sensor
  • Low Power Accelerometer
  • Ambient Light Sensor
  • Impact resistant Infrared Transparent Enclosure
  • Dimensions: width: 110mm , height: 105mm, depth:40mm 
    (48mm with wall mounting plate)
  • Bluetooth (Classic and 4.0 LE)
  • Wi-Fi (802.11 a/b/g)
  • High Fidelity Speaker
  • Neodymium (NdFeB) N48 grade strong magnets
  • High quality RGB LED
  • Micro USB charging port
  • Li-Ion Rechargeable 1000mAh 3.7V battery
    * Final specifications subject to change.











 


Visit us @ www.oronote.com for FAQ and more information.

story:
The average person spends about 20secs  - 1min to lock/unlock a door each time. That's 40secs - 2 mins on average people spend a day locating their keys just to unlock/lock a door !! The noise of dangling keys drove me nuts, the noise !  Don't be the key master from the matrix, let us help !  Last, design. We've gone through many prototypes to design our new Ti Skini and this is it !  We've developed a process that will lock your keys in for good, no loosening, slipping, etc..  
 

We're very excited to bring Indiegogo the dead sexy CINEIK Ti Skini by Cineik!  

Get the Ti Skini now at the very exciting price of $35 // $43!  (The Retail price at set to be $70 & $86, so this is truly a Great Deal!) 

 

 
 

Ti Skini Goal

Our goal is to offer an awesome accurate product that makes life simple and clean. With your help, we can pre-order the material, tooling, hardware, product packaging, etc.. needed to make this baby happen. From the company that brought the original key organizer K-Addict, now's your chance to help bring the Ti Skini to life !  

 

 

 

Ti Skini Fabrication -

The Ti Skini is CNC machined from a solid Titanium plate, chamfered and countersunk for a very smooth to touch finish. Vs parts the water jet/laser cut leaving a horrible sharp uneven finish & edge quality. The backside is UNC form ***special sauce*** tapped that requires no special screws. Yup, we make our own tools too ! :)   

For replacement parts, or to lengthen the Ti Skini you can buy screws from us or any local/online hardware store, it's that simple. We include 3 different size screws, tools, washers, etc.. everything you'll need from 1 - 30 keys.  The Ti Skini can be sized to fit almost any set of keys by adding longer screws.  We offer in two different finishes.

Polish Finish - Raw Titanium polish to shine

Anodized Finish - Polished Titanium offered in a variety of colors (see pics & chart)

 

Ti Skini Accessories 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Production delays can happen, but we always route our A, B & C path before running any project. There's always the possibility a computer, machine, power, weather, etc.. can go down during production and that time can lead to delays. No fear we have backup plans for things like this and always keep our backers in tune as things happen !

Please help and support the campaign! Feel free to drop us a line.

story:
Health prospect is an open access and peer-reviewed journal, published by The Nepal Public Health Students' Society at The Institute of Medicine, Kathmandu, Nepal. It initially started as a newsletter in 2000 AD and has been published in journal-format since 2013. It covers topics and areas which goes unheard in traditional journals.

Health prospect published around 30 articles per year between 2013 and 2016. Last year we only could publish 10 papers, as we faced a lot of challenges in publishing. While the lucrative business of publishing has gone wild in the west, this journal from the Himalayan nation is committed to being fully open access where authors pay no fees for publication, this is contrary to many contemporary journals which charge nearly 1500-2000 USD per paper.

We want to provide a modest honorarium to our reviewers of 5 USD for each article reviewed, which no journals does so far. We respect our reviewers and their commitment to improving quality of our peer-review process.

Formatting, typesetting and processing manuscripts into pdf include lot of hard work. So, we want to give a modest honorarium to our production editors; 15 USD for typesetting, and to managing editor; 5 USD for editorial support.  We use software like Adobe Indesign which a yearly license costs 300 USD.

To keep our commitment to publishing open access we need your support. So, please support our production team to publish them at least 60 articles per year.

Your contribution will be highly valued and will be published as an “Acknowledgement to our supporters” in the final issue of Health Prospect each year. We planned to raise 2,100 USD every year to this endeavour. Our commitment is to keep every spending transparent. Be our supporter.

No such thing called small donation, every contribution matters, and every contribution lights hope, every contribution motivates and change the perspective of people.

Our editorial team, 

Editor-in-chief

Shiva Raj Mishra, MPH, PhD(c)

Nepal Development Society, Nepal,

Faculty of Medicine, The University of Queensland, Australia

shivarajmishra@gmail.com

 

Managing Editor

Anupa Rijal, MscPH

University of Southern Denmark, Denmark

anuparijal@gmail.com

 

Executive Editor

Namra Kumar Mahato, MPH

Nepal Health Research Council, Nepal

namra.mahato@iom.edu.np

 

 

Senior Editors,

Non communicable diseases, & Implementation science

Aarchana Shrestha, MPH, PhD

Department of Epidemiology,  Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health, USA

 

Health Economics, & Access to medicines

Abhishek Sharma, MPH

Boston University’s Center for Global Health and Development, Boston University School of Public Health,  USA

 

Tropical medicine

Bipin Adhikari, MPH, Dphil(c)

Department of Medicine, University of Oxford , UK

 

International/Global Health

story_txt: Health prospect is an open access and peer-reviewed journal, published by The Nepal Public Health Students' Society at The Institute of Medicine, Kathmandu, Nepal. It initially started as a newsletter in 2000 AD and has been published in journal-format since 2013. It covers topics and areas which goes unheard in traditional journals.Health prospect published around 30 articles per year between 2013 and 2016. Last year we only could publish 10 papers, as we faced a lot of challenges in publishing. While the lucrative business of publishing has gone wild in the west, this journal from the Himalayan nation is committed to being fully open access where authors pay no fees for publication, this is contrary to many contemporary journals which charge nearly 1500-2000 USD per paper.We want to provide a modest honorarium to our reviewers of 5 USD for each article reviewed, which no journals does so far. We respect our reviewers and their commitment to improving quality of our peer-review process.Formatting, typesetting and processing manuscripts into pdf include lot of hard work. So, we want to give a modest honorarium to our production editors; 15 USD for typesetting, and to managing editor; 5 USD for editorial support.  We use software like Adobe Indesign which a yearly license costs 300 USD.To keep our commitment to publishing open access we need your support. So, please support our production team to publish them at least 60 articles per year.Your contribution will be highly valued and will be published as an “Acknowledgement to our supporters” in the final issue of Health Prospect each year. We planned to raise 2,100 USD every year to this endeavour. Our commitment is to keep every spending transparent. Be our supporter.No such thing called small donation, every contribution matters, and every contribution lights hope, every contribution motivates and change the perspective of people.Our editorial team, Editor-in-chiefShiva Raj Mishra, MPH, PhD(c)Nepal Development Society, Nepal,Faculty of Medicine, The University of Queensland, Australiashivarajmishra@gmail.com Managing EditorAnupa Rijal, MscPHUniversity of Southern Denmark, Denmarkanuparijal@gmail.com Executive EditorNamra Kumar Mahato, MPHNepal Health Research Council, Nepalnamra.mahato@iom.edu.np  Senior Editors,Non communicable diseases, & Implementation scienceAarchana Shrestha, MPH, PhDDepartment of Epidemiology,  Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health, USA Health Economics, & Access to medicines Abhishek Sharma, MPHBoston University’s Center for Global Health and Development, Boston University School of Public Health,  USA Tropical medicineBipin Adhikari, MPH, Dphil(c)Department of Medicine, University of Oxford , UK International/Global HealthPramod Regmi, MA(Population Studies), MSc (Public Health Research), PhD (Faculty of Social Sciences, Bournemouth University, UK) Health Policy and health systemsPratik Khanal, MPHKorean International Cooperation Agency, Kathmandu, Nepal Biostatistics and EpidemiologySaruna Ghimire, MPH, PhD(c)Department of Environmental and Occupational Health, University of Nevada, USA Assistant EditorsAney Rijal Institute of Medicine, Nepalrijal.aney@gmail.com Sweta MahatoInstitute of Medicine, Nepalshweta5iom@gmail.com Ankit AcharyaInstitute of Medicine, Nepaliamankit321@gmail.com More information,Journal, https://www.nepjol.info/index.php/HPROSPECTWebsite, http://www.nphss.org.np/jhprospect/Facebook, https://www.facebook.com/hprospect.nepal/Twitter, https://twitter.com/healthprospectLinkedIn, https://www.linkedin.com/company/health-prospect/ Journal OfficeHealth Prospect: Journal of Public HealthMehego Building, Institute of Medicine, Maharajgunj Medical Campus, Kathmandu, Nepal Queries related to campaign,Aney Rijal, Campaign Coordinator, NepalPhone:+9779849055766email: rijal.aney@gmail.com

story:
ALLDOX BUSINESS : Made with Solid Domain Experience

ALLDOX, Inc, is the young and enterprising venture behind ALLDOX. We are here to build the most trusted document management tool on earth. ALLDOX Home is already there, spreading 'Peace of Mind' about important documents in millions of homes in 219 countries.

We understand the pains of entrepreneurs trying to build remarkable ventures, pain of not finding documents in time, losing those precious minutes and living those moments of stress. So we have built ALLDOX BUSINESS, to power yourself and your team with those extra minutes of your winning times.

ALLDOX BUSINESS has scan on mobile, paper document location & movement management, auto upload by email, adding reminders to documents that need a future task like renewals or payments, password removal of third party documents, sharing in all possible ways including with a password, share rooms, claim rooms, offline, adding notes, auto suggest of folders (AI), signature and more best practices. It has AES 256 encryption with exclusive keys of every single user. With a focus on regular non tech users in small busineses ALLDOX BUSINESS is one-stop, easy and safe (secure & private). 

Available as web app and mobile apps on iPhone and Android devices. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need your active trial and open feedback to give you back a flawless, remarkable ALLDOX BUSINESS.
  • You get the product at a deep discounted price.
  • Plus you got the power to customise. Together we will build that remarkable experience.

The Impact

There are plenty of extensive and expensive tools and technologies for large organisations. Not for entrepreneurs in small businesses like yourself, while in many places you compete directly with those big boys. Together we will build ALLDOX BUSINESS to be a tool that genuinely transforms the way entrepreneurs and their team manage their important documents, they get more efficiency and more time to spend in their core area.

Get ALLDOX BUSINESS and get 'peace of mind' about your important documents!

How to claim your PERK?

1. Create  your ALLDOX BUSINESS account. You can download ALLDOX BUSINESS from iTunes or Google Play. You can also create account on web at www.alldox.com.

2. When you are signing up please opt for 6 users plan on 1 month trial.

3. Please send an email to support@alldox.com mentioning registered e-mail associated with your ALLDOX BUSINESS account.

4. In 3 business days, we will add 12 months of upgrade to your account. In case you are opting for 16 users plan, we will upgrade you to that as well.

story:
Short Summary

 Last Minute Hair is leading the charge as the first on-demand delivery service specifically for the beauty industry.

Last Minute Hair makes it easy for local beauty supply stores to market and sell their inventory directly to consumers through a mobile app and deliver from B2C in just one hour or less.  It allows users of the app to locate and purchase specific beauty-related goods from any beauty supply registered within a 40 miles radius. 

On top of all the incredible functions of LMH, they operate as a fulfillment and distribution center for private-owned beauty product lines. This fulfillment center will also permit the sale of beauty-related goods products as late as 1 AM for people with busy work schedules. \

Last Minute Hair provides three membership options for both beauty supply stores and beauty consumers. The memberships are broken into two subcategories—licensed and non-licensed. 

Last Minute Hair is making a pledge to sponsor a small beauty business with each goal made.

$500- Last Minute Hair will sponsor one local beauty supply store
$1,000 - Last Minute Hair will sponsor 2 local beauty supply stores
$2,500 - Last Minute Hair will sponsor 5 local beauty supply stores
$10,000- Last Minute Hair will sponsor 8 local beauty supply stores and
        five small beauty brands.
$60,000- Last Minute Hair will sponsor 12 local beauty supply stores and                               
        ten small beauty brands. 

$100,000 - Last Minute Hair  will sponsor 50 local beauty supply stores and 50 small beauty        brands

OUR MISSION:

To help stimulate economic growth within communities by making it easier for consumers to shop and support their local businesses specifically in the beauty industry.

OUR PHILOSOPHY:

When you look good, you feel good, and the feeling good should be accessible to all.

What We Need 

We are looking to raise $100,000 to take this venture to market

To go more in-depth on what will be using that capital towards I will breakdown below:

To build out the app will we be using 50% of the raised capital. This will ensure user security and give drivers a portal to sign up to start working.

The remaining 30% will be used for payroll. I have recently hired new employees to assist with the onboarding of users and stores. And I plan on employing more people as we grow. 

10% will go towards Operational costs such as maintaining and updating the software, processing inventory, sending out packaging materials to stores.

10% will go towards our marketing budget to help expand and scale the company.

The Impact

Because we are partnering with local beauty businesses, the products purchased through the app will be supporting businesses within the neighborhood. Leading to, what I hope are, stronger small businesses, stronger neighborhoods, and stronger economic growth in the community. Especially underserved communities. I am creating jobs and have included in my business model, an internship program for college students looking for real-world experience in tech. As we grow, I hope to be able to include high school students as well. We would also help after the program to assist with job placement and continuing education courses. 

Risks & Challenges

Right now our biggest challenge is building out our POS software. We are in the process of developing the wireframe and will use the capital from this crowdfunding campaign to further develop its functionality and ensure security. We have multiple versions of the app prepared, and will release the first version as soon as possible, and then additional upgrades as we continue to raise capital.

story:
PIN-Master® | Bringing Security & Peace of Mind

 

A wonderful gift item for the people you love. 

PIN-Codes and Passwords are a hazzle - and they do not become easier to remember as time goes by..... And to reduce risk we are requested to create stronger Passwords which are even more difficult to remember.

This new gadget can help you - it is 100% safe and secure - and very easy to use.

You will never be caught in an unpleasant situation - standing in a long queue and suddenly your PIN-Code is gone.... (we have all tried it).

PIN-Master® brings Security and Peace of Mind. 

 

Two versions: 30 codes or 125 codes

We are producing two versions of PIN-Master®:

Version 1: PIN-Master® with Capacity 1.000 characters. Up to 30 codes can be stored, each with a maximum of 32 characters (letters, numbers or symbols). Or 50 codes with an average of 20 characters.

Version 2: PIN-Master®+ with Capacity 4.000 characters. Up to 125 codes can be stored, each with a maximum of 32 characters (letters, numbers or symbols). Or 200 codes with an average of 20 characters.

The model with 125 codes is called PIN-Master®+ (Plus).

 

100% Safe and Secure

PIN-Master® is 100% Safe and Secure. It is not online and cannot be hacked. 

A security function protects your codes in case your PIN-Master® is lost.

Use it for your most critical and important codes. Especially the ones you would never store on your Mobile or in the Cloud. 

 

Strong Passwords reduce risk 

Most hacking related breaches are due to weak or stolen Passwords. Reduce the risk of hacking and potential theft of your IT identity by using strong Passwords. 

PIN-Master® allows you to create strong Passwords which you can remember when you need them. This brings Security and Peace of Mind.

 

Where do you keep PIN-Codes and Passwords?

Today access codes are used everywhere. Whether it is PIN-Codes, Passwords, User-ids, Login codes, Passport numbers or Bank accounts we are expected to memorize these by heart. 

PIN-Master® has been developed to assist you with this challenge - in a Simple, Secure and Safe manner.

Do you have codes which really ought not be stored on your Mobile phone or in the Cloud? 

 

Safe, Secure and Easy to use

  • One Master Code protects your stored PIN-Codes and Passwords.

 

Same size as a credit card

  • PIN-Master® is ultra slim and can be kept in your wallet.

 

How many codes must you remember? 

  • Store all your codes in one place and access them with one Master Code.

 

 

PIN-Master® can store all your codes

With the PIN-Master® organizer you can keep all your codes in one place and have them ready by hand when you need them. PIN-Master® can store codes which consist of numbers, letters and other symbols, so all sorts of codes can be managed.

In addition to A-Z (both upper and lower case), all digits from 0-9 and SPACE, we have the following special characters covered:
/ _ - . + ! & * # @ , $ % > < = ` ^ ( ) { } [ ] ~ ? '

 

You only need to remember one Master Code

When you switch on your PIN-Master® organizer for the very first time you will be requested to select your own Master Code. In the future you will only need to remember your own Master Code in order to get access to all your stored PIN-Codes and Passwords.

 

Same size as a Credit Card

PIN-Master® has the same size as a credit card. It is ultra slim and can be kept in your wallet. You always have your codes available when you need them.

 

Corporate gift item

By adding your company logo PIN-Master® becomes a very attractive gift item increasing IT security in your own company and among your customers.

Technical specifications

We are producing two versions of PIN-Master®:

Version 1: PIN-Master® with Capacity 1.000 characters. Up to 30 codes can be stored, each with a maximum of 32 characters (letters, numbers or symbols). Or 50 codes with an average of 20 characters.

Version 2: PIN-Master®+ with Capacity 4.000 characters. Up to 125 codes can be stored, each with a maximum of 32 characters (letters, numbers or symbols). Or 200 codes with an average of 20 characters.

Chose the model which covers your needs.

Credit Card size: 3.370 inches (width) x 2.125 inches (height) - (86 mm x 54 mm)

Ultra slim: 0.12 inches (3 mm)

Illuminated display

Battery CR2016 included

Stored data will not be lost after change of battery

Additional videos and information visit www.pin-master.com

 

Pictures from the production facilities

Testing of PIN-Master® LCD display and software:

 

Mold used for PIN-Master® Case/House including the battery clip:

 

Support PIN-Master® - Thanks

Your support is highly appreciated.

Thanks in advance.

 

PIN-Master® | Bringing Security & Peace of Mind

story:
The PixiAir v2 is the perfect on the go monitor. Stop using HDMI and Power Cables for your monitor and use PixiAir's built-in wireless functionality.

Unlike other portable monitors out there, PixiAir v2 extended monitor is 100% wireless and 100% compatible with all your devices: Computer, Phone, Tablet, game consoles,...

 

We have built PixiAir v2 because we were tired of working and traveling remotely without the right device or cable. PixiAir v2 is the ideal second screen companion for any remote needs.

Unlike with our competitors, PixiAir v2 allows you to present your screen wirelessly from any device, without the hustle. No need for an external socket. PixiAir v2, therefore, works especially well for devices like the iPad and the iPhone which have no sockets.

PixiAir v2 is plug & play without any software to install.

PixiAir v2 increases productivity and adds convenience to daily life. With your support, we can bring PixiAir v2 to the world and provide the ultimate portable solution for wireless screen extending.

 

 

We are a team of product designers and technology experts with years of experience in the field of remote wireless devices. We have created PixiAir v2 because we needed a true portable monitor that could easily be used with wired or wireless connection.

With PixiAir v2 anyone can present their screen easily and without complications, software, cables, and sockets. Help us to change the world with the power of technology.

PixiAir V2 is powered by a long range battery 3500 mAh.

 

 

 

 

We love Indiegogo and the Indiegogo community. The fact that people from all over the world can use Indiegogo to support products they believe in is extremely exciting to us.

PixiAir v2 is a ready to go and developed product. Feedback from current users has helped us to create a product that our Indiegogo backers will love.

 

 

All funds raised will go to manufacturing. The PixiAir v2 is developed and ready for high volume manufacturing which will allow us to get the monitor to the Indiegogo community at a never before seen price.

We have designed and built a world-class product and Indiegogo gives us the best opportunity to get the product into many people’s hands sooner than would otherwise be possible.

Join the PixiAir community and please share the campaign with everyone you know.

 

• Wireless connection up to 10 meters

• Compatible with all devices and software (even iPhone / iPad)

• No power cables needed (long range battery)

• Fits anywhere, light weighs only 900g

• Type-C Interface Monitor

• HDMI Interface Monitor

• Full HD 1080p

• 178° Wide Angle

• IPS Screen

• Slim design 8mm

• No software and easy setup

• Power bank functionality

• Built-in battery 3500mAh

 

 

 

The uses for PixiAir v2 are extensive. We have listed below the most common ways you can make the best of PixiAir v2.

• Use as a 2nd screen extension for work or watching videos

• Duplication of the main screen (Screen mirroring)

• On-the-go client presentations

• Gaming

• Ideal for home working without taking up desk space for cables

• Perfect for on the move thanks to the long battery life

 

 

 

 

The PixiAir v2 come with 15.6 inch IPS HD screen (1920*1080) is fully responsive and very durable, delivering maximum screen quality wherever you take your PixiAir v2.

 

 

Forget cables and wires! PixiAir v2 connects wirelessly whenever you need it.

 

 


A 3500mAh Battery capacity and our stereo speakers are just some of the features in addition to the Full HD IPS screen that make PixiAir v2 the perfect travel companion for any gamer.
Perfectly match Switch, PS3/PS4, Xbox and other main stream game consoles.

Switch does not need a dock connection, supports reverse power supply and games can be played anywhere.

 

 

 

PixiAir v2 is the ideal two-screen setup for when you are out of the office. Ideal for trains, planes, remote work, and anytime you need a professional two-screen set up ready to go.

Of course you can also use PixiAir v2 as your main monitor.

 

 


Showcase your work or impress your clients with high-quality presentations that will hit the mark.

 


PixiAir v2 has everything you need in a tablet and portable monitor, all in one device. The 178° wide-angle offers a perfect viewing experience.

 

 

 

Connect your phone wirelessly and turn on the TV mode.

In TV mode the phone can operate all other programs normally and without interruption.

 

 

 

Perfect for work and leisure. The PixiAir v2 comes with everything you need to take it with you straight out of the box. No adapters, additional cables, chargers, or software needed.

 

 

The PixiAir v2 is compatible with Laptops, smartphones, and tablet devices of the brands listed below and many more without the need for software. Simply plug and play. The PixiAir v2 works with all operating systems.

 

 

 

High-quality tech at a price never seen before. Our aviation aluminum CNC Stainless body and Ultra-thin CNC body design are durable and beautiful.

 


We know that everyone hates adapters! The PixiAir v2 offers every connection type and port you will ever need including 2 USB interfaces, HDMI, Type C, and DC ports. So whether it is a mouse, a keyboard, or any other device that needs connecting, we got you covered!

 


Take your PixiAir v2 anytime and everywhere. Our amazing Full HD screen is 15,6 inches large and the PixiAir 2 weighs only 900g.

 

 


The risks of our campaign are low. We have already developed and launched PixiAir v2 and had great user feedback. The goal of our crowdfunding campaign is to get PixiAir v2 in as many hands as possible.


To do so, we need to reduce the cost of manufacturing. Our goal is to manufacture 5,000 PixiAir v2 with your help so that we can achieve a great price point for all our backers.
