Stop using HDMI and Power Cables for your monitor and use PixiAir's built-in wireless functionality.Unlike other portable monitors out there, PixiAir v2 extended monitor is 100% wireless and 100% compatible with all your devices: Computer, Phone, Tablet, game consoles,... We have built PixiAir v2 because we were tired of working and traveling remotely without the right device or cable. PixiAir v2 is the ideal second screen companion for any remote needs.Unlike with our competitors, PixiAir v2 allows you to present your screen wirelessly from any device, without the hustle. No need for an external socket. PixiAir v2, therefore, works especially well for devices like the iPad and the iPhone which have no sockets.PixiAir v2 is plug & play without any software to install.PixiAir v2 increases productivity and adds convenience to daily life. With your support, we can bring PixiAir v2 to the world and provide the ultimate portable solution for wireless screen extending.  We are a team of product designers and technology experts with years of experience in the field of remote wireless devices. We have created PixiAir v2 because we needed a true portable monitor that could easily be used with wired or wireless connection.With PixiAir v2 anyone can present their screen easily and without complications, software, cables, and sockets. Help us to change the world with the power of technology.PixiAir V2 is powered by a long range battery 3500 mAh.    We love Indiegogo and the Indiegogo community. The fact that people from all over the world can use Indiegogo to support products they believe in is extremely exciting to us.PixiAir v2 is a ready to go and developed product. Feedback from current users has helped us to create a product that our Indiegogo backers will love.  All funds raised will go to manufacturing. The PixiAir v2 is developed and ready for high volume manufacturing which will allow us to get the monitor to the Indiegogo community at a never before seen price.We have designed and built a world-class product and Indiegogo gives us the best opportunity to get the product into many people’s hands sooner than would otherwise be possible.Join the PixiAir community and please share the campaign with everyone you know. • Wireless connection up to 10 meters• Compatible with all devices and software (even iPhone / iPad)• No power cables needed (long range battery)• Fits anywhere, light weighs only 900g• Type-C Interface Monitor• HDMI Interface Monitor• Full HD 1080p• 178° Wide Angle• IPS Screen• Slim design 8mm• No software and easy setup• Power bank functionality• Built-in battery 3500mAh   The uses for PixiAir v2 are extensive. We have listed below the most common ways you can make the best of PixiAir v2.• Use as a 2nd screen extension for work or watching videos• Duplication of the main screen (Screen mirroring)• On-the-go client presentations• Gaming• Ideal for home working without taking up desk space for cables• Perfect for on the move thanks to the long battery life    The PixiAir v2 come with 15.6 inch IPS HD screen (1920*1080) is fully responsive and very durable, delivering maximum screen quality wherever you take your PixiAir v2.  Forget cables and wires! PixiAir v2 connects wirelessly whenever you need it.  A 3500mAh Battery capacity and our stereo speakers are just some of the features in addition to the Full HD IPS screen that make PixiAir v2 the perfect travel companion for any gamer.Perfectly match Switch, PS3/PS4, Xbox and other main stream game consoles.Switch does not need a dock connection, supports reverse power supply and games can be played anywhere.   PixiAir v2 is the ideal two-screen setup for when you are out of the office. Ideal for trains, planes, remote work, and anytime you need a professional two-screen set up ready to go.Of course you can also use PixiAir v2 as your main monitor.  Showcase your work or impress your clients with high-quality presentations that will hit the mark. PixiAir v2 has everything you need in a tablet and portable monitor, all in one device. The 178° wide-angle offers a perfect viewing experience.   Connect your phone wirelessly and turn on the TV mode.In TV mode the phone can operate all other programs normally and without interruption.   Perfect for work and leisure. The PixiAir v2 comes with everything you need to take it with you straight out of the box. No adapters, additional cables, chargers, or software needed.  The PixiAir v2 is compatible with Laptops, smartphones, and tablet devices of the brands listed below and many more without the need for software. Simply plug and play. The PixiAir v2 works with all operating systems.   High-quality tech at a price never seen before. Our aviation aluminum CNC Stainless body and Ultra-thin CNC body design are durable and beautiful. We know that everyone hates adapters! The PixiAir v2 offers every connection type and port you will ever need including 2 USB interfaces, HDMI, Type C, and DC ports. So whether it is a mouse, a keyboard, or any other device that needs connecting, we got you covered! Take your PixiAir v2 anytime and everywhere. Our amazing Full HD screen is 15,6 inches large and the PixiAir 2 weighs only 900g.  The risks of our campaign are low. We have already developed and launched PixiAir v2 and had great user feedback. The goal of our crowdfunding campaign is to get PixiAir v2 in as many hands as possible.To do so, we need to reduce the cost of manufacturing. Our goal is to manufacture 5,000 PixiAir v2 with your help so that we can achieve a great price point for all our backers.

story:
Witit Backers

Whether you are backing this project, sharing it with your friends, family, and followers, or just plan on signing up when it launches, thank you. Your support is inspiring a new generation of wealth creation for EVERYONE on the planet with access to internet and a passion to share.

 

Witit: Turn your social life into your source of income.

Witit is a social media/professional app and website that makes it easy for your friends, family, and followers, to support you. Helping creators get paid for their passion and helps anyone turn their social life into their source of income.

 

The current problem with social media as a creator or a professional.

There is an increasing number of people making an incredible income off of social media. The problem is that the social medias that make it easy like Twitch, Patreon, and OnlyFans, are not for everyone. And the other social medias require an extreme amount of effort to find success. Fighting against ad space and a monstrous algorithm.

Everyone should be able to make an incredible income with their skills and talents. Witit is designed to make this a reality for everyone.

 

The current problem with social media as a user.

Don't you hate that social media apps now try and control so much of what you see? Whether it's with ads or an algorithm, we are no longer in control of what we experience. Not only that, because of this new culture of ads and algorithms, it has become harder than ever for creators and professionals to make an income with social media. Lower income means lower quality content. Forever scrolling through mediocre social media feeds to see the same things again and again. No ingenuity because there's not enough of a budget to create on the level these people want to create on.

Witit strives to fix that. Giving you the power to support your favorite creators and professionals directly, ultimately leads to far superior content and even helps enable greater relationships with the creators and professionals.

 

Witit: A new social economy

Witit is a place that helps support you. Built in a way that heavily encourages and rewards users for engaging with others and supporting creative and professionals. Witit makes it easy to find creators/professionals and sort them by their following, reputation, experience, and locations.

No more wasting time and money on a website, 100 different social accounts, and walking people through your sales pitch. Everything is all in one place with Witit.  

 

Your Profile

First thing people will see when they view your profile will be your highlights. This is a nicely organized, portfolio style, page of photos and videos that you can mark as a highlight. To showcase your best work.

Profiles also display 3 metrics:

  • The number of followers you have.
  • The amount of experience you have.
  • Your reputation.

Experience is gained by interacting with other users, spending money, and earning money. Your reputation is a a rating out of 5 stars that is an average of how people have rated paid transactions with you.

Easily navigate someones profile by just tapping the menu on the top left.

Feed: This is a reverse chronological feed of all the posts you've made, similar to other popular social media apps. Meaning, you see the most recent posts first!

Exhibits: These are premium posts that you charge people to access. Whether it's a photo set you're proud of, a video you made, or a tips and tricks guide, this is a place where you have all of your "pay to access" posts.

Services:  You will have  the ability to list of services on your account and allow people to see what you offer and order your services on demand.

Pay per minute: Set up a rate per minute and allow people to request your time to talk on the phone or video chat through the app!

Witit also has a clean and easy to navigate desktop version!

 

Posting on Witit:

  • Content: Witit will allow you to post high quality photos or videos.
  • Exhibits: Charge access to premium posts.
  • Accept Tips: Choose to accept tips on your post!

The Home Feed/Trending Feed:

  • No algorithm feed: Your home feed will show posts from people you follow in the reverse order in which posts were made (newest first), uninfluenced by some greater algorithm.
  • Feed personalization: Your feed will allow for the ability to sort content. For example, if you only want to see funny posts, you can select "Humor" and you will only see funny things from the people you follow. This is
  • Trending: The trending page will have a sort of algorithm but much more geared toward supporting users equally. This page will also allow for the sorting of posts.
  • Freedom: Both the home feed and trending feed will allow for the ability to post uncensored content that may not be suitable for all audiences. We want to give creators the power to post content they are passionate about with minimal restrictions. However users will have to turn on that ability from a desktop computer. Mature content will appear blurry as a content shield and only revealed when clicked on, incase you're in a public space. Mature content will also be completely unavailable for users under the age of 18.
  • Award: Each day you can award one post as your "Favorite post of the day" doing this helps the post make it to the trending page!

The Community Page:

  • A community directory: Search through different kinds of creators on the app and sort them by their following count, experience, reputation, and more! Great for finding new people or a professional when you have a question.
  • Trending users and services: On this page you will find trending users and services.

Current Progress:

After 2 years of ideation and the past 8 months of development the app is actually almost complete! We just need to raise a little more to complete the project!

At its current state you can:

  • Sign up
  • Edit your profile
  • Create posts
  • Scroll through your feed
  • Message other users

What we need the remaining funds for is development costs for:

  • Set up the payment system for every feature
  • Profile services set up
  • Community section

Stretch Goals

$25K: If we can raise $25,000 I will make sure we include some form of story feature on the app!

$50K: With $50,000 we can afford to onboard tons of your favorite creators and professionals! We also will be taking requests!

story:
Getting creative with 3D printers is amazing but it's not easy to print large, complex 3D models with typical 3D printers. Many of them cannot support the demands of high quality, large scale prints.  Prints such as these require special printers that are expensive, fragile and not easy to operate and maintain.

 

So we created PrintHero, an industrial level 4K SLA 3D Printer for large-scale Prints. It includes special features such as extra-large print volume, 4K high resolution, and premium build quality that makes 3D printing efficient and easy for anyone!

 

 
  • Unrivalled Large Build Volume

PrintHero was designed to print extra-large projects that fit the size of big dreams. Supporting build volumes of up to 293*165*400mm, users can print whatever they desire in a groundbreaking large scale.

 

 

Thanks to extra-large build volume, PrintHero is able to complete 34 pieces of standard dental model within 2hours at one-time, drastically boosting the printing efficiency. 

 

  • Fast Print Speed

The printing speed of PrintHero is up to 30mm/h. It enables handling of high-volume print jobs faster, drastically reducing necessary work hours.

 

  • Large Resin Volume

Packed with a 3kg resin volume, PrintHero can be printed continually, bring out the maximum of the creativity without adding resins many times.

 

 
  • Precision and Accuracy

PrintHero is equipped with a 13.3” Industrial LCD Screen with 3840*2160 ultra-high resolution. Its 76μm XY and 10μm Z resolution lets you obtain ultra-fine print quality with more detail and dimensional accuracy.

 

 
  • Uniform Exposure for 98% Surface Area

PrintHero delivers a uniform exposure for 98% of the surface area. With it, 3D models can be printed accurately within the whole printing area, which delivers a coincident precision to every dimension of 3D models.

 

  • Superior Build Quality

We used an all-metal design for PrintHero`s body not only to make it durable and stable during printing but also to make it a piece of art that will complement your workspace.

 

The hydraulic rod flip cover design allows you to operate it with one hand, saving time and effort.

 

  •  Dual linear rails and ball screws on Z-axis 

The unique dual-liner slides are designed to ensure the smooth and high-precision movement of the 3D printer.  It can avoid print misalignment and provides a lifting force of up to 100kg for easy printing and demolding.

 

  • Ultra-long Working Life


            The standard LCD screen can withstand a working temperature of 60 Celsius degrees. For the SLA 3D printer, it is designed with LCD-SLA principle and needs to place the LCD screen above the ultraviolet lamp. So if the temperature is too high, the LCD screen will be damaged and the printer will not work properly. 

 

PrintHero is designed with a super heat dissipation system and unique photothermal separation technology, which can keep the temperature of the LCD screen below 50 Celsius degrees even for a long time working, greatly extending the working life of the LCD screen.

 

  •  Easy to Use 
  •  Multifunctional Resins 

PrintHero comes with high quality liquid resins that are very affordable. We created 3 types of high-precision resins that satisfy the needs of any type of print project.

 

  • Compatible with 3rd Party Resin

PrintHero is also compatible with most available third party resins and you can use additional paints to achieve any color match you want.

 

  • Smart Touch Screen

With the deluxe 5'' touchscreen monitor on the body, users can change print settings & track printing status anytime with simple touch controls.

 

  • USB Drive & Wi-Fi Control

Other 3D printing systems are complicated and time-consuming. PrintHero is easy to use and you can get started printing in seconds with one-button prints and file transfer using LAN, USB drive or Wi-Fi connection.

 

Thanks our backers Roi and Douglas for providing us these prototypes, and we’ve printed.  link: https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:533652; https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:2810666;

https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:4543820.

If you have some prototypes to print, welcome to share them in the comments and we’ll print for you.

 

 
 

 

PrintHero has been producing high-quality 3D printers for years. Now we enter the second stage of our brand development, marked by this SLA 3D printer. We still adhere to the original intention of making good products, and constantly bring good products to this world we love. 

 

 

Upgraded resin tank design mould:

 

Schoen’s Batwing Vase – Math Art by Dizingof
www.3Dizingof.com

story:
About this project

Introducing Tack-On Labels

Uber transformed the world of taxi cabs with technology and an idea about sharing. AirBnB disrupted the lodging industry with technology and sharing. Everywhere we look, technology is changing the way we interact with the physical world and replacing old, dated technology.

What about notes? Post-It Notes (or sticky notes as it is also known) were invented nearly 40 years ago and became the fifth best selling product of all time. They got bigger and smaller and more colourful but they could not play music, show websites, play a video, send text alerts or be interactive. They could hold a few words of text or even a doodle but they could not provide a multimedia stream of two-way communication – until today.

 Announcing, Tack-ON, the new digital sticky note of the digital age. TACK-ON makes notes interactive. Tack-On makes notes a two-way communication. TACK-On is an interactive electronic hard drive on paper. TACK-ON is a stylish interactive digital sticky that SENDS YOU reminders, stores audio files, stores video files, becomes short cuts on your favourite activities and streamlines repetitive actions. TACK-ON notes can be recordings, text alerts, geo-tagging locations, storing HTML links (such as simple kitchen recipes), photo storage and so much more.



Usages of Tack On Labels

Innovative ways to connect, create and communicate

Besides the typical usages of sticky notes as tags to organize and prioritize at home, school or the office, there are many other ways we can use Tack-On labels. Below are some examples.

1) Love Notes

Add Private Messages To Your Loved Ones

Let your loved ones know you are thinking of them. Instead of sending a plain card, you can now add your personal secured video and audio message with Tack-On labels. Simply record your video or audio messages into a Tack-On label and paste it over your greeting card. To ensure privacy, passwords can be added so that only the intended recipient can access your intimate message.

2) Gifts That Talk

A Personalized Talking Gift

Gifts can come to 'live' with Tack-On labels. Tack-On labels allow personalized gifts engraved with custom messages. You can now send gifts personalized with your own video and audio messages. These unique talking gifts can be a lasting memory a loved one will cherish for years to come.

3) Multimedia Markers

Mark Your Tutoruals, Books & Presentation With Interactive Contents

Tack-On labels allow you to add multimedia markers to your applications, be it tutorial notes, story books, scrap books, presentations materials, resumes, recipe books or objects. With a scan on the Tack-On labels, the markers are transformed to 'live'.

4) Education

Decrypting your notebook. We’ve all been there — you took the best notes possible…but now they’re lost in the sea of information and that is your notebook. Tack-On labels get you the essentials quickly and easily.

Tutorial notes, lecture handouts and textbooks can be labelled with interactive contents on Tack-On labels in the same manner as storybooks and hence making revision an easy-breezy task.

5) Storybooks Come Alive

Convert Your Storybook Into An Interactive One

Tack-On label can transform a story book into a recordable talking book. Parents can now read their precious loved ones a bed time story even when they aren’t able to be there in person. Storybooks are no longer confined to a 2D printout. Videos and audios can be linked or recorded into the Tack-On labels. These labels are pasted in the storybooks as markers. With a simple click and scan, the entire storybooks become interactive.

6) Medication Notifications & Expiry Date Alerts

Medication Notifications & Expiry Date Alerts

Medication alerts are important notifications sent to individuals, reminding them to take prescription medication at the times and in the amount prescribed by their doctors. With the aging of the world's population, medications are being prescribed at an ever increasing rate. Unfortunately, patients are not taking these medications properly and this is creating an additional health hazard.

Tack-On labels can be attached to medications and provide notification alerts via the smart phone. Reminders can be set in the labels to remind patients to take their medications at a prescribed date and time and in the proper dosage.

Besides medications alerts, Tack-On label can also track the expiry date of medications and sent notifications to the user when the expiry date is near.

Tack-On labels could help reduce wastage in perishable food, cosmetic and health products with the expiry date alert and notification. This is due to the cost-effective ability of the Tack-On labels to reliably identify tagged items as well as gather informations on their conditions. With specific focus on expiry date and remaining shelf-life, the consumers can manage the wastage with ease.

8) Geo-tagging Digital Prints

Tack-On labels allow one to share the location of the photos taken or where the video is captured. Hence, photo albums, scrap books and presentation materials can have the location of the subject pinpointed and shared with Tack-On labels.


How to use Tack-on Labels

1) Stick Tack-On label on a desired object for example: notes, presentation materials, gifts and medications.

Scan Tack-On Labels And Add Contents If Label Is Blank

2) Download the Tack-On app. Open the app and scan the QR code on the label. If the label is blank, app will prompt you to create and add content. If the label is not blank, the contents will be displayed after scanning the QR code. 

Apps Available For iOS and Android Users

3)  Follow the App procedures to add content to that label and set access protections (TACK-ON can be Password protected). These contents include text alerts, notification alerts, video recordings, audio recordings, photos storage and playback, html link and geographical tagging.

Simple as that – content is now built into that Tack-On label – ready to be retrieved.

Technical Details

1) Unique QR codes

Each Tack-On label contains an unique QR code. A total of 56billion QR codes can be assigned per year based on the Tack-On codes allocation system.

2) Memory space

Every Tack-On label is a hard disk on paper. The memory allocated for each typical Tack-On label can contains the following :

•  25sec of video clips in HQ quality

•  6 High Def photos

•  25mins of audio recording

•  500 text wordings


3) Robust and Secured Crowd Hosting

Tack-On engaged secured and robust cloud hosting solutions in that it has security built into every aspect of the solution rather than bolted on top.Multiple layers of security are implemented inside and outside of the infrastructure, with all the pieces working together as one system instead of functioning as a collection of independent parts.

4) Support both iOS and Android OS platform

The Tack-On app used to create contents supports both the iOS and Android OS platform.


Timeline


Patent Pending

Tack-On Sticky Labels' are unique in that they are specifically designed and manufactured to makes notes interactive.Tack-On makes notes a two-way communication. TACK-On is an interactive electronic hard drive on paper. TACK-ON is a stylish interactive digital sticky that SENDS YOU reminders, stores audio files, stores video files, becomes short cuts on your favorite activities and streamlines repetitive actions - just a sheet of paper with an integral sticky note-like adhesive. Our patent-pending product is extremely simple, but amazingly convenient.


The Journey Behind Tack-On

We've gone through an immense journey to get to the design that we are offering today. Below you can see the different prototype steps we have gone through to finally bring you Tack-On labels.

The team has spend several versions of the labels and modifying the features. We have re-spin on the product designs at least 6 times before bringing it to the market.

After finding the right design, we looked at several factories to identify suppliers to start prototyping.

We have assembled the prototypes and started the pilot run to prepare the product for manufacturing. A lot of changes were made to the initial prototype design.

And now, we are ready to bring the Tack-On label to you...The Journey is yet to be over.

We are asking for your help here on Indiegogo! The funds we raise will be used to:

• Perform more stress testing and refine our firmware

• Get the required product certifications such as FCC and CE

• Design and production of branded packaging

• Procure production supplies in large quantities to minimize cost

• Produce, assemble and ship the devices to you

• To help meet the manufacturer minimum requirements in order to launch the initial line of products.


Thank you!

Great things are built with the support of a lot of great people. We are endlessly grateful to our dedicated volunteers who helped us while we were testing our products, collecting and summarising feedback, spreading the word and providing the emotional support when we needed it most.

And if you made it until this point on this site, THANK YOU! We hope you, too, will become part of this story with us. If you like what you see, please pick a Perks.

If you have a question that you can't find an answer to here, please don't hesitate for a second to get in touch with us!


Risks and challenges

We have already extensively researched and tested various technologies and materials for the Tack-On Labels. The biggest challenge we face is being able to manufactured labels that integrate both our design and technology to be affordable for the mass market. The funds we raise during this campaign will ensure that we are able to make a large enough order to our manufacturers to bring the price per unit down far enough to allow us to guarantee that the finished product will be available after the campaign at a price that remains affordable.


Our Story

The Tack-On Labels are the brainchild of Tack-On LLC. Tack-On LLC is founded by tight group of professionals with varied areas of expertise and experience, mostly from the server architectural and industrial design fields. We’re young, dynamic, and creative, and we came together to realize a common goal: that of making brilliant and simple accessories that make your life more enjoyable.
story_txt:
About this project
Introducing
Tack-On Labels

Uber transformed the world
of taxi cabs with technology and an idea about sharing. AirBnB disrupted the
lodging industry with technology and sharing. Everywhere we look, technology is
changing the way we interact with the physical world and replacing old, dated
technology.
What about notes? Post-It
Notes (or sticky notes as it is also known) were invented nearly 40 years ago
and became the fifth best selling product of all time. They got bigger and
smaller and more colourful but they could not play music, show websites, play a
video, send text alerts or be interactive. They could hold a few words of text
or even a doodle but they could not provide a multimedia stream of two-way
communication – until today.
 Announcing, Tack-ON,
the new digital sticky note of the digital age. TACK-ON makes notes
interactive. Tack-On makes notes a two-way communication. TACK-On is an
interactive electronic hard drive on paper. TACK-ON is a stylish interactive
digital sticky that SENDS YOU reminders, stores audio files, stores video
files, becomes short cuts on your favourite activities and streamlines
repetitive actions. TACK-ON notes can be recordings, text alerts, geo-tagging
locations, storing HTML links (such as simple kitchen recipes), photo storage
and so much more.




Usages of
Tack On Labels

Innovative
ways to connect, create and communicate
Besides the typical usages
of sticky notes as tags to organize and prioritize at home, school or the
office, there are many other ways we can use Tack-On labels. Below are some
examples.
1) Love
Notes



Add Private Messages To Your Loved Ones

Let your loved ones know
you are thinking of them. Instead of sending a plain card, you can now add your
personal secured video and audio message with Tack-On labels. Simply record
your video or audio messages into a Tack-On label and paste it over your
greeting card. To ensure privacy, passwords can be added so that only the
intended recipient can access your intimate message.
2) Gifts
That Talk



A Personalized Talking Gift
Gifts can come to 'live'
with Tack-On labels. Tack-On labels allow personalized gifts engraved with
custom messages. You can now send gifts personalized with your own video and
audio messages. These unique talking gifts can be a lasting memory a loved one
will cherish for years to come.
3)
Multimedia Markers


Mark Your Tutoruals, Books & Presentation With Interactive
Contents

Tack-On labels allow you
to add multimedia markers to your applications, be it tutorial notes, story
books, scrap books, presentations materials, resumes, recipe books or objects.
With a scan on the Tack-On labels, the markers are transformed to 'live'.
4)
Education
Decrypting your notebook.
We’ve all been there — you took the best notes possible…but now they’re lost in
the sea of information and that is your notebook. Tack-On labels get you
the essentials quickly and easily.
Tutorial notes, lecture
handouts and textbooks can be labelled with interactive contents on Tack-On
labels in the same manner as storybooks and hence making revision an
easy-breezy task.
5)
Storybooks Come Alive



Convert Your Storybook Into An Interactive One

Tack-On label can
transform a story book into a recordable talking book. Parents can now read
their precious loved ones a bed time story even when they aren’t able to be
there in person. Storybooks are no longer confined to a 2D printout. Videos and
audios can be linked or recorded into the Tack-On labels. These labels are
pasted in the storybooks as markers. With a simple click and scan, the entire
storybooks become interactive.
6)
Medication Notifications & Expiry Date Alerts


Medication Notifications & Expiry Date Alerts

Medication alerts are
important notifications sent to individuals, reminding them to take
prescription medication at the times and in the amount prescribed by their
doctors. With the aging of the world's population, medications are being
prescribed at an ever increasing rate. Unfortunately, patients are not taking
these medications properly and this is creating an additional health hazard.
Tack-On labels can be
attached to medications and provide notification alerts via the smart phone.
Reminders can be set in the labels to remind patients to take their medications
at a prescribed date and time and in the proper dosage.
Besides medications
alerts, Tack-On label can also track the expiry date of medications and sent
notifications to the user when the expiry date is near.
Tack-On labels could help
reduce wastage in perishable food, cosmetic and health products with the expiry
date alert and notification. This is due to the cost-effective ability of the
Tack-On labels to reliably identify tagged items as well as gather informations on their conditions. With specific focus on expiry date and remaining
shelf-life, the consumers can manage the wastage with ease.
8)
Geo-tagging Digital Prints
Tack-On labels allow one
to share the location of the photos taken or where the video is captured.
Hence, photo albums, scrap books and presentation materials can have the
location of the subject pinpointed and shared with Tack-On labels.

How to
use Tack-on Labels
1) Stick Tack-On label on
a desired object for example: notes, presentation materials, gifts and
medications.


Scan Tack-On Labels And Add Contents If Label Is Blank


2) Download the Tack-On
app. Open the app and scan the QR code on the label. If the label is blank, app
will prompt you to create and add content. If the label is not blank, the
contents will be displayed after scanning the QR code. 


Apps Available For iOS and Android Users

3)  Follow the App
procedures to add content to that label and set access protections
(TACK-ON can be Password protected). These contents include text alerts,
notification alerts, video recordings, audio recordings, photos storage and
playback, html link and geographical tagging.
Simple as that – content
is now built into that Tack-On label – ready to be retrieved.

2) Memory
